Author: Andy
Title: Best blender ever!
Body: I use the single serve most frequently for myself. I can make a smoothie for on the go in seconds. It’s fast and blends so well. I’ve never had such a good blender. We blend everything in the main container from margaritas, to smoothie, to shaved ice!

Author: H Pauley
Title: Best out there.
Body: Does everything and more we hoped for. Awesome product.

Author: Shirley's Wellness Cafe
Title: Best blender I've ever had
Body: I just love everything about this Ninja BL660 blender. I use the little cup blender for making whipped cream or for making sauces. I use the large blender to pack it full with veggies or fruits. It does a fantastic job at chopping or blending.

Author: Cortervette
Title: Great product.
Body: Love the blender

Author: Jamie
Title: Best ever!
Body: I love my new Ninja blender. It works really well and is so easy to clean up. I use it often for smoothies.

Author: Rachel
Title: Nada
Body: Súper padre

Author: Joe Sams
Title: Awesome
Body: We’ve had this for a year and it has been used a lot. A perfect blender. Very sharp blades and well built. My favorite thing to make is key lime pie. The recipe comes with it. It will chop up a brick of cheese for tacos, make smoothies, milkshakes…it’s powerful and well worth the money. A fun Little machine.

Author: TOKUNBO OLUBUNMI OGUNDIRAN
Title: I enjoy it.
Body: I like the product.i use it for home use

Author: Ogechi Olawale-Oladipupo
Title: Glad
Body: I hv been having issues with my other blender and this came with a relief.

Author: James K. Smith
Title: works great
Body: very good product - it works great

Author: Amanda Prewett
Title: Easy to use
Body: This is a great product. I love it so much and it's so easy to use.

Author: Andy
Title: Good
Body: Quiet

Author: Andrew McNair
Title: A work in Progress
Body: This blender does leak a little from the top when in use in spite of the top being completely closed. This is the only flaw that I have experience with this blender. Thank you.

Author: Denise A
Title: Good Product
Body: I'm using my blender to make smoothies, jucing and protein shakes. I probably should have a juicer but this is working out fine.I put in ice, frozen fruit and more.The only issue I have is that water and condensation gets in the handle. Not sealed properly.

Author: Lynne Chernasky
Title: Disappointing
Body: I bought this as a replacement for our old, worn Oster blender. I use it to make smoothies in the morning. I bought it thinking the 16oz cups that came with it would be convenient. Unfortunately - if you fill the cups to the max fill line, once blended, you'll only get 1/2 cup of smoothie and while the motor should be more powerful than my old, much less expensive, Oster - I have to run it three times as long and still end up with whole pieces of spinach and chunks of fruit which never happened with the Oster..

Author: Mariana Morais
Title: Pretty good, but the lid…
Body: 2 - 3 months after we purchased the blender and now it’s leaking from the lid… It seems the rubber they use for the sealing system becomes dry so fast. Anyway, good product but we are really disappointed with the quality of lid materials

Author: Jamiegirlx
Title: Too louf
Body: Too loud not easy to clean

Author: Chelle Walker
Title: Awesome
Body: Best blender ever

Author: Candice Murray
Title: Powerful
Body: Had some friends over for margaritas and received many compliments about how powerful this thing is. I love it

Author: H. Alexander Castro
Title: Super effective blender with 2 smaller
Body: Super effective blender with 2 smaller

Author: angie
Title: Mine broke after one use
Body: Got in End of April used it once packed it away securely in original box inside a tote. Went to use it today and it wouldn’t work. I troubleshooted everything. It wouldn’t work. I called the service hotline and they are sending me a new base but I have to pay the $21 shipping charge.

Author: beverly weidner
Title: Love it. Especially individual size
Body: Great power and multiple size blenders is handy. I love Ninja products and this is one of the best. I make a smoothie every morning & it handles the frozen fruit perfectly.Also love my Ninja slow cooker and air fryer!!

Author: Willie Buhay
Title: Blender heaven!
Body: This was a gift for my girlfriend. She was using a magic bullet blender for a diet she makes shakes with.I noticed her struggling as it was too small and she would have to do multiple batches just to incorporate ally the fruits and veggies and other ingredients.She saw th size of the ninja pro and she immediately had to try it. She was very happy and the multiple blades not just on bottom like magic bullet really makes a difference. She was blending through kale, pears, apples etc like nothing!She even made enough for me to have a shake. Plus it Comes with extra cups which really made he happy!She also loves the power of the blender making it easier and quicker for her.Very happy with this blender and my girlfriend literally smiles while she’s using it. I spy on her and it’s the cutest thing ever!

Author: Sher Doxzon
Title: Works like a charm
Body: Love it!! Not much more to say. Works great and looks pretty on my counter, too!

Author: Annika Turner
Title: Great
Body: Easy to clean, use and super fast

Author: David S.
Title: It was good until it wasn't
Body: Great blender until the blender (part with the blade) sheered (from vibration) the plastic that holds the screws in for the blade assembly on the bottom. Less than a year after purchase and customer support said that part was not covered. I never want to buy from Ninja again.

Author: N W
Title: Wasteful, difficult to clean, easy to cut your fingers.
Body: I don't like this product at all. It doesn't blend well at all. It spews ingredients all over the inside of the jar and I would have to scrape down the sides AND inside of the lid multiple times. My husband cut his finger badly while taking it out of the box and I cut my fingers a little each time I used it even though I am being careful. It's awkward to use and to clean and I feel like I lose 3-4 tablespoons of food when I clean it. I've never had these problems with any other blender I've used. I really regret buying this one.

Author: Evangelia
Title: It's more powerful then ever!
Body: I like the product because it has more accessories and attachments for many people.

Author: Susyq
Title: Makes great smoothies
Body: I’m not sure why all the reviews are bad. We’ve had this for almost a year (2021) and have zero problems.Makes great smoothies. No issues with cracking breaking etc.

Author: kojo paul
Title: Doesn't last long
Body: It stopped working after few years had to throw it away

Author: sandra l griffith
Title: Good while it lasts
Body: This is my 2nd one. This last one is barely a year old when the canister has cracked again. It looks like the crack started where it is attached to the center piece. Doesn’t hold up. Very disappointed.

Author: Zen
Title: Just okay
Body: Product is just a simple ninja blender. Only a few months & it stopped working!!!! Waste of money, it's best to save & invest in Vitamix

Author: Jess
Title: Cracked and leaking
Body: Cracked and leaking after less than 8 months of very light use. Wish I could return

Author: JOSE ALFREDO LOPEZ
Title: Excelente
Body: Buen artículo, súper recomendado!!!

Author: maggiemay
Title: Perfect for my need
Body: I drink protein shakes daily and cleaning the whole blender is a nuisance. I love the single serving container with lids to drink from. When I'm done it easily goes right into the dishwasher~

Author: Raza
Title: Stopped working after a year. Barely used
Body: Stopped working after a year. Barely used

Author: ashley bean
Title: Love
Body: Great purchase

Author: Panasalsa
Title: Ninja blender
Body: It was a wedding gift. They loved it

Author: Jose Figueroa
Title: Misleading Reviews - Difficult/Dangerous to Clean (Avoid)
Body: I hardly ever write reviews, but I would definitely encourage you to avoid this product. The blades are extremely difficult to clean after use without dishwashing machine. There are many grooves in the housing of the blade and the actual container portion. The blades are very sharp, so if you make an attempt to clean it by hand... you will get sliced. The cups that come with them are pretty small and also difficult to clean by hand since they are small. You will need a brush to get the inside. If you use a dishwashing machine, then sure, this blender will do the job just fine though the container is pretty large to fit in standard dish washing machines.I would just avoid altogether, personally. I know the 4.8 star rating (at the time of this review) is tempting, but just be cautious when cleaning by hand if you do get it. I've gotten sliced twice :(

Author: Gregory S Tullo
Title: Unlike your husband, it's quiet and effective
Body: Yes... That is a direct quote from my darling wife.If you blend often, do yourself a favor and spend the extra money on this. It is quiet, easily blends, and blends completely.Unlike the cheap ones, it is much quieter, does not dance across the counter, and it is easy to clean.

Author: Sisi.S
Title: Best blender ever
Body: Does the job and fast. Very powerful blender. I use it a lot to do smoothies and gaspacho.

Author: Tina Marie
Title: Works Great
Body: Great for making my smoothies and anything else i need to blend

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Was not tested.
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   I write from Venezuela, I had to wait a month for it to reach me and today it is finally with me. Unfortunately not in the desired condition. Speed ​​level 2 does not work so I am assuming the blender was not tested. It's very frustrating what happened.

Author: Russ Walker
Title: Cheap plastic pitcher!
Body: I have always been a big Ninja fan and advocate, as have only used this blender a handful of times and have hand washed it and yet the bottom of the pitcher has cracks coming from and around the heat shaft. The cost of the pitcher alone, a half the cost of the entire blender package!Very disappointed in this product!

Author: MJS
Title: This is my best purchase EVER
Body: I truly like this product and use it almost every day for my evening smoothie. It has great blending power and it's relatively easy to clean.

Author: Doug
Title: Is this new?
Body: The picture of the box is how this was shipped. It was sitting on my front porch as you see it. No wrapping. No outer cardboard. Just a ninja mixer sitting on my front porch. I love my neighborhood but that’s pretty. blatant even for here. The second picture is of the inside of the mixer. Some kind of glue or caulk is visible and some remains inside the mixer-as if I could scratch it off. It’s not under the glass.

Author: Pumpkin Pie 39
Title: I used it 365 days of the year.
Body: I work this blender to the bone. I use it every single day and it has lasted for 2 years. I just recently bought a new one because I thought my old one was dying but it's been 3 months and it's still going strong. I love this blender. It's the hardest working appliance I own.

Author: Kate625
Title: This Ninja is a BEAST!
Body: My son bought this while living at home during covid. No longer able to “ deal with” mom and dad’s blender…. Ohmygosh was he ever right! We pop on the small container to make smoothies regularly. And I use the large one regularly to make sauce. Attachments go on seamlessly. No wrestling with anything… just glides on. The large one is big enough that I can blend 2 28oz cans of tomatoes with ease. And the blades stay locked in as I pour the sauce out of the spout on top. Every time I use it- sheer joy realizing how simple this makes my tasks. It cleans like a dream too. And Chefie tip- you can also blend warm water and a small shot of dish liquid for cleaning it on the spot. I love love love this machine and told my son he has to buy another one for me before he moves out. But who’s kidding who here??? He’s never leaving. Careful with the blades. They are incredibly sharp!

Author: Kayla
Title: Great blender!
Body: Gave this as a wedding gift. I have owned one of my own for years and it still works as great as it did when I took it out of the box. Great product!

Author: Cassandra McClain
Title: Pitcher cracks after minimal use
Body: This is a poor quality product. You'll be satisfied for a short time until you find several cracks at the base of your blender's pitcher(didn't take long for me), after which you'll regret having made this purchase in the first place(several reviews back this up, wish I had seen those sooner). It seemed like a great value over more expensive blender products, but if the pitcher cracking is inevitable, better to simply spend more money on a better quality product to avoid the hassle of replacement and the bitter disappointment.

Author: Lottalatte
Title: Not worth it unless you don't want a smoothie.
Body: This does not blend everything to a smoothie liquid form.There are chunks left (veggies and fruits, mind you) even though I let it run for a while, which makes no sense. Not sure why such a great rating, but this deceived me.Returning it ASAP.

Author: Dean Braband
Title: Amazing!!
Body: Great for smoothies!!

Author: Shawn Widgeon
Title: Worse blender
Body: Blinking red light constantly would not work.

Author: MOMMY
Title: My Coquitos come out perfect!!
Body: This is exactly what I needed to make my Coquitios, its easy to use, easy to clean and it doesn't make loud noises. Blends really well. It looks super nice as well, I feel like I have a very expensive blender

Author: Cesar Alexis Goza Rivera
Title: The best one
Body: The media could not be loaded.

Author: CJ Lester
Title: Not powerful enough
Body: I replaced my nutra ninja 900 with this, believing it would be more powerful and versatile. It is neither. My date paste has chunks no matter how long I blend. My matcha frappe has almond milk ice cube chunks. Flaxseeds don’t break down at all. The two smoothie cups that come with it are too tiny to make a decent smoothie. I’d return it if I could but am outside the 30 day window. Gave it a good try.I just ordered a nutri ninja again.Don’t buy this if you want any decent blending capability.

Author: Cami
Title: Hazard
Body: After almost one year of biweekly use this item started smoking and burning itself! Luckily I was in the kitchen when it happened and immediately stopped the blender.I called the warranty dept to have it replaced under the 1yr warranty and have still yet to be addressed and treated as a decent customer. I rarely post reviews but the BEYOND TERRIBLE Customer Service from the claims dept, warranty dept, escalation dept has motivated me to share my experience. It’s been 4 days of complete run around from the teams at Shark / Ninja. I initially spoke to Ian, & I completed a video call with Ian to verify the blenders malfunction. He promised the claims dept would call me the following day, which someone named Nicole from Escalations did call at 9:15am and left a call back number for me. I returned the call at 9:25am and have been continuing to call everyday to speak with Nicole. No one has followed up with me for days, not even an email to provide a status update. Every time I call I get the same response, “ the escalations team will call you in 2-4 hours”. I even had specific warranty reps state they have spoken to Nicole and she promises to call back in 2-4hrs (which is a ridiculous time frame)… no one ever calls..Over the past 4 days I have spoken to a number of reps from Ninja including Mitsey, Tiffany, Camille, Daniel 3x, Shanice, Christopher and Manager Alejandro who promised to resolve the issue and have Nicole from Escalations reach out to me today at 9am… you take a guess if I received a call…I am beyond frustrated with Ninja & their associates. I do not recommend using their products being that they are hazardous and their customer service needs massive overhaul!Protect your family, home and peace by not purchasing this product. This is truly an unfortunate situation and this company clearly does not care about its paying customers.

Author: Wally
Title: Hace muy bien el trabajo
Body: Me gusto que es fácil de usar

Author: Duane A. Peck
Title: great!
Body: for myself

Author: EO37
Title: Darn bean counters!
Body: I do like the product but I do hate that the bean counters got to the lids and eliminated the part that seals the drinking hole of the caps so you won’t be packing a smoothie for later in the day with these. My plan was to take both smoothies to work. Thanks to the a**hole bean counters I can only take one using the blade cap. My brother recommended this product but his earlier model did include sealable drinking caps. I’m not at all happy with that. And, either their website doesn’t provide a way to communicate my dissatisfaction with them, or it’s hidden well enough to discourage it. Therefore, I recommend looking for a more suitable product and skip this one altogether.

Author: R.Runions
Title: Love it!
Body: Powerful and sharp as can be. You will not be disappointed.

Author: Mindy
Title: This blender does an amazing job crushing and mixing. It's just noisy.i
Body: I use this product for making smoothies. I just wish it wasn't as noisy. However, I would buy it again.

Author: Kathy Bednar
Title: I used the last one for many years and it started to lose power
Body: works good with frozen fruit when making smoothies and the size is perfect. This is the second one I have purchased.

Author: CassyLynn
Title: It does the job
Body: This is a great blender to kick start my healthy habit of drinking smoothies. I’ve been doing this for 3 weeks and no issues. Easy to use and the 3 speed level does a good job blending all ingredients. To make my smoothies less grainy, I blend the greens with the liquid first before adding my fruit and other good stuff. I wished it had a turbo burst like I’ve seen on other high powered blenders , but honestly don’t know if it will be any different. I ramp it up to 3 and it works. My smoothies are smooth enough for me.

Author: KeithArthur
Title: Small jars should be spill free
Body: I dislike the fact that the to-go jars do not have spill free covers

Author: Nolac
Title: Excellent, superior blade system; but why only 4 stars??
Body: This is a very good blender, the blade system is really powerful and better designed than Nutribullet...BUT, why only 4 stars rating? Because (1) they don't have 4 1/2 stars (this is 4 1/2 stars). I deducted 1/2 a star because compared to Nutribullet I owned before, the material components are less superior than Nutribullet, the base power in Nutribullet was much heavier and steadier and plastic components were thicker and better. Nevertheless, I am happy and content with this blender. Definitely does the job for the price. A great plus for me are the cups---much slimmer and easier to hold & open than the Nutribullet cup which has wider and chunkier body.

Author: maritza rosales
Title: No la available Mal aspects la caja rota la devolve porque Era Para un regalia y Lucia vieja
Body: No me agrado El aspecto la caja rota la devolve sin abrirla

Author: Peter
Title: Burning ninja bl 660
Body: Don.t buy this blender, I order this blender on September 25, 2021, after using it for smoothies, this morning which November 11, 2021; the blender started burning and a lot of smoking coming out, and stop working. Because over 30 days return policy, and I need to pay for $26 for sending it back.

Author: Yelina Columbie
Title: Lo mejor
Body: La calidad del producto es excelente

Author: Ang
Title: Second time to buy
Body: We received the full-sized Ninja blender as a wedding gift in 2014. I used it almost daily for about 4 years before it broke. I replaced it with the smaller, individual cup blender and used it for about 3 years. We wanted another full-sized blender and decided to get the combination full-size and individual set this time. The quality is great, just as before, and now we have the ability to go big or small depending on the job. I love using the large container to make almond milk and the smaller ones for smoothies.

Author: Gerard Baptiste
Title: Better than advertised
Body: Easy to use

Author: Oxana
Title: Best blender so far
Body: Great purchase! Very noisy but very powerful!

Author: Sabrina Emmorey
Title: Burn motor first time using
Body: Plugged into surge protector never turned on started burning

Author: Tasha
Title: Fantastic investment
Body: Love it and I’m so glad it came with single cups to make smoothies on the go super and easy.

Author: jvrobertson
Title: Single Server Stopped working after 14 months
Body: Loved this Blender. Used about once a month for 14 months. Single server stopped working. Problem with Amazon- and company I am just out 100$ plus - After researching online, this seems to be a common problem. Don't buy!

Author: Juan Senegal Sr
Title: Have not used it much yet
Body: Got it to make green smoothies

Author: Michael A Rivera
Title: Cracked in the bottom after only 1 yr
Body: Product works good but there’s a crack on the bottom that has a small leak. Not crazy bad but should have been better quality. Get a better model.

Author: Moenasha Kinlaw
Title: Crushes thick ice easily
Body: Haven’t used it much I will update my review later-

Author: Erin
Title: No chunks smoothies
Body: I am amazed each time I make a smoothie and there are zero ice chunks. Works like a dream. Worth every penny.

Author: Trevor
Title: Great blender
Body: It works well.

Author: joe
Title: Fast service
Body: Vary dependable great product

Author: Mr. Fleas144K
Title: Feels upgraded from my old one but less powerful.
Body: It's obviously lower wattage/HP to my older 1.5 HP Professional Ninja unit. Not quite as much umph but everything is still the same great quality. The Tritan plastic is even nicer than the original and I like how sharp everything is. I was sold on the old infomercial where they turned the wood cubes to sawdust. This one is lower power but with the upgraded motor it could probably still make sawdust.

Author: Tomás
Title: DO NOT BUY - Cracks develop in the base and leak
Body: Look to buy a different blender. Cracks will eventually develop in the base and your contents will leak everywhere. NINJA wanted $65 to replace.

Author: Stacy
Title: Seems to blend well enough.
Body: Everything seems good. It all works.

Author: Tracy
Title: Buy this blender
Body: There is nothing this blender won't blend, frozen or not....it's a must buy

Author: Gina
Title: It's the best blender I've owned
Body: I ordered this blender to mix smoothies only. It is super powerful - but still noisy. I wouldn't want to use it in the morning and wake the whole house up, but am still recommending it. I looked at the others with the enclosure case to knock out the noise, but $$$. This is great quality and a great price.

Author: Israel Araujo
Title: Great product
Body: This is the best blender i have ever owned

Author: Cocorico
Title: A great blender
Body: I never had a blender that could make a smoothie so easily. No need to chop large frozen pieces, it works very fast and blends without stalling EVER. I love it and make myself a smoothie a lot more often now. It was too much work before, too much time and energy handling frozen food. Now I pour what i need in the blender, add some liquid, turn it on, turn it off. That’s it!

Author: Ruby Rodriguez
Title: So amazing, made a great gift !
Body: I accidentally broke my moms blender (it was glass and i dropped it) so i wanted to replace it with a great one and this one is so amazing !! I’d definitely buy again if I had to.

Author: oscar solorzano
Title: Excellent
Body: A little noisy, but an excellent blender

Author: Sandie Beltran
Title: blends smooth and quick
Body: I use it to make smoothies. It is fast and makes them very smooth. I also use it to quickly chop carrots for my soups. Just a couple short bursts and its ready to pour into the soup.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Smoke in the kitchen
Body: This review is written 1 year and 2 weeks after I purchased the Ninja blender.A few days ago while making a smoothie (water, soft fruits and 3 cubes of ice) the unit started to release a strong smell. While I approached it, suddenly thick smoke started to be released from the Ninja Blender and filled the kitchen with this smoke having a very strong smell. I immediately unplagued the unit from the power electricity outlet.As a good customer and as a concern for the safety of future customers, I have called the customer service and told them about it. I proposed to send them the unit so that they could inspect it to prevent any danger that can occur to their customers in the future. I was told they don't do that because of COVID-19.Since all this occurred only 2 weeks after the warranty expired, I was told that I need to pay full price to get a new one, when I insisted that this does not make sense I was offered to pay 50% and refused. Indeed, they don't have to since a year passed but due to the unusual safety circumstances I was expecting more from a company as big as Ninja.My review here is not due to frustration of not getting a new unit, I will buy one from a different brand anyway, It is just to make sure that before you buy this blender you are aware of what happened to me.So - if you are planning to buy this blender, take into consideration my story and make sure to check if you have smoke or strong smell from your unit.

Author: Queticoman
Title: IMPOSSIBLE to Clean!
Body: I wanted to love this blender but cannnot. The vertical triple blade comes out of course but you can't get between the 6 blades w/o cutting your hand or between the bottom section where food gets TRAPPED. If you don't need a huge portion, just buy a regular sized blender. I bought it for the Single-Serve additional mini that it includes but this mini doesn't blend typical smoothies (like spinach, peanut butter, ice) very well. I should have just spent the extra $$$ and bought a professional-grade one. After reading all the problems w/the pitcher cracking, I might just return this anyway...kind of a waste of time.

Author: Liz
Title: I love this blender!
Body: I liked everything. It was easy to put together and use; the instructions were great. I made two smoothies immediately using frozen items, hard to chop fruits; it did a fabulous job. I live in a small apt., did not find the noise level to be excessive at all. The power of this blender is all I was looking to get! It’s easy to clean, but you must be careful with the blades of the large blender. They are sharp. Instructions give the best way to clean them. Great purchase!

Author: 1fleshnhim
Title: Wonderful tool to add to our kitchen!!!
Body: I love the ease of use! Our coffee frappes are turning out perfect!!!

Author: Sonia
Title: Wish it blended better
Body: I've only used the single serving one since I do smoothies everyday. This really doesn't blend good at all. Cheaper ones blend a lot better. I tried giving it a try but it just leave chunks and its so loud :/

Author: dennis k sullivan
Title: Does all I need it to.do.
Body: Use it for smoothies, perfect for that.

Author: Karen
Title: A great purchase
Body: Great purchase it operates well especially blending the fruits and vegetables

Author: Harry V.
Title: Not worth purchasing
Body: I had a ninja 1000w and it was more powerful than this ninja product very disappointed

Author: leonshargo
Title: My new kitchen staple
Body: Saves you time and efforts when it comes to chopping, blending, etc. I am pleasantly surprised with its features.

Author: Marcia
Title: Does not blend smoothies as well as bullet. Single serve cups are too small and poorly designed.
Body: I thought this was going to replace my bullet, but it doesn't. It is convenient for making a big batch of smoothies, but it doesn't blend as well as the bullet. Oatmeal, blueberries and seeds in the smoothie remain a bit gritty. The single size cups are only 16oz which means the fill line is below that -- way too small for a decent size smoothie. The single serve also can only be pulsed, so you have to hold the button on the entire time. That's a lot of holding if you use frozen fruit. The blade top threads/screws on to the outside of the cup, while the sip top screws on to the inside of the cup. So there is always smoothie you have to wipe off from the outside threads. There are no larger aftermarket single serve cups for this model ... only 16 oz. I'm disappointed and undecided as to whether to return.

Author: Laura
Title: Turns Ice into Snow
Body: Love everything about it. Only thing is the noise is high. But overall a great blender.

Author: Adriana
Title: We use this everyday for smoothies!
Body: The only thing I would mention is the blades are SO sharp they are tricky to clean.

Author: Elle
Title: It’s a Beast!
Body: Love this blender! It has made many of our favorite drinks so much easier to make! Love it!

Author: Blue Rocket
Title: Achilles heel is no replacement for rubber suction cup feet
Body: There is much to like about this blender. Our family uses it daily. Even my customer service experience was commendable in many ways. Their ability to create a video call led to a faster resolution. But that is the root of the problem. There was no resolution. The suction cup feet are literally the achilles heel. Why? Because they are not replaceable, making your blender less stable and less safe. The suction cup feet are a part on the blender you cannot yet purchase or find a replacement. If you want suction cups on your blender so it does not wobble, you need to purchase a new blender. They do not even have a sku for these rubber suction cups or list them as available replacement parts.

Author: JJG
Title: Love it.
Body: Just what I needed, exactly as advertised.

Author: AMW
Title: Loud
Body: Love it but it’s loud!

Author: darlene roberts
Title: It works well at the cost of your hearing.
Body: Have had zero issue with it for the years we have had it. Except for the fact that it is EXTREMELY LOUD.

Author: Patty
Title: Amazing!
Body: This is the 2nd Ninja I have bought. Only reason for getting a 2nd one was because my kids broke my blender cup. But, I am glad I bought this one because it is more quiet than the previous one and the blending is even smoother than ever!!

Author: Virginia
Title: Blenders are loud
Body: I love it! It's on the noisy side, but it's a blender. I did smell a slight odor of heating plastic toward the end of my blend (a single serve). Which I'm hoping is normal, but I love it. So far, so good!

Author: unknown
Title: Excellent
Body: Great quality!!! Worth the money!!! Would buy again!!!

Author: LE
Title: Hard to clean
Body: I would not recommend! Didn’t even know this ring came out…was very hard to get out had to use a fork. When I was trying to deep clean this is what I found….. yuck!

Author: Syed S.
Title: Gone bad after year an half of use
Body: I bought this product last year, and it has gone bad after year and half of use. Specifically the motor stop working. It looks like I am out of warranty for the product. Not sure if this is a common recurrence or just my specific piece.

Author: William's mom
Title: the best blender I've ever owned!!!!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Unexpectedly dangerous!
Body: Don't get me wrong - this is an incredible blender. Just phenomenal. Mashes everything I put in it to a pulp. But for safety's sake, I wish I had waited until I could afford a Vitamix. Reason? Vitamix's blades are at the bottom whereas the Ninja has this core of blades that run through the middle from top to bottom. And they're sharp as all get out. My husband went to move a piece of fruit near the top and sliced his thumb pretty deep with no effort whatsoever. Which also makes it slightly treacherous to clean. You don't need that stress in your life. You really don't.

Author: Dana Longo

Body: Works better than any other blenders. And I have broken many in the past !

Author: Wally
Title: Pitcher cracked after 18 months - VERY common problem!
Body: A broken and leaking pitcher is apparently a frequent problem. It took ours out of commission (see photos), and a replacement pitcher is only slightly cheaper than an entirely new blender. The forums and reviews have DOZENS of reports of this happening. Also, the crappy pitcher design prevents water from draining out of the four little corner pockets when you wash it upside-down in a dishwasher, so the goop that accumulates in them is DISGUSTING, and darn near impossible to clean out because of the size and shape (see photo).A pity, since we LOVED the blending - efficient and powerful. Made awesome hummus. But now we’re stuck spending more money and looking for another brand name that not built as cheap after only 18 months of use.

I have owned other blenders in the past with no issue such as this. I will do my research and buy a different product. its a shame i had bought so many of their products in the past I expected the blender to hold up over many years and see this as a lost investment. if i expected a blender to crap out in a year i'd have bought something cheaper. eesh, something went wrong with the manufacture. i hope i never accidentally inhale something like that again while looking at my smoothie of only blue berries, bananas juice and yogurt. blahh

Author: Kenneth H. Beckett
Title: EXTREME safety hazard! YOU WILL BLEED.
Body: Tried to pick up the blade pillar to clean it, and it sliced one of my fingers open. So, with extremely light pressure, tried again - and sliced another finger on the other hand. From the reviews, I see this is a common problem. The blade assembly is very heavy, and the top is tapered and slippery when wet, but if you try to pick it up between the blades and you touch one, you will bleed. The blades are insanely sharp - pretty much zero pressure is required to cut you to the bone! They will pass through your flesh like it's made of warm butter. I very much doubt it's necessary for these blades to be so sharp to do their job when spinning at high speed - I use and handle other blenders all the time, and touch the blades, and have never been cut by one (and I've been doing this almost 50 years). I didn't even use the blender myself - I was just trying to clean it for my wife after she chopped some nuts and it left residue on the blades. I probably saved her from being sliced open, but I've told her I will never touch this blender-from-hell again. Yes, there was a warning about the blades being sharp, but it was definitely not firm enough. It should say that it's almost impossible for your finger to touch a blade without being instantly sliced open. The cuts aren't small, either - about 1/2 long and very deep. I think both times it wasn't the end of the long curving blades that got me, but where they have a little elbow right where they protrude from the shaft - they are super-thin and super-sharp there.

Author: Margaret K. Kutz

Title: Almost perfect.
Body: My original Ninja just died after ~7 years of use. I was making at least 3 protein shakes at a time 3 days a week for the 1st few years. I looked at a lot of blenders and kept coming back to the Ninja. Overall, it is fantastic. Fast and much quieter than my 1st one. Reasons for only 4 stars: 1. the blender cup lids are open. My original ones had a flip away snap to close the opening. (see me making a mess somewhere in the future) 2. The plastic used for the blending pitcher is flimsy compared to my original one. 3. The rubber suction cups on the bottom are annoying. I had my original one for ~7 years and never needed suction cups to keep it on the counter.

Author: P. J.
Title: Most overrated blender on market
Body: Have owned this blender for several years now and am consistently disappointed by its performance at almost every use. The large blender unit in spite of its formidable looking multi-blade is very poor at mixing and can hardly crush normal sized ice cubes which spin and skitter around inside for many minutes without being crushed. Not good, in other words, for ice based smoothies. The noise is also horrendous and deafening. Frankly, it puts out so many decibels that it should come with a warning to wear hearing protection, especially given how long you have to run it to get a smoothie.The smaller single cup units actually work better than the big one (they are geared to spin faster) but are not without problems: they tend to cavitate easily and then the small blade just spins in a pocket of air and does nothing. Also the gasket (O-ring) that seals it gets moldy and stinks after a few weeks of use because food gets behind or under it. After a few more weeks, if not cleaned, the mold begins to turn the light colored rubber gasket black and it has to be thrown away. Getting it out to clean it is an incredible pain. We use a dental pick, but it occasionally cuts or perforates the O-ring decreasing its life span further. There are blenders one third of the price that function as well as this one. Would definitely not buy a Ninja again.

Author: snowdrop
Title: I hate this blender so expletive much
Body: I use a vitamix at home, but my sister had purchased this for my mother to replace an old blender from circa 1996. This has been such a disappointment for the price point. I’ve used it 3x and I am ready to light it on fire and bring my small several years old vitamix to my mom’s to replace it.The first time I used it, I made a green sauce and was a little irritated that it didn’t blend greens smoothly. The second time, I tried to blend rolled oats into oat flour and after several minutes of blending at various speeds there were still chunks of oats in it. The third time, I made a cashew-based dip using cashews I had boiled for about 20+ minutes to ensure they were nice and soft because I didn’t trust this blender; after blending for 20 or more minutes, my sauce was still slightly grainy with visible tiny chunks of whole spices and I finally gave up… this is a sauce that takes me 1-3 minutes in my vitamix and should have whipped up like whipped cream. Given how much time I had to blend this for in the ninja to get mediocre results, I’m pretty done with trying to use this and think I’ll just try my luck with the food processor next time instead.Additionally, it’s annoying to get onto the base and even more annoying to clean. With my vitamix, I just rinse it out, throw a few drops of soap into the container and fill it about 1/3 full with water, run it on high for a minute, and then rinse off the parts and it’s clean. This blender gets sauce caked on to the middle of the base just below where it attaches that doesn’t come off with rinsing or blending and requires manual scrubbing. It’s also quite loud, which I wouldn’t have an issue with if it didn’t take so many minutes for it to barely accomplish the most basic blending functions.I cannot reiterate how useless this blender is. If you’re doing any sort of blending beyond something simple like smoothies (which I could still have accomplished with my mom’s 25 year old sunbeam), run away from this.

Touching any of the blades at all with your hands will result in deep cuts. Would not recommend this to a household with children.

Author: Tasha Prefect
Title: I don't want a blender subscription service!
Body: I really like this blender, but after 9 months I noticed cracks in the large container. I can feel the cracks on the inside so I am done using it. I contacted SharkNinja thinking that this should qualify as a defect in workmanship, but it does not. The price of a new one container is $65. I was offered a one time half-off of that, but not is not good enough. I don't want a blender with a subscription service! I had my previous blender for 20 years and yes, I did purchase one new container for it, but that was after 15 years. If this one hadn't cracked for even 5 years, I would consider getting a new container,, but after 9 months.

Author: Don
Title: Best yet
Body: This blender is by far the best. There's nothing it can't do that a blender is supposed to do. Lots of power.

Author: Federico Dominguez
Title: Lo mejor
Body: Poder de mezclado, fácil de limpiar, ruido normal, moliendo hielo para bebidas, buena capacidad, esta excelente.

Author: masha
Title: Could this be rated more than 5 stars?
Body: So for about $100, we got a ridiculously powered blender and 2 individual travel mugs. This not only blended everything it encountered into something my jaw-fractured husband could imbibe during his 2 months of having his jaw wired shut, but it provided the unforeseen benefit of creating multiple single-serving blends.Think chicken vindaloo can't be make into a full liquid diet-compliant smoothie? Then you haven't tried this Ninja blender. This was the single best purchase I've made in the past 6 months.

Author: Mimi1104
Title: Not Worth the Money
Body: I can't understand why so many people think the Ninja is a good lower-cost alternative to a Vitamix. This blender was a pain from Day 1. I use a blender almost daily for morning smoothies and this only chops veggies & fruit, doesn't completely blend them (although the small individual cup does a great job). Must be positioned just right, lid difficult to clean & dry, the suction feet on the base all came loose over time and eventually all 4 of them came off at each use and had to be repositioned before putting the blender away. I suffered with this thing for over 5 years. Just bought a basic Oster for less than half the price of the Ninja and couldn't be happier. Smooth and completely blended smoothies in seconds.

Author: J. Dunn
Title: Extremely loud, shakes the body, unusable for smoothies.
Body: It works great when using the large regular blender BUT sounds like the motor is going to blow-up when using the smaller smoothie containers. The body shakes, gears sound like they're grinding, and it will wake the neighbors. (literally) It's practically unusable for smoothies. Very surprised given all the reviews. Perhaps this is a bad unit or it's simply cheaply constructed. Really disappointed with this unit.

Author: Skydale
Title: Not durable! Handle broke preventing it from working.
Body: After not having it that long at all the handle broke and that is preventing the whole blender from working. The black piece along the handle just popped of at the top and it is preventing the lid from going on right which is preventing it from working. For being on the pricier side it is not durable at all. The cheap $20 blender I got from Walmart lasted longer and was more durable. Also when I blend eggs I didn’t want to use the big blender and I would use the individual size and the eggs or anything that was somewhat liquidy would leak out all over the place. Also beware the blades don’t stay in place so be careful when you pour anything out of it the blades will fall out. I cut my face pouring a smoothie, why I was holding it so high when I was pouring it into a cup who knows.

Author: EnaidPI
Title: It's amazing
Body: Bought this one because we needed bigger capacity and our old one was too loud and didnt leave our shakes all that smooth. The moment we started using this one, OH BOY. Leaves it almost as smooth as water and although it makes noise, it wasnt as loud as our previous cheaper one. I recommend!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A Quality Purchase
Body: Great power and smaller individual cups are easy to clean.

Author: Shawnee Ray
Title: Works great!
Body: Love this blender! It is perfect for my morning smoothie and anything else I need blended.

Author: Pork Chop
Title: Neat!
Body: Strong blender, tricky to clean because of the blade configuration (not recommended to hand wash, ended up slicing my thumb open) and certainly not quiet. The noise levels are pretty brutal. But it works wonderfully for large batches and solo servings alike by swapping out

Author: enoc jimenez
Title: Great product to have
Body: Great product to have

Author: RoadCop
Title: Amazing Blender
Body: The first time I used it, I was blown away at how well it worked. I highly suggest this item to Anyone who is in need of a blender. I generally got it for frozen summer drinks, I find myself using it for so many other things. You can find a cheaper blender, but that's exactly what you're getting, a Cheaper one and you wont be happy.

Author: Roberta Givans
Title: Fantastic
Body: Blends very well, very easy to clean, some noisy, but understandably

Author: Demetria
Title: Mold in the Pitcher Handle
Body: I really like it but after using it for several months, I noticed mold growing in the handle. It was less then a year so I called Ninja. They sent me a replacement pitcher and said I had a 3 month warranty on it. Well that was January 2021 and now there is mold growing again in the handle and I cannot get a replacement. I am disgusted and don't want to use something with mold. The design is defective if it is not sealed properly and allows moisture into the handle. I don't think I will purchase their products again because of this. It is a shame since it worked great. The customer service person said they have not had any other complaints but I find that hard to believe since I had 2 in a row with the same problem.

Author: Selsimar Gertrudes

Body: Good

Author: Eric Powell

Title: Purchased this 6 years ago, still going strong; is loud though.
Body: I purchases this unit 6 years ago (June of 2015) and its been going strong the entire time. My only complaint is that it gets louder with age; still works great though. Just make sure to clean the gaskets regularly.

Author: joshua lewis
Title: Damaged on first use
Body: First time using the product and it breaks

Author: Eric Adamian
Title: This blender is not safe to use
Body: After receiving the blender, I took it out of the packaging and BOOM sliced a part of my finger off right away. I didn't actually try the blender or use it, so I can't vouch for the quality. But looking back at it, why does it have 3 separate blades running through the blender? That can't be safe for anyone trying to clean it...had to go to urgent care because of this. Would recommend a blender that only uses blades at the bottom of the container (much easier to clean).Definitely a Ninja because of the ninja stars that cut my finger and caused me insane amounts of blood loss...

Author: Sean

Author: Art
Title: I have used better
Body: I have used a few times now to get a feel of the product. I had a vitimax and it died on me the second use but the first use it was excellent. So in comparison to that first use of the vitimax I would give it 5 out of 10. The three blades are not a bad feature but they don’t chop up the ice or suck it down from the top to get blended. Additionally it does not blend to the point where your smoothie is smooth like the vitimax, you still get some bits of ice.The challenge to this unit is cleaning. The blades are not easy to clean. I have cut my fingers three times now and since the blades are sharp the cuts are long and deep, which take days to heal. So you have to be very very careful when cleaning the blades. Because I use peanut butter and other similar products the blades need a wash cloth to clean not just a rinse.I’m going to keep and continue using because at least it works! Maybe I had a bad Vitimax but that blender for the first use was excellent. The jury is still out if I would recommend this product

I bought another one for my Mom.

Does not happen with non dairy milk, but sometimes I want to use regular milk. Also the blend to go cups are too small for a complete meal, only 16 oz. My husband wanted to buy a Walmart vitamix instead and I insisted that this was better, but I was wrong. I will sell my blender on Facebook marketplace since it is now used and go to Walmart and buy the vitamix instead.

Title: Great Blender
Body: We bought this and have been using the main blender for smoothies and never thought we'd be using the individual blending cups for blended iced coffees as much as we do (almost every day). The three level blade system is great for chopping everything in the blender (not just leaving chunks of fruit or ice on top like normal blenders sometimes do. Thing runs a little loud, so if people are still sleeping it's going to be a wake up call, but if you have a blended ice coffee ready for them it definitely softens the blow! Fairly easy to clean, the blades are removable and the pitcher is very easy to clean. Would definitely buy again.

I try to stuff as many greens and fruits as I can, but it's pretty limiting in the 16oz cup. I also like to use the XL pitcher for pureeing foods for my dog's homemade food.

I love the option of having the cups to make single serving smoothies (double if you're splitting it between two kids!) without having to use the whole blender. Overall, it's quick and convenient!

Disappointed with the individual serve option…not sure if there was something defective with the single serving blender, but the large blender and the 6 blades will cop/blend up almost anything and it holds so much food!!!

Author: The Doners
Title: Do not buy
Body: Main blending container is cracking after 3 months. We use it 1x a week for smoothies.Parts are NOT covered under warranty and replacement is $65!NOT WORTH THE MONEY

Author: JKev
Title: 2 Cracked pitchers in 2 months
Body: First pitcher cracked after a week. It cracked on the sides, so I figured its the frozen fruit hitting it too hard. Called Ninja, at first they said I had to pay for a new one, that this was normal wear and tear. After a lot of arguing, they finally agreed to replace it once for free.Second pitcher, I was very careful with. Never put it in the dishwasher, didn't use frozen fruits. Today, I saw it was cracked, but this time on the bottom, not where bruits get thrown by the blades against the sides.This particular blender was a replacement to a 3 year old one that had the first pitcher last more than 2 years of near daily use. The second pitcher on that one failed after a couple months. Now these two fail in days. Clearly, Ninja has changed something in their materials in the last couple years. NEVER AGAIN.

Author: Carmin Spells
Title: A keeper
Body: I love the attachments and the simplicity of it. The blades are awesome and my items blended very well.

Author: Humiliated Grapes
Title: Ninja blenders/customer service are awful!
Body: First, I should note how I use blenders. I use one every single day to make smoothie bowls or shakes for breakfast and sometimes for sauces and blended soups ... and the occasional frozen cocktail. I'm gentle with my appliances and never put anything in a blender that would cause it to work too hard. The only solid things I ever put in it are frozen fruits (always in small chunks), and occasionally some ice - pre-crushed by my refrigerator's ice dispenser - and always with adequate liquids to keep things moving smoothly.Now that you know my typical use, I can explain why I will never purchase another Ninja product again. This is the second Ninja blender I've wasted my money on in the span of two years. The first one (a different model) broke between the base and the blade assembly. The motor ran, and the drive stud would spin, but the blades didn't. That happened within 9 months of using it. I returned that to Costco (and got a refund, thank God) and did my research and, against my own better judgment, bought this one. After LESS than a year of use, this one also broke. One day it just decided it randomly didn't want to spin anymore. I'd push the buttons and all I'd hear is a click - no motor spinning. This would happen intermittently, but more often than not. I contacted Customer Service at Ninja and told them about the issue. They had me video chat with them and show them what was going on. Of course, during the chat, it worked fine. They offered to send me a new blade assembly. I told them I didn't think that would fix the problem, but they said it would be the first step in fixing the issue and sent it to me anyway. Ok, fine. When the new assembly showed up, I attached it and, sure enough, the blender still didn't work. Surprise, surprise! (giant eyeroll). By this time, the blender had completely stopped working. I called to tell them it still was not working and video chatted again, this time showing the clicking/not spinning. I said I thought the problem was most likely an issue with the base and asked if they could send me a replacement. Because they sent the assembly to me for free, they told me that sending a new base would require me to pay the shipping price of $20. Ummm.... that's 1/4 the price of a whole new blender!! AND IT WAS STILL UNDER WARRANTY. Because of my first experience with a Ninja blender, I purchased the Amazon extended warranty when I bought this one. Sadly, because I reported this issue while the blender was still under Ninja's warranty, Amazon's warranty would not cover the defect. Live and learn, people. Live and learn.Needless to say, I stopped purchasing these cheap garbage blenders from Ninja and splurged on a Vitamix instead. Don't waste your money on Ninja crap, folks. Save up and get a blender that lasts more than a few months and from a company that offers a warranty with no out-of-pocket costs.Side note: I never once used the blender carafe - only the two individual serving cups that the blender came with. When I pulled the carafe out of my cabinet to donate to GoodWill because it had never been used, I noticed it was cracked at the bottom where the blade assembly is, so it probably would have leaked if I'd used it. It still had the tape on it from shipping, it was still brand new, but it was cracked. Horrible, horrible QA at Ninja. So that went into the trash, too. Look at photos from other reviews and you'll see that cracked carafes are a recurring issue.

Author: Marta Pence
Title: You will be Very satisfied!
Body: We make Smoothies ever evening and it crushes ice, frozen fruit and does a Great job! It’s powerful and easy to clean.

Author: Amy Simmonds
Title: High Quality Blender at a Reasonable Price!
Body: I was looking for a blender that could really crush things for both ice and making vegan cheeses. For cheese, you really need a powerful blender because the consistency is similar to melted mozzarella. When you're talking 8+ ounces of cheese, you can easily burn up a standard blender trying to mix the binding agents into the recipe. A Vitamix is obviously a top-tier choice for all that stuff, but if you're not willing to shell out double, triple, or even quadruple this price, you can bet on a Ninja.My second favorite part about this is that it's versatile. The blade easily comes out so I can thoroughly rinse and scrub it without having to reach into a blender cup and put pressure onto the bottom (maybe why the bottoms are cracking for some people)? The fact that these little blender cups sit right where the big one goes is a genius feature because it's easy to have a million and one little kitchen gadgets to clean and store, and having your smoothie blender work on the same device trims it down one more.You can save yourself one more device if you can get away with using it as your food processor. It's nice to be able to use the little cups and put them in my dishwasher rather than taking up a huge amount of space the food processor does in there.If I had to give this a gripe, it would be the overall shape of the blender pitcher. Square obviously isn't ideal since the blending motion is happening in a circle, so if you're like me and like to put water in the blender and run it before putting it in the dishwasher, you might have to take an extra step to hit the corners.The other part is that, as others have mentioned, the lid is a little tricky for some. It's actually a safety feature that triggers a sensor so it will not run without the lid in place. The lid goes on a certain way and it's easy to forget if you're not using it frequently. You will not have a leak if you're aligning the lid correctly and not forcing the lid on in another direction. This is also a powerful blender, so even if you're running a small amount of stuff through here, it may very well splash up to the bottom of the lid if you're running it on full blast.If money were no object, I might get myself a $500+ blender, but if it's like anything much higher than the mainstream, I'll really need to try it myself before I can justify that much additional value. This is a great buy for a reasonable consumer wanting an upgraded blender, and it has served me well for the hard work I've had it do! I'm rating this 4 stars because I'm sure there's a high-end model out there that is quiet, blasts through ice, and is even easier to clean, but for this price point, this is the best out there.

Author: walter
Title: Use it every day
Body: I pre crush ice in a canvas bag with a mallet over a cutting board, then put the crushed ice in the single serve cups along with sweeteners and ingredients like skim milk, cocoa powder, iced decaf, whey powder, yogurt, and blend, to make frozen desserts. The blender has become part of my daily routine. It's very handy. I highly recommend it.

Author: Byelhsa
Title: Professional quality blender!
Body: Awesome, awesome blender!! I was ready to buy a new one after I tried making hummus in my old blender and it couldn’t even do that. It was beyond frustrating. So I went out on a limb and bought this one after seeing it displayed in Costco and reading all the reviews on here. So happy I did! The blending power is amazing. We’ve only used it to make salsas and things like that so far but I already know making drinks will be great too. It’s not super loud and it suctions to the counter so you don’t have to worry about it slipping or vibrating the countertop. Easy to clean but the blades are very sharp so it might be easier to clean it with a handled scrub brush rather than a sponge. Love this product. Great quality for a great price.

Author: Suzanne Heffelfinger
Title: Worth every penny.
Body: Well made. Easy to assemble. Cleans up well.

Author: Bateman
Title: It's not a crappy blender
Body: We broke the glass on our old blender and hubby was so excited. Great, he said, now we can get a blender that's not crappy! We did some research and ordered this one. So far it has done a great job and hubby is happy. We've made many smoothies and some Indian dishes that needed to be blended.

Author: Des
Title: Love it
Body: It's a pleasure to use

Author: Hoser83
Title: Amazing blender!
Body: Love this blender! Crushes ice like a champ and the single serve cups are great! Easy to clean and a quality product.

Author: Barbara Sampson

Author: Paula Shoebridge
Title: Must have
Body: Love my ninja!!! Tad more expensive then wanted but hey with a machine like this it is well worth it at any price!!

Author: Lillian V.
Title: Maybe not so good
Body: My old Ninja finally bit the motor dust, so I ordered the new one. But I also purchased the Nutribullet. I've been trying both to see which I will keep. I've been using the same ingredients in both units for the shakes I like. So far the NB has been working better. The Ninja has had a motor smell from the first tryout. This sort of worries me since my last Ninja had that smell toward the end of its life. Also the Ninja takes longer to make some recipes. Nutribullit is noisier. I'm going to try another shake from Ninja recipe booklet today in both blenders. I need to decide which to keep.

Author: DanT
Title: Powerful and compact
Body: This is a great machine for sauces and smoothies. The two smaller cups that come with it are very handy for either small amounts to blend or individual drinks. It’s got more than enough power and multiple blades in the page canister make quick work of whatever goes on there.

Body: Dang! This thing is Powerful 💪 Totally worth every penny!

Body: Great product.

The media could not be loaded.

Author: jose boyzo
Title: Ninja blender
Body: It was amazing you should buy it. Love it 😍

Author: luis felipe
Title: Exelente
Body: Super

Author: KaitlinAllie
Title: Powerful blender!
Body: I use this everyday. I love how powerful it is- blends up big frozen strawberries with no trouble at all. It also COMPLETELY blends everything. I cannot drink a smoothie with bits of greens in it and that's not a problem with this. There's no evidence that greens were ever added to my smoothies. Totally smooth. I also love how easy it is to clean. The blade comes out completely in one piece. I also love the easy to clean cups.I do have to open it up once and push stuff down to get everything blended, but i dont have a problem with that. But just so you know, it's not a set it and forget it situation.It's also very very loud. Nbd for me, but definitely noteworthy.

Author: Jo
Title: Excellent!
Body: This is the real deal! It will blend anything!

Author: AD Clarke
Title: Keep shopping.
Body: This blender does not get contents creamy. It’s fine, and will use it until it quits but my last blender produced smooth smoothies. This one can’t. You could run it all day, but there are still grains of nuts or produce in your end product. Also, getting all your contents IN the container initially can be challenging. The 3 blades take up too much space - It has a nice big pitcher, but 1/3 of the interior space is taken up by apparatus. The 3 blades don’t ensure a smooth smoothie like you’d think 3 blades would. It’s just a gimmick.

Author: Latisha McMillan
Title: Great Blender
Body: I love this blender! Purchased it to make baby food; it is so quick and easy. I would recommend this blender to friends and family.

Title: Awesome blender
Body: Have only used it a couple of times but it work amazing. Love how much smaller this one is compared to some of the other ninja blenders.

Author: Tracey Finger
Title: Not the best blender
Body: It does not work as it says so we returned it. We are now looking for a blender that is what it says it is.It’s a little cheap in the materials and the way it’s made

Author: Tara
Title: Excellent
Body: Great value !!

Author: Gaby
Title: It broke in less than a month
Body: It broke within the month of purchased, unfortunately I took too long to return it and I did not get my money back.

Author: Romel
Title: Awesome blender
Body: My mom said this is the best blender she has ever used!!

Author: Anabelle Castro
Title: Easy to use and practical
Body: So ash to use to make smoothie , sauces

Author: Phyllis J. Mills
Title: Best blender.
Body: The blending power is incredible. This is a fantastic addition to any kitchen.

Author: Gloria
Title: It gets the job done....... That's all that matters
Body: I love it, I love it, I love it, the durability, the style, the power, it's amazing 👏 😍

Author: Valencia Bathe
Title: I feel like a chef
Body: This product is quick and easy and beautiful. Powerful! I feel more competent just using it!

Author: dboyl13
Title: Not impressed with the packaging/shipping
Body: Eve thing looks ok from what I can tell. It works but for $100+ I kind of expected a better presentation at the very least. Might have be shipped back or something not sure. I bought cheaper stuff with better packaging then this. All I know is it better be as good as I heard.

Author: Marco Antonio Hernandez Varela
Title: Excelente artículo
Body: Cumplió completamente con las expectativas de uso

Author: Josh Taylor
Title: Pure Trash
Body: This goes for all Ninja Blenders. They are very cheaply made. The plastic is easily shattered or parts will break off. Not only that but to clean it, the blade part is on loosely, so you have to do this slow pull from the top to not cut a finger. Very annoying to clean them. Also, putting it away means gently grabbing this.Now, my favorite gripe,the lids are dumb. The locking is okay but the pour spout always breaks off. In a month or within the year, after using it, little plastic holding it in place will crack. Then they want you to buy a new lid/blender. Ridiculous. If the blades were locked in, not a huge deal but if you pour without the lid, out comes the three blade tower. Bit of a mess then.Overall I cannot recommend this. Just buy a regular blender. I know, not as I intricate or elaborate, but with the name brand like this, they are selling a poor product. Buying the name is far from you get. At least a good blender can last 20 years. This you can expect a couple of years. For the price, not acceptible.Hard to clean, poor engineering, forgot to mention, very loud, and cheap. Go find a nicer maker of things if you want to spend the money and if not, buy a cheap blender. This is the middle of nowhere.

Author: nabila fiaz
Title: Good working
Body: Very good quality and good price

Author: D. Land
Title: Hairline Fracture In 72oz Pitcher
Body: Purchased the BL660 under 2 months ago. Use it every other day for protein smoothies, no ice.Started leaking a week ago, and discovered a hairline fracture near seam. Contacted Ninja about a replacement and was told not covered under warranty and would cost 65$ to replace. After further research, found multiple complaints online about cracked pitcher. Faulty Product! Will replace with totally different company.

Author: Migdalia
Title: BEST IN THE MARKET
Body: THIS BLENDER IS DEFINETELY THE BEST

Body: Price and performance of blender was outstanding. Very easy to clean, and makes it easy to make smoothie (breakfast) and go! Two additional cups for smoothies make it easy to plug and play

Author: Shelly
Title: Great Smoothie Blender!
Body: This is an amazing blender for just about anything, but it's power to make smoothies is incredible and it's very durable and I love that.

Author: Ivonne Santos
Title: Excellent string blender, easy to use and clean!
Body: Excellent excellent product. Super easy to assemble, easy to use and easier to clean! Best blender ever! Very strong one too!

Author: Youngseok Oh
Title: Broken and not powered.
Body: Bought “like new”Bottom was slightly broken and power is dead.No operation. I am returning it.

Author: Akshata
Title: Clear Glue Bandits
Body: The blender came with a crack on the bottom They tried to seal it with clear glue. I love Ninja products. Not sure what happened with this order.

Author: C. Dawson
Title: Business model is for you to buy replacement parts
Body: Pass on this and all other Ninja blender products. They have the same model as many other products - give you a base with a disposable product and require you to buy replacements. This is exactly like razors. Although to be fair to razors, their cartridges hold up far better than the pitchers from Ninja will. Be warned, do not waste your money on these. If you still choose to buy one and think it won't happen to you, it will and sooner rather than later. When it does, be prepared to double down on that purchase price when you need a new pitcher because a light breeze touched it.

Author: tami g.
Title: Great blender
Body: I love this blender. Rips through ice, no problem. I use it for protein shakes and milkshakes. Love it!

Author: Jared Wilson
Title: AWESOME BLENDER
Body: AWESOME BLENDER VERY EASY TO CLEAN

Author: tkn
Title: Works great, lots of power.
Body: I love the fact that this blender finely chops ice cubes and makes snow! I noticed that it has the power to chop up fresh fruit and vegetables better than any other blender I have owned. I do recommend everyone giving this blender a try. It will surprise you with its power!

Author: D. Adams
Title: Best Blender EVER!
Body: This blender was recommended to me by my daughter, who has joined the green smoothie trend. I Purchased the blender, and I’m thrilled with the performance. The power is fabulous for frozen fruit smoothies! No chucks! I’ve used it for salsa, smoothies, and frozen daiquiris. Blades are extremely sharp so be careful when cleaning. I highly recommend the Ninja blender.

Author: Penelope Kowaleski
Title: Tremendous value!
Body: Works great- chops ice- sturdy dependable easy to clean

Body: Rips through ice, frozen fruit with zero hesitation.Actually blends ingredients very well and cuts down even the most flexible of ingredients very thoroughly.

Author: R. A. Krawiec
Title: Good blender, didn't live up to expectations.
Body: Powerful blender. Claims to be dishwasher safe but I had to return the first one I received due to the lid detection mechanism on the pitcher being damaged by doing so. The rest of the parts washed fine but I purchased this in part due to the ease of cleaning in the dishwasher which is disappointing.

Title: Sent a Lemon Unit. Base was already broken right out of box
Body: Base was not working right out of the box. Called manufacturer and they said it was broken already. They would replace but I would have to pay shipping and handling. For a broken product never used. Not a good look.

Body: Absolutely love this blender! i use to have an old cheap o from walmart and well finally decided i needed an upgrade and man this this is awesome! Its like going from an old beat up junkyard volts wagon to a rolls royce! Makes smoothies is seconds and with ease. easy to clean. everything locks into place so no need for trying to hold the lid on everything locks and stays in place while blending. You will love this thing i wish i had gotten one sooner!!!

Body: A nice option if you're like me and can't afford a Vitamix. Blends spinach very well. A little loud, but it's quality and easy use makes up for it!

Author: Keshav Maheshwari

Body: This blender truly takes the smooth out of smoothie. Horrible and not worth the $100. Recommend getting nutribullet or something cheaper that actually makes smoothies and not a disgusting drink with pieces of kale like with this blender

Body: This bender is AWESOME! I have used it over and over and it just keeps getting better and better. My smoothies are smooth and the three blades can crush any frozen fruit or ice. I have purchased many cheap blenders through the years, but none compared to this. It is worth the price. I love the spout and the suctions at the bottom for non movement.

Body: I’ve owned 2 of these same model ninjas before this last one I just brought. Both we’re decent powerful blenders. This last model they changed the design to lighter cheaper parts and although it’s powerful it’s noisy as hell , rattles and vibrates . You have to hold it otherwise it will vibrate right off your counter .I didn’t rate it with stars because then amazon will list it as a best choice . Stay away from this piece of garbage, their are better choices for he same amount of money

Author: JFizzle

Author: Avara Yaron
Title: Great price-effective option
Body: I have long been a VitaMix fan, considering it the queen of blenders. I sold mine when I moved out of the country to a place with a different electrical system. In returning to the US, I read great reviews of the Ninja and discovered I could buy 5 of them for the price of one queenly VitaMix. I am very happy with my Ninja purchase. It is powerful, easy to clean, and does a great job with all of my blending, from smoothies to sauces to making banana ice cream from frozen bananas.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender
Body: Love the small smoothie blender as I make protein shakes everyday

Author: Amanda
Title: Broken less than two weeks
Body: Dont waste your money. Thought the reviews were off so decided to get it anyways..... My last blender lasted 14 years- I love the power this guy offered but there’s a major flaw with the blender carafe. My cracked after using and washing it. Very frustrating- Ive only had the product less than two weeks.

Author: Glenn
Title: New age blender
Body: I had been years since I bought a blender. This is a new generation product that is wicked easy to use and especially easy to clean. Very pleased with every aspect of this blender and would recommend to others.

Author: renee
Title: Should come with a volume button!
Body: Love it but it's ridiculously loud!

Author: Hector Carrasco
Title: Hate it
Body: Doesn’t blend well, there is always chunks of food left at the bottom of the jar

Author: alfonso castillo
Title: Buenisima
Body: excelente licuadora para realizar cualquier tipo de batido o helado, es muy sencilla de usar y realmente practica, los batidos y helados quedan mucho mas ricos y espesos, no tengo ni que picar la fruta!

Author: Laurenad2005
Title: Awesome blender! My hubby loves it!
Body: This thing is amazing. Makes great smoothies and even better margaritas! Love optionality of large capacity vs single serving. Blends well. Can be used as food processor.

Author: Louise Vidanes
Title: Could be better
Body: Decent blender, but definitely not the most powerful or sturdiest in my opinion. I use this to make protein shakes and protein fluff. I have to constantly scrape the sides to get a smooth blend, and even then I still get little chunks of ice on the bottom that just won't blend. The plastic pitcher has multiple cracks already after only a few months of use. Even though the pitcher is supposed to be dishwasher safe, it still warped slightly despite me not using the heat dry setting. Just be careful with this one... it's not as sturdy as it looks but it does the job.

Author: RJK
Title: Defeated Ninja! :(
Body: So I bought this so that we could make smoothies and stews and other things at home.Pros:- I like that it can fit a large volume (72oz) and that it can crush ice but used it only once this way and was afraid it would break.- It comes with 2 x 16 oz cups as well which is nice.Cons:- It is very loud- it deformed in the dishwasher and now we can’t close the lid anymore!! So this product is advertising falsely and they say it is dishwasher safe when it is not! You can see in my pictures how the top of the ninja deformed and now I can’t close the lid- the 16 oz cups don’t come with a lid that completely closes on the top but has an opening to drink from but if you are traveling by car or on public transportation then it makes it very easy for there to be spills.- ExpensiveOverall:I do not recommend buying this expensive product. I used it less than 10 times in total. The first time that I used it in the dishwasher and the top distorts and now I can’t use it anymore. I am definitely not impressed and even less impressed by the cracks I see from other people’s reviews and pictures! Poor materials and false advertising.

Author: Nieves Osorio
Title: no me gusto
Body: no megusta no muele bien

Author: TaMarah
Title: 72oz plastic blender container cannot handle the power
Body: I purchased this blender, within a month I had to replace the 72oz container because it cracked in several places. Got my replacement used it for two weeks. Same result. The power of this blender is extraordinary but does me no good if I can’t use it with the blender container provided.Poor quality.

Author: Janie
Title: Great buy!
Body: Thumbs up!

Author: Art Teacher
Title: Great kitchen tool
Body: If there was a fire in my kitchen I'd grab my Ninja blender first!

Body: Loved

Author: LDH
Title: Blender appealed to me because it came with both a blending jar & smoothie cups with lids.
Body: This Ninja blender is considerably larger than my previous blender. With lid & blending jar on unit there’s not much space left between appliance & my cabinets. Also was disappointed that my cups from my old unit do not fit this unit although the cup lids do fit my new Ninja. This is a plus since the new cup lids cannot be closed. Overall I’m happy with the unit & it’s blending power. This unit draws a considerable amount of amperage so this should be taken into consideration before purchasing.

Author: Diana
Title: Wow
Body: Amazing. Will be buying again.

Author: Alyssa Ferguson
Title: Great blender. I like that there’s a big and small blender
Body: I like this a lot. It works great, and I like that you can do individual servings or larger servings. I just use it to make smoothies. It can be a bit difficult to clean, but as long as you’re careful it’s fine. It’s noisy, but most blenders are. Haven’t had it for long, so I’m not sure how long it will last. As long as you take care of it, it should last a while. It looks really nice.

Author: SandyG
Title: Great machine.
Body: Works great on ice!

Author: Mary K.
Title: Great blender
Body: Works well on frozen fruit and easy to clean.

Title: Very loud, has suction cups under base so once placed hard to move.
Body: We haven't used the big one yet just the 16 oz one with the screw on blades. I mostly bought this to make icees for my daughter over summer, so the single serve function is perfect. I just made her icee water and she loves it!!! It is very loud but I knew it would be when I bought it. Suction cup base sticks a little too well.

Author: Leo
Title: Vary powerful and easy to clean.
Body: Very powerful. Will make short work of just about anything you put in it. Its also really easy to clean. It's a blender so there will be noise. The item being blended will determine the noise. Ice for example will make a bit of noise.

Author: Sandra Knight
Title: Absolutely Perfect
Body: I love this new blender, I use it everyday since receiving it. I use the 16 oz blender cup every morning to make my fruit drinks. It grinds it down to perfect drinking capacity. There are no chunks left in bottom of blender cup like my last blender. I just love it. I also don't think it is too loud either. All blenders have some noise but this one is not that loud. I live alone any way so its no problem for me. The large blender is also lightweight, something I also like since my former one was glass and was soooo heavy. It also works perfectly. Thanks for a great product.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Be very careful of the blades
Body: Works great but you have to be extra careful of the blades, very dangerous don't push things down into the blender with hands and dont remove the lid and poor without removing the blade carefully
