Body: I needed this to process my sea moss , perfect choice 😊

Author: Megan Campbell
Title: Awfuk
Body: This blender is awful and arrived damaged!!

Author: Tiffany
Title: Best blender ever
Body: Best blender for so many things...smoothies, margaritas and sauces

Author: Courtney
Title: AMAZING! VALUE FOR MONEY!!!!!
Body: We wanted something durable, very strong and easy to manage, this blender/nutribullet did not disappoint. We can blend anything and its done in seconds.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I Love this blender!
Body: This is a great blender. Because the lid locks it makes no mess. It is very powerful, and the price was great!

Author: Joy Dudley
Title: Don’t buy this
Body: Do not buy a ninja blender the motors are great but we have purchased 3 of them because the pitcher and lid break so often and it’s around $80 to get replacements it’s redicolous and expensive waste of money, if they build a product of quality it wouldn’t be breaking every 2 years and they don’t have a warranty for stupid little problems like the lid safety button jamming so the lid no longer locks onto the pitcher (if the lid doesn’t lock the blender motor will not turn on for safety reasons) if they are going to charge you an arm and a leg they should at least replace the parts that they failed to make quality......I know things break but 2 years is way to soon and then to not have a warranty is ridiculous

Author: Sunshine1
Title: Great wedding gift
Body: Wedding gift for my daughter & her family. Granddaughter burned up old one trying to make smoothies.

Author: Miguel Ramos
Title: Definitely worth the money
Body: Love it works great easy to clean. And definitely has the power to blend what ever you want. It is loud but tolerable for me.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender but.....
Body: So I’ve had this blender for about 6 weeks now and I have loved it, EXCEPT the single serving blade now leaks every time I use it. It seems like the rubber gasket may be worn causing the leak. I called Ninja and they said there is no warranty for anything except the motor. $36 for a new blade(they don’t just sell the rubber gasket). Ridiculous if you ask me. The gasket couldn’t cost more that a few cents by itself. Love the blender, dislike the warranty.

Author: Maria G.
Title: Great for blending smoothies and soup
Body: I love my ninja

Author: Roy Miller
Title: Very powerful Ninja!!!
Body: This is a monster of a blender! Excellent, powerful, will turn anything you want into a drink! And with two bullet cups and blending attachment!

Author: Best Day Ever
Title: Pitcher is trash.
Body: I'm happy with the blender, however, I've gone through 2 pitchers in less than a year. (The first one, my fault I forgot a spoon inside the blender while making a smoothie, my bad, busy mom distracted with the kiddo, ooops! )At about $80 a pop, definitely not a good investment. Should have bought a Vitamix instead, the pitcher is more durable. This one seems to be made of sometime of weak plexiglass, my second pitcher cracked in the sink just sitting with other dishes. I called the Ninja customer service line and it's not covered since it's a wearable part. If I decide to replace this with a 3rd pitcher, that's about a $350 blender at this point. Get a Vitamix instead.

Author: Cynthia D
Title: The pitcher cracks easily, and leaks.
Body: After only using it a couple months, and only hand washing the pitcher, it was full of cracks and started leaking. Now there is no way that I can use it, and I’m having trouble finding a replacement pitcher. It’s also very loud. UPDATE Just found the replacement pitcher and it is $65! This is almost half of what I paid for the entire blender originally. Based on the other comments, I’ve decided not to pay $65 since it will just easily crack again, and look for a different blender. I may actually spring for the Vitamix at this point.

Author: Melissa Martin
Title: Motor problems
Body: I was excited about this product and brand, but was quite disappointed. I love the type of blade in the blender... it blends things together very smoothly. When I recieved it, I tested it to make sure everything was working properly. It could hardly blend even unfrozen food and something was wrong with the motor. It smelled funky when turned on high and when run for a bit. I returned it soon after...

Author: AG
Title: Not a good blender. It sucks at it's only job!
Body: I was excited to get this so that I could blend food and make shakes with the single serve cups. However, i ended up extremely disappointed. It sucks at blending. I could have it blending for minutes and there will still be chunks in there. It's not good and I can't believe other people like it. It's not worth the price and If I could I would return it. It's a terrible design. I have previously had blenders with the blades at the bottom that worked fantastically. This one has blades that don't touch the bottom and are instead placed in random areas inside the cup. It sucks. Idk if it's because of the blades positions but it sucks. It's bad at the one job it has. Don't buy this. Trust me... it's not worth it. Also, it's very noisy to be that ineffective.

Author: Dennis Martillo
Title: Easy to cleaning
Body: Is very good.

Author: Keith
Title: Beast is the Ninja.
Body: No complaints here.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great, great blender!
Body: I love this blender, it is powerful and easy to clean. I use it about 3-4 times a week, primarily for fruit smoothies. I spent a lot of time researching this blender and other brands/models based off of the product reviews and this one is the real deal! Frozen fruit is not an issue for the blades. It’s a blender of course, so don’t expect to be able to run it when some one is sleeping but that’s a silly thing to complain about with a blender. The noise isn’t any louder than any other blender I would think. There are 3 speeds and a pulse button to slowly chop up the frozen pieces. I would absolutely buy this one again if I had to do it over!

Author: VA Fiber PM
Title: Ninja the **** out of some fruit.
Body: Love it.

Author: nygirl
Title: Great product 👍🏼
Body: I like the blender very much it’s powerful. I do notice that when blending blackberries, raspberry, and anything with small seeds like strawberries the blender doesn’t make it fine. You do have a taste of the small seeds. Doesn’t bother me much but might for those who have issues choking on seeds. I’m happy with this blender as can’t find a good blender these days that can chop well or do the blending you want.

Author: Larry Beard
Title: it works fine
Body: I have had it for over two years now, works great

Author: Kristen Nolan
Title: Easy to clean and use!
Body: The ease of use this and cleaning this is worth a few extra dollars! My 15 year old loves smoothies and having her be able to make them and take it right away is the best!!!

Author: Michael Dixon Jr
Title: Best blender I have ever used
Body: Best quality and nicest blender I have ever used

Author: Nikhil Teja Alamanda
Title: Dont underestimate the blades
Body: I was casually inspecting the product and was consciously careful while handling the blades after reading the reviews, yet I managed to cut myself! People were not kidding about the shapness of the blade. And the cut is not like a regular knick you get from knife. IT HURTS.I'm suprised this kind of stuff is not regulated. Anyway if you're like me and decided to ignore the reviews to buy this product, be extra careful!!

Author: annmarie
Title: Must have
Body: Great blending power

Author: Donald F.
Title: Cracks At Base of Pitcher
Body: I used it once, very first day it arrived and when I washed it out I notice two hairline cracks on the base of the pitcher. They ran from the corner to the center of the pitcher. Other customers have written about broken pitcher bottoms in their reviews. Ninja for a $100.00 item should put out better quality. Amazon return was very easy to do, but I'm disappointed with Ninja.

Author: steven c shirosky jr
Title: Works great
Body: Excellent blender!!!

Author: Clary
Title: Ok
Body: Really nice.

Author: GUSTAVO QUIROGA CAICEDO
Title: Calidad Muy buena calidad
Body: Excelente producto, seria bueno saber si existen repuestos

Author: D1
Title: It is superb
Body: Is awesome

Author: Associated Reviews
Title: Seems nice at first and earns praise, then it breaks.
Body: I have had a Vitamix for years, no issues. Bought the Ninja for the second home because it was less money. I thought the Ninja was fine enough at first, not as good as Vitamix for blending, but fine enough for simple use at a second home. It broke down after two years of light use. Not the quality of a Vitamix. Should have known better.

Author: Sammi
Title: Birthday Gift for my Dad
Body: My dad was super happy with this blender. It matches the ninja air fryer we have. Very strong and easy to clean!

Author: ollie01
Title: Ninja Pro
Body: My daughter was so happy that I purchased this blender for her birthday. She made the greatest green veggie drink and sent me a picture of this super healthy smoothie . She love love loves it.

Author: Andie
Title: Literally the best blender
Body: This is literally the best blender I have ever owned. It is worth the price, I promise. I had one and my brother stole it for his post workout smoothie/protein drinks and I tried using a regular Hamilton Beach blender. I can never go back to that old blender. The cups are the perfect size for personal smoothies and smaller blends. The 72 oz is a bit big for me, I might try the smaller 52 oz, because the only downside is, if the 72 oz container is not about half full, it does not blend quite as well and you need to scrape the sides a few times to get everything even. But when this is full, it is AMAZING. I did not like that it was plastic at first, I'm used to the old school glass blender pitcher, but this is super easy to clean, has not scratched or chipped yet.

Author: Cherie Elisse
Title: Top of the line blender in its price category
Body: This is a big blender that has at least three lines of blades, unlike the cheap blenders with one at the bottom. A great bonus is the attachment cups and small blade attachments for making smaller size blends. You save time by not having to clean the entire blender, but just the small attachment and cup.Ninja has always made a good product and this is one of them. It makes the low price blenders just look so obsolete when you can get something like this for spending only double more.

Author: Rosa Chavez-Valle
Title: Awesome blender
Body: Blender is great!! Worth the money. I love making my smoothies in the small cups, both are easy to clean.

Author: Elio Platias
Title: Dont buy this crap plastic its very bad quality broken
Body: Plastic bad quality 6 months broken call for garanty only whant to sell again the cup for 89 same price for new one crap blander crap company

Author: megan carter
Title: AWESOME
Body: Love this blender and how it has a single or pitcher option is also so convienent

Author: tracy l. muhammad
Title: My favorite smoothie blender
Body: Makes great smoothies

Author: Joan Lubischer
Title: Most adaptable
Body: You can make a single drink with minimal clean up or a whole batch.

Author: Jennifer Starr
Title: Baddest blender
Body: This by far is the biggest baddest and loudest blender I have ever owned. I mean it’s my first blender but the best! No matter what you stick in there it blends it up. Fruits, wood, rock, margaritas you name it!

Author: Rhonda Briach
Title: Don't waste your money. I'm not paid by Amazon for my assessment!
Body: It did not chop the smoothie ingredients at all. My moms old blender does the job this can never do!

Author: Ucky
Title: LOVE IT
Body: LOVE IT. Better than my Oster, hella cheaper than a Vitamix. Blends smoothies and purées, and I’m looking forward to doing more.

Author: Marie
Title: Efficient blender!
Body: I love this blender! It is very easy to use and clean. It is also aesthetically pleasing. The individual cups are perfect for smoothies on the go. I just wish Ninja would make a 24ox size fir this model. I also bought one for my sister as a house warming gift!

Author: Garrett Morin
Title: Best blender
Body: Best blender ever!

Author: Felicia Strope
Title: The perfect combination
Body: This is the best blender I have ever owned. It can blend anything with ease- it reminds me of the blenders you see at commercial smoothie shops. I chose this model because of the single serve option, and it did NOT disappoint. The single serve blends just as well as the full pitcher, if not better. This is the perfect machine if you drink smoothies every morning.It is not the easiest TO clean- be super careful not to slice your finger on the blades- but overall it is easy to KEEP clean.You will not be disappointed with this blender.

Author: Jessica
Title: Nice blender
Body: Loving my new blender. It’s efficient easy to clean, well worth the price.

Author: Ricardo Leroy
Title: Good
Body: Good

Author: Johnny
Title: Great value for a powerful blender
Body: Bought this model expecting less. Plenty of power, super easy to use and clean, and I love the fact you can do single servings with the provided cups. Great product.

Author: Simple Lady
Title: Works well
Body: Use mostly for drinks, smoothies and dips. Works great!

Author: Mary PeGan
Title: Good buy for the money
Body: This blender has a lot of power and will chop whatever you have. The only real thing I don't like about this machine is that the blades are not attached to the container as in most blenders. This one you install the container to the base and then you put the blades in the container. As I'm sure you are aware the blades are super sharp and I'm scared to death about cutting myself. So I'm VERY careful when I put this together and take it apart.

Author: RMin
Title: Quality Appliance.
Body: Exceeded our expectations.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Poor Quality Unit
Body: This worked well for the first 3-4 uses. We have been hand washing to make sure it stays in good shape. The other morning I was going to make a smoothie for the family for breakfast, quickly realized that somehow a piece of the handle unattached itself not allowing the lid to properly assemble, preventing the unit from starting. Difficult to get ahold of customer service for Ninja. Honestly I just need a new top for the blender, the base is fine. For how costly this blender is, I would expect it to hold up for several years, not only a few uses. I would not recommend this to a friend.

Author: Natynats3891
Title: Super Ninja!! Great purchase
Body: I love my ninja Blender, It is powerful, easy to clean and with a lot of features. I highly recommend it, you wont regret it.

Author: Lattisha Williamson
Title: Good
Body: Works great

Author: Olga castillo
Title: Not a good quality
Body: First use and it’s already broken

Author: Alexis Sanchez
Title: Powerful blender
Body: Smoothies have never been better.very powerful blender I love it.

Author: Jim A
Title: Excellent blender
Body: Nothing to dislike. This is a great blender

Author: Victoria Richter
Title: Good product
Body: Everything works well. There is a lot of power. It blends mostly anything. Most of the time you need to have a liquid component for the contents to mix well.

Author: B Derringer
Title: This is the absolute best blender ever!
Body: I bought this one to replace a really old O branded blender that died. It was a workhorse and finally passed away. We really like to make blended drinks especially in the summer when it's in the 90's with humidity that you can cut with a knife!Anyway, I did a lot of research before purchasing the Ninja. I do own a couple of other products made by the parent company and those have been so good I decided to give this a try. Wow is all I can say! One of the adult beverages we love is a Midori Pina Colada (message me and I'll send you the recipe). This machine makes the ice to a tee and blends the other ingredients perfectly!It seems well made and am quite confident that it will last a long time! If you are on the fence, it's my suggestion that you just buy it! You'll actually be happy you did!

Author: james
Title: Ddon't know what took me so long.
Body: I love my ninja it works great!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Made out of plastic
Body: Blender was made out of plastic. Gave my old blender away which was made out of heavy glass.

Author: Jose
Title: It works 👍
Body: Make smoothie bowls all the time 10/10

Author: Shelby
Title: Awesome blender!
Body: I really really love this thing. My kids and I are making smoothies right and left, it’s so much easier to clean than my last blender. It blends frozen solid fruit so easily, it’s super fancy, and so sleek looking. I’m happy I bought it. Happy to add it to my ninja collection! :)

Author: Homer Trecartin Jr.
Title: Powerful
Body: Great addition to the kitchen this family loves its smoothies

Author: Diana
Title: Llegó antes de la fecha esperada. Tremendo servicio
Body: Perfecto. Mejor de como lo pensaba. Lo recomiendo al 100%

Author: eric turner
Title: Daughter’s happy
Body: Makes it very convenient with the cups and has plenty of power.

Author: QueenE
Title: Love it
Body: Worth the money. Blends well.

Author: Janet Gulston
Title: Good product
Body: My daughter is very happy with it

Author: Kat
Title: Broken
Body: Just received this item, tried it out and it was leaking out the side. Saw that it was cracked the entire way down the side along the handle.

Author: Trishsocal
Title: BEWARE OF THE BLACK MOLD
Body: Gross and can make you sick. The gasket in the blades for the smoothie cups grows black mold easily and ruins if you try and pick it out with something to clean it. (I have tried all different types of tools and tweezers and nothing works without damage) How disgusting and stupid the way it is made. Not sanitary at all. This is the same for all the ninja blender cups that you use for smoothies. I have tried all the different blenders that have the smoothie making blender jars and they are all the same, with the same gasket and same problem. Buy a different brand of blender so that you don't get sick. I have written questions to Ninja Kitchen, but they won't answer me. Obviously they know that this is a problem and don't want to admit to it and have all the lawsuits from your illnesses that you get from using this product.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Cup size
Body: Love blender works great for price , my only comment is I wish you could buy larger cups for this model dl660 non of the larger ninja nutri cups ie 24 oz 32 oz sold on amazon appear to be compatible per there descriptions.

Author: Me Ta
Title: Hope it lasts
Body: Wife uses it everyday to make healthy smoothies. Blades seem to be extremely sharp.Suction cups in the bottom of the base is too strong. Need to make an effort to move mixer

Author: Brittany J.
Title: Ice and frozen fruit.
Body: Looked at alot of blenders and reviews. My sister had an older model and I mainly wanted it for the smoothies and blenders. Alot of other blenders reviews mentioned having issues with frozen fruit or ice. I've made a good 10 or so smoothies in the single use containers along with some generic ones and it has no issues. Any blenders I ever need will be ninja as they make the best.

Author: Beverly H
Title: Best Blender Ever 🤩
Body: Love it!!

Author: kenny g.
Title: Great Value
Body: Excellent machine for making smoothies and chopping up fruit and vegetables! Great value for the price!

Author: Anna
Title: Shipping delayed
Body: I love this product, however the only reason why i’m giving this 3 stars is because it took over a month to come in. If I were you I would look at different sellers to get this product delivered on time.

Author: Mateo
Title: Pretty poggers
Body: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend she loves it makes a pretty damn good smoothie too.

Author: Jen
Title: Must have!
Body: The whole family can use it. We love the blending power and how easy to clean it is!!

Author: Taylor
Title: Breaks Easily
Body: This is a pretty nice blender all in all. I've used it for smoothies for a while but usually use frozen fruit that blends easily. First time I tried to use ice instead, small ice chips as well, the blender rocketed the ice chips into the side and cracked it instantly. I added the ice after I had blended fruit and milk in it filled half way first too so I don't know if you are supposed to do the ice first then the liquid but its broken now and I cant use it. I still have the single serving blades and cup so its not a complete loss but it is kind of disappointing as I've only had it for 2 months or so.

Author: Kate Manning
Title: Highest recommendation!
Body: Making smoothies with an ordinary blender was very difficult with only a few blades to cut through frozen fruit and ice. I read an article recommending this model and have absolutely loved it. Three levels of blades cut through frozen fruit and vegetables with ease. Extremely easy to clean- the top, blade stem, and pitcher itself all go in the dishwasher. It has several speed levels and incredibly efficient! Highly recommend!

Author: Lisa
Title: GOAT!!!
Body: Best blender I've owned, period!

Author: Dan F
Title: Love the Ninja blender
Body: Love this blender. We bought extra cups so our family can enjoy custom milkshakes in the evenings. The larger blender does a great job producing a smooth consistency with minimum time needed to blend. We love it!

Author: Clark Masters
Title: Excellent blender, excellent quality
Body: I rarely write reviews, yet felt compelled to do so as this Ninja Blender is great! Very powerful, very easy to use, very easy to clean and great instructions. It's worth the extra dollars to get a solid and well made blender. Blends quickly and doesn't sound like a jet taking off. Relatively quiet for a blender. Great choice!

Author: Ebony Rich.
Title: Powerful. Does the job and more
Body: I've owned more blenders over the years that I cannot even count, but I've never owned one so powerful. I'm now making smoothies every evening before I exercise because it's now a breeze. I love it. I use coconut milk a lot Now I buy the coconut and make my own coconut milk. Thank you 😊

Author: Adam
Title: Ninja!!
Body: Love it. We have another Big name blender at the office that costs three times as much and I honestly like this one better! Blends great, easier to clean, really like the portables that came with it. Overall - very pleased!

Author: teamaster
Title: Breaks easily
Body: Lid and pitcher crack very easily and the cost of replacement parts is robbery, essentially costing the same as a new item. It's also very difficult to clean, especially without a dishwasher. I did feel it had pretty good power, which you would expect at this price point.

Author: Anette Colon
Title: Fast
Body: I love this product

Author: debi baker
Title: Awesome
Body: This is awesome! Works wonders for my smoothies

Author: Duane Hibbard
Title: Very happy
Body: I didn’t think I’d use the 16oz cups but their what I use the most now. Very happy with all of it.

Author: Lisa L.
Title: Best blender ever
Body: This is a great product.

Author: Kacey
Title: Defaulted Product
Body: Unfortunately I didn’t even get a chance to use it. Upon opening I noticed that there was a crack in the base. I ordered a replacement because I really wanted this blender and to my surprise the replacement came with the same crack in the base. At this point I did a google search (I know it should’ve been done prior) only to find out that the crack is a very common problem with this product. So unfortunately it will just be a return of this product. Which is a bummer because it looks pretty cool and matches my kitchen decor.

Author: LTR
Title: Powerful!!
Body: Love this blender-so powerful and easy to use!!

Author: Daphne Reiley
Title: Exactly What I've Been Looking For
Body: I'm loving this blender! We've used the individual serving options a couple of times. We have smoothies every morning, so this blender is a life-saver!

Author: Marissa N.
Title: Strong Blender!
Body: Strong and effective! Been using it as a blender and a food processor. The blender strength hasn't faltered and I love the small individual containers that came with it. Saves having to clean the big container.

Author: general4
Title: Everything we wanted and more.
Body: As advertised we love it.We clean it right after use for next time. We love it.

Author: Leticia tapia
Title: Mala inversión
Body: No me gusto no muele bien se queda mucho líquido en la tapa

Author: Cornell Christian
Title: BOUGHT IT 4 MONTHS AGO AND I USE IT AT LEAST 3 TIMES A WEEK
Body: BOUGHT IT 4 MONTHS AGO AND I USE IT AT LEAST 3 TIMES A WEEK ENUFF SAID, I WORKS EXTREMELY WELL

Author: A. Sonday
Title: Love the Ninja!
Body: Bought one for my son due to how much I loved my Ninja! My son is happy to make some smoothies on his military base.

Author: Linda Walton-Robinson
Title: SO HAPPY! NEW BASE FITS OLD ATTACHMENTS
Body: I bought a Ninja Ultra Kitchen System (BL780CO) about 9 years ago. I use it all the time. A few days ago the motor base died. Ninjakitchen.com sold this for $110 including tax. I bought this for $117 at Amazon. No shipping fee and it came with 2 single serve smoothie cups and a 72oz pitcher. My 64 oz food processor bowl works on the new motor base. So do the 72oz picher and single smoothie cups that came with my old Ninja.Over all, I'm very happy with how this turned out. Note: my old manual says attachments are not interchangeable, but they worked out for me.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Rubber feet on motor
Body: There are 3 rubber feet that sit on top of the motor; where you lock in the blending unit. One of the feet came out; and it is impossible to get it back in. Ninga will replace the motor portion; because it is less than one-year; but I have to pay for shipping.

Author: robert
Title: Great blender
Body: I wish the cups were larger and the lids had a closure

Author: Brenda
Title: AWESOME BLENDER!!!!
Body: This is my dream blender and it was worth every dream I have about it. I'm actually in love with my new blender that was gifted to me for my birthday after tons of hints - wink wink!!! The power is awesome and now I just love making unique drinks and tasty smoothies. Can't wait for the summer and really take this bad boy for a drive!!!!

Author: Jeanne Mueller
Title: New Ninji
Body: I love my new ninja. It works beautiful

Author: ptbreak2603

Body: Pretty much perfect! Amazon had the best price! Buy The warranty.

Body: Amazing so powerful !!

Title: Good quality
Body: Good quality

Author: B. Layton
Title: Best blender I’ve ever had
Body: This blender is powerful, and quick! My last blender I’ve had for years and hated, always had to stop and stir over and over. This blender gets the job done quick, in 30 seconds or less and it’s ready!Blends frozen fruit, large chunks of ice no problem.Recommend to anyone, only had a few months but so far so good!

Body: Awesome

Title: powerful a staple in kitchen the multi level blades are amazing
Body: a great blender i think it could blend a brick lol makes a great smoothie easy to to clean the blades come out i researched many a great buy

Author: D. Owens
Title: Healthy Habits
Body: Purchased this for my guy friend as an impromptu gift. We sat around talking about healthy habits & a fitness plan he purchased. It requires making smoothies daily. I couldn’t believe he didn’t have a blender. I’ve got the same exact Ninja at home. Good for me after 2 years, food for him too. Best part is the single cups. Easy to clean when you remove the blade.Reduced stars because there’s always that grinding sound or burned rubber. Same way my Ninja blender with the cups blew out. Maybe the motor goes out easily.

Author: Norma Weismiller
Title: Love this blender
Body: I can't believe I used my crappy blender for so long. I have been using this every day for my protein shakes and it blends so well! Cleans up easy, too.

Author: Jenny Milligan
Title: Money saver
Body: I was spending $5 a day for a Mocha Frappuccino...this has saved me so much I make them right at home now. Love the single serve blending cups

Author: Kira
Title: Works perfectly
Body: Used a. Cheap blender for years, do yourself a favor and buy this one. Works great, blending is awesome. Very happy with it.

Author: Jesse W
Title: amazing
Body: love it we had a bullet and this is like 100 x better

Author: Greg
Title: Awesome Blender!
Body: This is exactly what I was hoping for - a high powered blender for morning smoothies at a fraction of cost of industrial ones... and it delivers! Perfect... just wish I ordered bigger single use cups because I'm a big guy who needs a little more smoothie!

Author: getting ready for a wedding
Title: Love this
Body: I love this. Now I'm able to make green smoothies every day

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice
Body: Refurbished/Open box.. the Ninja has zero issues, and is a workhorse. Made a few smoothies and mixed drinks.. it crushes the ice and fruits..

Author: Justin
Title: Does everything you need it to
Body: Honest customer review here:Pros:Carry handle for the lid/blending containerRemovable blades, easy to rinse/cleanClosing pouring cap built into the lidSingle serving blending cupsCons:Pretty loud (most blenders are though)Lack of settingsSingle serving cup lids are poorly designed, its just a hole in the top to drinkThat being said, I think the cons are mildly annoying but not a big deal, and the pros are fairly nice features. It blends well, and has a vortex sort of pattern that sucks the unblended stuff from the bottom to mix it all together. Was almost 4 stars because the lid of the single serve cup is kind of annoying but everything else was pretty great so 5

Author: Minney
Title: Love it
Body: Perfect!! And on time.

Author: Deb Richards
Title: Blender
Body: I liked the versatility of the blender to us various items.

Author: Lourdes Hernandez
Title: Powerful blender
Body: Love this blender! There isn't anything it can't blend within seconds! So easy to use.

Author: Roylee Walker

Body: had it for 6 weeks and it's making grindy sounds, feels like some of the gears are slipping and kind of a burning plastic smell. 2 weeks out of the amazon return window. rip.

Title: It's like a Bullet and a Blender all in One!
Body: Got one for my Son as a housewarming, he blabbered about it so much;I got one for me. Love it!!

Title: great product!
Body: fast shipping, good product,

Body: This puppy works as advertised.

Body: So many options and the smoothies and the margaritas are the best.

Body: Excelente licuadora, llego súper rápido (menos de 5 días a Colombia)

Author: CoScho
Title: Louder than a jet engine. Really.
Body: Louder than a jet engine. Mediocre blending power; in particular the two small tumbler mixer are noisy and are not good at blending at all.

Author: Oslay
Title: Works perfect
Body: Best on market.

Author: Erika Odaisa de Araújo Mota
Title: The product is perfect
Body: The product is perfect

Author: Ericka brown
Title: Be careful of the blade
Body: It’s a great blender

Author: Isabel Hutchings
Title: It was what We needed for our Juicing
Body: It's super powerful. It cleans up easy. I dont know if it will last a while but so far so good.

Author: Judi Isaacson
Title: Died after second use
Body: Died after second use

Author: Rodney West
Title: Best Blender ever had.
Body: Very nice easy to use and good quality

Author: William Hung
Title: Excellent blender, blades very sharp! Love it!
Body: It's well built, sturdy, powerful motor. It locks the lid, as well as the pitcher and the cups, at the base, so you don't have to hold it. Basically, a one handed kitchen appliance. Also, like the blade tree style, no chunks get left behind. Have to be very careful, cause the blades are extremely sharp, just got myself cut on first use. LOL.The negative side, the boxes came ripped on the bottom corners, both, the replacement and the one from original order. And, the one I ordered came missing the Nutri Ninja blade assembly, use by the 16 oz cups. That's why I had to order a replacement whole blender, just for one piece.The blender works great!But, I got to said, Amazon is great! They send it same day, so I got it the next day by mid-day (2 pm).Thank you, amazonians! Great job! Keep it up! Now I'm very happy!

Author: Matthew
Title: It's so nice to have a real and strong blender.
Body: I don't need a commercial blender, but its nice to have one almost as strong. I like how it works.

Author: kendra Herman
Title: Worth it 100%
Body: So far so good, mine came in plastic cups and picture I read alot of reviews about glass ones breaking. Mine is fine as of now. Love it, it works amazing. It pulverized frozen fruit.

Author: Gabriela Zuniga
Title: ARRIVED BROKEN
Body: arrived broken. Bottom of the pitcher cannot be placed correctly because it is broken and appears to have been glued back together. Very disappointed.

Author: Joe S.
Title: This thing is a BEAST!
Body: This thing is an absolute BEAST of a machine! I’ve had it for a month or so, now and I’ve used the hell out of it. It destroys ice and makes one hell of a smoothie. My only complaint is that the lid can be difficult to clean but if you rinse it off right away and have a dishwasher, you’re good. Buy this. You won’t be disappointed.

Author: clo
Title: The magnificent Ninja Professional Blender gives me confidence that it lives up to what it does.
Body: It is easy to clean. Having not brought a new blender in 20 years, I was shocked by the size of it when I unpacked the blender. The blades stacked in 3 layers, so the fruits & veggies are sure to get purred. It was easy to use & clean. The two 16 oz. drinking containers and the large straws is an extra benefit. The 72 oz. picture makes it easy to combine fruits & vegetables together and blender and blades does its job without human interference. The price was within my budget. I am so happy I purchased the Ninja. It makes smoothies perfectly. I encourage you to purchase this.

Author: Bek
Title: Works as it should
Body: Individual cups are on the small side. Kinda loud but thats to be expected.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Loud but it's great
Body: Works really well. Easy to clean and use. Great for smoothies

Author: Stephanie T.
Title: Gets the job done
Body: I love this blender soul much . I use it everyday for smoothies. Tricky to clean some parts but I use a toothbrush for those parts. Love that it comes with the 2 smaller ones and the piece to blend a smaller smoothie. So convenient . I was worried I'd get a defected one after reading some reviews but I am pleased. Only downside is I've seen this at least 30 dollars cheaper elsewhere. But oh well. It was worth the money.

Author: Jess h
Title: Great blender
Body: This is a great blender at a great price. We’ve enjoyed making smoothies and soups. Great size options for blending.

Author: Natalia
Title: Se daño el motor de mi licuadora yo lo estaba probando se daño
Body: Yo quiero saber q puedo hacer con el motor de mi licuadora q se daño ayer

Author: Binyamin
Title: Food got stuck inside of plastic. Literally uncleanable
Body: After a few uses, I started to notice food residue literally inside plastic areas that appeared to be sealed making it literally uncleanable. No idea how the food was getting in there, I just made a few smoothies and machine washed it. So it started to get gross pretty quickly.

Author: Jac
Title: Amazing Blender
Body: This is a great blender! I make smoothies daily using this blender and they come out just like the smoothies at my favorite local smoothie place.

Author: Daniela Ramirez
Title: Amazing
Body: Bought this as a gift for my mom and she totally loves it ! All the Mexican moms out there , totally recommend to make those bomb spicy salsas !!!Has really sharp blades that instantly dissolves everything inside

Author: Shireen
Title: Powerful
Body: Good blender

Author: Sadie
Title: Not good for soups/sauces
Body: It is a good blender but it does not get sauces smooth or soups smooth. Good for smoothies etc but not great for every day use. I returned it due to grainy textured sauces.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: best smoothie and ice crusher
Body: I am not sure I'm keeping this model because it holds so much and I am just one person. The top is plastic but I was hoping for glass. Maybe they don't make a model with a 48 oz pitcher in glass, so I will probably keep it with a 72 oz. plastic one. Looking forward to crushing ice into snow soon and it will be a Ninja!

Author: Josue
Title: the best
Body: Gift for my mom. she loves it

Author: KiraMarie
Title: Not that great
Body: It’s really annoying that the blades take up the entire blender. When you try and put solids in they sometimes get trapped on the top of the blades and don’t blend well. I had much higher expectations for this blender.

Author: Brett
Title: Love it
Body: I had another brand that was a single serving blender. It worked well but broke in less than a month. I use this thing everyday and is much better than the other brand I had. It also serves us as a regular blender which we didn't have. While I don't use the large blender often, that was a plus with the dual use.

Author: Torrence Shaw
Title: Ninja Happy!
Body: I love my Ninja. It’s extremely durable and so easy to clean!

Author: Leticia Danis
Title: Good for Fruit but not for half cooked rice
Body: It was not as powerful as you think it should. It broken itself when I was using it. Thankfully, no one in my house got hurt. Do not put something even a little bit hard to sheer inside. It will cause problems

Author: Gary R.
Title: This is the blender to end all
Body: We've been through quite a few blenders. This one was a bit more pricier, but worth every penny. The full-length blade engages and draws in materials thoroughly without having to stop and press down bulkier items. Be mindful when cleaning; the blades are very sharp.

Author: La Borincana
Title: Easy to clean
Body: Blending power

Author: ricardo perez
Title: Es fácil de usar y es un buena para tenerla en casa...la recomiendo
Body: Esta excelente ...

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: easy to use and clean
Body: Just got it and LOVE it so far

Author: M. Lang
Title: So happy I finally upgraded to this Ninja!
Body: Love this blender! It took me a long time to convince myself to pay a hundred bucks for a blender but I am so happy that I did! The single blender cups are amazing and blender is very quick so I'm out the door in record time now!

Author: TheBagman
Title: Best quality on the market
Body: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. She uses it everyday to make her protein shakes. The ice gets completely shaved down almost insteantly. This is definitely the best quality on the market.

Author: Victoria Remesal
Title: The best blender I ever had.
Body: The blenders that I have owned in the past have not been as powerful as the Ninja, something was always left in large pieces. Ninja is powerful and shreds perfectly. every morning I make my fruit smoothies with oatmeal and they are perfect. I love my new Ninja.

Author: Evijan Watson
Title: Best blender ever!
Body: Amazing smoothies come out of this thingThis has made staying healthier a easy things

Author: Maribel
Title: Wonderful
Body: Works good

Author: yarellano
Title: Ty
Body: Great product

Author: Tony S.
Title: Best on smoothies
Body: Have had a Breville and Vitamix (both great blenders) but both would not mix frozen fruit perfectly for really thick smoothies (blades just spin in a bottom air pocket not blending),The Ninja doesn’t have this problem and it’s a fraction of the price (unfortunately because it made in China)

Author: James E. Moore
Title: Works great.
Body: We love that when we make our smoothie we can stop early provides a nice texture.

Author: susan m. auther
Title: Great blender for the money!
Body: This works so well to make smoothies and blend anything. Love the single serving size, too! Easy to puree fruits and veggies, too. And super easy clean. Perfect for what I needed.

Author: Peter
Title: Awesome
Body: Absolutely amazing product. Has delivered everything I needed it to and has a great easy to use design. Could not be happier.

Author: Air KoryO
Title: If I could give this piece of crap zero stars, I would
Body: Scratch that, it deserves NEGATIVE STARS.By far, this piece of crap is the absolute worst home appliance I have ever owned. You have the whirling blades of death, with the stupid locking mechanism at the bottom that does a great job of getting peanut butter, smoothies, or whatever else you just made deep inside it. This makes it difficult to clean without running it through the dishwasher about three times (minimum).Then, if you don't get the lid precisely on top of the center of the blade mechanism, it won't lock. The stupid thing won't run if you can't lock it, obviously. Any time you want to use this ridiculously overhyped nightmare you are stuck fiddling with it for 10 minutes, just for 30 seconds of blending action.But wait, there's MORE!The stupid lid apparently is prone to break. I did not know this when I bought this wretched excuse of an appliance, and if I had, I would have kept looking. There are YouTube videos about how to fix the mother flipping lid, I kid you not, and it looks like if you don't get the repair precisely right (of course....), you're screwed. Shocking, I know.No, I didn't try fixing it myself. I was afraid of what evil kind of Easter egg Satan's assistant at the factory put in there. I'm just happy this (appliance) garage queen has not sliced my hand open, or injured any of my family members. (Being left with glop instead of a blueberry banana smoothie, in exchange for not having to go to the ER because of a laceration? I'll take it and be grateful. It could be so, so much worse.)Do yourself a favor and get anything but this blender. I don't care if it has an alleged lifetime warranty. All that means is....if it breaks, you get ANOTHER one of these horrible, terrible, no good pieces of crap (after forking over another $14.95, naturally, because I'm sure the sadists who invented this have a relative in their customer abuse department.)If 2020 had an official blender, it would be this wretched pile of plastic and inferior design. It's only suitable for masochists who enjoy taking way too long to make their quick breakfasts. The Ninja is the perfect gift for people you absolutely, totally despise (like an ex, a boss from hell, the teacher who made your life miserable for a year way back when, or your in-laws.) It's far too cruel to give this to someone who annoys you, but if you have deep seated hate for that person, put this on the top of your list.

Author: zooming more these days
Title: Powerful, well made
Body: This blender is very powerful and has held up well for the first year. The blades are super sharp, so be careful unloading the dishwasher! Easy to clean and store.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: It has a suction cup on the legs that really hold on the table for stability
Body: I has more than enough power for what we need. It is very stable to use. I recommend it.

Author: Wrigley
Title: Efficient Blender
Body: Have used it for all kinds of different foods, easy to use and has the one-person cup which you can use instead of the whole mixer. Works great and fairly easy to clean, just watch out for sharp blades during cleaning.

Author: Tracey Metoo
Title: BUY BUY BUY!!!
Body: This is the best blender I’ve ever owned. It’s by far the most versatile of blenders. It able to easily crush ice and frozen fruit to make a delicious creamy smoothie. It’s also perfect for making salsas and soups. Definitely a great investment and totally worth it.

Author: Rott630
Title: Power
Body: Kicks ass

Author: Duprey’s
Title: Best ever
Body: This is a really powerful unit. Great for milkshakes!

Author: REalHousewife
Title: Best thing about this is the add-on single Spend a little more and get entry level vitamix instead
Body: I hmmed and hawed about buying this. I'd had a Ninja blender before that I had won on a talk show of all things. Since it was free, I didn't complain. I even cut my thumb on the blade once while cleaning it, which required 5 stitches. But I chalked that up to being my own fault, however, I vowed never again to buy a Ninja blender. Well, after 4-5 years, the motor gave out and I was back looking for a blender.I ended up purchasing Ninja again because a. Vitamix was triple the price and b. I had some Amazon gift cards to use towards it. I thought the blender may have improved over the years and I liked that it had the one-serve attachment.Well, I am almost 6 months in and I regret this purchase. It has the same wicked blade attachment and same awkward installation. The same method of chopping- not really blending- so it ends up being somewhat of a coarse mixture when blending anything that had any sort of texture to begin with. Even strawberries stay lumpy. I hate how you must remove that wicked dangerous blade with your fingers!! and if I find I need to blend more, which I almost always do with this blender, I have to pour it all out into another container, rinse, and start over in order to re-insert the dad-blamed blade apparatus.The lid is crazy-making. It only works when on a certain way, with the pin, I get it, safety, but when storing this monstrosity, it never wants to close when on the vessel, so you are left to store each component separately: a. a huge, heavy platform with a cord that has no way to wind neatly, b. that deadly blade, c. a cover with a flap open and won't go back on top of the vessel. This results in the 5-inch deadly blade rattling around in some cabinet ready to fall out and slice anyone unfortunate enough to be within striking distance.To say I hate this blender with a passion is an understatement. It doesn't even blend well. Forget about smooth sauces and purees. Ain't gonna happen. And it didn't even come with a chopper attachment- I have a separate mini Cuisinart for that. So a cabinet full of half-useful, dangerous, and heavy/awkward appliances- I still have my old Oster and I'm really thinking of chucking this for that one- it actually made blended smoothies far better than this Ninja.If you are considering this, keep looking.

Author: Katharina O.
Title: Awesome blender!
Body: Love how it blends fruits veggies etc. It's super fast and it creates smoothies within just a few seconds.

Author: ANA BARRAZA
Title: They need to change the lid design on this product
Body: I dislike the lid and rubber. It’s attached and hard to clean and dry causing these dark spot. Super gross. Now I either buy a new blender or spend $64 on a new pitcher/lid combo so it’s not grossing me out. I think I’ll try another brand. Didn’t even last me the year

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Leaky blender---no support
Body: After 4 month sof 4x weekly use, the bullet attachment began to leak into the base even when it was sealed tightly. Amazon placed me in touch with a Ninja rep who apologized and then after 35 minutes of questioning how I use it and how often, etc made me pay $21.00 for them to send me a part!! No support, no wow it has only been 4 months, we will replace immediately No, I paid to have a part sent. Really?!? I could have ordered another brand, however went to the Ninja because of its reported quality.....next time I will think twice about anything from this company. Buyer beware. Also, some of the quaestions they asked me about serial numbers, were not on my blender, so who knows if it is authentic and not counterfeit?

Author: Maria Stetler
Title: I just love it.
Body: I use it to make marinate . This blender allows me to make 1 pound of garlic, which is amazing.Also to make margarita.... just amazing .

Author: diderickd
Title: Great smoothie blender
Body: This has the power to really crunch fruit and ice.

Author: Cathy
Title: Love it
Body: I bought this for smoothies. Got the job done fast. I love it. It's loud though. Feels grown up and advanced for a blender.lol

Author: jeanna scott
Title: Packaging
Body: I love my new ninja blender but I disliked finding a box on my porch not in appropriate brown paper packaging so as to not advertise to everyone what I purchased and possibly have an expensive blender stolen. Thank goodness I was home when it was delivered .

Author: Pili
Title: Very cheap material for $100
Body: Really cheap plastic jar it arrived already cracked, had tu return it same day I received it

Author: Sean from California
Title: Bought 7 months ago and now leaks all over. DON'T BUY!
Body: For a ninja product I'm disappointed. Was wondering why my wife wasn't using the blender I got her back on July 6th, 2020 and she told me it leaks inside the blender. I was shocked and asked if she was sure. Naturally she was right (stupid hubby brain). So now I'll have to go out and get her ANOTHER blender that IS NOT Ninja. Since 7 months clearly is too long for the cheap product to last. So I'll say this. The product IS sharp. It DOES work. Just expected for it to last longer than 7 months. Hope this helps in your decision!

Author: Shaft
Title: Great for the price.
Body: For the money, fantastic blender. Nothing like my Vitamix. But, one fifth of the price. Have in second home and I like it. I just couldn’t stomach spending $500 on a second blender so I got this one. I think it’s better that any other at its price range and serves me well. I use it quite a bit for sauces and it blends and eviscerates well. Works better than the Kitchen Aid I had. Way better.

Author: Yard Gal
Title: Great Blender
Body: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and son-in-law who are enjoying making smoothies with this blender. They love it.

Author: Belisa Sherman
Title: Blends well with ice and frozen fruit
Body: Great blender

Author: megan waugh
Title: Cracking
Body: We had this blender for just over a year and we are noticing the blender is starting to crack in multiple places. It is not leaking yet. The blender is good, it will chop up ice and fruit quicker thana normal blender, but the plastic is just not durable.

Author: Cassie Bromenschenkel
Title: Good for a year.
Body: Worked amazing until almost a year. Now the smoothie cup won’t turn right to use them.And they’re trying to charge $26 for a new metal piece.

Author: Uriel R Mercado
Title: not a new Ninja Blender
Body: I got my ninja blender and the box was open, it is clear that the blender is not new, then I checked that the rotor had some wear inside it has been used I think someone changed only the motor ,you can see the photos how bad the paint is , Maybe it's a remanufactured blender, I don't know the blender works just fine, but the fact is that if you are paying extra you want a new product.

Author: JC
Title: Explosive breaks
Body: Alrhough I did not purchase this from Amazon I felt the need to write this review.Returned one due to excessive water in the handle after washing.This is the second one. Used maybe once a week. Exploded with plastic shards everywhere. BIG HAZARD.

Author: mbh
Title: Instant slush
Body: Husband a better blender to make cocktails, particularly the frozen slushy kind. This one is perfect for that - turns ice cubes into slush in seconds. I like the blender cup for smoothies - blend & go, no need to pour or scrape into another container. Other that being much more noisy than a basic counter blender, it’s great.

Author: Yvonne Soto
Title: It blends very well.
Body: So far I have used it for personal shakes, put I have used it for other things yet, but so far I'm happy with it.

Author: Leslies Blushing
Title: Don’t buy it’s cheap an breaks. Dont get insurance either! It’s not covered.
Body: This blender is such cheap quality. The blender cup itself isn’t even covered from Ninja bcus They know it breaks an falls apart within a few months. Then the protection Plan is a scam. They also don’t cover the blender cup! Unless you submit them the broken cup itself which isn’t mentioned in the purchase of the protection plan. So if you don’t have the cup anymore cus you threw it out guess what it’s not covered either 🤦🏻‍♀️ This is the 2nd time I’ve bought this blender & this blender cup literally falls apart. Shatters into tiny plastic bits start coming apart from the top of the blender cup an the bottom of it. I’ve had glass blenders cheaper from Walmart last me way more then this. The only good thing about this blender is the blade! Definitely not worth what you’re spending. How is a product gonna be expensive an the quality is trash? Make it make sense.

Author: Mary castillo
Title: Excelente
Body: Mucho

Author: Pamela
Title: Best Blender Ever!!
Body: I've owned several blenders over my several years - this one has so far been the best yet - perfect smoothie every time!!

Author: Dave
Title: bought as a Christmas gift for our Daughter and she loves it
Body: Our daughter loves the power and the great way it blends and is easy to clean. She had chosen this model based on previous reviews and that it had two glasses included

Author: Rainbow
Title: Great
Body: Gift! They love it! Works great!

Author: Sarah P.
Title: This blender is not cutting it
Body: I’ve had this blender for a couple of years and initially was happy with it but honestly didn’t use it that much. Now that I’ve got 2 kids who rely on smoothies to get any kind of vegetables, I’ve been using this blender a lot and it just doesn’t cut it. The smoothies I’ve been making are coming out chunky no matter how long or high I blend the mixture for. I’ve also played around with different smoothie recipes thinking it was just user error but that’s not the case. I just upgraded to a vitamix and it’s like night and day! It’s worth it to me to spend a little more money and get something that’s better quality and going to last.

Author: Martha Walker
Title: Dependable
Body: Exactly what was needed. Crushes the ice perfectly

Author: Kelly Lopez
Title: Cheaper elsewhere
Body: I love this blender. However I was a little sad because I saw it for 20$ cheaper at Sams the next week.

Author: Entelechysail
Title: Common Cracks in Plastic Jar Lead to Failures
Body: I would NOT recommend this blender. The Jar arrived with spider cracking in the base of jar. Many people probably don’t notice these apparent defects. I started to order a replacement but then found multiple reviews about this plastic jar cracking to the point of leaking and/or breaking. One reviewer had a replacement jar sent by manufacturer with a short time of purchase only to have the replacement crack within a couple months. Manufacturer would not replace jar for free again. I found a major brand with thousands of reviews and a glass jar for about half the price of this. These cracks may not look like much but you can feel them with your fingernail. Stress cracks usually get larger and items fail just like a car’s windshield will do.

Author: Trixie
Title: Powerful
Body: First one looked like a refurb so sent back for a replacement. This is our first high powered full size blender. We use it every morning. So happy with this.

Author: tim boney
Title: New or used.
Body: Is this blender new?

Author: Debora K
Title: Love this powerful, easy to use & clean blender.
Body: This is an awesome product! Very powerful. It truly turns ice into snow. You can easily make snow cones with it. I make Kefer every morning with fruit, with the smaller blender attachment cups, and it blends it perfectly. I highly recommend this product even better than the Kitchen Aid blender it replaced. Clean up is a breeze, I just swish in hot soapy water. Well worth the money!

Author: Nicole
Title: Easy to use
Body: I like this blender. It’s easy to use and clean. However, sometimes it has difficulties locking into place and blending. The single serve cups are useful for on the go blending.

Author: Chris W
Title: Great blender for the house
Body: Only our second blender to own, but it has been a great addition to our kitchen gadgets.

Author: Gary J
Title: Love it
Body: Love, bought 2

Author: priscilla compono
Title: Love this product
Body: Love this product

Author: Jenny
Title: Stirrer
Body: This is an easy-to-use product. It comes with a big two small cups. I can stir any food with a big guy and then make minced meat into meatballs. it's great. The small cup can be used to make juice or mash any powder. I like it very much

Author: Mark blizzard
Title: Very nice blender!
Body: Got this around Christmas time and it shipped and arrived extremely fast! I love this blender so far, making smoothies and mixed drinks are almost a daily thing in my house now. Both the pitcher and single serve cups blend ice and frozen fruit with ease. This blender is pretty loud but that is to be expected, and it’s super easy to clean. Very nice product!

Body: I love this machine for making smoothies and blending soups and salad dressings. Love the small single serving attachment too. The blades for the main blending unit look like something from a horror movie, but boy do they work! Just be very careful when cleaning.

Author: Ramona DeBernardis
Title: This company does mot stand by their product.
Body: After a little over a year the single cup base broke and ninja will. It stand by their product saying that we are over the one year warranty.

Author: Maro

Body: Great product & good quality

Author: TootsieRo

Body: Was delivered on time and it works great. Even though the box looked like it was taped a lot.

Author: Sahr Sonny Junisa

Body: My wife is amazed by how good it works.

Author: humberto guerra

Body: Blend frozen fruit quickly and easily

Author: christina s.

Author: CRC

Body: We had an old model ninja that my husband loved for frozen drinks, it worked great until I dropped it. I bought this as a replacement and oh my goodness it is awesome, absolutely love it and the power is amazing

Author: Ryan
Title: Ok
Body: The box came all tore apart and ripped open.

Author: Maria
Title: Great
Body: Great

Author: Diana
Title: Such a great product
Body: It really does make ice

Author: Brad Mueller

Body: Sheerness

Author: TexasMom
Title: Stopped working in less than a year with infrequent use
Body: I loved this blender when I received it in February of 2020. The large container is VERY large (and a bit cumbersome to store) so I didn't really have a need for it but liked that I could blend up individual things in the smaller containers. We have 4 people in our household with very different likes so the individual containers were really nice. We used it a fair amount but not heavily for the first couple of months, then slowly tapered off use until recently. (Dec 2020) I made morning smoothies, plugged it in, tried to blend and it is completely dead. I tried different plugs in the kitchen, tried unplugging and plugging back in. Super sad it just died, and with use of less than a year and not regular use either. Really disappointed for the cost especially. I don't think I'll buy another Ninja.

Author: CtUsaMom

Author: Elizabeth R.
Title: Speed
Body: Excellent Blender

Author: babs
Title: It's easy to use!
Body: My daughter-in- law thinks it's fine!

Author: Adam D.

Author: Yakov
Title: not working
Body: i bought this product but it wasn't working at all, the power cord wasn't fitting as well so i had to buy 3rd party oneand it never worked, if u going to buy make sure you are from usa at least not working anywhere out side usa for me at least

Author: TEB
Title: Powerful, well made
Body: This blender is much more powerful than blenders I have had previously. The blades are extremely sharp and everything is very easy to clean. Get the feeling this thing will last for years.

Author: Matt

Body: It's very useful device that I think every one needs in the kitchen.I suggest to Buy a newer model which has extra food maker mixer.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Awesome
Body: Love this blender!!!!Works Wonderfully!!!!!

Author: Mari

Body: Still working well

Author: Robert/Cassi
Title: Incredible blender
Body: We love this blender, we had to replace our Nutribullet that had a lot of problems and chose this one based on the reviews and it did not disappoint! Love that it comes with a full size pitcher as well as 2 single serve cups with lids. We use it often and I have no complaints thus far!

Author: Interested Buyer
Title: Disappointed in Performance and Practicality
Body: I was given this as a gift and am thoroughly disappointed with its performance and practicality. The individual-sized smoothie containers are too small for someone who is into making a smoothie containing greens and fruit, unless you are a mini-smoothie drinker. After about a month and a half of making my smoothies, the 16 ounce-sized container quit working. The full-sized container is too tall to fit on my counter or even in my appliance storage area. I have to store it in my closet. What a hassle. I have gone back to my small, reliable blender which I purchased at a local department store for a quarter the cost of this blender.

Author: Lyons Den
Title: Awesome
Body: Best blender I've ever owned, hands down. Easy to use, easy to clean. Crushed ice in seconds. Blade is invincible.Makes perfect smoothies in seconds

Body: Can make a smoothie very fast and efficient, and a pina colada

Author: Itzayana Rosado

Author: Sonia A Cervantes
Title: Sad
Body: The package it came in was torn damaged destroyed. :-/

Author: James P. McQuinn
Title: It's a blending beast!
Body: I use it to blend both fruit and veggie smoothies. I love the single serving option as an alternative to the full pitcher.Not unimportant, by design it is safe to use, considering the sharpness of the blades needed to accomplish the job.I couldn't be more pleased.

Title: its really nice
Body: works great for smoothies

Author: antidrm
Title: Not what expected.
Body: VERY loud, has a lot of power but does not puree well.

Author: J Smith

Author: Lynn

Body: I like this machine for its blending power. It is a bit of a big, clunky item, and the cleaning requires care with the very sharp blades and the corners and angles of the lid. But overall, it's a good machine.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Lid gets stuck
Body: Initially I gave this product five stars. The blender itself works great. After several months of use though, now I'm finding that the lid is very difficult to release at times. The handle locking mechanism gets stuck in the locked position and I have to bang it and manipulate it to get it to open. I'm worried it's going to break soon.

Author: Raci570
Title: Professiponal Quality
Body: I was a chef for a while at a mountain resort, and the professional blender they had there wasn't as good as this. The materials are super solid, the motor is powerful and relatively quiet. the controls are easy to master, smoothies are a breeze, and the skies NOT the limit. The possibilities are endless, and it seems this thing will last forever.

Author: yarnosduh
Title: The Ninja blender is awesome, the seller that I purchased from is not. They sent me a used blender.
Body: Ninja blender is awesome.The seller is terrible. When I opened the outer box the box inside looked like it had been drug 1 mile down a dirty road. Then when I opened the box I realized they had sold me a used blender. It was dirty, obviously used, had spilled food on the side. I tested the blender and so far it works ok. I tried to determine who sold it but was unable to tell, just that I purchased it through Amazon. Not happy with being sold a used item at full retail price.Ray

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Purchase another brand! Do NOT waste your money!
Body: Terrible product! Did not blend as smoothly as I desired which I looked passed. The deal breaker, however, was that I purchased this product on October 1, 2020 and today, January 7, 2021, it no longer works!!Such a waste of money especially considering I didn’t use on a daily basis so wear and tear was not the issue.

Author: Chris
Title: POS STAY AWAY!!
Body: Stay away the plastic is cheap and will eventually crack after not even 3yrs of use on and off POS

Author: emmanuel scriven
Title: I love my Ninja
Body: I have no dislikes more likes it's better than I thought

Author: KellyCanuck
Title: cracked.
Body: owned it for around six months and its already cracked.

Author: James
Title: Great power. No need to spend money on Vita Mix.
Body: Great blender. Blades are almost scary. Not for kids to operate without adult supervision because blades are super sharp. A little bigger then I would have liked but would never buy a vita mix with this at a fraction of the cost.

Author: Bonnie J. Terry
Title: Love it
Body: Been wanting a Ninjajust felt like they are too expensive. This one was a decent price and a Christmas gift. Made cashew milk and a smoothie the first day and it’s a great blender.

Author: John Smith
Title: Okay product.
Body: Had some confusion over the 'safety features' - it does have a system of 'switches/sensors' that ensure the blending unit is secured to the base -

Author: Sharmar
Title: A must have in your home!

Unfortunately the box inside the shipping box was damaged, and the blender itself is dirty and looks like it was sitting out somewhere. The large blender cup has cracks or scratches in the bottom of it. We would love this item, but not in this condition.

On a side note, when you get ready to remove the blade and wash it, be VERY careful. You will slice your hand up if you are not cautious! Great product.

Title: Disappointed. Do not purchase this model.
Body: This 1100 W blender does not work any better than my old 700 W blender. It does not blend my dates even when I cut them or my cashews, walnuts & raisins. I use a liquid to blend. I make a lot of sauces & needed a stronger blender. On the panel are numbers 1 to 3. I have no idea if I am chopping , grinding or doing a puree. I wish I could return it( but I had to use it to see if I liked it) as this is the first time I have been disappointed in a new appliance. It easy to clean which is the only positive. Overpriced for poor performance

Author: Darren
Title: I gave 5 stars across the board even though I don't know why Sheerness" is a thing"
Body: It literally makes snow in less than 10 seconds if you fill it with ice cubes leaving no ice chunks. I always hated that when I used any other blender I've ever owned it left little ice balls the size of marbles no matter how long you let it blend. This blender works 1000 times better than any other one we've ever owned.We use it every morning to make disgusting smoothies that will likely cause me to live to be 150. It's still as awesome today as it was when we bought it. I could not recommend another blender at any price as highly as this one. And really the price isn't crazy either.It's easy to clean as well. No problems with it whatsoever! If you buy one you will not be disappointed!

Author: Liz H
Title: Pitchers cracks too easily with temperature change
Body: Be careful with temperature changes. The pitcher cracks far too easily with temperature shifts. This happened to mine within months, and it’s only use has been blending frozen smoothies. Rinsing the pitcher out with hot water after blending is enough to cause cracks, leading to leaks. Doubtful it’s covered under warranty due to language around avoiding “extreme” temperature changes. The changes don’t need to be that extreme.

Title: Didn’t last:(
Body: I bought this in May, and have used it 3-4 times a week to make my smoothies, along with sauces, etc. I never had any issues, never dropped it, and I hand wash it, but I am disappointed that in only 7 months, the pitcher has completely cracked on the bottom, so it leaks out, a lot, making it useless now. To replace just the pitcher is almost as much as buying an entirely new Ninja. But I’m not sure I want another one if I’m going to have to buy two a year. My sister had had hers for 8 years with no issues, so I’m not sure why mine broke? This is very disappointing, as I prep and make smoothies 6/7 days of the week, and blend 3 of those days. I really liked it otherwise. :(

Title: Love it 😍
Body: I love my Ninja blender! The blending power is like no other, turns ice into snow in seconds. Makes great fruit/vegetable smoothies AND great margaritas. It’s easy to clean, but be careful when removing the blades b/c they’re extra sharp! If you don’t make too much of a mess you can just add some water and dish washing liquid to the blender and turn it on for about 30 seconds & that will do the trick (a little life hack I learned from Tik Tok). Definitely worth the $120 I spent when I bought this September 2020!

Author: Don Cristobel
Title: Maybe too powerful, definitely too small of a pour-in opening
Body: I have had a protein smoothie for lunch at least 300 days a year for at least the last 15 years. My blender finally died and I had to replace it, and I bought this.When a blender is too powerful it can introduce almost too much air into the smoothie and then you eat it and it is all fluffed up and you end up getting really bloated trying to get it all down. It just is not good. There are only 3 speeds, I wish there was more control. This will definitely destroy whatever you put in it.I really dislike the lid. The spout to add stuff to it while spinning (like my whey powder) is in the corner, not in the middle, so anything you pour in tends to get stuck on the side of the jug. Also its too small, too small for my standard whey scoop. I don't use weird whey, I use the best selling nationwide brand. The little spout is just too small. The whey doesn't get mixed great if I don't add it while the liquid is in motion.This is super easy to clean, the jug is all 1 piece. The blade sits on a gear, so you can remove the blade and really rinse it or just toss it in the dishwasher. No disassembling the jug.All told, I can probably deal with the power issue by using the lowest setting and making sure I run it as briefly as possible. But the lid... I really dislike that lid.

Title: This blender is not user friendly. To
Body: This blender is not user friendly. To use the single serve function, one has a press down the button and hold on to it, in order for it to work. I don't want to have to press down the button and babysit the blender in order to use it. I want to just press it down maybe put away the ingredients and then return to it to turn it off. I cannot do that with a single serve function, and I don't want to find out if I have to press down the button too and keep holding it in order to use the big blender.Lastly, the videos that I looked at was attached to this blender, showed a blender with timer. This blender does not have a timer.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great product
Body: Great product

Author: KMContar
Title: Awesome
Body: Had a normal, crappy blender for years. Should have spent the money sooner. Love the min blender cups.

Author: Dedicated
Title: Single serve too fragile.
Body: Single serve lock switch already broken after just a few uses.

Author: Anthony S.
Title: Great blender for the price.
Body: Sufficient blending power for ice, frozen fruit, etc...Easy to clean.Shipped fast👍

Author: Customer
Title: Disappointed
Body: Not sturdy. Can’t handle fully frozen veggies, etc. A small park broke and the large mixer only fits a certain way now. But I now prefer using the separate cup.

Author: tonyinthebiz
Title: Only bad thing
Body: I really like the blender and I like the price even more but it I had to complain I'd say the 2 blender cups that come with the machine are way too small. I'd love to buy larger cups but they don't sell it for this model.

Author: roberta s.
Title: Best Smoothies Ever!
Body: I have a standard blender and Magic Bullet, but wanted a larger capacity, more powerful blender to make smoothies for my family. I was making smoothies in batches with my bullet in order to have enough for my family of 4. I did extensive research and decided on the Ninja Professional Countertop Blender. I have to say, I was very pleasantly surprised with this machine. First of all, the design of the machine is great. It not only looks good, but it has features that are very convenient. Little things like the suction cups that hold the machine in place and the easy click container make using the machine a pleasure. I even look forward to using it, whereas I hate pulling out my traditional blender! The cover is smart too since it clicks and releases easily with the touch of a button. Very smart. Most importantly for me, it's easy to clean. I've used frozen fruit and veggies and ice and it has been liquified in no time. The motor is very powerful - I've mostly used level 2, but it has 3 levels plus a pulse which makes it flexible for different options like liquifying soups. I love this machine. It was a great choice and a great value!

Author: Sherri
Title: Waste of money
Body: Great blender for 4 mos then it smoked and the motor died. Don’t buy.

Author: Stormy Johnson
Title: Make life simple!
Body: LOVE this blender!!!!! Both the single serve and the big blender are amazing! I am able to make smoothies, soups, cocktails, etc! Heat, texture, density this thing can take it all! Would recommend for anyone who likes to make smoothies with frozen fruit!

Author: Mark Thomas
Title: Blades don’t secure. Dangerous design.
Body: The blades do not secure to the bottom, so every time you pour it falls out so be careful. Every time I try to clean it the blades falls out, and don’t grab it from falling I just extremely sharp and catch the hell out of you. Moreover, any powder put inside sticks to the blades almost like a magnet.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Easy to use! Powerful!
Body: Love the Power!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Dead on Arrival
Body: Got the blender and after we set up, it wouldn't blend. We ensured al the lines and dots were connected. The power button was solid color telling us everything was in the proper position. It just wouldn't start. we even filled it up with water and ice, still nothing. How is that even possible strait from the box.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: good
Body: good

Author: Scott Van Horn
Title: Great
Body: Everything, two protein cups are awesome

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Best Kitchen Tool!
Body: Perfect for our smoothies and soups. The small to go cups are helpful for breakfast smoothies on the way to work.

Author: Murphy
Title: High quality blender for an even better price
Body: I'm still shocked about the price of this blender. It has been great. Easy to clean and no issues at all so far.

Author: Lizette
Title: Great capacity
Body: Love it! I used it to prepare about 3 gallons of green juice. The capacity of jar combined with the power was perfect to finish fats my little project.

Author: Olivia L. Foreman
Title: worth the money
Body: excellent smoothies

Author: Mutant
Title: Lid is defective
Body: The blender is very Powerful and we like it. It won’t run unless the complicated lid clicks on. After just 6 months the lid is very difficult to click on. It is as if the mechanism is faulty . I can’t recommend this because if you are like me you will be paying for a new lid at $30. I have blender before this one where the lid never need replacing at all .

Author: Tay
Title: Great machine!
Body: Amazing blending power. Be sure to cut your fruit into small pieces when using ninja cup.

Author: Turners
Title: Use it all the time
Body: We use this all the time. Its great. It's hard to wash by hand, but I usually throw it in the dishwasher. Kind of a pain though if you use it often.

Author: Heidi
Title: Defective!
Body: This blender was great for the first couple of uses. After that you can not release the lid from the pitcher. When contacting the company for help, the only thing they could do is offer for you to buy a replacement part for the same price as it would cost to purchase a new one. Save your money don't buy Ninja!!!

Author: Jeffro
Title: Nice and Nice!!!
Body: Nice blender! But the bonus of two single serve cups and a special blade makes this worth every penny, and then some... And it’s super easy to clean. I use water with a touch of soap, and touch of vinegar to clean the blade and cups after use on a high cycle for about 15 seconds. I also use ice to sharpen the blades. But aside from that, I highly recommend this product.

Author: Ed Burger
Title: Amazing
Body: This has so many functions and blends sooo smoothly. I would definitely recommend this product.

Author: Peter C
Title: Awesome
Body: absolutely love 💘 this I make smoothies everyday now lost 15 pounds first month

Body: Works great, pulls spinach down.

Body: Great blending power. Very sharp blades.

Author: Darci Shellman
Title: My best purchase of 2020
Body: I love this blender and it's my favorite purchase of 2020.

Author: Bec
Title: Great size
Body: We juice daily and the size makes it possible to make several servings perfectly blended. The top locks down so nothing leaks out. It is easy to clean as well.

Author: aoeu
Title: Works great
Body: Been using it to make slushies, margaritas, and other frozen drinks and food. Also have used it to slush many fruits and vegetables for cooking. I've had no issues with it so far, and it's been able to cope with all the items. Cleaning is very easy, and the included single-serve blender is excellent for making blended cocktails.I previously had an Oster but the glass pitcher broke, and greatly prefer the Ninja.

Author: Randy Wilson
Title: Power Button Failed
Body: Bought 10 months ago and the power button failed. The first call to customer service I was told the motor base was NOT warranted and the replacement is $95 (only paid $80 for the entire unit) but a one time only offer it would be $19.95. I called back (and got someone who could speak plain english) and was told the motor base is warranted and the $19.95 was for shipping which I disagreed with but what choice did I have? The customer service lady was helpful and got the shipping down to $14
