Title: Your drink ready in SECONDS!
Body: This is a home run! Love it and the little extras for a one-person drink as well as the option for many!

Author: Mahmoud Chaaban
Title: good blender for the price
Body: I bought this blender a year ago and it is still works the same day I bought it.

Author: Maria Diaz
Title: Ninja Countertop Blender
Body: After I purchased this Professional Countertop Blander I was sure this would be the last blander I was going to have to buy, But I has very wrong because I purchased this blander on February 24, 2020 and in only7 months, only using it every know then it dose not work. I also purchased a 4 year protection from Asurion just incase I needed it, and boy I was right in less then 7 month the Ninja Professional Countertop Blander was broken It's not working. So please be Advised that this blander will NOT work after 7 month. I only use this on weekends to make some drinks I can't believe after only 7 months and only using it on the weekend it DOSEN'T WORK. BE AWARE OF THIS. IT DOSENT WORK.

Author: Interested Golfer
Title: Crushes frozen fruits for great smoothies
Body: The instruction were very clear, with well written explanations on how to unpack, assemble, use and clean the machine. Good illustrations as well.I made a smoothie using a lot or frozen fruits, a banana and almond juice. This type of smoothie is what broke my old blender. The Ninja blended everything quickly and produced a nice, ice cream like, smoothie. It was easy to disassemble and wash. It took up a little more storage space than my old blender did, though.

Author: Nikita Isaac
Title: Great for all uses.
Body: This was a gift for a friend. The love and use of the product has been easy and efficient. Clean and precise blending power. Makes cleaning easy with a simple wash amd rinse.

Author: michael shaun mcmillan
Title: Great product that I highly recommend.
Body: This blender is powerful and sturdy. I’ve made many smoothies using the Nutri Ninja Cups and they turn out perfect every time. Do be careful handling the blades because they are very sharp.

Author: Katrice Cook-Watson
Title: We are blending 😊
Body: I purchased this item as a gift for my mother-in-law and she absolutely loves it! I asked for gift wrap and her gift was delivered wrapped. No complaints here!

Author: Jonas Smith
Title: Amazing Product
Body: This blender is truly amazing, great power. I use it to grind my coffee beans and it does a fabulous job. I like the single serve feature as well. I make a fruit smoothie each morning and this feature provides the exact quantity. You have to be very careful when cleaning the blender blades because they are very sharp. There is also a safety feature with the single serve that I like as well. If the blender top isn't tightened correctly to the cup and you try to blend, it will not work. You'll notice the power button blinking.

Author: Cliff Northern Jr.
Title: Unfortunately this was defective
Body: I love Ninja products. This one blender here leaked at the handle so I was definitely disappointed for sure. And I believe it was discontinued after I sent it back so I couldn’t re-order another one

Author: Erika E.
Title: perfect
Body: This wonderful machine does it all. I did sno-cones in the summer which was awesome. How many blenders can makes sno-cones without killing it? It very easy to clean. The extra 1 serving containers are perfect for small smoothies. Easy to clean, easy to use, very very pleased!

Author: Tom B
Title: Faulty Lid and Very Bad Customer Service
Body: 2nd failed blender lid, this time with small springs and plastic parts ending up in smoothie. Customer service a JOKE: (apparently in S.America so phone tech making conversation extremely frustrating). After 5 phone calls, roughly 48 mins on hold, 3 requests for a supervisor, two emails with pictures sent to Ninja (cservice@sharkninja.com) I was told I needed to buy yet ANOTHER canister to get replacement for ANOTHER failed lid (I already did this once.) The lid is ironically the MOST IMPORTANT part to use this blender, and now I conclude it is prone to easy failure AND A RISK OF SMALL PARTS GETTING IN YOUR FOOD WITH FAILURE. I find it impossible to believe I just happened to get the only two lids for this product that have failed, SO BEWARE. I would NOT recommend this product, and I am shocked and disheartened with the customer service who's approach appears to be Let's Make a Deal to buy more product.

Author: Skynet
Title: Worth the money
Body: This thing is a beast it chops up everything this is a super blender I put in sweet potatoes apples oranges bananas spinach kale you name it it blends it It is super fast pace And at this point mine don’t leak any fluids out

Author: Tiffany Kendrick
Title: Blender
Body: Great for major slushy drinks.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: It is awesome
Body: Love it

Body: This thing is fantastic. I mostly use the single serving blenders for my smoothies. Blends ice, frozen berries and anything else with ease. I even made butternut squash soup and blended that into the smoothest soup. Highly recommend.

Body: Ninja makes the best kitchen toys and this is no exception. Knocking off one star because you have to hold the blend button when blending with the single serving cup. Would prefer to leave it running for about 20-30 secs on its own for my morning shake while I multitask.

It's hard to clean because of the way the blades are stuck to a poll persay, and it often leaves a white residue with regular washing if you do not put it in the dishwasher to saatize and heat dry.It's also awful at blending spinwch for how sharp of a blender it is. Very disappointed overall.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Gaiz, if you like making smoothies...
Body: GET THIS!!! I should have gotten this a long time ago. I am a big smoothie boy, as it is so much easier to eat fruit blended. You can tell when you open this thing, it is well designed and looks mean. The blades came from an industrial power tool... It can handle ice, frozen fruit, etc... and truly liquifies. NO MORE CHEWING AND LITTLE FRUIT BITS!!! Don't bother with those cheap blenders anymore!!

Author: Warren Jones Jr
Title: Best blender
Body: I've gone through some really average blenders in the past and finally decided to pay a little more for a ninja after I'd heard so many good things about it. This thing really, really, really blends well. A common issue I had with my previous blenders was that they didn't blend consistently and would cause lots of air bubbles. That's not the case with the ninja. I use thing thing on the daily for breakfast smoothies and have never had a problem. Big plus that it comes with 2 personal cups so that you can blend and then drink on the go. Cleaning is simple and the blender is a size that's easy to store in the cabinet.

Author: Sam Elliot

So i ordered Ninja Blender and i have to say, it's works amazing. I use to make my breakfast smoothies and it blends my frozen fruits, very smooth and it's not loud. I would recommend to anyone.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Trash brand for the fake consumer
Body: Shark/Ninja is a trash brand, it's really that simple. Their customer support is almost as bad as their products. You buy this brand if you want to pretend to have nice things, even when those things don't work.

Author: Dulce B.
Title: Worth it

This blender doe just that. It is also very easy to clean and we love the safety precautions it has. Definitely something we recommend.

Author: Subongkoch Chantaburanun

Body: Hello!This is great! I love this thing. I make all kinds of shapes, haven't used it for cooking yet, but it's great.Love the dials, easy power on - 1 2 3 speeds and tap/pulse.Crushes ice easily - the one serving cups are really nice as well although I don't use those, I always make full size shakes to eat through out the week.Only issue was compatibility with their smaller unit. The single serve blenders don't interchange blades. Which is a bummer.

But I’m crushing ice so I don’t expect it to be. But I also don’t fee the need to wear ear plugs when using it! I love that it comes with singe serving cups and a pitcher. We’ve used it several times and are looking forward to Summer so we can have more frozen cocktais!

Author: JP

I think maybe a recent round of poor QC has caused what used to be a great blender into a health hazard! Sent back immediately!

Author: jeremym

I found that it can be used to make ice cream, peanut butter and even crush ice into snow for snow-cones.

The ninja has been great for us for the past 3 years! It blends really well and I love the convenience of being able to blend individual containers

Author: Harshit Soni

Author: Kaitlin

Author: Dennis Anderson

Author: echo21
Title: Love this blender
Body: We use it to blends peppers for hot sauces and other intense blending things that are too much for a food processor. The mulitple-blade stack is a huge improvement over blenders of my past (all of which I discarded in favor of my food processors). Worth the money and a good product.

Author: K. Souza
Title: All I was expecting!
Body: The Ninja Professional Countertop Blender with 1100-Watt Base is very powerful and perfect for mixing smoothies, crushing ice. Cleanup is very easy.

Author: Gdog in DE

Body: LOve the small container. Blades are super sharp, be careful taking out to clean. Blends everything weve thrown it it so far!

Author: Tony Gutierrez

Author: Janice Kelly

Body: I love it more than my expensive Vitamix which changed over the years

Author: Anthony Vitani
Title: Very satisfied!
Body: Very happy. Like the ability to make a single serving using the single serving cups, if desired.

Author: Alexandra B

Body: My babe and I think this is by far the best blender out there.Go ahead and enjoy.

Author: PJ west palm

Author: Miller-Mission
Title: Great product
Body: Bought this to make smoothies and use it every morning. Super easy to use, blends my frozen, dry and wet ingredients into a perfect drinkable smoothie in seconds, highly recommend

Author: Leslie
Title: Awesome!
Body: BEST BLENDER FOR ANYTHING! Smoothies come out great, salsas, sauces anything comes out smooth !

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Awesome blender
Body: You get what you pay for. I had a 20 dollar blender and it sucked. This will blend ice in smoothies, it will chop vegetables (I just chopped some carrots in the uploaded picture), and grind up nuts or coffee beans. So far I’m very satisfied!!!

Author: charisse vega
Title: Blades and locking
Body: Wow where do I start. Fantastic!!!! I wish that I had this powerful blender years ago. The ninja stands up to its name 110%Last night I made homemade pumpkin soup came out delicious. See photos 💜When using this machine please make sure that you pay attention to how it locks into the base and on top to open it you must press the release button and make sure it is locked when you hit the power button. When cleaning be extra careful when you take out the blades they are very very sharp repeat SHARP.The blender is loud when it’s on 3 but I will not take stars away from this powerful blender. I 💜it and can not wait to make drinks smoothies and more soups desserts and spaghetti sauce. 🥰 A must buy if you haven’t already.

Author: Natasha Prusa
Title: Easy to clean and great for hot or cold foods!
Body: Love it for smoothies and soups! Easy to clean, assemble.

Author: Brett from TX
Title: Excellent budget option for smoothies
Body: I was looking for a budget alternative to the Vitamix Turboblend, and this is a great option. We've made multiple smoothies so far and it crushed frozen fruit, ice, carrots, and greens very well. The overall construction seems to be well thought out. It might not be quite as refined as the Vitamix models I have used in the past, but at 1/4 the price it is perfect.

Author: Jeronimo Gonzalez
Title: The box was open is this used I pay for a new one
Body: The box was not in good conditionAnd it was open

Author: Altynbek Nazarov

Body: I got it as a gift for my gf and she loves it. Good thing is she makes smoothies almost everyday, it's healthy, it's tasty and doesn't cost a lot. Definitely good thing to spend your money on

Author: Charli Meldrum
Title: Great product!
Body: This blender is a pro!! I threw in frozen peaches, grapes, a banana, and apple cider and there was no chunks. Very smooth!

Author: Richard Interrante III
Title: Works
Body: Works great, small cups good for making protein shakes, easy clean

Author: Kay
Title: Works GREAT!
Body: Really glad I decided to buy this, it's perfect. I've been making a smoothie every day, salsa every other week, margaritas on weekends. It's held up very well. Easy to use.

Author: GLK
Title: Excellent for making my smoothies!
Body: Now that I have this blender (recommended by my son and a nephew), I am thankful that my old clunky blender died. This Ninja countertop blender is so much easier to use to make a single smoothie in the morning and the clean up goes quickly. So glad we ordered this one! I am making smoothies using a recipe from Will Bulsiewicz's book, Fiber Fueled, and this blender makes it so much easier for me to keep it up!

Author: Irisdairi
Title: La caja esta dañada
Body: La caja llego hecha un desastre y rota por todas parte.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Works great
Body: Got this in a couple weeks ago and we love it. Has lots of power and the cups makes it easy to mix and go.

Author: Marco Guerrero
Title: Licuadora
Body: Lo que necesitaba

Author: njb
Title: Not the same....
Body: We bought our first Ninja Blender several years ago and used it quite a bit. It was well built. We had to replace it this year and we bought, what we thought, was the same item. I could smell a burning smell many times so that concerned me. Sadly, the pitcher cracked within 3 months of purchasing. We never dropped it or misused it. Author: Amazon Customer

Then after I used it on day 2 the blade was on the counter air drying and I slightly bumped into it and it sliced deep into another finger. If any child were to grab it I'm sure it would slice a finger completely off of God forbid worse. Those sharp blades should not be removable from inside the blender. It's very dangerous.

Author: Shemeka Chargois
Title: Yes it will blend and it is amazing
Body: was hesitant because this is refurbished but compared to the new options from similar brands, I couldn't justify spending the extra money. Previously, I used a Magic Bullet, which is good but not really adequate for long-term, heavy-duty blending. I used this to make a fruit smoothie with frozen berries and soy milk. I used the smoothie button, which gives a countdown of 60 seconds before turning off. The frozen fruit processed perfectly and there was only a little bit of berry seeds left behind (not even enough to really notice). It was a perfectly smooth texture. No lumps, no chunks of ice, and no clumps of fruit. It got stuck during blending. All it needed was a bit more liquid and it was fine.I like that this blender has the power switch in the back too. The jar is very easy to clean because it's square. I like this design a lot better than other brands because I hate having to take apart the jar to clean it thoroughly. I haven't used the other features on the blender but for a first try, it worked perfectly. For a refurbished unit, there's nothing cosmetically wrong with it. It looks like a brand new model. The jar and lid are brand new but the base is not. I attached pictures of the blade and stopper for the lid. I like that the lid opening is small enough to drop ice cubes or oil or whatever, without taking off the lid.

Author: Jeffrix
Title: Powerful. But don't fill too high and watch the bottom for cracks
Body: Very powerful motor. Probably blends anything.2 complaints.1) it doesn't blend well if it is too full. About 1.5 ltrs. Anymore than 3/4 full and it doesn't blend the top well.2) after only 2 weeks the bottom of the blender container where the motor connects cracked.For the price and the good reviews it shouldnt crack within 2 weeks of using.Update: ordered a new one and container came cracked. Found this is a common problem with this blender.Added pictures

Author: MotherOfLilDragons3
Title: I Miss My OLD Ninja More
Body: This was a replacement for old Ninja, that finally died after multiple daily uses, for 7 years. This new one, while it looks the same, most DEFINITELY does NOT perform as well, as my old one. I think they tampered with the motor, and made it different since making these new ones. Now, when I turn it on to mix my protein shake, it starts smoking very easily and quickly, and smells like the motor is burning up. I am not overloading it. Its just ice, almond milk and a scoop of powder. A 1100 watt motor should handle that with ease, but this struggles. I have ZERO doubts, that this product will last more than a year or two. So, sadly, I don't recommend it. I would just save the money, and purchase a Vitamix. It may be more expensive, but in the end, it will last many more years than this puppy. I do like that you get additional cups with this model, as they can be upwards of $20 each. The problem lies in the motor of the base. Also, the little rubber nubs that are down inside the base of this, tend to just pop out for no good reason. I would look down, snd they would be missing. I finally just super glued them back into the base. You can use it without them, but you risk moisture and liquid getting into the internal compartment where the actual motor is. It can also strip the grooves in the blender cups. As a user of this product for over 12 years, I recommend to people, NOT putting the blender cups in the dishwasher. The heat breaks down the plastic, snd causes it split, as well as it will warp the opening of the cups and then the blade attachment will not fit properly, and they will start leaking everywhere when you turn the blender on. If you are only a casual user of this product, this item will be fine for you. However, if you are a heavy user, like myself, where you blend shakes at least 2x a day, every single day, save your $$. It is extremely convenient having the to go cups w/blender attachment. And I have yet to find another blender that can blend to the perfect consistency that i enjoy, which is no slivers of ice, etc. Bottom line, it appears that the actual Ninja company has started cutting corners during the manufacturing of these models, or either has re-outsourced them to someone different and they are made more cheaply on the inside.

I inspected the bottom and found large cracks around the attachment for the blades. These cracks have rendered the pitcher unusable. The smaller personal cups with the cup blade attachment are still functional, but the pitcher is not. It's a shame that this happened after just barely 6 months of use. Without this random damage, I would have easily given the product 4 stars. (Not 5 stars because its nooks and crannies are a little difficult to clean.)
