The most use I get out of it is with the blending cups which is perfect for quick preps on the way out the door or right after a workout. The only thing that would have made this purchase that much sweeter, is if this model came with closed mouth tops for the traveling cups... I sometimes do not like that they are open mouth, especially when I am taking them into work or around other people -- but the absent of, was not enough to take away a star. Hopefully Ninja (or another company) will release a product that does allow me to close mouth lid my drinks, one day.

Author: KC
Title: Great smoothie maker
Body: Great for making frozen fruit smoothies.Not good for making morning juice out of vegetables and fruits!! It doe not blend perfect and will have chunks!! You have to buy vitamix to blend all the veggies and fruit if you are doing one of those juice diets!!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good
Body: Good

Author: dapscaps
Title: Great machine
Body: Love it

Author: Jae L.
Title: Pleased with this product!
Body: LOVE this product! I've always wanted one of these and then the bullet. I was ecstatic when I discovered this combo. My daughter enjoys using this for any and everything she can think of. My Fiancè seems to think that it somehow makes ice cream, even though I've stated at least 3 times it DOES NOT! 😅😅😅 BUY THIS.. It's worth every cent! I've had it about 2 - 3 weeks now and have used it several times with no complaints! It's super easy to clean and use. You won't be disappointed.

Author: jeanette
Title: Glass cracks
Body: Glass cracks after a period of time

Author: Amazon Customer and An Avid Reader
Title: Great Product.
Body: Tried a lot of blenders This is best. RECOMMEND

Author: Gayle Calcote
Title: Easy Smoothie/Milkshake Maker
Body: I especially like the smaller cups for making individual servings.

Author: José
Title: Lo mas importante... que me mandaron. La licuadora. Pero no me mandaron. Los vasos.
Body: si. Es agradable.

Author: Corey Walker
Title: Good for the go!
Body: I love it! I love being able to make a big batch of smoothies or just using the personal cups

Author: M. Griffin
Title: BEWARE: Pitcher cracks with barely frozen fruit!
Body: Used twice and has two huge cracks on the bottom of pitcher. A 1/2 cup of frozen blueberries inside a smoothie was just too much for this blender to handle. It leaks all over inside the engines motor. What a hunk of junk!

Author: Brooke
Title: Worth the money
Body: This blender and blender cups are amazing!! It works very well!!

Author: Alz
Title: Quality blender
Body: My fiancé started making a lot of shakes. Our previous blenders could barely crush ice which naturally enraged him. This blender was a great purchase. In less than a minute things are crushed. The single blend is very convenient as well. All in all we are very happy with this purchase!

Author: Nikki
Title: Love this blender
Body: Absolutely love this blender, especially the single cups. Perfect after make a protein shake after my workout. FYI the blades in the bigger container are super sharp!

Author: M.G.
Title: Chops ice!
Body: Fantastic blender! This is my 3rd one. Great for protein shakes with ice. Chops it perfectly!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Works great.
Body: In love with this blender. So glad I purchased it. My husband and I use it a couple times a day and it holds up nicely.

Author: Zendora
Title: Whoop my Ninja has arrived!!!
Body: Received my ninja blender today very happy great customer service and look forward to using this blender.

Author: Mona ambriz
Title: Makes alot of noise
Body: Its prety but very noisy, makes alot of nois when i use the induvidual cups not happy ay all

Author: Jimin Kim
Title: Poor packaging and missing accessories..
Body: Package came all broken and open like photo shown above. Missing blade assembly and the two lids that are supposed to come with it.

Author: Bonnie
Title: Old model works great still!
Body: I didnt buy mine through amazon. I got this at Kohls with all my discounts and played 30 buck at least 4 years ago. I still use it everyday for my healthy green drinks. I use frozen fruit and solid ice cubes from an ice cube tray in there to blend and still no issues!. I am afraid to purchase a new one in future as it sounds like they are not as well made.

Author: Jean M. Dorsinville
Title: LIVES UP TO ITS REPUTATION
Body: THIS IS MY SECOND NINJA IN 10 YEARS. THE FIRST ONE SIMPLY DONE ITS JOB.

Author: Deborah Lueders
Title: Great Bargain!!
Body: Very happy with this machine. Really does the job! Powerful motor. Love the attachment feature, to make smoothies, that is SO nice! The motor is a bit loud, but was expecting that due to the size, I've had louder!'

Author: Wade W Hicks
Title: For motorhome
Body: Works great in the motorhome

Author: A K
Body: Good

Author: BEATRIZ S
Title: Súper satisfecha con mi compra
Body: Me súper encanto!!!! Muele excelente, fácil de usar, de limpiar, máxima capacidad. Todo está perfecta.

Author: MightyMouse
Title: Great mixer!
Body: Great mixer for frozen Margarita's and more.

Author: Alejandro Escobedo Lozoya
Title: Broken the very first week!!!
Body: Broke at the 1st week of usage, nothing out of the ordinary just regular house Kitchen usage, our old Oster Blender has been working for 6 years without any issues. We just bought this Ninja blender because my wife wanted a fancier one, welp we are now never going to purchase a Ninja product back again.

Author: Bill Cooper
Title: PERFECT!
Body: Love this thing. Powerful, and efficient. Quality buy!!!

Author: Stephanie
Title: Awesome!
Body: Holy moly! This blender is incredible and clean and easy to use. I am addicted!

Author: chelanne soriano
Title: Best blender
Body: Best blender I have ever used. Blends large chunks of frozen fruit with ease

Author: Teresa Miller
Title: Very powerful.
Body: Love my new Ninja. Used it multiple time today, for breakfast smoothie and later for mixed frozen drinks. Frozen drinks were a hit. Works great, small and compact and love that i dont have to have the big blender on counter, can use the little cups to blend. Blended the ice in an instant.

Author: OutdoorDesigner
Title: Beware of the plastic components...
Body: I love that this makes amazing smoothies. But I've used it three times and there are hairline fractured in the plastic pitcher that have grown. Also the threads at the top of the blade component have already become worn in three threads. This product has amazing potential but the plastic issue needs to be addressed as noted in so many other reviews here. Also a safety grip at top for blade spinner would be a good idea, as well as a gentle push down lock to keep blades in place when cleaning.

Author: Billboard
Title: Powerful
Body: Loved the two extra containers with a separate blade...wonderful smoothies

Author: Me
Title: Best blender ever
Body: This blender exceded my expectations. Well built and best of all, does an incredible great job. Thanks Ninja

Author: brandy
Title: Muy malo
Body: La maquina a las 2 meses dejo de funcionar

Author: jack
Title: Cracked
Body: The product is not easy to clean. It is made of plastic but it started to crack and liquid flush out of the cracks. So messy and not happy with my shopping.

Author: tealover
Title: motor broke after few use
Body: I brought this BL660 2 years ago and used few times, and like it very much, easy to use and clean, no problems what so ever. Recently I took it out after a year, the motor couldn't start, no light, completely dead! I have so many Blenders but nothing like this one so short lived.

Author: Red11
Title: Leaks
Body: Leaks to the point that you cannot use it at all. Very loud too.Back to my cheap bullet which is 10 times better. Placed this one in storage.

Author: Carin
Title: Love this smoothie maker
Body: Great for making big batches or smaller individual cups of smoothies. With the lids, the cups are easy to take on the go. The lids do have an open hole for drinking, so don't toss it in your bag or you'll end up with smoothie everywhere.Great value for the price.

Author: Ira G.
Title: Motor is going out after just one month!!!!
Body: This is a TERRIBLE blender!!! It arrived less than a month ago. All systems go, worked fine, then the motor starting going out. Too late to return it, so $100.00 down the drain. NOT worth the money- do your self a favor and avoid at all costs!

Author: Tabatha
Title: Blends great and very easy to use
Body: I'm absolutely in love with this blender I've been seeing it on so many food videos that I've been watching. The only problem I don't like is you can't soak it in water because the handle gets moisture in it which it's not able to come off and could build up mildew.

Author: Yo-man
Title: Convenient and easy clean up
Body: Bought this to make one serving smoothies since it was only a little more and you get the blender as well. The cups are smaller and narrower than other the single serve blend system. I use a bottle brush for easier cleaning since it’s a tight fit for my hand. So if making larger single serve smoothies you may want to go with the other unit. Definitely pleased with the blending power and how well it mixes everything. No clumping of my collagen mix in oat milk, banana and blueberries.Haven’t use larger mixer but feels well made with nice features. The entire middle blade comes out for easy and safer cleaning.

Author: Nicolette Miller
Title: Perfect in every way but one
Body: This is the first blender I've ever purchased. All others have been secondhand. This is a dream. It blends well, is easy to clean, easy to use BUT it is the loudest appliance known to man. It rivals a lawnmower. Every time we use it, we have to notify each other because it's scary!

Author: Christine
Title: Great features and amazing power
Body: I love how easy to use this professional blender is! it pulses, mixes, and crushes easily and completely. The individual containers are perfect for smoothies or drinks! This is simple to disassemble for cleaning and can be cleaned with dish soap or in the dishwasher. I have made many of the recipes from the booklet which is included and loved them all! I am looking forward to finding many more recipes and using this for years to come.

Author: Brittney Fason
Body: It blends everything well!

Author: shulvr
Title: Quick and Powerful
Body: Better than my Kitchenaid that broke recently. This blender is powerful and crushes ice with ease

Author: Jaxwal
Title: Second Ninja blender to die - not worth the $$
Body: We have now owned two of the Ninja blenders with the personal blending cups and they would be great blenders if they would last beyond a year and a half. Our first Ninja blender's motor died at a year and a half and the power button on our current Ninja blender, purchased about a year and 3 months ago, is no longer functional. We do not use them very often, maybe 3 or 4 times per month and we are not hard on our appliances.This blender is too expensive to be that disposable. Not to mention, having to discard two of these, with all of its plastic components, within 3 years, is incredibly wasteful.Gonna try Vitamix.We also own a Ninja Foodi, which we purchased about a year and 4 months ago, so I'm still holding on to my Instant pot. You know, for when the Foodi will inevitably crap out.

Author: Chris
Title: Very nice
Body: This thing is legit. I always wanted to be a ninja, maybe some smoothies will help get me there. Careful cleaning it, the blades don't look that sharp but I cut myself cleaning them on day 1.

Author: Grace
Title: Woof. Super weak blender.
Body: I made the mistake of accidentally discarding the box before trial, but if I could return this item I would in a heartbeat. I've used both the single-serving blending cups as well as the large pitcher and both really do a poor job at blending. I specifically bought this smaller scale blender because I pretty much only use the blender to make smoothies, which means I'm not putting ingredients into this thing that are difficult or hard to blend/crush. With this specific model, spinach does not blend completely and cacao nibs stay coarse and mealy in both the single-serving blender and the large pitcher. I am SUPER disappointed. I wanted to like this product so badly, but it really doesn't even perform its basic function to a passable degree. If you're looking for something better, look into the full-sized blender or the Vitamix.

Author: Erica George
Title: Best Blender Ever!
Body: This is the best blender I’ve ever owned. I love that it comes with the single serving containers too! It makes amazing smoothies and perfect margaritas (restaurant style). This is worth every penny!

Author: Prashant
Title: Product stopped working
Body: Very bad product. First the base stopped working. After Jars had problem.

Author: Krypto
Title: Ninja Gaiden
Body: Ninja honestly has the best products on the market. I wouldn't go with any other brand except for Ninja.

Author: Pedro Rolim
Title: Great product
Body: Great Blender

Author: Stephanie
Title: LOVE THIS BLENDER
Body: This blender means business. It will blend anything you put in it. I have made salsa, smoothies and milkshakes with it so far and I love it. I especially love the fact that it came with the smaller blade and two cups so that you don't have to dirty the whole pitcher for a single serve or beverage or small bowl of salsa. It is early to clean and assemble. It also has suction cups on the bottom to hold it firmly to my counter.

Author: Evelyn Callente
Title: Very simple using Blender
Body: Great blender. Really big for my counter. I love that it has the bottom grips to hold sturdy in place while blending.

Author: Gigi Calderon
Title: Very sharp blades!
Body: I love this blender. It has lots of chopping power. I fear that the cleaning is the hardest in between the blades. You have to be very careful. I love the individual cup servings. I use this to make cucumber water. I recommend this product with caution to clean carefully and thoroughly!

Author: Carmen vila
Title: Super good
Body: Fobuolous

Author: Darius
Title: pitchers break easily
Body: Power of the blender is great but the pitcher is garbage. It cracked on me 3 times, 2 of the 3 times I was using warm liquids (making soup) and followed the warning of putting hot liquids inside. So I made sure to keep the liquid temp 20 deg below what the directions approved as the limiting temp and it cracked after 3 uses every time. Waste of 100 bucks.

Author: Kevin Trapp
Title: The best $100 investment in my life.
Body: I bought this blender five years ago for my family. I thought they’d use it once and that would be it. Well, I started to make a smoothie before work in the morning one day. I’ve now used it 6 days a week for the entire 5 years! This machine is amazing, it will blend anything in less than 5 seconds, and it just kept going and going. The motor is just now starting to die. I’m buying another one immediately. The best $100 I’ve ever invested in my 49 years on this planet! I LOVED my ninja.

Author: Awa Kalleh
Title: My blender was cracked
Body: Like the blender but it was cracked in bottom

Author: kmanuel
Title: Very powerful and great all around blender
Body: We love it for smoothies and individual servings as well as blending larger portions. It really is powerful and, if you aren't paying attention, will quickly turn blended food into baby food. Pulse is your friend here, unless you're actually making baby food. It is quite loud and you have to handle the blades with extreme care.

Author: comp sci major
Title: pitcher cracked
Body: After two years of moderate use, the pitcher developed a crack in the plastic along the side, extending through to the bottom. A replacement pitcher is $65. I paid $62 for the whole blender kit in 2018. So it is junk after just 2 years.

Author: Glory
Title: Well worth it.
Body: It looks very good and it blends and breaks the ice quickly. The smoothies come out great. I will recommend this blender to anyone that normally makes shakes for themselves.

Author: Bree
Title: Used to only get ninja - NEVER AGAIN
Body: DO NOT ORDER ANY APPLIANCES FROM THEM! I’ve had a blender for less than a year... barely used and both the food processor and blender cracked and they will not replace under my warranty because they are “wearable” products. Go with another company that you won’t have to buy replacements every few months for “professional” grade appliances!

Author: Alberto Marin
Title: Poderosa Liquadora
Body: Esta liquadora Ninja es poderosa y efectiva en su acción y de muy facil mantenimiento. Altamente recomendable.

Author: Simone H
Title: Best blender ever!
Body: This is the best blender I’ve ever used. It crushes ice and frozen fruit instantly! The blender has suction cups on the bottom so it doesn’t slide around The individual cups are good not only for making smoothies but making sauces and dips. If you’re looking for a blender that is worth your time and money look no further. Plus everything is dishwasher safe!

Author: david m.
Title: Missing one of the 16 oz cups
Body: Like product other than it did not come with two cups. One cup and two lids, yes.

Author: Blair
Title: Didn't even last a year with light use.
Body: Update: With very light use this ninja blender didn't even last a year. The lid won't fully close anymore and it won't work. The buttons light up, but it won't blend. Super bummed and now onto my search for another one and different brand.I already owned a ninja before and loved it until our oldest daughter broke it. Decided to go with a bigger one this time and so glad I went with this model. I did my research beforehand and I'm not disappointed. Works like a dream and super easy to use.

Author: Kim
Title: love it
Body: this thing makes ice cubes in snow cone ice in like seconds. super powerful love it

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Trash
Body: Amazon sent me someone's old nasty blender. It was broken and wouldnt even power up. Absolute trash. Thanks amazon

Author: Weston Pickhinke
Title: Strong Blend - 16oz cups are a joke
Body: Overall, it's a good blender. However, very important to me is making a good shake to take to go. I like to use spinach, avocado, banana, and some berries and nuts. These cups are not big enough to mix these ingredients AND enough milk to make it drinkable. My old blender worked for this because of different cup sizes. Frustrating and disappointing as it is, this model does not have any compatible size alternatives for to single serve cups. I'd love a 24oz option. Even 20oz. But no. Buy seemingly any other model for various compatible sizes, but you're stuck with the insufficient 16oz or grossly overkill 72oz to blend a single serve shake. Why so few accessory options for this model? I thought Ninja was supposed to have lots of accessories for all their models, but I was regretfully misled.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Awesome
Body: Absolutely love this blender

Author: milano_performance
Title: Awesome power
Body: Glass blender should be stronger

Author: Kat H
Title: Great value!
Body: Love this! Powerful enough to easily crush ice and the single serving containers are perfect for iced coffee or a smoothie for one.

Author: Natasha Smith
Title: In love
Body: I’m absolutely in love with this, I use it every morning but the cups locked in the scent of milk, maybe I cleaned it wrong because the scent is gone now. Don’t put the lid on while drying it (that’s what caused the smell, I believe)

Author: Tatiana De Hernandez
Title: Awesome
Body: Highly recommended, very happy that I’m able to make smoothies every morning

Author: Richard
Title: Price
Body: Great value

Author: Carrie Glaza
Title: Perfect margaritas
Body: Perfect ice blend for frozen drinks

Author: Joey
Title: Sharp and blends well.
Body: Works very well. I probably wont need another blender for years. Best blender ive ever had. Be careful for the blades for ive cut myself a few times because i was not paying enough attention while washing.

Author: Sir Over Here the II
Title: Junk. Motor ran out after a year.
Body: I initially wrote an overwhelming positive review about the power and performance of this thing, and how it is the one to buy.A year later, the motor has run out. It's junk. I feel awful if anyone bought one over another brand based on my review.

Author: rhonda
Title: love it
Body: Works perfect

Author: Margaret Richmond
Title: Good capacity
Body: I use it to make smoothies. Very powerful.

Author: Your Ninja Is Fram From Good
Title: What a Joke
Body: Whoever is running this account should be fired. My Ninja arrived basically open, not in an amazon box and products were missing from it. Extremely disappointed and I wouldn't recommend this at all.

Author: Fiddle Man
Title: This is the best blender we have ever used.
Body: Great power. Smoothie attachment is a great idea. Really does a super job. Motor is really strong.

Author: SN
Title: Gasket broke within a month
Body: We use this once, sometimes twice, a day. The Single cup Blade gasket snapped in 1/2 within first 30 days. First replacement is free, next time it breaks (and it will!), we get to pay $26.95...which is about 1/4 of what we paid for the entire blender. Junk!

Author: Thomas
Title: Poor design, doesn’t work.
Body: Both over-engineered and poorly designed. If I could give it less than one star I would. Does not work at all.

Author: Fernando Hudson
Title: Best blender I’ve ever owned!
Body: This product is amazing! It is so much easier to use and clean than a normal old blender. Also, as a bonus there are little suction cups at the bottom of the base to stick to the counter top so the blender does not fall over! Best blender I have ever owned and I love this ninja!

Author: Alex Lopez
Title: Tiene diferentes tipos de vasos y un libro de recetas para cocinar .
Body: Esta muy buena , llego bien empacada y sin detalles.

Author: charbel c.
Title: Very nice
Body: Pretty nice blender to be honest it blends really well and crushes ice like it’s nothing . Gotta be carefull cleaning it though . I use the cups that cone with it a lot more than the big blender and it’s just as powerfull- it’s very loud so don’t do it at night- really does a good job with smoothies-sometimes it does leave very minimal chunks for fruits but it’s very minimal i enjoy it to be honestOver all very powerfull and it does it’s job especially for smoothies

Author: jtl60047
Title: Fruit NINJA in Real Life
Body: Wow is this a Rock Star!!!Chews through ice like a coffee grinder. BAM - Fruit slushie!!Add a little Rum and Boom!! Daiquiris for everyone!

Author: Tech guy Adam
Title: Awesome for our Poolhouse and frozen drinks!
Body: This is my second Ninja product and I love it. It stays outside in our pool house and is used exclusively for Pina Coladas and other frozen drinks! I didn't think I was going to need the other 2 smaller individual blending cups that came with it until I realized how PERFECT it is for people that want:a. A different drink (margarita instead of a pina colada for example!)b. Virgin drinks (perfect for kids and adults who don't drink!)Thanks to the Ninja, I am going to need to start going to AA meetings shortly ! :)

Author: Dee
Title: Great
Body: Perfect!!!

Author: Lisa
Title: Works like a dream
Body: absolutely no complaints and only good things to say about this all the way around. I use it daily!!

Author: Shellse Estefania Tellez
Title: Summer smoothie
Body: Yes bomb to make smoothie!

Author: DanaAmor
Title: Needs bigger cup sizes
Body: We purchased this as an upgrade for our Ninja IQ but were very disappointed that it only came with 16 oz cups and larger cups are not available. The 16 oz are not big enough for what we need and we don’t want to use the pitcher on a daily basis. So we are packing this back up and returning it.

Author: christina
Title: Smoothie perfection
Body: Spent a long time trying to find the right blender.This one blows the others out of the water

Author: Nell
Title: love it, its worth the price
Body: love love this blender!

Author: Colorado Pattiecake
Title: Makes the SMOOTHEST Smoothies
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Wow! Where has this blender been all my life? It makes the BEST and SMOOTHEST homemade smoothies I've ever had. It also turns ice into snow- literally. I see some snow cones in my future. This is by far the best blender I've ever had. It's easy to use and easy to clean. I like the simple controls and components and the latching lid with the pour spout keeps shut tight and makes pouring easy and neat. I'm pretty frugal, but I wish I would've bought this years ago. It is SO worth the money! Highly recommend! Don't wait, buy it now! You won't regret it.

Author: Rhonda L. Cobian
Title: Awesome Product
Body: Love this blender. It works beautifully for my smoothies.

Author: NoName
Title: Less than 1yr later & motor is dying
Body: I was hopeful for this product after purchasing/arrival. The blades were so sharp, I sliced my finger on what I originally thought was just Nicked skin. I was kind of proud the product lived up to its name that way. I used the self serve attachments mostly. The seal on the self serve was usually hard to get out of the deep top and I was always afraid to cut myself or the seal on the blades. The product didn’t usually take long to liquify everything frozen fruits/berries to make smoothies/shakes, thick non gluten desert batters, and I used it to make almond butter. It was good while it lasted but the problem was that the power it came w/ didn’t last long (about 8 to 9 months?). Haven’t used it since and disappointed overall.

Author: Ana
Title: Best blender EVER!
Body: Best blender I’ve ever had! Makes drinks quick and love the summer slushes I can make with this heat! I would totally recommend anyone to invest in this!

Author: Antonina
Title: Like it
Body: Perfect power for good price.

Author: toeaung
Title: Great blender, & we love the single-serve cups!
Body: This blender is awesome - we put it on our wedding registry and use it all the time a year later! It's my first blender, and I absolutely love the single-serve cups. They are so easy to quick blend up a smoothie and easy to clean in the dishwasher. I would like to purchase more of the single-serve cups but haven't found that listing yet. It would be nice if they had lids for on the go as well, since they could spill if I were to take them with me on the go. Other than that, no complaints, this is a great set! My smoothies always turn out creamy and delicious (:

Author: Jose
Title: Beat blender i have used..
Body: I love this blender,the first day i got itI put ice to see if it does as it says ,and it did crush the ice really good, And then did a smoothie with the blender half full with fruits and veggies and milk it cut them really good..

Author: ephawd
Title: No 24oz cup size for this blender, only 16oz.
Body: Good blender but very sad that they only have 16oz cups not 24 or more size option. The 16oz doesn’t fit anything and sometimes I have to blende it by two pieces, which is annoying

Author: Mahboubeh Shabani Samghabadi
Title: Powerful, Strong & Satisfying
Body: I got this product because of its reviews on Amazon! But most of the time I'm looking for a bad review first! Anyway, I've trusted in good reviews and I purchased it! So far so good! its job result to me is very satisfying! I recommend it to anyone who decides to get a trustable blender.

Author: Fatima
Title: It’s ok.
Body: It’s a powerful blender. The plastic looks cheap though.

Author: Consumer
Title: Large container does not blend well due to dumb blade design.
Body: Just know that the large container with blades on a central stock (aka the original Ninja) does not blend well. If you put kale in your smoothie, you will choke on the kale. The smaller Magic Bullet rip-off containers work well, but the larger container does not make smoothies, it makes chunkies.It's because the developers decided to use perfectly flat blades rather than properly angled blades — like the angled blades helicopters use to go up (or blenders use to blend).I'm convinced it was developed by a sales team:SALES:Let's make a blender with NINJA BLADES that go FYEWW! FYEWW! FYEWW! LIKE THAT!I'M a SALESMAN!Designers:OK here's your prototype.SALES:But why are the blades angled?Designers:Because that's how it has to be if you want the ingredients to blend evenly.SALES:But that's not the BLADE of the NINJA! The NINJA uses FLAT blades!! Make them FLAT like the NINJA! Make them go FYEWW! FYEWW! FYEWW! LIKE THAT! Designers:OOOOOOooookay, here's your stupid non-blending blender...SALES:Yeaaahhhh! Now they go FYEWW! FYEWW! FYEWW! LIKE THAT! We've unleashed the powerrrrrr of the NINJAAAAA!!!I'M a SALESMAN!Designers:...and we're done here.-- a couple years later --SALES:These aren't selling well! WHAT'S GOING ON?!Designers:We told you TWO YEARS AGO what's going on. You designed a stupid product.SALES:Well make a new one!Designers:Okay, so what kind of blender do you want?SALES:Ahhh, just copy Magic Bullet!I'M a SALESMAN!

Author: Jon Ball
Title: A powerful and thoughtfully designed blender that gets the job done well.
Body: I am primarily using this blender to make smoothies, and it does that job well. I like the fact that you can make large quantities with the 9 cup container, which has a three-tiered blade unit that quickly reduces fruit, vegetables, and ice to a drinkable consistency. Just make sure you add some water, which helps fluidize the whole mixture for better mixing and blending. I also like that it comes with two individual tumblers and a blade assembly for the tumblers, so you can make a smaller, individual portion. The tumblers come with sippy caps, so you can take your drink on the go. I find the unit to be easy to use and easy to clean. Simply clean the pieces right away with hot water and soap. Of course, you need to be careful when cleaning the blade assemblies because they are exceptionally sharp. Generally, I just give them a good flush with lots of hot water. I can't tell you much about the durability of the blender; I have only had it for a month, but it appears to be sturdy.

Author: Bonnie Ross
Title: Cannot properly clean
Body: The blender is powerful, but gunk gets into the handle and can't be cleaned. One would need to use a screwdriver to take it completely apart to properly clean.

Author: Albert Theodore
Title: Nice but larger cups don't fit
Body: This is a nice blender but we use it for smoothies a lot and the 16 ounce cups are not quite large enough for us.Not sure why they don't make the 24 ounce cups for this one. They should have made all the cups compatible for the different blenders.

Author: Calista
Title: The blender is falling apart
Body: I’m really disappointed with my Ninja Blender. I’ve always loved Ninjas products but this one went south really quick. Within the first month of using it, all of a sudden it started blending incredibly loudly and would only get louder the longer you had it on. It would leave my ears ringing as if I just was sitting next to an amplifier. It also smells really bad afterwards, as if the gears are heating up. I don’t know what to do about it and don’t think it’s normal, but I don’t have the money to buy a new blender!

Author: Nicole Toal
Title: Works when it wants to
Body: I bought this product mainly for smoothies. I had a Nutribullet for years that recently died. I first tried making a double batch of smoothies in the pitcher, but it wasn't nearly as smooth as my Nutribullet smoothies. I then tried using the single serve cups and my experience was even worse. The power light is supposed to blink and the motor won't start if the cup isn't locked in correctly; however, the power light blinked and the motor wouldn't start no matter what I did. I didn't have this problem using the pitcher, but I still wouldn't recommend this product.

Author: dolli
Title: Product experience is very good
Body: This product is very good and worth recommending

Author: sara
Title: Single Serve Cup Gets Stuck in the Blender Base
Body: I have had this blender for just over a year. Unfortunately that is when the warranty runs out. The last 3 times I have used it, the single serve cup gets stuck in the blender base. It is locked in. I have to use a butter knife and stick it around the edge of the cup to try and get the cup unstuck. It takes a good 20 minutes for me to get it out. Such a PAIN!!!

Author: ANI LAO
Title: Can't Ask Me lol
Body: For now, it's good enough for me, and my fam. I literally am not educated on blenders enough to review them, but it does a good job for what we blended thus far.

Author: Luisa L Hernandez
Title: Great product
Body: My daughter in law loves it

Author: Lala
Title: Very good!
Body: Very good and powerful blender. Love it!

Author: Robert J. Menucci
Title: Awesome Power
Body: I really love this machine! Versatility and power. A must have for smoothies.

Author: Arpit
Title: Nice blender
Body: Nice blender with easy cleaning and powerful blend .

Author: Mr. Gray
Title: Power !
Body: She said she loves it , is all I can tell you .I know she did like the fact they had 2 smoothies size cups with them and also the power I am sure .I have seen reviews referring to the container being broken , she does not use the big one side she using this just for smoothies .. soo

Author: Oliver n scholtes 3rd
Title: Sharp and powerful
Body: Extremely sharp blades great chopping and easy clean. Best blender I ever own

Author: Rudy
Title: Awesome blender! Nothing but love for this combo package!!
Body: I’m loving this product!! It was packaged well and after reading instructions, I started rocking my smoothies! I’m very pleased with the power, and ease of use. I bought the 4 year warranty that was suppose to be delivered via email first before the blender, but didn’t receive it, even though I had already paid for it. But after I submitted my concern through Amazon, the company contacted me an sent it right away. Besides that little hiccup, I couldn’t be happier!

Author: Keisha Marshall
Title: good buy
Body: replacement for magic bullet

Author: Chimise Hill
Title: Love this blender. Strong and durable multi functional
Body: Love this blender. Strong and durable multi functional

Author: Shirl
Title: So easy to use!!!
Body: Love this Machine!!! Like the look and feel of every aspect of this machine. Most blenders are too sophisticated with all the optional buttons depending on usage. However all you need is Power, 1, 2 , 3 buttons with each one escalating in speed and a pulse button. Like how the pitcher sits on the base angled and with a twist and click the arrows line up so no guessing if the pitcher is on correctly. Has a button on the lid to lift handle which secures the lid and has a pour spout for a thicker mixture will not pour out over the intended transfer. Also like the bottom inside the pitcher being smooth for easy cleaning instead of having to clean around the blades making a little more challenging to throughly clean. Used this weekend for Pina coladas. Perfect!!!

Author: KC
Title: Love IT!
Body: Love it!

Author: Gitanjali Bhandari
Title: Happy 😆
Body: Very expensive but I’ve been making the best smoothies thanks to this. And it’s also very convenient to drink out of the blender cups 😁

Author: Bethany
Title: Blenders from the 70’s still work
Body: We bought ours in 2016 and used it often for sox months, then periodically for the past four years. It just died, and I am not really sure why (we haven’t been hard on it) but I expected it to last much longer. Some blenders from the 70’s still function, but my ninja didn’t quite make it to five. Next time I see it I will buy a blender from my local antique and vintage store.

Author: Brenda H Riggleman
Title: Works great
Body: Love it

Author: Rachel
Title: Perfect!
Body: Amazing blender!! They absolutely made a great product with this. It pulverizers everything you put in it- no chunks at all.

Author: Ruh!!
Title: Good blending power
Body: Blending power is impressive. While its easy to clean the smaller cups, the larger jar is tedious to clean. Also, back when we had smaller kitchen sink the bigger jar was inconvenient to clean.Overall this is a good blender.

Author: BriannaMarie
Title: Great blender!!!
Body: Yes. Exactly what we wanted! I see a lot of reviews about noise level....it’s a commercial blender, it’s quiet for its power, but expect some noise. It blends like a charm, will also be using for baby food in future! 👌

Author: Sandra
Title: Boy bonito
Body: Por su potencia

Author: Safyah
Title: Awesome Blender
Body: Oh my Goodness. This is by far the best blender I have ever owned. I am most impressed with the motor power and blades that offer excellent blends without stopping or shutting off due to power overload.

Author: Sandra Carlson
Title: Cracked after one use
Body: Purchased this blender less than a week ago. My daughter used it for the first time to make a blended fruit smoothie and the pitcher cracked. I called Ninja for a replacement and customer service was hesitant to help because I hadn't registered the product....we had it for less than a day. After I pressed her, she agreed to send a replacement pitcher, however it will be a two to three week wait. I can't believe I wasted this much money on a blender. Less learned.....

Author: Maria prieto
Title: La tapas nosirve
Body: Hola la tapas se esta qebrando

Author: Shaniqua W.
Title: Love this Product!
Body: Love this product!

Author: Will Jewers
Title: Well worth the money
Body: Typically never do reviews but as someone who actively purchases new gadgets for my kitchen, this is my favorite buy yet. The blender does exactly what you'd expect it to you, blend perfect smoothie/shakes in no time and with easy clean up. The smaller cups come in handy if you're like me and just want to make a single serving. The blinking button to indicate something isnt input correctly is a nice little feature as well. Ninja lives up to its name once again and puts out another good product!

Author: Christine Biswell
Title: Gold star
Body: My friend in this lock down, I am happy with this machine.

Author: Jellian G.
Title: Thank you
Body: Very good

Author: Ransom
Title: Very good product
Body: I was a little hesitant due to the recent negative reviews. I’m so glad I got it! This thing is amazing and definitely worth it!

Author: Reuben Penn
Title: too many blades
Body: This blender isn't good. It has a lot of blades which create a lot of drag and no vortex. Just get a Vitamix...

Author: Stacia
Title: Lasted a year....
Body: For the price, I would hope it would last longer than 12 months. Its still usable but is cracking... I only make protein shakes and only blend level 1 for a few seconds.

Author: Scott
Title: Great for almost any blending need
Body: I use my blender to make smoothies mainly. It cuts up frozen fruits and dates well. Only 3 pieces to clean as well so that makes it good for easy clean-up. Not too big or too small so it fits well on the counter.

Author: Queen Nikki
Title: Blending Bliss!
Body: I love this blender. Easy to clean, powerful for my needs, and it makes my snow ice in the single serve glass just as I want it.5 ice cubes and I gently shake the blender while pressing single serve button. It's heavenly!!!! Lol

Author: Julian Ortega
Title: Yo mamma
Body: Hella badass...thats it

Author: Joey J.
Title: Best Kit!
Body: Great quality and features. For the price point, I don’t think anyone can find a better blender kit!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great for smoothies but nothing hot
Body: This blender works very well and is easy to clean.It blends frozen vegetable smoothies very well.You can't blend hot things in it like sauces or soup. I would like it even better if it were glass or at least heat resistant.

Author: elitas
Title: Love the cups!
Body: I really like this blender, I bought it as a Xmas present for myself and I don't regret it. I mostly use it for smoothies and it works great! it does not matter if I am using fresh fruits or frozen.The 16oz cups are perfect for taking in the car or to the office. It is definitely noisier than I was expecting, but honestly I never have had a quiet blender, it is not a problem for me.Totally recommended.

Author: James
Title: 2.5 years to problems
Body: Bought this 2.5 years ago and it’s having some real trouble with the smoothie cups. It barely blends anymore. Not sure if it’s the cups or not. Bummer.

Author: Kathryn R.
Title: Ninja Excellence
Body: Not too big or small unit. Stores nicely. Performs ALL kitchen and drink activities with ease.

Author: Robert J. Frishman
Title: A good four years, then died. Not durable.
Body: Worked like a charm, then one day, far too soon, it died. Husband fiddled with the motor a bit and got it going one more time. Then, nothing. I have seen that this has happened to other commenters, too. Sad. Because I really liked it, but will not buy another.

Author: Larry Jones-Darkins
Title: PERFECT BUY
Body: Best buy ever. I love this blender smoothies after workout

Author: Amy
Title: TERRIFIC, NO NONSENSE BLENDER
Body: WHAT A GREAT BLENDER! i had 4 previous blenders which all had so many issues, very noisy, didn't chop stuff enough etc- But this Ninja Blender is so amazing- blends smooth, the least noisy of all blenders i have had. Be careful with the blade- it is sharp. I have found no real issue with this product.

Author: joe panarese
Title: Blender
Body: Great for shakes and smoothies

Author: MS. MEL
Title: Great product
Body: I needed to upgrade from those regular blenders as they weren't getting everything at once. This blender get everything since the blades are not just on the bottom but in the middle and top. I really love it.

Author: Jordan Schwartz
Title: Blends like a Pro
Body: This blender has 3 blades which makes it crazy powerful. It makes my smoothie easily in 30 seconds. Recommend 100% and worth every cent.

Author: Jessica Holding
Title: Does not blend smoothly
Body: Although I like the size of this blender it does not blend that great. A $30 does a better job. I hate how the smoothies and shakes and/or juices come out way too frothy. Frozen drinks do not come out smooth either. There are always still chunks of ice in them. I like to make salsas and shred meats in it. It can be challenging to clean the under the bottom of the canister also.

Author: Bree Snyder
Title: Blade in big mixer came damaged or looks used!
Body: What I disliked was the blade came messed up and the package was already late getting to me. Returning is a bigger pain so might as well stick with it and it probably won’t last a long time because of the blade in the big mixer. Easy to clean and it is noisy for an apartment.

Author: Jose F. S. de Medeiros
Title: high reviews are very misleading - do not buy this product
Body: This is my second Ninja in less than 6 months! My first one (late Feb 2020) developed a crack in the base early on after only blending liquids. I complained and they said I would receive another cup but it would take many weeks (it has been around 3 months and I have not received a replacement). I need a blender so I (stupidly bought a second ninja - May 2020). Again, after light use and only blending liquids it has developed a small Crack and the base simply won't turn on today (red blinking power light). I will now have to go through the hassell of trying to get my $ back for two blenders (short return window is closed) and step up and buy a third blender (which certainly won't be a ninja). Given the reviews and price I could even tolerate it's high noise and the common cuts trying to clean the blades. However, given the repeated issues and sub standard customer service I would highly discourage anyone from buying this product.

Author: SC Southern
Title: Seems like great product
Body: This product has been much better than I expected. I was afraid of the Ninja brand but am very happy with the product. It seems to be well made and is very easy to clean. It chops ice with ease, and blends smoothies very well. The two extra cups and a blender module for the cups is also helpful. It is very noisy, but this is not a problem for me. So far so good!

Author: Chambi
Title: Good
Body: Cook

Author: Harry
Title: Gift for my friend.
Body: Gift for my friend. But the packaging box was broken.

Author: Scott
Title: Single serve too small & inside threads are frustrating
Body: Blender works for blending, but I have not been able to find any larger cups for larger smoothies that fit this model. I have also found it very annoying that the threads are on the inside of the cup to screw the lid on. not sure why it is like this, but smoothie gets in-between the threads and cements the lid on while also making it messy in general.

Author: Thomas LeBlanc
Title: Powerful blender and great costumer support
Body: I love this blender. It’s pretty powerful and easy to manage. We had a problem with the pitcher (it cracked out of nowhere) and we called costumer service, they were very helpful and sent us a new one. Totally recommend it.

Author: Angabange
Title: Works great
Body: Super easy to clean.

Author: Ed Tickel
Title: WOW!!!!?
Body: Crushed ice.... incredible! Blending power..the same. Noise..who cares!!!! I have wasted a lot of money on other cheaper blenders. Well constructed with Safety locks. This is well worth the price!!!!

Author: Kasey
Title: I’d give more stars if I could
Body: Best blender ever !!!!!! I normally don’t write reviews but this product is worth the money . Shipping was super fast too !!!

Author: s. manz
Title: This works great and doesn't cost too much.
Body: This blender is bigger, more powerful and easier to use then our previous cuisinart that we had. We really enjoy the personal smoothie cups that attach right to the blender. This is a great, worth while feature. The suction cups on the bottom are brilliant. It's a little noisy, but that is too be expected. I recommend this blender, we use it daily. Careful the blades are sharp!

Author: Suzuki
Title: I like it.
Body: So far it works great! Powerful and helps make great smoothies.

Author: Brenda Escamilla
Title: Blades
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   I just opened it and it’s looks like it’s been used. The blender part with the blades looks scratched up on some sides. Overall the rest came in good shape.

Author: Marti
Title: Not good for ice blended drinks.
Body: Doesn't blend ice good for margaritas or pina coladas!!!!! Not like my old kitchenaid! Bummed.

Author: sarboni
Title: So much noise
Body: So much noise

Author: Nathan Strom
Title: Great blender, great price
Body: Amazing blender. I was skeptical to get it because of the price and because of a few less than 5 star reviews, but all in all, I am glad I bought it. I was amazed at how my first smoothie turned out in it. It was the same if not better consistency than Jamba Juice

Author: Arielle M.
Title: Stopped working after one year, manufacturer says too bad.
Body: I used my Ninja blender to make a smoothie a few mornings a week, and that's it. about a year after purchase it just stopped turning on. I called Ninja, and was told that there's nothing they can do about it. I have to buy a new one. They did offer me a new motor unit (at $95), at basically the price of an entire new unit. I wouldn't recommend this product or anything from Ninja. Apparently they make junk and they know it.

Author: Heidi Fluder
Title: Loud, but overall works good. Only lasted 1.5 years
Body: I loved this devise until it stopped working out of nowhere today. I clean it regularly and for some reason will not turn on🤦🏼‍♀️ Otherwise this is a good product but it is sooo loud it can literally wake the neighbors!

Author: vishnu
Title: One of the Best Buy’s of 2020
Body: I usually am not the one write reviews but this blender is the best for the price. The single serves are the right amount for shakes. The power is amazing and it can probably blend rocks! The noise is a little high but it ain’t too bad. Would surely recommend if you’re looking for a powerful blender

Author: stacey l heath
Title: Very good blender
Body: I love this blender. The size pitcher is perfect for making protein smoothies. I also love that you get to go cups to blend in and then change the lid to take on the go. Very happy. This blender chops frozen fruits and ice cubes easily and smoothly.

Author: Carlos andrade
Title: Mamalona
Body: Chingona

Author: Sweetstory
Title: Great Buy
Body: Perfect for mornkng shakes

Author: Rebecca Carrasco
Title: Only good for smoothies
Body: It doesn’t blend the ingredients good when I make salsa I guess this more for chopping and making smoothies

Author: Jorge
Title: Recommend to anyone
Body: Really happy with this buy, best blender easy to handle made perfect for everyone use

Author: Diana Luna
Title: Worth it!
Body: Best blender I've gotten love the extra cups! And blending power is beautiful.

Author: Hardin Management & Consulting
Title: Well worth the money
Body: Sure there are cheaper options out there but this gets the job done. We have started making smoothies as a family . I love the option to use the full blender to make enough for the whole family or one of the cups for single serving.

Author: Candice S.
Title: Worked great for a few months... Then it didn't work at all
Body: The blender won't turn on after only 7 months of infrequent use. It didn't show any signs of issues the last time it was used, but when I went to turn it on this time, the power light won't even come on. Complete waste of money, I've had cheap blenders that outlasted this one.Update: Even if this item is under warranty, and they admit it should not stop working randomly after only a few months of use, it turns out the company still makes you pay $20 to replace their piece of crap product with what is likely another piece of crap. Save your money and buy something that will last more than a few uses.

Author: Karla R.
Title: Excelente compra
Body: De Las mejores licuadoras la super recomiendo

Author: Alberto salcedo
Title: excelente llego a tiempo
Body: Excelente

Author: Kate Coleman
Title: Made cheap not worth the price
Body: This is not built as well as the one I have had for years. It's looks cheap, sounds cheap, feels cheap but costs the same as the one I bought 6 years ago that had 4 cups, a food prosesser attachment, a dough blade and extra blade. This one comes with only two cups that really need to be bigger in my oppinion. They are too small for making fresh fruit smothies.It is so upsettingly loud. It vibrates and rattles like it's going to shake apart or blow up. And the pitcher doesn't blend nearly as well as advertised. I'm really disapointed. I'd return it if my husband hadn't thrown out the box.

Author: Aaron
Title: Great blender
Body: It’s my second ninja. Very happy with these. This one has less power than my first but still blends great! I love the single serving attachment!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Crappy blender
Body: So crappy!!!!! Broke immediately!

Author: Luvjuicyjocy
Title: Ehhhh
Body: Sucks. Stopped working after 6 months

Author: tanesa
Title: Ninja blastA!
Body: Can’t go wrong with a Ninja!! Gets the job done right

Author: retired and loving it.
Title: GREAT
Body: Where have you been? I have been soooooo unhappy with my old blender, problem solved. GREAT,GREAT

Author: Karen Hernandez
Title: Powerful
Body: A little noisy but this thing does the job. Very powerful blender and I love how it comes with the smoothie cups so you don’t have to wash a big blender if you don’t need to

Author: Jennifer Rodriguez
Title: The Best
Body: I love this Ninja!!! It's the best blender that I've had in a long time! Its so easy to use and blends really good really fast.

Author: Natalie L
Title: Higher expectations
Body: Maybe user error but just doesn’t blend smoothies out as smooth as I want.

Author: Carey
Title: Blends great but wakes up everyone
Body: Blends amazing but is very loud. So in the morning you’re waking everyone up. I would suggest rinsing immediately after use because blades get fruit glued to them easy.

Author: Phil Batey
Title: Quick Smoothies!
Body: I use this just about everyday to mix single-serve smoothies in the 16oz containers. Just drop in some frozen fruit, some OJ, and a bit of yogurt and in about 20 seconds I've got a fantastic smoothie. I don't use the 72oz container much, so I've been thinking getting a Ninja Fit that I can leave on the counter -- this one is a bit big to leave out.

Author: Dwaine
Title: Great blender
Body: The product is great. It is by far the easiest to use. It is really quiet as well.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: It is dang sharp
Body: This blender seems like it should be something MORE than a blender..... it seriously obliterates anything you put in it! I don’t love washing it though.... with all the blades well let’s just say I’ve cut myself.... and yes it’s sharp.

Author: Suzanne Watson
Title: AWESOME BLENDER
Body: I LOVED THIS PRODUCT!!! such a great blender. new favorite!

Author: lightyourworld
Title: 4 months of light use BROKEN
Body: Bought first of February. Lasted until the middle of June. Guess I will be on the 'don't buy China' bandwagon. Horrible bearing or gear noise followed by death of the Ninja.You would be extremely foolish to purchase this blender.Wish Amazon had negative stars.

Author: Lisa M.
Title: Died after 2 years
Body: This blender worked great for 2 years then completely died. So...great blender if you’re ok with replacing it every 2 years.

Author: Jason T Lucas
Title: Worth it.
Body: This beats the magic bullet. It’s fast and the ingredients are completely blended, no chunks with fruit smoothies.

Author: Richard
Title: Professional quality at a competitive price.
Body: It's the same quality I've come to expect from ninja products. I suggest buying a cleaning brush as the blades are quite sharp.

Author: Melissa Shultz
Title: Great blender
Body: We have used it everyday since it arrived. So far we really love this blender and the individual cups that came with it.

Author: Michelle colon
Title: Great product
Body: I love it easy to clean. Makes great smoothies

Author: Richard Marcy
Title: Excellent for smoothies and way cheaper!
Body: Awesome! Extremely powerful!

Author: Lori M.
Title: Noisy
Body: The noise is very loud. It's something you have to put up with. Other than that, the blender is great. I didn't realize that the Ninja did so many other things. Very pleased with the product.

Author: Latosha
Title: Amazing blender
Body: Amazing! Love it. A bit loud but blends beautifully.

Author: Edwin Hernandez
Title: Is great!!!
Body: I don’t used this blender but my wife love it so much

Author: Cynthia Stevens
Title: Processes ice like no other!
Body: I bought this blender because of the reviews for crushing ice. I wanted something that would make great smoothies. Literally it will take ice from the freezer and powder it like snowcone ice! Amazing!

Author: AennovyFN
Title: Nothing special
Body: Been searching for a really powerful and good quality blender mainly for smoothies and other things but found this was not up to par! It's also really loud. Yes, it chops things fast but it didn't blend very well at all. It just creates a big splatter without a smooth finish so our smoothies were always really clumpy and super thick no matter how much water or liquid I add. So overall, not happy with this product therefore I returned it and got my money back.

Author: Christopher Kemp
Title: Product missing. Arrived in terrible condition
Body: I was promised 2 tumblers with my order, and only received 1. Also, my package arrived in terrible condition in a damaged box.

Author: Lynne M Woodard
Title: This is a bad a$$ blender
Body: I love how powerful this blender is The single serving size has to go tops which is a great feature also It is a great blender

Author: albert J. Smith
Title: Ninja Professinal Countertop Blender
Body: This is the best blender I have ever had.

Author: PEDRO MACIAS
Title: Works great
Body: AWESOME PRODUCT!!

Author: Julisa Chrysafi
Title: Amazing blender
Body: I spent a lot of time researching a good, dependable, long-lasting blender. Not only did the reviews on Amazon have mostly positive reviews, but I asked friends close to me and they all had Ninja products and have had them for over six years. It blends so quickly and its very easy to assemble and clean. The blades have a warning that they are sharp AND THEY ARE so definitely be careful when cleaning and handling because my boyfriend cut himself when cleaning it, but he was warned lol. Overall awesome multiuse blender.

Author: Jenalee Paige
Title: Powerful and Loud
Body: This blender I purchased over a year ago. It still works well; I mostly use it for smoothies. The power is amazing and I can tell it is very strong. The blades for the pitcher-type container are very very sharp. We have cut ourselves using it a couple times. Therefore, I usually try to only use the single-blend cups now. I hardly ever use the big one because cleaning it is very tricky if you do not have a dishwasher. Be very careful. While, the blender is very strong, it is also very loud. I feel like it is louder now than when we first used it, but I could be wrong.

Author: Sarina G
Title: Great blender!
Body: This blender is great. I will continue to buy these whenever I need to replace one. I just hope it is no time soon. Should it stop working as it is now I will post another review. But so-far it is great! I would recommend this product.

Author: Rick Smith
Title: Shoddy shipping - hope it works!
Body: Glad the product worked given the shape the package was in. Looked like it went through a war zone.

Author: c.canova
Title: great blender...
Body: OOOOO i love this blender. i love the extra cups, so easy to clean. I was going to cheap out and not get the two extra cups, but i'm so glad i did. We use them everyday.and the blender just really is powerful.

Author: Nicole Kulis
Title: Blends well
Body: Great blender. Does a great job blending. Just as noisy as any other blender.

Author: Amber
Title: Best blender ever!
Body: Best blender I’ve ever owned! We love our smoothies and this blender is perfect. The suction isn’t too much that other reviewers have said. I love that this one comes with a single serve cup option too. Worth every penny.

Author: yoyo
Title: Convenient blender
Body: We have owned it now for a couple of years and it’s held up to daily use. I blend a lot of smoothies with it. I feel like I got my money’s worth and wouldn’t feel terrible if it broke any time soon- I would gladly order another Ninja.

Author: Christina Wesson
Title: Great Blender
Body: This blender is amazing! Works well for the broccoli smoothies that we make everyday and it also works amazing for our homemade Match lattes, mixed the matcha in completely with no clumps.

Author: Zury
Title: Excelente
Body: Perfecta

Author: Mama Llama
Title: Amazing blender
Body: Amazing blender bought it for my mother. Love that it has blades all the way through. Has lasted 4 years with use every day. Going to get another for myself soon.

Author: Frequent Shopper
Title: Plastic pitcher cracked in two months - $80 rip off replacement part
Body: The plastic pitcher cracked along a seam after two months use. We do not think it was dropped, over filled or abused. Luckily I can get a replacement pitcher, but it cost me $80! I really like this blender but I feel like I was taken advantage of with the price of the replacement part, it doesn't even include lid and blade. What ever happened to glass blender pitchers? My Mom's lasted forever.

Author: Crystal Harrel
Title: Wonderful
Body: Got this for Mother’s Day, and I absolutely love it. Multifunctional and easy to clean!

Author: drj
Title: Works well.
Body: Love it!

Author: Slh
Title: Love it!!
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   This blender is so perfect. It blends my frozen fruit in seconds! It’s so easy to clean & put together. I’ve had it for 2 weeks now, & I use it everyday, with no problems!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Blends Wonderfully
Body: this product was even better than we thought it would be. This is worth the money.

Title: Calidad excelente
Body: Muy buena calidad

Author: Mark Lawless
Title: Looks cool
Body: I haven't used it yet.

Author: Mary
Title: Powerful and Fast
Body: The large blender and the individual tumblers work great and are super fast.

Author: CeCe
Title: Great
Body: Love it

Author: Katherine
Title: Works Great
Body: I had to purchase a new blender since my first Ninja one was not working out well for me after a couple of years. I like this option because you can do the single serve or use it as a full blender. With the amount of smoothies I drink this things does an awesome job of blending all the frozen fruit really well!

Author: Charly Cyriaque
Title: Im confused about this product and the tech support i received since then
Body: I started using this Ninja blender just after delivery. 1 month later I decided to use my old blender which I used for a month. Then I had to do something that required a much more powerful blender. When I tried to use the new blender, it didn't respond at all. Since then the blender does not work and I noticed that the small light on the start button does not light. When I called the number on Amazon on having technical support, the agent told me that since I am no longer in the USA and that the blender is not located on American territory or in Canada, I lost the guaranteed and he won't be able to help me. Can someone help me with this purchase because I have invested a lot of money in this item?

I also like the little suction cups on the bottom of the blender that prevent the blender from moving while in operation. Anything I have made in my blender has taken just seconds. So happy I picked this oneI gave it four stars for noise level and ease of cleaning, but I don’t think any blender I’ve used is easy to clean or quiet. The blades come out very easy to clean, and you can actually hear someone talking while the blender is in operation. Hope that helps

Author: Rusnuvol
Title: Not for small jobs
Body: I was trying to replace a 24 oz smoothie blender because that one became too small. I thought this was the way to go since it was 72oz. I was wrong. It is very noisy, which is fine if it did the job well, but it doesn't blend well. I think you would have to fill it up for the blades to catch everything and blend them, i think. 6 swivel blades are super sharp and can cut you a bit while cleaning, but they don't catch everything in the container.Also this particular model doesn't seem to have a lot of replacement jars. I wanted to get a smaller 32 oz or 48oz jar, but those are very hard to find, for this model only. Ninja Blenders are great, i used one for over 4 years but had to replace it because it was too small which is why i went with this one. But this one is for big jobs it seems It comes with 2, 16oz personal jars, which are nice, but too tiny for me.In conclusion, i would whole-heartedly recommend Ninja blenders, just not this particular model. This comes with a 72oz jar, and it seems it works best for 72oz jobs, nothing smaller. Worse still is that it's hard to find replacement jars that are smaller than 72oz, for this particular model. There are other models that are very similar to this one with the same 72oz jars, but they have 32oz and 48oz jars that are easy to find. The 16oz jars that come with this work very well, but they're too tiny for me. At the end of the day, do your research, something i failed to do diligently.

I purchased the counter top version with the 72oz blender base and blending cups for the versatility. I usually make single smoothies - it is nice to have the flexibility to make larger quantities.

Author: Purchased Product
Title: LIMITED ACCESSORIES - NO WARRANTY" WARRANTY"
Body: THERE IS NO SERIAL NUMBER on the machine, so the manufacturer has no idea who you are. BTW you have 10 days FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE - not receipt - to register your warranty. You need to call 1-800 HOLD and provide a serial number to do this but there is none. Now what? Plus, you must pay a $19.95 fee, PLUS the cost of the required insured shipping in order to see if your issue might happen to be covered under the warranty. Second, know that that there are no accessories for this model - actually no accessories that I could find - except the option to purchase additional small 16 ounce cups. Amazon pulls a bunch up below this item, but when you look at the model number none of them fit. I bought this machine to make smoothies, intending to purchase the larger cup sizes later. There are none. In my opinion, Amazon is misleading on the (lack of) warranty, and the lack of any accessories for this unit.

The reason I rated it a 2 is that it quit working after only 9 months. The power button blinks but won’t turn on. I’ve looked at all the troubleshooting I can find and can still not figure it out. Author: R. Brown
Title: Lots of Power - Works Great!
Body: We have a special needs dog where we have to blend her food into the consistency of a milkshake; and this blender has been a huge time-saver! We were trying to use our regular blender originally - which took forever and we couldn't get the food smooth enough. I finally purchased one of these and couldn't be happier; I wish I had bought one years ago! It blends the food perfectly; no lumps and things don't get stuck like in a regular blender. It is a bit loud; but then again, I would expect that given how powerful it is. And I can't say it's much/any louder than my old blender - which couldn't get the job done.There's a lot of safety features built into the product as well; which we really appreciate! It doesn't slide around on the countertop and you don't have to stand there and hold a button down. Clean-up is a breeze - we add water/dish soap and blend away - lol! I can't recommend this enough - it's been a huge time saver and never disappoints.

Title: The best blender ever!
Body: I purchased this blender (BL660 model) in 2017. It's 2020 and the blender has not loss it's power. While preparing a fruit smoothie, I accidentally left a metal spoon in the pitcher. Unfortunately, I didn't realize the spoon was in the pitcher until the spoon busted the side of the pitcher and fruit smoothie spewed out onto the walls. Although my spoon was damaged, the blades are still in tact. I will be replacing the pitcher because this is the best blender I ever owned.

Author: Loki Feliciano
Title: The best for the price. A blender to love!
Body: I love this blender! It is pretty loud which I guess isn’t good for your hearing i the long run. But I had a VitaMix several years ago that worked for a year and one day. I loved that one best! Looking for another blender that I liked but without the high price I tried an Amaste 1200w pro hot/cold blender that I hated. It seems that all the VitaMix wanna-be’s do the hot feature by way of a heating element instead of the friction heat feature of the VM. This messy that they are very slow and tend to cook food onto the bottom making cleaning difficult. I love this one because although it does not heat, it’s blending strength is very powerful and cleaning is a breeze! It also comes with (as well as a large quantity pitcher with impressive blade components), individual cups and a blade attachment for making individual smoothies and shakes! Love this one!

Author: Lisa Daak
Title: Great!
Body: I bought this NINJA, because the older one I had, was over 10 years old and was starting to not fit well, when trying to secure and blend. I love this new one and I also love how it comes with the two blending cups. You can blend and put the lid on the one, to put back in the fridge, for later if needed! It is however pretty loud, in my opinion, but it is a great product and I hope it lasts me another 10 years. Those of you that do shakes alot in the am, this is the perfect blender for you!

Author: Amazon Customer

Author: Brerightback
Title: Worst blender I've ever gotten!
Body: HORRIBLE. Mine broke within 1 week, I can't locate the stupid asurion warranty and frankly it was a HUGE regret purchase.

Author: Brian
Title: Very good blender with some quirks
Body: First of all, this blender is powerful. The three-tiered blade design really seems to get the job done. I had bought a cheap $20 bullet-blender which of course broke so the wife and I shopped around for a blender that would be powerful and have the convenience of using smaller single-serve type containers. The Ninja checked all our boxes.PROS:- Powerful- The single-serve cups are easy to swap and clean.- The removable blade is genius for cleaning and getting out all the goodness.- Locking top is good so you can pour heavy stuff without fear of the top coming off- Build quality seems top notch.CONS:- LOUD. Nice alarm clock for the entire house though.- Suction cups on the bottom are annoying. Rubber pads would've been better- Very tall so it's hard to fit under our kitchen cabinets.- It would be nice to have another (larger) door on the lid to drop in stuff while blending.- The single serve containers could be bigger.- It would be VERY nice if the single-serve containers could blend continuously instead of just pulses.- The main gear on the base is plastic, probably better if metal but thats for the engineers.I know it looks like the CONS outweigh the PROS but they are mostly minor design grips. Overall I'm very happy with the blender and would buy again.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Holds up very well, as all of NINJA product do.
Body: This blender works great. I had a previous model from NINJA that lasted for 7 years before replacing it with this one. I use the blender atleast 5 times a week and sometimes even twice a day. Holds up very well, as all of NINJA product do. A little loud, but what blender isn't.

Title: Very Good Product!!

I wanted to add a photo but couldn't find how to. Don't call the Ninja phone number for any help. They won't help you! I am disabled and I need a refund and a ups pickup and I cant get through to Amazon customer service now. What is the sense of being a Prime member?

Body: For the price of this blender i am more then happy with it. It is the best blender i have ever owned. My wife wanted to update from our old school basic blender that most people think of when they say blender. it has great power, the blades are super sharp and it can whip up a smoothie in no time at all. it is a little noisy but no worse then any other blender i have used.

Author: Jess
Title: Worth it!
Body: Amazing! I am a smoothie snob, never satisfied with my own homemade smoothies because the texture at a smoothie bar is just so much better - this blender finally gives me the option of making a fantastic smoothie/workout shake at home! Definitely worth the $! Smoothies, shakes, and pre-work-out slushies for daysssss!

Author: Jennifer
Title: Great product! Definitely recommend it!
Body: It is loud but very easy to use and makes the drinks fast!

Author: Mikayla Jennings
Title: not all its cracked up to be
Body: Don't get too excited about the single-serve blender cups. I tried for a week to make them work but they only blend the bottom two inches where the blade can reach - leaving the top 3/4 of the cup unblended. I love the big blender attachment and it works great but if I would've known ahead of time that the single-serve blender didn't work I would have only bought the regular (Cheaper) blender without the extra attachments. Pretty bummed.

To replace this piece is $70.00. easier to just but another blender. Very let down by this product.once again DO NOT PURCHASE. Poor product and poor customer service.

So it isn't quite as versatile as I would want for the price.

Body: I barely had this device for a week. On the plus side, excellently powerful motor. The downside! The CHEAP PLASTIC jar will crack after a few uses. The replacement is almost as much as buying a new one. Gee, I wonder why? HARD PASS. You get what you pay for. Get a high Hp blender with a PYREX (or similar) type of jar.

Author: Rowan
Title: ⚠️ UPDATE! Very impressed! And not disappointed!
Body: Update 2022: MOLD!! There is mold in the gasket lid where the gasket meets the plastic! I've try soaking in hot water with dish soap and also with bleach and dish water... Nothing has worked! At first I figured I'd just replace it. You can't, YOU HAVE TO BUY THE WHOLE PITCHER costing $64 if they have it in stock... they don't!! I'm so mad!!😠😡 I'll have to buy a new one. I'm going to walmart to buy a cheap blender at a much cheaper price!Update: If you're debating on buying this blender... don't! Just buy it. It cost quite a bit more, since I'm on SSI and had to sacrifice bbut and I'm not at all disappointed or discouraged in this product. It makes full sized ice cubes into snow in about 7sec. I can blend ice cubes frozen fruit, strawberries, raspberries, grapes, bananas, I'm on a slushy/smoothie diet. So I bought a $39 blender that gave out in just 7 days! I had to return it. So I decided to buy one that had a way better reputation. This blender rocks! I didn't have to put in the ingredients one at a time then blend then put in the next. With this blender all I have to do is pile all the ingredients at one time and blend. It did so effortlessly! It crushed the ice, pulverized the frozen fruits, ice cream, almond milk and Greek yogurt.It's a major plus that it came with the go cups and can also be used with the blender. I haven't tried that yet though.

Author: JEM395
Title: Motor burns up quickly
Body: After 4 uses over 4 days, the motor started smelling like it was burning up. 4 days. I was replacing a 3.5 year old Ninja that burned up, but while I wish it would have lasted longer, at least it was years and not days. I noted other reviews here about the motor burning up quickly. Don’t recommend Ninja anymore. I bought a Nutribullet and so far so good with the motor. I also found that the Nutribullet (almost same wattage) liquefies my smoothies better.

Will make the investment in something that will actually last.

Body: Japan's era of shoguns and samurai is long over, but the country does have one, or maybe two, surviving ninjas. Experts in the dark arts of espionage and silent assassination, ninjas passed skills from father to son - but today's say they will be the last.

Title: Great blender, but 16 Oz. cups are too small for smoothies

You really can't pack much in them, and the larger cups available for other machines are not compatible. This is a major flaw for those who want to use the cups rather than the blender. The 16 Oz. cups are convenient and easy to clean, just way too small. I would not have purchased if I had known. Look into the other machines with larger cups or a different brand. I have no idea what they were thinking!!

Author: Mica C.
Title: Wish it would power on...
Body: This would be a great device; however, the power button is problematic. The power button should flash a red light when pressed indicating it is ready for use. It powers on intermittently, at best, and is unreliable. We returned the first one because we thought it was faulty, but the replacement does the same thing! We've tried unplugging it for a few minutes but it still powers on intermittently. You never know if it is going to work or not. Very frustrating. Anyone else have this problem?

Author: artdeanne
Title: Very disappointed, Can’t recommend it
Body: I really wish I hadn’t bought this blender. We make smoothies every morning and this blender just isn’t doing the job. We don’t even use ice. The positioning of the blades seems to leave flaxseed and Chia seed and hemp seed glued into the corners and not properly mixed. The greens we put in our smoothie aren’t really blended, just sort of chopped The smoothie is never really smooth. It’s always gritty. My last blender was a basic $40 blender and it did a much better job. Also, I can see where the suction cups on the bottom might have been a good idea but they end up being a hassle. You can’t really move the blender back-and-forth on your counter without struggling to get it unstuck. I would send it back but I’ve already recycled the box so I’m just going to try to live with it and get used to it. I’ve used it every day for two weeks and we’re just not happy with this purchase. I can’t recommend it to anyone.

Title: Powerful, quality blender; excellent support from Ninja
Body: So I think this is an excellent blender. The blender blades run from the bottom to the top and adequately handle anything you throw at them; Ice is perfectly blended as is anything else that goes into this thing. The 16oz blender cups are great for making smaller portions and are powerful enough to handle anything as well.My 72oz crushing pitcher arrived with cracks near the bottom. I contacted Amazon support and they called Ninja support and transferred me to a very nice, helpful agent who took my information and mailed out a replacement crushing pitcher. Shark-Ninja stands behind their product, which in my opinion is the best blender I have owned.

Title: Very scary experience with this Blender!
Body: I don't know, what should I write, because I scared really after the second usage. It's a really powerful blender, but I don't know yet, what was wrong with my blender. I wanted to make a benana smoothie. I added banana, milk, honey and vanilla Ice cream and let it to run. I went the other side of kitchen to bring vanilla extract and then BOOOMM, it's burst like a balloon!!!! All the drink splashed all over the kitchen from three big hols inside the glass!!! This blender should be strong enough for hard ice cubes, but with just some spoons of cold ice cream is explode!! I am so lucky, that I was in the other side of the kitchen, otherwise it might be hurts me!! I have tried to call the Ninja costumer service and ask them about, but I had to stay very long on the phone, which means I have up, as long as nothing happened with me. Just to much work for clean up after that!! I preferred to send it back, instead of to spent my time agin after the clean up to get the new one or just an apology!
