Title: Blender
Body: Mostly shakes, but, tried most things in the booklet.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender
Body: Easy to use

Author: Nathan Fortier
Title: Great Product
Body: It's an amazing device but it is loud. I'm ok with the volume cause it's not running all the time 30 seconds most mornings ... Helps wake you up :P. Very powerful no issues!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Happy with my purchase.
Body: Love it. Good so far.

Author: Aubrey
Title: Not sure
Body: I was not able to use it.

Author: Kevin
Title: Great for Smoothies
Body: I purchased the Ninja to replace a cheap blender. The Ninja's blending power is incredible! No longer do I have chunks of fruit or veggies in my smoothies! I also love the 16oz single-serve cups. They are really convenient for taking smoothies to work or anywhere on the go.

Author: David Ritson
Title: Loud, massive, awesome
Body: Louder than your mother in law even on low settings. Besides that it’s a smoothie making monster.

Author: V.Rod
Title: Convenience and ease!
Body: Great, easy to use. I can make my personal serving for me or switch to the bigger blender and make big blends.

Author: Shar
Title: Awesome
Body: Excellent blender. I had an old expensive Kenmore that we finally threw away cuz it couldn’t even blend a banana,ice,milk.This blender is the best at blending anything,especially ice.

Author: F. A. Brown
Title: Ninja blender
Body: Love this blender but must be careful with blades when cleaning. A bit noisy as most are.

Author: Sweetpea
Title: Well pkged, fast delivery and many features
Body: Grinds well

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: i love it
Body: nothing much to say about that

Author: Kevin
Title: Great
Body: Works great

Author: Kat
Title: Great blender, little hard to clean large attachment
Body: It’s a good blender for the price, if you are looking for something that will give you a smooth smoothie I would look elsewhere but overall it’s a great blender. A little hard to clean the big attachment but for me I mostly use the two little ones and take them to go. The noise is.. well it’s a blender so it’s not quiet. Had it for a few months and haven’t had any problems so yay :)

Author: cindy w.
Title: Great product
Body: Love my ninja. We use it for everything from smoothies to margaritas to purees. It is everything it should be.

Author: Tad
Title: Margarita options
Body: I really like this blender. Great for a small or large batch of margaritas!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Nice blender
Body: This is a great blender! It chops through everything easily.

Author: Jessica De Marti
Title: Disappointed
Body: I used this product to make my protein shakes and it stopped working on 6/30. Incredibly disappointed. I had it for one month and it broke. Stopped working meaning wouldn’t even turn on anymore.

Author: Feli4you
Title: Use my ninja almost everyday x3
Body: Literally will never have to buy another blender. This is the best!!!!! Crushes/ blends flawlessly. My protein shakes come out in a flash. I will say cleaning the main blender pitcher thing is a lil tricky(it’s Scary sharp and awkwardly shaped) buuuuut performance wise I haven’t experienced anything better. Single use is my go to though. Super convenient and muuuuuch easier to clean. Love love love this product!!

Author: Michael
Title: Love it
Body: I love it, but takes up a lot of counter space

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Blender!!!
Body: I use it to make green smoothies and it works like a $400 blender. I use it almost everyday.

Author: Stephen P.
Title: Easy to use and clean
Body: I use the small container 90% of the time.For smoothies, it is as good and as easy as you can hope for.

Author: Maira Agosto
Title: Best blender
Body: Best blender . Fast

Author: rosebud
Title: gift
Body: gift

Author: Rose
Title: Very good
Body: very good

Author: Gerardo Arellano
Title: Great for the price!
Body: Used daily. Just wish it was more quiet!

Author: Kendra Alicia Burnett
Title: Love it!
Body: Love it!

Author: Candi Tanberg
Title: lid lever broke and wouldn't open
Body: Lid broke after 2years. Call me old school but I think this product should last longer than 2 years

Author: Mario B
Title: A must have
Body: Great product

Author: Robyn
Title: Love it!
Body: Love this blender! I have used it almost every day since my purchase and it does great! It blends everything in seconds. It is noisy tho, o have it a 3 star rating on the noise level, but overall I’d purchase this again. Makes it easy to make smoothies and margaritas:)

Author: Candy
Title: Blah
Body: Product stopped working about two weeks after warranty was up, ain’t that something.. .

Author: Timothy
Title: Amazing but loud.
Body: It’s a great blender, I use it every day in the morning. Only downfall is that I get up early and it is very loud.

Author: Cameron
Title: Powerful blending.
Body: Works for smoothies, could be smoother tho. More like a food processor than a good smoothie blender.Good build quality.

Author: CloudChicCa
Title: Very good
Body: Very good got this for my mom she’s in love !

Author: Nikhil
Title: Really awesome
Body: Works really good

Author: hector rojo
Title: works as good as expected and than some.
Body: works great, used for salsa, pina coladas, Chile sauces.

Author: Katelyn
Title: Amazing
Body: I make protein shakes daily and I wanted something that I could use the big blender if me and my boyfriend wanted the same flavor or the small cups if we wanted different. I was getting sick of using our big blender and having to wash it in between. This was perfect for us. I was nervous of the ice blending in the individual cups but it works perfect and blends so well. I love it and wish I hasn't waited so long to buy one. Worth the money for sure.

Author: nzube
Title: Open package
Body: The package looked tampered with when it was delivered. I will be returning it for a replacement. I will update my review after the replacement arrives.

Author: N. R.
Title: I’m spoiled for life now
Body: This blender is a god send. I didn’t know how bad my blending game has been until I received this actual real life ninja. I’ve never had a blender that didn’t leave clumps of stuff in the bottom, and now I’m spoiled for life. My favorite thing about it is the smoothie cup blenders. They are perfect for my breakfast smoothies and make about 1/3 of the mess that I was making every day using a full size blender to make my breakfast. Also, I’m saving on energy costs because I don’t have to wash the giant blender in my dishwasher as much. I’ll never go back to a crap blender again.

Author: Brandon R.
Title: Nothing stands a chance
Body: This blender is unlike any I have ever used before. The triple blades make sure the food is blending at all levels of the blender, not just the bottom. The individual cups are also great of you just need a little drink because it saves having to clean the whole pitcher. I highly recommend this blender.

Author: ChicoMike
Title: How to operate this blender
Body: I received this a few days ago. I came well packaged. I tried with the single serve small part of the blender but could not figure how to get it to run. Finally after reading the instruction for umpteenth time I found that the numbered levels have nothing to do with the smaller part. JUST HOLD DOWN THE BUTTON ABOVE THE NUMBERS WHICH READS SINGLE SERVE. I checked it all out. All parts work fine. The single serve really purees very well. If you need to pulse just stop the blender then touch and release the single server button on and off repeatedly for a pulse actions. Very good blender. It is loud but no louder than other blenders I have used in the past. I would definitely recommend this to my friends.

Author: WDH
Title: My brother called me from the emergency room
Body: I bought this and had it shipped by Amazon to my brother. the reviews look good, and by all indications it did a good job making milkshakes for his daughters the first time he used it. However, when pouring the milkshakes, the blades FELL OUT and cut his hand so badly he had to go have stitches.Based on that I can't recommend this blender. I've never heard of a blender that has the issue of blades falling out and cutting the user's hands.

Author: Amy N.
Title: Replace the 16 oz cups
Body: I like the blender a lot. I used the 16oz cup more often. Unfortunately, both 16 oz cups were cracked when I blended the ice. Can I buy a replacement? does it come in smaller cup to grind spices. Thank you.

Author: Fort2nita
Title: Good product
Body: Very noisy

Author: Deondra
Title: This product came not working and i am so disappointed
Body: I was not able to uncover what i like or dislike about this product as when it reached to me, it was not working!

Author: Kia
Title: Great blender
Body: Love it

Author: Jay
Title: Amazing blender!
Body: Great crushing and blending power, and so easy to clean!Frozen things are best thawed a bit before putting them in to be chopped and crushed not because it won't crush the items, but because when it's done blending, the liquid will be super thick and slushy and you'll have to wait to drink it easily.But the blender seems capable of crushing and blending everything I've put into it so far and I'm so happy with it.

Author: dorita gagnon
Title: The size is perfect!
Body: Works great! We love it!

Author: Cathy Pedego
Title: Ninja Professional Countertop Blender
Body: Great product. I bought it because I have the Ninja Coffee Bar (which I am in love with), and this company stands behind their products. Small thing wrong; they take care of it. Big thing wrong; they replace it. This blender works great and comes with a small (bullet size) mixing cup and one small drink cup with lids. I gave it only three stars for noise because every NIGHT my daughter blends her smoothies for the next day and it seems loud to me (she does it at 10pm though). All in all, extremely satisfied with this blender.

Author: Reba
Title: Powerful machine, good value
Body: This is a powerful blender. I use it to make smoothies. It does make a lot of noise, but because the product is so powerful I can tolerate the noise.

Author: Mpinane Phoofolo
Title: Single serve option is so handy!
Body: I love using the single serve option. Easy to use and clean.

Author: Amber
Title: Great value for the quality and power you get
Body: This blender is fantastic! A little noisier than the rest of the household would like to hear for my morning smoothies, but well worth it! Blend time is super short. It cuts through contents with no question, annihilating ingredients into a smooth purée.

Author: Cloverfrog
Title: Great!
Body: We use this for fresh fruit smoothies almost daily and it's awesome!! It's a little loud, but it blends like a mofo. Definitely recommend!

Author: MB
Title: So so
Body: Doesn't pulverize as well as my prior nutrabullet, hard to clean, 16oz cups are too small

Author: funny person
Title: Omg it’s awesome
Body: Easy to clean easy to use makes killer protein shakes with massive fruit even if they are frozen

Author: Vanillabare
Title: Awesome
Body: My husband purchased as an anniversary present. I love everythin about this blender. We use the both the single serve function as well as the full size blender. I love that I can use both functions with one appliance. Blends frozen fruit into smooth creamy goodness in just 15-20 a seconds. Easy to clean.

Author: Ezell
Title: Does not blend well.
Body: I bought this to replace a 900 smaller model I used for a couple of years.Pros: it is not as noisyVery easy to clean.Cons:Will not blend up seeds like flax seed.The cups are pretty small for a single serve.You can't add anything while blending unless you are adding a liquid.I would not purchase this again.

Author: Charles H. Massey Jr.
Title: Great Smoothie Maker
Body: I haven’t used the main blender jar, but have used the individual jars and they are just the right size for a personal smoothie. I use frozen fruit and the Ninja does an amazing job of thoroughly blending.The noise is a bit much, but so is the noise made with other blenders.My only real complaint is having to screw on the lid. I’m finding that it can be difficult to find just the right spot to initiate correct screwing.

Author: Weston Cecil
Title: a good solid blender
Body: I have been using the blender over the last 12 months pretty much exclusively to make homemade frozen fruit smoothies. I have never had anything it couldn't cut up. Cleaning the blades is somewhat challenging. They remove from the base easily enough but there are a lot of 90 degree angles that just make it a bit of a chore to clean but not to bad. noise level is loud but not excessive.

Author: Sharee
Title: Perfect
Body: Exactly what I wanted.

Author: Surinder Khullar
Title: Blender
Body: Blends great... too loud noise

Author: Karlene L.
Title: Amazing!
Body: Absolutely love this blender! I bought it to grind monkey chow into powder(yes for monkeys) it didn’t disappoint!! Pulverized them very quickly and love the large size! Also makes great smoothies!

Author: steven rodgers
Title: great
Body: love this blender, no problem with ice, nuts, roots. pulse works great, easy to clean

Author: Glenda B.
Title: It is broken after only six times used
Body: I have had mine a short time and it has broken. Returning this product

Author: Emily
Title: Handy
Body: And easy to use. Bought as Xmas gift for friend

Author: Barb
Title: Excellent
Body: Frose

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not durable
Body: I got this in November 2018 to blend bulletproof coffee when im visiting my mom. I wish I’d spent the ducats to get a vitamix like i have at home. I’ve used the ninja a total of 7 times & it’s developed a crack in the bottom which leaks all over. My vitamix is 24 years old & still working great. It’s also super easy to use & clean.

Author: Bradley W Pabian
Title: Powerful Blender
Body: The best blender I have ever had. It is not very loud and it crushes frozen fruit for my smoothies easily.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: smoothie master
Body: great product

Author: M.R.
Title: Not too pleased with ninja products.
Body: Powerful motor, I like the large size, but the blade is not too functional sharpwise. I have a 15 year old Oster blender with a still sharp blade. This ninja blender is too loud and takes a little longer to crush and grind. My old Oster blender is faster.

Author: Sammy
Title: Blender blades are extremely sharp!
Body: The blades on this blender are very, very sharp. I had to return it because I kept getting cut every time my hands would even lightly graze the blades during the disassembly process for cleaning.

Author: Sheila Burnham
Title: Nice Machine
Body: Use it daily for smoothies at work and home. Easy to use and keep clean.

Author: Tlletts59
Title: Quality
Body: So far it works as expected

Author: aggie
Title: Great value
Body: Love this for making pineapple slushes! Daughter and son-in-law use it as well to blend protein drinks. Love that it has suction cups on the bottom of the unit to help prevent it from traveling.

Author: Tahlia B
Title: Great blender
Body: Wedding registry gift to us, love it

Author: Rona
Title: Use it every day!
Body: We love this blender. We use it every day for breakfast shakes. I love the individual bottles as well if you're not making a big batch. Blends very smooth!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Only 2 months old and won’t turn on...
Body: I decided not to write a review right away but give it a month or two to try the product to leave an honest review. At first we LOVED this blender. It was everything we wanted! We’ve used it almost everyday to make smoothies and blended coffee. It’s been almost two months since we’ve had it and today IT DOESN’T EVEN TURN ON! WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT TO SPEND SO MUCH MONEY ON A PRODUCT THAT DIDN’T LAST 😣

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender, extremely loud
Body: Had it for a month, fantastic at blending. Easy to take apart and clean. Didn't think I'd ever use the single serves but they're perfect for smoothies. On the single serves, you can't set them and walk away, you have to hold the button to blend them which is a little annoying but they blend in like 6 seconds so it's not a big deal.But this thing is LOUD.If you make smoothies in the morning while your family is sleeping do not get this blender. I don't have that problem but I am just waiting for the apartment neighbors to complain and frankly I'm surprised they haven't.

Author: Morgan S.
Title: Loud but worth it!
Body: Works great - love it. However, it is loud. Our dogs hate it but we’ll put up with the noise because it works so well.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Love it
Body: Love it!

Author: NYRN
Title: Happy with blender
Body: Works very well. I make smoothies with spinach and other Vegies and fruits and they come out excellent!

Author: Emily
Title: Very convenient, works great!
Body: Yeah, it's loud, but it's a blender...what did you expect? It crushes ice and blends really well...and fast. I love the single cup option. Great value for the money and great product, highly recommend.

Author: Alicia W.
Title: Powerful, But Definitely Not Quiet
Body: I use this product to make blended protein smoothies in the single serving size. It works fantastic. A shake in between blending gets everything perfectly blended. It is not quiet, but with the quick blending it completes I am not bothered by that. It would be perfect for making large quantities of margaritas or blended drinks as well.

Author: Manas
Title: Not Durable at all
Body: This blender was working fine for the first 3 weeks till I decided to make cold coffee with 'lots' of ice chunks. The jar split open and the coffee shot out everywhere in the kitchen.Save your money and get something durable. This blender is going back.

Author: Yvonne Asante
Title: Works Magic
Body: this is the best blender ever!!!

Author: Andrew
Title: Great blender
Body: Great product. Received this product fast and reliable. After my first use me and my wife been trying different things every day.

Author: Regina
Title: Great quality
Body: A lot bigger than I expected but works great

Author: jack r.
Title: great item. i use it every day
Body: works a lot better than my old conventional blender. amazing power. makes shakes and smoothies. single use cup is a great idea and much easier to clean. i think its a great investment.

Author: Cathryn
Title: LOVE IT!!!
Body: I bought one for myself and because I loved it so much I bought one for my mom for mothers day (which she got early) and she was ecstatic about it and couldn't wait to use it. I love how easy it is to make a single smoothie/drink just for myself and go about my business. Highly recommend.

Author: julie
Title: Loving my new blender
Body: Love the new blender! I never had individual cups before and it’s a game changer. Love making my protein shake and my daughters smoothie every morning with just a quick rinse of the blades. Pulverizes my frozen fruit in seconds!!

Author: Tim
Title: Get One
Body: You need to get one of these. They make awesome smoothie and puts other blenders to shame. we have ruined several blenders trying to make good smoothies. Get one!

Author: Leonard B
Title: Great product
Body: Careful when cleaning.

Author: Manisa P.
Title: blends like a champ but way too loud
Body: great product, wish it was quieter. use it daily for protein shakes and frozen smoothies.

Author: N Breezy
Title: Definite Upgrade from the Bullet
Body: I upgraded from a bullet and I am so glad I did. Requires 1/2 the time and I make less mess. Even using the mixing cups is easy peazy..... The blades a very sharp so it requires you to handle with care. I am proud of my purchase.

Author: Lori C
Title: Best Ever Blender
Body: Created a great new way to cook and drink all kinds of foods

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Works amazingly!
Body: Love my blender! Love the fact that the blades come off and you don’t run the risk of cutting yourself! It works amazingly!

Author: Miguelito
Title: Detoxing with green smoothies right out of the box
Body: Powerful unit that provides everything you need to blend, chop, and mix the best smoothies. I have a juicer and I would take this over the juicer any day.

Author: CL
Title: Ninja
Body: Super sharp blades. Be careful when cleaning!

Author: Kim
Title: Love this!
Body: This is best I’ve ever had. Wonderful

Author: JenniferG
Title: Metal shards in smoothie.
Body: Did not enjoy the metal shards in my smoothie. This is my blade a year out. Ninja Customer service offered for me to purchase replacement part as response to finding parts of the blade in my frozen strawberry smoothie.

Author: Tanner Norcross
Title: not what i was expecting. more of a headache than anything
Body: has zero power, anything tougher than a strawberry and this blender will struggle. I returned and upgraded to a vitamix. Making my breakfast shakes for the week went from a 70min ordeal to a 25min process. I do miss the single serving mix aspect of this blender.

Author: Annernanner
Title: This is a great blender!
Body: Love it! Blade is really sharp and works perfectly!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I'm very happy with this blender
Body: The package arrived on time, very simple to use and it works perfectly fine. I would buy it again

Author: Sherri L. White
Title: Grey not black
Body: The product is grey not black.

Author: ian petrak
Title: Great
Body: Girlfriend loves it

Author: dcdenizen
Title: Not long lasting but powerful
Body: The blender stopped working after three years of only intermittent use. The red power light blinks and the power does not come on even when the blender is properly affixed.

Author: Dr. Phyllis A. Deal
Title: Great for smoothies.
Body: None of these are quiet but this is the best and fastest blend I’ve had.

Author: tania Schwerert
Title: The power. Able to blend everything
Body: Like the power. Dislike how noisy it is

Author: Martin M.
Title: Perfect
Body: Perfect

Author: K. Adams
Title: Wish it still worked.
Body: Stopped working less than 2 years. Very loud. Blends food well.

Author: MESC
Title: Cannot use a Ninja Blender for Hot Liquids!
Body: We bought this blender for Bulletproof Coffee at our office. After using 3 times, the blending pitcher started leaking and we noticed that it cracked. Only then did we check the website to find no hot liquids!. Waste of money.

Author: Nolan
Title: Don't buy it. Spend money on a decent blender.
Body: Every time we get it it cracks and leaks. Its junk and a water of money. We hand wash and never put in the dish washer. We're careful and it cracks.

Author: Micalita
Title: Noisy but strong!
Body: Just be careful when you pour the contexts that you removed the blade first. Already stab my hand with it. Blends great. Noisy but strong!

Author: Cristian J.
Title: Funcionamiento
Body: Excelente, la volvería a comprar.

Author: Evan Fleishman
Title: Grinds Like A Champ
Body: I was a little apprehensive ordering this blender because I've had bad experiences with other blenders that just couldn't grind ice like they're advertised. But the Ninja Blender works as advertised. I'm going to order extra parts because I plan on keeping this one forever.

Author: william masewicz
Title: gotta have it
Body: makes a great smoothie

Author: Michael Garza
Title: Must have.
Body: Just simply awesome !

Author: Samantha Lone
Title: Great blender!
Body: Loooooove it! I think a ninja is a perfectly acceptable and more affordable substitute for a vitamix!

Author: Erik A. Garrett
Title: Awesome
Body: Just the best

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Expensive but worth it
Body: For those of who saying the single cup leaks.. it’s because y’all are putting too much in at once.. there’s a full mark once you don’t go over it you should be fine. I went over I had the problem, I then follow the full line and the problem was solved.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Ninja wanna be"
Body: Do not like the fact that for the Single blender you basically just have to keep pressing the bottom until it does its job. It makes no sense to me! Plus when making baby purees it takes a while to get that smooth consistency, it does not blend well!

Author: N. Russell
Title: Wonderful Alternative To More Expensive Blenders
Body: Both the single serve cups and the full size blender are both exceptional. Both are easy to use and clean. The machine is well constructed and sturdy. VERY sharp blades (ask me how I know - OUCH!). We have made everything from smoothies (of course), hummus, ice cream, whipped cream and iced/blended coffee. LOVE this machine.

Author: Kierstyn
Title: Definitely recommend
Body: I was hesitant to buy this because of the issue this brand has had in the past. But I love it!

Author: Richard
Title: amazing
Body: very loud but so worth it, makes great smoothies

Author: Stephanie
Title: Original Brand New!
Body: Great blender, super sharp blades and at a crazy great price! Shipped quickly too!

Author: Brittany H
Title: Loveeeeeeee
Body: Love my ninja.. Purées everything I’ve tried in no time at all. So glad I Upgraded from my $30 blender I had previously.

Author: Shellemeno
Title: Just get it.
Body: I debated for months. I really wanted a Vitamix or Blendtec, but I couldn’t justify the price. Reviews were good so I finally took the plunge. This thing turns ice to snow in seconds. Single serve smoothies in a minute. Easy to operate and superb blending power. I already bought extra cups. My kids are really enjoying making their own single serve smoothies. I couldn’t be happier. I wish I’d gotten one sooner!

Author: John Flenniken
Title: Don't ever drop the lid! The unit will not work because the safety feature is broken.
Body: It does what I want it to do. The Ninja is just a bit taller then the blender I had before and it does not fit under the shelf above the countertop. where i would normally set it.

Author: Jillian
Title: Good blender
Body: This is a really good blender, the only issue is that after just a few months you can smell the motor... It hasn't crapped out yet or anything, but kind of expecting it to not last a long time. The smoothie cups are very handy, but the threading is on the inside of the glass so it'll stick if you don't rinse it out before it gets too sticky.

Author: L. Hornberger
Title: Best thing since sliced bread!
Body: This thing puts my old blender to shame! I love it and use it almost daily. It makes fabulous smoothies and is super easy to clean.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Weak motor
Body: I'm about to send this back. 2nd one to burn up. Luckily the Amazon warranty is killer.

Author: Kristen Anderson
Title: Would recommend
Body: Works well. The only complaint/thing to mention is it is not the same connection for the blender bullet cup. This ninja is has a much smaller cup and connection to the blender than the bullet. Which is fine, but would have been cool if they were interchangeable.

Author: Samantha L
Title: Love it!
Body: Works great! Love the blending cups for smaller things like smoothies and coffee!

Author: Jean B Bazile
Title: High Quality
Body: Great blender for multiple purposes

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Perfect for our smoothies
Body: Me and wife been smoothing for a month now definitely has the power we need our last one went out on our first smoothie. The only thing I personally don't like is it's made out of plastic which scratches easily.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Do not buy this product.
Body: So very disappointed. As you can see from the picture my Ninja self-destructed on low power, blending a smoothly the second time I used it. I could smell it tearing itself apart. Plastic on metal is the problem, the plastic was torn apart. Would never recommend the product. Had to pull out my 10 year old Cuisinart blender to finish the job.

Author: Nyleve Eiram: Life of a Single Mother!
Title: NYLEVE Ninja experience
Body: I've been in the market for a blender to make my own smoothies, sauces and almond milk. So when I Google and YouTube this item I asked a friend of mine to get an early bday gift. I just got it last night my son and I love this thing. I'm on my third 16 ounce smoothie and the Ninja blender does crush ice like it says.

Author: RADHAMES GARCIA THOMAS  #DO80Q21787N
Title: Good
Body: Good

Author: GalacticLady
Title: Powerful blender that’s good for either single servings or large batches.
Body: Powerful blender that’s good for either single servings or large batches. Replaced a traditional glass pitcher blender.

Author: Xavier Robinson
Title: Great Blender.
Body: Works wonders, I absolutely love it.

Author: Tammy Brooks
Title: Great and Durable
Body: I love this blender great grinder. I use it everyday.

Author: Tina L.
Title: Great blender!
Body: I received the Ninja Blender in the mail yesterday and used it to make milkshakes last night and smoothies this morning. It's very powerful! My old blender was loud and had trouble blending frozen fruit and was starting to smell like the motor was burning out so we bought this one. This blender pulverized the fruit in seconds! My only complaint is the suction cups on the bottom of the unit...it makes it harder to move on the counter from under the cabinets into the work space. (but I know the suction cups are there for safety)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Wow
Body: Wow

Author: Resa Mitchell
Title: 100% Customer satisfactions!!!
Body: I'm very satisfied with this product and use it everyday.

Author: Av
Title: Awesome
Body: Wonderful blender

Author: Mary Eddards
Title: IT WAS A GIFT
Body: It was a gift to someone who is sick and having trouble eating. She is very happy with it. It is used everyday, and, they are happy I got it for them.

Author: Tamara
Title: Died after only 5 years
Body: I purchased the Ninja in 2014 and it died on my this week. I'm very disappointed and would not recommended as a result. Also the blades are super hard to clean. You cannot get a good grip to use a sponge, and when your hand slips you slice open your hands/fingers on the blades.

Author: Kelly
Title: Best blender hands down!
Body: This blender is literally the best appliance in my kitchen. It’s easy to use, clean, and isn’t as noisy as my previous blenders. I am constantly amazed at how efficient it is and I love the single serve cups!

Author: Yesenia Munos
Title: Exelente
Body: Exelente

Author: Sonia Masis
Title: ight and fast
Body: What I like most is easey to wash

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very durable.
Body: I brought this and it actually broke the 1st time I used this. I was able to call customer service and a new one was sent to me. Now that I'm able to use it I love it

Author: Alex
Title: Easy enough to use for her.
Body: Got it for my mom once her old one gave out.

Author: Slimmouser
Title: Will it blend? It will!
Body: Absolutely love this blender - having used a magic bullet previously and struggled to get everything blended without starting and stopping over and over again - this has been life changing.We've made smoothies, crushed ice, etc - everything still works great.

Author: Kristen
Title: Quit working first use, and they charged to replace
Body: It quit on first use after 3 seconds of processing peanuts, and after that it wouldn’t even light up. We contacted the manufacturer as instructed and they charged us $22 to send a replacement part and expected us to replace the circuit ourselves. What a pain.

Author: Kenny
Title: Cut my finger right in half while cleaning it.
Body: Great Blender BUT please be careful cleaning this thing. I went to clean it and the blade came right out and nearly cut the whole part of my finger off. I would share the photos but they're pretty visual with lots of blood. Please note that the blade is not secure and will fall right out and it is EXTREMELY SHARP. I just want to help all that buy this blender and don't want what happened to me, to happen to others. This was the first blender that I have ever owned and didn't realize that the blade falls right out. I'm sure that someone who has owned other blenders probably knows that already but for those who don't know that, just please understand that before cleaning. Can't explain to you the pain that it has caused. If they create a SCREW ON safety for the blade, I will rate this blender higher. But for now, since the thing almost took my finger off, I will be rating it 3 Stars and hopefully save a few other people's fingers in the process.

Author: AKC
Title: Refurbished
Body: Refurbished product

Author: Alejandra Fernandez
Title: Multiusos

Body: A month and a half ago I bought this blender for my wife, and on the sixth time I used it, the jug was broken, luckily my wife did not hurt herself.

Author: CaliforniaCell

Body: Easy to use, robust, used daily for months without problem.Just a good product doing well the things.

Author: Barbara
Title: Great blender
Body: Overall I love my ninja blender. It does an amazing job. It has some good built-in safety features which means that it can’t be turned on it advertently. I would only caution people to be very careful cleaning the blades ( of course!). These blades are so much sharper than the blenders of the past. That’s what makes the blender so great, it just also requires more care. I also love the individual blending bullets. If I am doing smoothies for my family, we use the blender; if I’m doing a smoothie for myself, I use the bullet. Finally, it is very easy to clean and most mornings all I have to do is rinse the parts. That is good because I wouldn’t want to have to individually clean the blades due to their shortnes finally, it is very easy to clean and most mornings all I have to do is rinse the parts. That is good because I wouldn’t want to have to individually clean the blades due to their sharpness.

Author: bonepetit
Title: LEAKS!! don't buy to juice
Body: I have had a trustworthy blender for years. My husband is a workout fanatic and loves to blend a juice concoction at the end of his workout. I decided to surprise him with a new blender and one suited to this habit. How convenient to have two juice cups with lids! Juice and go. It turns out the entire machine is made of plastic. IF any of it ever goes in the dishwasher - it will craze. IF you put liquids (of course you'll put liquids) in the individual juice cups - you have to then screw a blender top on the cup and TURN IT UPSIDE DOWN.... that's how it's designed to be used. It leaks every time. You lose your juice, you make a mess, you have to clean the blender, you say bad words. This machine cost 4 times what a traditional Hamilton Beach blender costs at Target. It has much cheaper materials, it's harder to clean, it will fail earlier and is more frustrating. Save your money.

Author: Sojourner
Title: Powerful but...
Body: Right off I want to let readers know I purchased this model @ Sam's Club--not on Amazon BUT felt this was the right place to review this Ninja blender. Mine leaks liquids inside the lid and the handle. I do not put it in the dishwasher as I'm afraid the leaks would get worse over time. If ice is on the very bottom of pitcher it will not crush/chop the ice. My previous blender (an Oster) had a reverse function that would pick ice up off the bottom. I will continue to use the Ninja until it breaks or the blades wear out but will return to the Oster--it is a better quality product WITH a reverse function.

Author: Jen
Title: Ninja is a must!!
Body: Use this almost daily!! It is easy to use and works like a charm. Makes ice cream from frozen fruit with no sugar and barely any liquid.

Author: Eron Marer
Title: Great
Body: Love it. My cats, not so much. A bit noisy, but what do you expect? It's a blender with knives that spin at high speeds!! Purees really well

Author: Ayan Saif
Title: excellent
Body: excellent

Author: Lisa
Title: Can’t blend greens
Body: This blender can’t handle greens. I bought it as an upgrade from my $30 blender because I make smoothies most mornings and this one has greater capacity and should be more powerful. It leaves smoothies gritty with chunks of spinach which get stuck in my teeth. Would not recommend.

Author: Ronda
Title: Do not recommend...
Body: I would not recommend this product as it barely works. I really wonder if I received a refurbished model. Does not blend well and has funny smell when blending. I have used this same product before and it worked great. This one that I ordered off of Amazon was disappointing.

Author: Rachel Lind
Title: works ok
Body: I thought this would blend better for smoothies than it does...so kinda disappointed.

Author: Marko600
Title: Don't buy Auto IQ cups with this blender, they don't fit.
Body: Great blender/food processor. Good build quality and design. Unbelievable what it'll do to ice cubes. It makes them into snow! I think it probably has enough power to grind ball bearings! (Just kidding, don't try it) Very easy to use and clean. The only complaint I have is that I also purchased the 24 oz Tritan cups that Amazon says are frequently bought together, and they are not compatible with this BL660 blender. So don't add those to your cart, or you'll be sending them back. Otherwise, I would give this blender five stars, because it's that good.

Author: Toby
Title: Top notch quality.
Body: Very affordable.

Author: RGreene
Title: Lasted only a year and half
Body: Honestly you may be better off buying a cheaper blender. The blender works well but lasted me only a year and a half. When I called customer service they said that something is wrong with my mother base (whatever that means) and that my only option was to buy a new one at the price of $99. Which is the cost of the blender! I use the blender about 5x a month, so not overusing it. Regardless I took it down this morning and it just wouldn't work and when I called customer service they weren't much help. So save your money and buy a cheaper one like Hamilton beach. I have one and it has been working for 5 years so far. I think at this point we are just paying for the ninja name, if their products only last a year.

Author: Julie T
Title: Easiest smoothies ever!
Body: Individual serving cups that attach to blade is SO convenient. My toddler loves smoothies and this makes it much easier than having to clean big blender and is much faster than immersion blender. Easily chops up frozen fruit, even strawberries that my old blender struggled with. We use it daily! I’ve never had a vitamix but I can’t see spending that kind of money when this blender works amazingly well for 1/5 the price.

Title: Noisy but works good
Body: Yes it’s a noisy blender, not too many aren’t. But the price was great and it beats out the $40 and cheaper blenders without a doubt. This is the second own I’ve owned.

Title: Great Blender for the Money, Powerful too!
Body: This blender does a great job! Things I have done with this blender with great success include fruit smoothies and green smoothies both in the full size container and the single serves. I have also made the snow from a full size container of ice. We have also used the full size container to mix blender muffins. This has worked great! As for the sound the sound on this blender is lower than our older blender which was not as good. For the power and the success of blending the noise level is very acceptable. I would highly recommend this blender.

Bought this and I can't believe the difference, I thought it would a LEAST make a smooth fruit smoothie but it doesn't even do that. I used my blender to make cashew sauces, nut butters, and even flour. This is going back right away. I recommend save for a better blender or find a used one on the various market places because it is so worth it to have a nice blender.

Author: Rebecca Sternberg
Title: Not as good as I expected...
Body: This blender performs fine for most things, but can definitely leave some things chunky. I find that I can't make a smoothie with dates in it in this blender, which I had hoped for the price tag it could do nicely.I've been using this for about 7 months, pretty regularly. the release button on the lid (which lets you remove the lid and get to the contents) sticks and is really hard to push now.Altogether, I'm fine with it but saving up for something better.

Author: Victor G.
Title: Love it
Body: Good its good

Author: wjc040741
Title: Perfect for smoothies & icy drinks!
Body: My son & I love icy smoothies in the morning. My old blender just wasn’t cutting it for chopping the ice very well. I read a lot of reviews & ended up selecting this Ninja model with the two personal cups & personal cup blending blade attachment. It has made such a difference in my life! I love this thing! I can make my son’s chocolate mint protein shake for him & my different flavored protein shake without having to clean in between. It’s the bomb in the morning rush. The main blender crushes ice beautifully and quickly. I use it when the recipes are larger or if I need to make two or more of the same flavor. I like that the lid has a pouring spout. I used it to make my favorite salad dressing & it’s not the best for simple blending. I’m glad I kept my old blender for simple blending. The blades in the big blender are SHARP. I cut myself trying to clean them the first time. So, be very careful & do not let your youngsters try to clean it - it’s a monster, but that’s why it works through ice so well. That’s my only complaint - that I have to keep 2 blender appliances, so I gave it a 3 for versitility. Otherwise, I love this new blender & use it almost every day!

Author: Anne Beardsley
Title: Good blender (especially for the price) but not perfect
Body: Mostly great, breezed right through whole frozen strawberries without any trouble at all. I do have one complaint, though: as I was mixing I noticed that the stuff at the top was not getting blended. The smoothie in the bottom 2/3 of the pitcher behaved as I hoped it would, but the top 1/3 of the smoothie just went around in circles there at the top and didn't really get mixed. I guess it's possible that I overfilled it (hard to be sure when you're filling it with big chunks of stuff), but if I overfilled it, it was just slightly. Not enough to explain the top 1/3 not getting mixed. Wouldn't be a problem if I had a tamper stick, but this blender doesn't come with one and would be impossible to use with one. This may sound like a major complaint but really, it's only to be expected. I have never met a blender that doesn't do this (maybe some of the really high end ones don't; I wouldn't know). Iwas just hoping this one would be different. I got around the problem by stopping the blender and stirring the contents with a spoon (please don't try this without removing the blade assembly!!).

Author: BagelBits
Title: Good enough
Body: Tried putting it to the snow test, very few chunks came out as much as my dissatisfaction in my purchase. giving this a 4.2 out of 5. maybe a 4.8 if this wasn't somewhat PLASTIC where glass should be.

Author: Dominica Morrow

Author: Becca
Title: Amazing blender!
Body: OMG 😍😍😍 I have had a lot of higher end blenders in my life & I just got this today, legit just to replace my nutribullet pro... the parts had just worn out, still working but smelled like burnt & with all the aftermarket replacement cups + blades it was hit or miss if I’d be sprayed with a spew of whatever was being blended, last time it was hot coffee & I was over it. Anyway - I got this to replace that. So I tossed my nutribullet, food processer & immersion blender into a box to stop wasting space in my kitchen. Heck Yeah!!!! I’ve made mayo & reconstituted serparated & partially solidified naturally PB (in the main pitcher) plus 2 single serve smoothies. Can’t wait to try it & have bulletproof coffee again 🤩 It takes about the same footprint as my nutribullet did & does so much more. I’m thrilled. Bomb price on it too!!!!

Author: Doozer
Title: Extremely powerful and efficient
Body: Ninja? I'd call it Godzilla. You get the impression that it could mix concrete. Even on speed 1 (of 3), it crushes ice and makes frozen margaritas or smoothies in seconds. If that's what you're looking for, you've found it! On the downside it's extremely noisy for sure, but what powerful blender isn't? I do have to take away one star because the 3-tiered impeller presents 12 imposing knife surfaces that may require tedious (and scary) individual cleaning of peanut butter or other sticky ingredients before dishwashing. My wife won't touch it! But for pure raw power and durability, this is what you want.

It needs some shaking and pauses in between the blending, but I think that's to be expected. Also, because of it's great power, it is extremely loud, so if you have sensitive ears, this is your heads up. Overall, it's a great, versatile blender and I love that it comes with the smoothie cups so I can make one serving instead of a whole pitcher full.
