Author: JMitchell
Title: Such a great value compared to other high end Blenders
Body: For a long time, I have wanted a Vitamix because my parents have one. Well, since just getting married and not being able to afford one of those right now, I had heard about the Ninja blenders. I just received it, and I absolutely love it! I have already used it to make smoothies and even chop broccoli to put in broccoli cheddar soup. It blends frozen ingredients amazing and they are completely smooth! I love the fact that it also has the smaller insert. It is the best! I also like the pulse feature as well as the 3 different speed settings. Note, you can only use the one setting for the single serve blender on the smaller blender. I am highly pleased with this purchase & would recommend 5/5!

Author: Jonathan Peyton
Title: Love this thing!
Body: Good bang for the buck. Use the single mixers daily for BulletProof Coffee. Blender gets the job done for all kinds of things. Overall very pleased.

Author: M L
Title: Easy and quick to use. Very powerful blender!
Body: Purchased this item several months ago. Works wonderfully! Used for making smoothies and blends all sorts of veggies, nuts and fruits to just the right consistency that I like. You have to play with the amt of solids vs liquids that you are mixing together and the machine is very powerful. Doesn’t take long to make a blended smoothie. Love the smaller single serve cups that came with blender, very handy to make something quick to drink. Clean up is easy. It is large so be sure you have the counter space or storage area for it. Great product!

Author: Miles to Go
Title: Too big, yet too small
Body: I was using a cheap blender for morning smoothies, and bought this one after it died. I was very surprised at its size--much bigger than I anticipated. Unfortunately the large pitcher is just too big to make a single smoothie; it sprays everywhere inside the pitcher and at the same time doesn't seem to pulverize. I love, love the way the 16 oz cups fit into the device for a single smoothie, and it blends like a champ, but the 16 oz size is too small. I've tried finding a 24 oz replacement cup and don't think they're made. I wish I would have chosen a different model.

Author: michael griffiths
Title: base of container cracked
Body: bought this unit August 2018 not used that much base has cracks in it. leaks..new unit costs only ten dollars more than a replacement container

Author: Whitney Packett
Title: Great blender
Body: Great blender and love the 2 to go cups

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great for smoothies
Body: Bought a cheap blender and immediately regretted it. Bought this one and we love it.

Author: Cindy Wilson
Title: great great blender
Body: great for smoothies, ice killer, love love love

Author: Adrian Wei Tha Hla Min
Title: Good
Body: Works great

Author: Raylene H.
Title: Awesome
Body: I bought for protein smoothies, I have never seen ice blend so fast.

Author: CHansen Sales
Title: Blends great!!
Body: Great product. Use it multiple times a day. Only thing is the suction cups tend to pop up and machine moves just a tad bit. Other than that, great!!!

Author: Kristopher Keeth
Title: Best blender on the market.
Body: This blender is most definitely worth the price; hands down. My teen daughter and her friends are able to use it with no issues and cleaning it is a breeze!

Author: courtney isaacs
Title: Burning smell, not blending, then exchanged.
Body: So I’m glad I waited to write this review. When I originally ordered this blender I was super disappointed when I turned it on and 1. It was super loud and 2. I’d didnt really seem to blend my smoothies. Also, there was a burining smell, like wut?? I read some reviews about people dealing with the same thing and how they replaced parts, etc, etc. I just decided to exchange the whole machine and oh man, it actually works now. Crazy.So if you actually get one of the blenders that works then yeah, it’s a great blender.

Author: Meghan Quinn
Title: Handle Cracked, not covered under warranty
Body: The handle cracked making the blender useless. Of course that is not something covered under the warranty and they tried to charge me $65 plus shipping for a replacement! HAHA I could buy an entire new, exact same product for $75 plus free shipping (which I won't) but crazy. No thanks and very disappointing.

Author: Maxima
Title: Best bang for your buck
Body: Love love love this blender. Amazing price for all you get and works extremely well.

Author: Cindy in Upstate NY
Title: Good blender but too tall.
Body: Since I just received the blender it is difficult to comment a durability just yet, but it seems to work very well. My complaint is its size. It's much taller and larger than I expected. I want to leave it out in my kitchen for easy access because it's nice looking and matches my color scheme. It's too tall to fit under my cupboards and very bulky. My options for keeping it out are very limited. I wished I looked at the dimensions before ordering.

Author: Marios Stoli
Title: Automatically blend for new model
Body: I wish the only thing that it had was you didn't have to hold down the button to blend button the whole time. Maybe a feature where you press a button walk away and it still keeps blending.

Author: AN
Title: Decent buy
Body: Happy with the product after one month of use, though little heat build up observed after blending for 3-4 minutes.

Author: Stephanie Alexander
Title: Great product
Body: Loving my shark ninja. I’ve been making a smoothie everyday, easy to use, easy to clean. Works well.

Author: Adam
Title: Great if you need a strong blender
Body: Great blender for shakes. Powerful motor and pulls ingredients inward and mixes well

Author: The new Wally’s
Title: Hands down the best of the best.
Body: This blender is a beast!

Author: Alejandra
Title: Excelente buy!
Body: Great buy!!!! Works awesome!! And looks nice as well.

Author: Marilyn
Title: Best !!
Body: I have had plenty of Blenders , but this is by far the BEST!

Author: Noe Luna
Title: Quality blender
Body: I'm glad I spent a little more money and went with this Ninja rather than a bullet. The strength is what I like the most. I use a lot of frozen ingredients for my smoothies and they always come out smooth and quick with this blender. Plus the 2 portable cups are a good incentive for the price.

Author: Minimaciii
Title: Powerful, versatile
Body: We replaced our last Ninja blender after it wore out after several years of weekly use. This set came with the smaller cups that you can slap a cover on and go! Pretty slick! Crushes and blends ice like nobody's business! would recommend!

Author: Vee
Title: Quality and ease of use
Body: Ninja

Author: A. Horton
Title: We love ours!
Body: I bought this to primarily make smoothies. It works fantastic and the quality is great. Would definitely recommend.

Author: Johnny
Title: Will not make thick milk shakes
Body: If you want to make a thick milk shake, this is the wrong blender for the job. The tri-blade assembly does not cause the contents to circulate if it is very viscous. It simply hollows out the ice cream around the blades, leaving unblended chunks of ice cream on the sides. It works better if you add lots of liquid.

Author: JSP
Title: Great value, great brand!
Body: This blender works quite well, and is the 4th Ninja product in our household. I find the particular design of the planetary gear setup incorporated into this unit to be clever, but a little slower than ideal while running the large carafe. The personal size blending cups are a great addition to the set, and can be found by themselves on Amazon as a nice addition, if you need more than 2. If you happen to need to blend frozen strawberries or yogurt unthawed, it's a bit of a challenge sometimes, to get all the chunks to break, but hey.......it IS frozen! A hard purchase to go wrong with, for sure.

Author: Jodie Bosheers
Title: Great buy
Body: Easy to clean, high quality

Author: Ethan
Title: Powerful blender
Body: Works great however the single serve blender part struggles if it becomes too full.

Author: Will & Raven Dodson
Title: Great
Body: Great

Author: Warren H. Mee
Title: Just what I’ve been waiting for
Body: I’ve waited 3 years to get one. I highly recommend this Ninja. Great for smoothies.

Author: marykate
Title: Easy and Durable
Body: I read so many reviews before choosing this model and brand! I received it very quickly but had to wait until Christmas to actually open it. The quality of the different parts is great, easy directions and works perfectly for smoothies and salsa.

Author: LB
Title: Bad customer support and not durable
Body: Have had this blender for a 1.5 and the lid broke. I called support and they don’t offer the lid but offer the blender body with lid for $64.99. The blender was only $79. The lady I called with Ninja support didn’t have any empathy and seemed like she had better things to do than to talk to me. Ninja’s website wasn’t user friendly either. I won’t buy this brand again.

Author: JAMazon Customer
Title: Works for now
Body: Seems to work good, but it smells like it’s burning up already

Author: Fernando Rivera
Title: Is nice and sharp..
Body: Is very good product so far.

Author: Nailah Beal
Title: DONT BUY
Body: I ordered this item weeks ago for a Xmas gift. I came sealed and newly packaged . However it was missing 3 major pieces not to mention it wouldn't even power on. Imagine my embarrassment level xmas morning.

Author: MR A
Title: excellent product
Body: good quality blender

Author: DKM
Title: Ninja Gift
Body: Daughter loves it! I would buy another one:)

Author: Life Mizrahi
Title: Easy to use easy to clean, great product
Body: Great product we are happy with it in general overall

Author: George M Beyor
Title: it is great
Body: love it

Author: Christy Attwood
Title: Works like a charm!
Body: I like this much more than I did my Vitamix. It works very well, chops up apples, ice, anything I put in for a smoothie. And I can have the option to make only one serving with the small container. With the Vitamix huge container, it was difficult to make a small amount and I always ended up with more than I needed--and then I felt it necessary to drink it all! You see where I'm going with this?

Author: Happy1
Title: Love it!!
Body: We have been making smoothies galore and pureed our fruit for hard cider!! It blends everything with ease!!

Author: Ray Taylor
Title: Beware if giving as a gift...Amazon slapped a shipping label on a Ninja-branded box...
Body: I’ll redo this review with a real perspective on the quality of this device...but wanted to complain for a minute about changes to Amazon’s shipping procedures. Bought this as a Christmas gift and it arrived today in a Ninja branded box. Hmmm. Wonder what’s in that one? So, zero surprise for the recipient, since they’re the one who snagged it off the porch. Just beware that gifts purchased off Amazon won’t necessarily come inconspicuously packed in another box anymore.

Author: Mma
Title: Powerful
Body: Perfect. Be careful washing the blades, they are incredibly sharp

Author: Kal Hadden
Title: works better than bullet
Body: Like that it is a blender, works good and purees everythingwell

Author: Lee
Title: It does what it’s supposed to
Body: Works like a charm

Author: CMTM
Title: Highly recommend!!
Body: This thing is amazing. I waited way too long to buy this. It handles everything like a breeze. I highly recommend it!

Author: Pooja
Title: Very user friendly and makes blending smoothies simple!
Body: I love this blender! Have been using it for a month and I love that I can blend the single serves!! Just takes a few minutes in the morning to make my single smoothie and take it to work! Its pretty easy to use, blends everything that I have added to the blender and very easy to clean! No issues yet!! Totally loving it!!

Author: mackenzie
Title: Love it
Body: Works amazing!

Author: Edwin L.
Title: Price was Great/Product is the same as my local store
Body: Would buy again.

Author: JackandCyn1
Title: Love it!
Body: I've waited and researched these blenders - I recommend this one! It gives me the versatility to use the big blender (and comes apart for cleaning!) or just my morning smoothie without needing to clean the whole thing!

Author: Zimmerman
Title: Love
Body: Does an excellent job of making smooth, smoothies

Author: Nancy Lofaso
Title: Great!
Body: Love this product! It is strong enough to puree almost anything! Also really like the 2 individual containers that accompanied it for smoothies!

Author: Sean P. Smith
Title: Crushes Ice but does NOT mix well
Body: This product does not live up to the expectations of Ninja products. Bought it through Amazon and did research on it. My neighbor has a similar model and that is how we found Ninja. Their's is great. We had an older Vitamin blender that did not mix well so thought the Ninja would be better. Bought it as a gift. Just using it now for first time, 90 days later, and yes it crushes ice, but does NOT blend a protein shake up. Leaves all the powder sticking to the sides. This model is no better than a blender you can buy for 1/2 the price. Also, went to return now via Amazon and they only give you 30 days to return. So if you are buying ahead of an event, as in a present, don't go past the 30 days or you are in trouble. Now Im sitting with a $100 blender that is worthless. Cannot even return it for a stronger model. BEWARE.

Author: Kimb
Title: Great for smoothies and protein shakes
Body: Love my ninja. Blends up ice for smoothies like a champ, easy to wash, not too noisy

Author: Savvy
Title: Perfect!
Body: Great product! The 2 extra shake size cups are extremely useful for my wife and I when we come back from the gym. The blender is very powerful and can even crush ice very well. We love it!

Author: Aimee H
Title: Efficient and makes amazing smoothies
Body: This is something I've wanted for so long!-- a blender that works well without me having to work for it by stopping and starting it and stirring it over and over. You push the button a few times and have something smooth and delicious! It's easy to use and the portable smoothie cups are so convenient for grabbing on your way out the door. It's easy to clean as well.

Author: Kal14
Title: Great
Body: Great investment. Love this machine. Unbelievable power for both single serve and large pitcher.

Author: Benjamin Arce
Title: Great price
Body: Great price, 50% cheaper than target WOW

Author: Mr Red
Title: love it
Body: great blender love it

Author: Icantsay
Title: IT'S PERFECT!!!
Body: Gave as gift, used DAILY

Author: M. Johnson
Title: Great blender for fruit and ice
Body: Be sure to use metal mesh gloves to clean blades, really sharp! Blends everything really well.

Author: Erin McGarvey
Title: Makes great smoothies.
Body: I have unused mine for smoothies and it works great. I have enjoyed have it and drinking the smoothies. I have not used it any other way so i still need to play with the Blender some more.

Author: ricrac
Title: Bought as a gift
Body: I bought this as a gift and it was shipped directly to the recipient. I don'tknow how well it works or anything else about it other than what I readin the description, Q&A and reviews. It comes with a couple glasses forsmoothies making it more versatile.

Author: Jason
Title: Nice
Body: Awesome blender

Author: Matthew Hodgson
Title: Recently purchased
Body: So far so good. We like it and how it works. Hopefully it stays that way.

Author: Tiffany B. in Austin, TX
Title: Everything is awesome but don’t expect it to blend almonds into your smoothie!
Body: We love our Ninja blender and I was able to get it $40 cheaper than the best deal I could find retail which was Target at the time. Literally to me the only way it is a bit less effective than our Nutra bullet is that even the single-serve cups will not blend/pulverize nuts into a smoothie. Bummer.

Author: I.M. Janky
Title: Great value
Body: Awesome blender for smoothies, etc.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Awesome product
Body: Great product! Crushes ice with ease..

Author: Blessing
Title: Worth the price
Body: I’ve used it everyday since it arrived. As long as you include enough liquid when blending frozen items it makes the very best smoothies!

Author: Easydusit57
Title: Excellent choice!
Body: For the money, excellent product. Loved it so much, I bought another one for a gift for my sister. Thoroughly satisfied!

Author: Larry Medina
Title: So far it has been a great product
Body: I haven’t used it that much sir you’re getting an early reading of so far it’s performance I’m just being generous

Author: Szb
Title: Very good and convenient product
Body: Love the way I can make all types of mixes with this

Author: miahthcat
Title: Great for daily shake/smoothie drinker!!!
Body: I never thought I would love a small appliance as much as I love this blender. I have been making these healthy, daily sometimes twice a day, shakeology and frozen fruit smoothies (shakes) for a couple weeks and I was super frustrated with my Hamilton Breach (cheap) blender. I splurged and bought this for myself. Oh my god! Game changer!!! For anyone who makes single serve shakes everyday this is crazy amazing and handles frozen fruit in literal seconds. For the FIRST time I did not have to fight with my blender to make a drink. And clean up is super easy since the single serve container and blade come apart it’s much easier to clean the blade. I still like that I have a huge blender attachment, but I plan to use the single serve cup daily (twice a day even).

Author: Travel Pro
Title: Broke after 6 months
Body: Product broke after 6 months.

Author: Lisas
Title: Worth the money !
Body: Love this blender !!!!

Author: Sylvain P L
Title: Not convenient for single
Body: I am used to a 24oz cup with protein every morning. The 16oz is too small to fill with all kind of fruit and crushing in the pitcher is very messy just for one. Not the best buy i did with Ninja. Wish they had a bigger model cup available to choose from.

Author: vshivers
Title: Perfect
Body: Purchased this as a gift for my son who wanted a strong blender that would crush ice well. This is amazing, great power & love the extra cups for shakes. They love it!

Author: Dave Nesbitt
Title: Awesome Blender
Body: Finally I own a blender that actually will chop ice and not just say it chops ice.

Author: Bree🌻
Title: I also like how the base suctions to the surface you have ...
Body: I bought this blender to start a smoothie cleanse. It chops and blends frozen fruits perfectly and does the job right, I also like how the base suctions to the surface you have it on so it doesn't slip or slide and there aren't any accidents.

Author: E.G
Title: Happy Customer!
Body: I LOVE this blender! I had been on the lookout for one that was higher end, and I was lucky to grab it on sale.It came exceptionally fast, works GREAT... my smoothies are incredibly smooth. I’ve only had it 3 or 4 days but I’m in LOVE!Blends ice, peanut butter, greens & frozen fruits with perfection.The only complaint I would have is the lids for the single serve cups don’t close completely. Meaning, the lid has a drinking hole, but no option to close it. For sanitary reasons it’s a little bothersome.Still gets 5 stars.I Definitely WOULD RECOMMEND to others, it’s worth it!!!!!!!!!Ps. I also want to mention I have only used the single serve cups, but I’m looking forward to blending margaritas, & recipes that call for larger portions. I have no doubt it will perform wonderfully.

Author: Irina
Title: Great!
Body: Love it!

Author: Avi
Title: Great quality
Body: Great product. I only use it about once or twice a month, and it has last me a year as of today. It is a great quality as any ninja product. Highly recommend this blender.

Author: Mandy
Title: Worth it
Body: I bought a $20 blender to start to save money. I should have just started with this because it is so much better. Blends everything so easily, quickly, and smoothly.

Author: Ash
Title: Best blender for the price!
Body: I love this blender. It’s a step down from a vitamin because it requires some scraping down the sides, but for the price it’s great!

Author: Alejandra Oliva
Title: Good durability!
Body: I love this blender, I have bought 3 of them and my family love Ninja! :)

Author: Carolyn De Vries
Title: Two thumbs up
Body: Two thumbs up

Author: M. Gray
Title: Came broken
Body: I read the reviews and was very excited about this blender. So I was really disappointed when I unboxed it and found that the blender jar was cracked from the top all the way down (not like a hairline crack, a half-inch-wide gap. I have no idea whether this happened in transit or before, but the box was not externally damaged, so this makes me really question the overall quality and durability of blender. Also, just frustrating that after spending $80 on something and waiting a week for it, I now have to box it back up and take it to a UPS store for return, and in no way get compensated for that hassle and time waste. I’m giving this 2-stars, but I’m willing to update that depending on how the rest of the replacement process goes.

Author: RJ
Title: Simply fantastic
Body: We use it every day for fruit smoothies. It's fairly quiet, works efficiently and is simple to clean.

Author: Roy Rene
Title: Great product.
Body: Item was great as expected and easy to use.

Author: Jasmine Sagum
Title: Perfect for single size smoothies
Body: Perfect for single size smoothies! I put all the stuff in one of the cups the night before and put it in the fridge. Then it's ready to go in the morning! The little cups are also a lot easier to clean than a full size blender jar!

Author: Lynn Clement
Title: 4 stars because it is a little bulkier than I would prefer
Body: I replaced a very old blender with this one. Naturally blenders are much better now than 20-30 years ago lol. Favorite feature of this blender is the blades at varied levels down the center piece, which of course chops and grinds everything nicely and quickly. So far I am happy with my purchase

Author: Colin
Title: Products works as described
Body: Had this for about a year now. Never lets me down. Still works great. Definitely recommend

Author: Catherine Reid
Title: Used daily for multiple smoothies - love it!
Body: When the motor in my old Ninja burned out (after 2yrs of HEAVY use with FROZEN berries for smoothies), I thought I could easily get a replacement - and still be able to use my old single-serve cups. Not so easy! Some newer models don't fit the old base, but (based on close examination of the picture in this ad) this one appeared to be a match, and it is! Love being able to make smoothies in the single-serve cup. This blends QUICKLY (is VERY loud), and the motor holds up to heavy use, blending frozen berries. I had wanted to get a Vitamix, but didn't want to spend the money. I don't know what I'm missing, but this works great for us! And, if we need it, we have the blender container (for greater volume).

Author: MamaBlair
Title: Very happy with my purchase.
Body: This is an excellent blender. I used it as a food processor to make Cranberry Salad for Thanksgiving. I’ve washed it in the dishwasher top rack multiple times with no problems.I love it.

Author: Heidi
Title: Pretty average.
Body: For what I paid for I expected it to work better. It does make smoothies just fine, it just takes some time which is disappointing

Author: FGR86
Title: Good blender, however blades get dull after a year or so
Body: I was pretty happy with this blender, and the small personal size options for smoothies and smaller portions.. however the large blade gets pretty dull after the year and smoothies/soups have come out pretty chunky. So I am dissapointed with the product. Wish it lasted longer.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: “Chopper” not “blender”
Body: Doesn’t do much blending for a blender. A better name would be “chopper.” I primarily use this product for smoothies, but there are always chunks left over. Not a fan of chewing my smoothies. The plastic also cracked easily and the lid and blades are very hard to get clean.

Author: ACA
Title: Powerful blender although noisy
Body: I really love the single serving jars. This blender is super powerful and does a great job with smoothies and milkshakes. (The blade is hard to scrape off because it is so sharp but that is why it can blend so well.) it is noisy but I don’t mind because it works well.

Author: SoLo Jo
Title: Not great, not bad.
Body: It's very good and efficient. It blends frozen fruit and ice cubes easily (which is the most important thing to me). However, it's not very easy to clean and since the first time I used it, it smells very strongly of burnt plastic when in use.

Author: Cliente Amazon
Title: Fantastic!
Body: The 3 blades are very strong for everything! The single jar works better for smoothies, I tried to use it like a food processor for garlic and it gets a bit stuck on it, but it’s ok considering the power of the blender! I really loved it, and it’s even possible make ginger roots desappear on smoothies, fantastic!

Author: mimi
Title: Great
Body: Love all our ninja products

Author: Dallas A
Title: Buyer beware, keep bandaids handy if you wash this by hand.
Body: Best blender I’ve owned. Be careful, the blades are razor sharp, much sharper than any blender I’ve ever owned.

Author: E H
Title: Love it!
Body: I bought this for my girl and its amazing! Very powerful. Ninja is the best brand!!

Author: Jose Z
Title: Blender came broken upon delivery !!
Body: When i opened the box i noticed the blender has a couple big cracks on the bottom.

Author: Terry Gietzen
Title: Perfect
Body: Works great. Awesome price

Author: Midlothian Consumptive Entity
Title: My wife - who was the person most interested in a new blender - loves using the Ninja!
Body: As she becomes a regular smoothie fan - and sometimes chocolate soymilk milkshake producer, my wife also has commented on a number of occasions on how much she loves the Ninja. From the individual serving tumbler sized attachments to the multi-level blades, to the ease of use and how powerful it seems, she's a genuine fan! The old blender was heavier, and not as versatile, and always sat in the pantry, waiting to be summoned occasionally. The Ninja is always right on top of the kitchen counter, ready for use on a whim. I guess that just about covers it...

Author: Jennifer C.
Title: A little disappointed
Body: I recently purchased this and have to say I am a bit disappointed. The single serving use works much better than making a larger quantity in the pitcher. When using the pitcher I could not get all of my ice crushed up and I was even starting with crushed ice from my fridge. Also, the higher up you went with the ingredients, the more would get stuck to the blades. I would end up having to take the top off and mix things off of the sides and retry several times every time I used this. I did, however, have a good experience using the single serving cup. However, 16 oz. was not large enough to fit all of my ingredients, especially when adding both fruit and ice and upon searching I realized that there is no larger cup size available for this model. I have now purchased the Nutribullet.

Author: yogesh maheshwari
Title: Rubber/Plastic burning smell
Body: I was very pleased with the blender in the start because of the convenience in making smoothies and getting things done fast but it started to look really bad when I turned the speed up from 1 to 2/3, there's a rubber/plastic burning smell whenever I run it on high speed. Simply running the blender for durations longer than 30 seconds does the same, I am scared of using this at high speed right now and I can't put anything like kale in the blender as it takes long enough for it to freak me out.

Author: John D. Faneuff Jr.
Title: Does NOT do hot beverages!!
Body: ....which is what I bought it for.

Author: M Davis
Title: This is not comparable to a vitamix blender
Body: I had a vitamix for years. I thought this would be comparable. It is not. Spend the money and get a real heavy duty blender. This is not it.

Author: C. Richardson
Title: excellent product.
Body: appears to be well made. Blends items quickly and efficiently.

Author: dtrudeau2
Title: Great versatile machine
Body: Perfect for morning smoothies, milkshakes, pie crusts and so much more

Author: Stephanie Mac
Title: Very, very razor sharp blades
Body: It’s very nice, but the blades are VERY sharp. I got 5 stitches in my finger after not paying attention and picking it up after dropping it. I’m now terrified to use it. Be careful is my advice.

Author: Mk
Title: Great product!
Body: Great product!

Author: Liz
Title: Love this blender!
Body: Is perfect for my frui smoothies.

Author: Imogene
Title: Please conceal your boxes better.
Body: Was shipped to me in the normal box it came in. I live in New Orleans and People love to steal stuff. So advertising what's in the box when it's shipped is really annoying especially when you just dropped over $100 on something and you don't want to draw attention to what's in the box. Other than that I'm very satisfied

Author: Cjmitch
Title: Warning! Blade on cups needs o'ring removed and cleaned!
Body: I've had this blender for many years, don't remember how many for sure. As far as working well, it's been a great blender. I don't use the blender part of it very often, but I've never had a problem with things that I've used it for. The little cups I use every day on smoothies. Do not like the blender part for smoothies, I think the cups blend a lot better. However, I did not know that the blade on the little cups, has an o-ring in the bottom of it, that needs to be removed and cleaned every time you use it. I used mine for years and did not know this, until I discovered it got moldy in there. Of course I had to throw the little o-ring away, then I couldn't find a replacement for it unless I bought a knock-off brand, which I did. That was earlier this year, the blade mechanism on the cups now seems to be shearing already and it leaks all over the place. So now I'm out to find a new blender, almost bought this one again, but the thought of having to remove the o'ring, which is not easy, has detered me from buying it again. Plus I worry about cutting my finger. Not looking forward to wrestling around with the blade everyday! Looking for something else.

Author: Thalia
Title: Perfect
Body: Great quality and easy to use.

Author: Ben Blankenship
Title: Works great but horrible durability.
Body: I really want to give this product 5 stars cause it works incredibly well. But I think it's too powerful given its construction. I've owned it for just under two weeks and without any misuse, dropping it, etc. The plastic at the base of the big blender is cracking and spreading to the point where it won't be able to contain anything without it leaking before long. Works great but it's a time bomb due to its horrible durability. It will be useless to me with less than a month of use.

Author: Billy
Title: Strong & blends super fast
Body: This blender is perfect in every way. The 2 glasses are a smothie makers dream. Have just ordered my second one as a gift for a hard to please person.

Author: Brandy
Title: Exactly what we wanted
Body: The kids and I wanted something to make frappes with and this does exactly what we wanted it to do. Our ice gets crushed up exactly right and it makes a great milk shake as well. All the pieces come apart for easy cleaning. We didn't think we would used the individual cups much but have been surprised with how much we use and like them.I would recommend this product to a friend.

Author: RUNTY 1
Title: Pitcher redesigned - Why?
Body: I ordered this specific model, BL660, to replace a few pieces of my old BL660, as it was much cheaper to purchase a new unit, than just new pieces, which are ridiculously expensive IF you can find them.The pitcher and lid are not working together even though same model- the smaller opening cover, on the pitcher cover itself, broke off one of the tabs. And the small pin on the pitcher cover does not easily push down the button on the pitcher as required to make sure the unit is safe to operate. I usually have to fidget with the cover to get the pin to operate correctly.Sadly disappointed, as the pitcher and the lid of both units, are NOT interchangeable.I can only assume they changed the pitcher and lid design due to poor quality of the old style.Hopefully this new unit, if I keep it, will last longer.All in all, it is a decent blender. I did however, have my last blender, an Oster for 20 years without any issues - and it worked just as good as the Ninja.

Author: Cowboy Steve
Title: Liquefy anything
Body: Product was very powerful and processes with consistency every time. It's a little on the loud side. But it will liquify almost anything you put in it. I didn't like the fact that there was not a hole on top of the processor (hence why the low score in versatility)

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great value
Body: Great Value

Author: Dazeymae
Title: Awesome for smoothies!!
Body: LOVE this blender for making smoothies! Easy & clean up is a breeze! Using the larger container is great too! The blades make short work of anything I've put in it! Great smooth salad dressings, etc. Love it!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Don’t buy the Ninja blender it’s not worth it and their costumer services is the worst EVER
Body: I was just happy about my blender till that very loud noise started, I called the worst customer service ever 8775817375, the First Female agent Hang up on me after 5mn49s, the other agent seems trying to help but after 46mn44s and after I repeated my address and credit card more than 6times I couldn’t keep doing that anymore.

Author: GW Hayduke
Title: Pitcher Broken in less than a week, manufacturer stood behind product
Body: UPDATEContacted Ninja. They requested some basic information and sent a replacement pitcher for no charge. Since then, I have been using the individual cups for smoothies and they were great. This is a much more powerful machine than the Nutibullet it replacedDelivered on 10/30/18, used for first time on 11/1, broken on 11/7/18, less than 1 week of use. As others mentioned, pitcher developed a crack in the bottom AFTER ONLY 5 very light uses with frozen berries, yogurt, and almond milk. Unacceptable! Contacting manufacturer and will improve rating if this is resolved without hassle.

Author: DragonKing
Title: This thing is awesome. We love being able to blend into the personal glasses"
Body: too."
Image links: This thing is awesome. We love being able to blend into the personal glasses, too.

Author: John Raper
Title: Love the Ninja
Body: Makes a wonderful smoothie!

Author: michelle reason
Title: Does not start
Body: I finally got around to trying this, I know, it's weird it took me so long to use this, but after I locked everything in, it just wouldn't turn on. I checked and rechecked to make sure I had it locked in properly, but no luck.

Author: Katie W
Title: Awesome!
Body: I love my Ninja! I've had it for a couple years, and it still works perfectly! I like the 16oz serving cups for my smoothies. They help chop up my greens and give my smoothie a silkier consistency than using the pitcher. I like the pitcher for larger servings. I love it!

Author: Emma
Title: Didnt come with the kids for the two cups!!
Body: We got this for our wedding and love it, but it didnt come with the lids for the little cups :(

Author: CommomSense
Title: It works however expect to see cracks in the pitcher much sooner than you expect!
Body: A good design feature is that the blade is not attached to the pitcher making it much easier to clean. Be careful to wear protection as the blades are sharp. The motor is powerful at the same time it is quite noisy.

Author: Hayley Savage
Title: Amazing!
Body: This thing is amazing. BUY IT. It’s so worth the money!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Would buy again!
Body: Awesome blender!

Author: liubov
Title: Just perfect!
Body: Love it! And an amazing price!

Author: T B
Title: Works great
Body: It's a work horse

Author: Your average consumer
Title: RECEIVED A DEFECTIVE PRODUCT! ENTIRE BOTTOM OF BLENDER WAS CUT OUT!!
Body: Just received my package and opened it to find a rather nasty surprise. I almost cut myself before I realized what was going on!The entire bottom of the blender cup looks like it had been cut out (see images included). Once I unwrapped it, plastic came flying out and, to my misfortune, the blade followed. Curious how this kind of defect occurs in a product, but nevertheless, I’m not the least bit pleased. I bottled up my frustration and calmly contacted the Amazon help desk and, to their credit, they’re sending me a replacement promptly.While I’m grateful for the quick customer service response, my faith in the product quality and durability is shaken. If that’s how it arrives upon delivery... how can I expect it to withstand moderate to heavy usage? I sincerely hope this is not one of those flimsy products that I’ll have to replace in a few months time. Jury is still out. I receive the replacement in 2 days, will update.UPDATE: I've received my replacement machine and it was at no additional cost to me. Overall happy with Amazon's response. This whole thing has turned out to be a minor inconvenience as opposed to the headache I thought it would be. I've adjusted the score from 1 star to 3 stars to reflect my gratitude to the customer service team.

Author: Amanda Hancock
Title: Love it!
Body: Such great quality! It was a great buy

Author: Rodney G. Pierre
Title: Not worth it
Body: I always wanted a ninja blender, now that I could finally get it, I make a oatmeal shake and it came out with chucks. FYI- the oatmeal was already cooked, all I did was add milk. I’m so disappointed and we’re not going to talk about how loud the blender is🤦🏾‍♀️. Better off with a $10 blender 🤷🏾‍♀️

Author: George
Title: Amazing
Body: We hesitated if it was worth for the money before we bought it. We didn’t regret it! It is amazing . Easy to clean and works really well.

Author: pema jo
Title: It chops most anything.
Body: I use it for smoothies and vegetables and ice.... I love it especially the one serving blade....

Author: CVG
Title: Nothing
Body: We liked it

Author: Lowell T Wynn III
Title: Cheap and fragile!
Body: I have used it for one week. It blends great, so far, but after three days, I noticed a small crack in the base of the pitcher. Didn’t think much of it at first, but three days later there are multiple cracks and they are getting bigger. Overall, I think it is very cheaply made and would not recommend this product.

Author: collwatt
Title: know what you're getting.
Body: i had a $30 blender and was happier with that then i am with this. only improvemen with the ninja is with the big container i could do a big in less time. the ninja gets hot fast and heats up whats being blend. to me the its inconvient how you to load ingredients then blend , i prefer the top load. and i've seen comparison videos, the're better blenders. i might sell mine

Author: Karen in Indianapolis:
Title: Reliable, fast, and easy to clean
Body: Outstanding blender! Makes smooth aguas frescas, single-serving shakes in the smaller container cups. Cleans easily! Highly recommended....

Author: michelle kleinheider
Title: Great product for the money
Body: This is so easy to use my kids love it. They can make themselves slushys anytime they want. And it really crushes the ice evenly with no big chunks left.

Author: Naz
Title: Great choice
Body: Excellent product. Works really well if you’re on the go kinda person.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great product!
Body: Easy to use!

Author: Justin
Title: Excellent
Body: Love it. Perfect for so many different things

Author: Andy
Title: After about a year doesn't work without extra pressure
Body: Not sure what is going on but now every time we want to use the blender, we have to hold and press the container with the blade down, otherwise there seem no contact along with the red light. Only after putting almost all body's weight on top of the small smoothy container, it starts working

Author: Thomas J Lukas
Title: Great affordable blender until you need what should be a cheap replacement part
Body: I really wish I could leave a better review. This blender served me well for a couple years, but then the spout cover broke off the lid. Turns out it's a very common problem (seems that piece of plastic is not as durable as the rest of the blender)... just search for The only thing I've been disappointed with is the clear hinged lid to the pour spout on BOTH lids have broken off! , and you'll find a discussion where many people have encountered this issue and were surprised there wasn't a cheap replacement part available.I tried calling customer service as recommended in that post, but they told me the only option was to buy an entire new pitcher lid. Very disappointing to be told to buy a $40+ part when all I need is a $1 piece of plastic. I don't understand why Ninja wouldn't make this part available since it's apparently a very common problem.

Author: Holsworth
Title: So happy I bought this
Body: I make smoothies everyday and this blender makes crishing the ice and blending perfect. So happy I bought this !!

Author: Christi DeLeva
Title: Highly recommend it!
Body: I love this blender especially the singleserving cup! Dices up my frozen vegetables and fruit with ease! Highly recommend it!

Author: ze mole
Title: Smells of burning plastic after use.
Body: After each use, it smells of burning plastic. The whole thing is made of plastic and feels cheap. Processing not as great as once would expect. Takes quite a while to mulch frozen blueberries, forget about strawberries...

Author: Melissa
Title: Faulty attachments
Body: Awesome blender except that the attachments (that I paid extra for) don’t work: a waste of money and now I have extra junk in my kitchen

Author: Ozcan tas
Title: Thank you
Body: Perfect

Author: William E.
Title: plenty of positive reeviews on this thing and it's pretty rad
Body: so i don't like to review products till i've owned them for awhile. We've probably own this thing for close to a year and beat on it everyday. Me and my wife are health nuts making shakes every morning and this thing beats all our veges and fruits up flawlessly. I see no need for new blades or anything even close yet. in the summer my kids make snow cone with it...it's the most powerful blender out there hands down and I've owned alot them

Author: Eddie Farmer
Title: More powerful than i imagined it could be
Body: I wish I could give it another star !!! This is very powerful and makes all other brand I have had look like junk. This will turn ice into snow very quickly. I would recommend to everyone to get this if you want to make awesome drinks.

Author: Michael A Akermann
Title: Ninja
Body: Great blender for smoothies and drinks

Author: Yaser
Title: Great deal
Body: I use it everyday.

Author: kay
Title: Works well
Body: All family members enjoy this.

Author: Michael Pace
Title: Great mid-level blender
Body: This blender does a solid job of blending, and average job of food processing, and all around does a great job of a being a great blender. This is no Vitamix such as the one my family uses, but after suffering the use of a very cheap blender for years I finally decided to get one that could make blending at least bearable. This blender does an excellent job with difficult mixtures and can tackle just about any job I throw at it. It can be slightly loud but that is to be expected from a blender. I liked this particular style due to the simplicity of use in that it only has 5 blend options. This makes morning routines very streamlined. The single-serve option is in-fact my most used option as it is very effective in speed and consistency management. The large bin is not as good at consistency management but the tower blade helps to compensate for this.

Author: Crystal
Title: Single serve blender piece is not up to par!
Body: I use this product mostly with the single serve blender shakes and unfortunately have not been satisfied. The reason is that when I add ice and fruit, usually a frozen half banana it seems the unit is not powerful enough to blend it. This happened right away when I started using it. It does blend it but it jerks the cup to point of almost jerking it loose from unit. That does not seem normal. I contacted SharkNinja and the first time they sent me a whole new unit, every piece brand new. It still continued to happen so I called again and also explained that this time it jerked so hard it popped a rubber piece loose on the single blade piece. They sent a replacement single serve blender piece....and now with this one it still continues to do the same thing! When I talked to them before they sent me the last replacement I asked if there was a way that I could upgrade to their larger unit (thinking more wattage is what it needs to blend ice and banana) and pay the difference, and they said I wasn’t able to do that. I got this as a gift in Dec. 2017 and now I’m just stuck with it. Unhappy customer unfortunately. I will say that we make salsa with the big blender piece and have had success with that part but I mainly use it for the single serve shake cup part.

Author: Lindsay
Title: Great blender for the price! I love the 2 single serving blendable cups with lids!
Body: I e alaway purchased my cheep $25 blenders from Target or Walmart and I ware them out with in 6 months to a year. I make smoothies about 6 times a week. My husband told me to get a nicer blender because he was tired of buying new ones all the one that didn’t really work that well. So after looking for one that didn’t cost a huge chunk of cash I decided to get this Ninja blender. I’m so glad I did! I’ve had it for just over a week and I’ve used it every day. It’s perfect for what I need it for-smoothies and shakes. I LOVE the 2single serving cups and lids. They are perfect for making my husband a smoothie before work. And one for me for my breakfast. The price is reasonable and it blends my oatmean and ice in my smoothies very well. I also like that the larger container is big enough to make a good amount of smoothie for my family of 6. Over I love my ninja blender!

Author: Heather Worcester
Title: Great Gift
Body: Got this as a birthday gift for my fiancé and he absolutely loved it. It's excellent quality and he's having a blast with it. Also loved that it was so much cheaper than buying in stores!

Author: Bird
Title: Awesome
Body: Blender is awesome!

Author: grip929
Title: Love it.
Body: I use this product almost every other day.

Author: p
Title: electrical failure ..
Body: Awful ! I plugged it in and loud bang and a flash ! that was itend of the story !!! electrical failure

Author: Amber Lynn
Title: Happy customer
Body: As expected. Im happy with my purchase.

Author: Nora
Title: It’s great!
Body: I love this blender. I mostly use it for my morning smoothies and its great!

Author: sandy roseman
Title: This blender is very powerful
Body: Product met our specifications. Just what our family needed. Love the single serve containers that came with the blender.

Author: McKenna
Title: The Ninja satisfies my smoothie addiction
Body: I grew up with this ninja and now, as a recently moved out college student with a smoothie addiction, this was a necessity. So far, all is well just as expected. This blender is the BOMB!!!

Author: Alharith Manasrah
Title: Missing cups
Body: Item did not include the cups.

Author: SLS
Title: Believe the other reviews, the pitcher is a problem!!
Body: Less than 10 blends in with my purchase and I have been hit with the Pitcher of Death. First off, I did not drop the pitcher, put it in the dishwasher and I was careful when putting the pitcher on the blender base due to reports of bad pitchers. I noticed the crack after I found some of my smoothie in the base of the blender when I was very careful about not spilling. When I put the pitcher on the counter and came back after a while that's when I found a hairline crack which was causing liquid to slowly leak from the pitcher. I'm thinking about buying some flex seal to fix it but obviously I should not have to fix an obvious defect from poor workmanship or low quality materials. If you buy this model be prepared to fix/buy pitcher or only use the 2 blend cups.

Author: Catsmeow
Title: Great blender
Body: This blender is awesome! I just puréed frozen spinach to make green eggs and ham for my toddlers breakfast. It is loud, but doesn’t take long. I wasn’t expecting a quiet blender lol. I just wish there was a glass option instead of plastic. It seems durable and has done well in the dishwasher.

Author: Randall J. Wilkins
Title: Excellent quality blender for a great price
Body: I used this product mainly for making smoothies/shakes. I really like how easy it is to clean. Very good quality. Really impressed with the power this thing has.

Author: Agnar150
Title: Below Average Blender
Body: I don't know why people give this blender a good rating. The motor is good but the performance is mediocre. It will not make smooth smoothies or blend ingredients into a smooth liquid. You will always end up with chunks in your finished product. My jar also broke from normal use the clips that hold the lid on snapped off.

Author: Marisa Nunez
Title: Great product, blends smoothies deliciously well.
Body: Excellent blender love the two individual cups, I use it everyday.

Author: Will Kimmey
Title: We love this blender
Body: It makes smoothies a breeze. The blade is super sharp--so much that you can slice your finger and not even feel it. So be careful. But that sharp blade does a great job at its main task--shredding whatever you drop in.

Author: Dean
Title: Very Powerful Blender
Body: Best blender I have owned. My old blender would get bogged down on all the frozen fruit I use for my morning smoothies. This one blasts through ice and/or frozen fruit like it's not even there.My only complaint, and I'm not sure how this happened, but there's a small piece of plastic rattling around inside of the handle. I'm not sure how it got in there or what it broke off from.

Author: James
Title: Good quality.
Body: Really like this blender for its single serve ability. And it seems very durable.

Author: Suzanna
Title: Wanted to love it, but it leaks everywhere
Body: After getting tired of having to continually replace cracked bases on my old oster blender I decided to invest in one that was supposed to be higher quality. It seems like it's impossible to find one that actually works without breaking, and sadly the shark ninja is no exception. Within the first couple uses it developed cracks, and by now it leaks everywhere. Apparently shark has a warranty program but it looks like it will cost $20 to replace the blender, and I'm not sure I want to spend that much money to get another blender that's going to break within days. I haven't even used it for anything solid, just coffee ):

Author: mark
Title: Lasted 3 months used 4 times
Body: Bought it in June of 18 used 4 times now dead.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A must!
Body: Best blender ever!!!!

Author: Frank A.
Title: Best blender I ever had
Body: Get this. Works great

Author: aharon
Title: Ninja courier
Body: In Israel, devices work on 220V and the device I received works 120V so that it can not be turned on

Author: KEVIN
Title: Awesome blender!
Body: Awesome product!

Author: GIna B.
Title: Must Buy
Body: This is the BEST blender evah!!! Finally a blender that you dont have to shake while blending, to get it all.... lol. I cant believe I didn't buy this sooner.

Author: Marvel Legends Fan
Title: Just spend a little more and buy this one!
Body: Really loves the little mixers that double down as drinking cups. Keeps making a quick health shake a breeze.

Author: Peach
Title: Wish single serve had multi speed option, but read all the plusses:
Body: Besides that issue, this machine pulverizes my greens into my drinks! Much easier to clean than past blenders I have owned. I don't find ANY ice chunks either. Three speeds, and a pulse option for the full size blender give me perfect results. The lid closes and locks so there are no accidental spills. I also notice that my last blender (a high quality one) put too much air into my slushies, and this one does not do that. My drinks come out smooth and creamy! The individual serve containers it comes with give the same blending results, and have nice sipping lids. I would personally prefer a straw opening. They are also easy to clean. It has a nice solid base that suctions to the counter; another safety feature. It is worth every penny!

Author: Peaceloveandshop
Title: Best Blender I have ever owned!
Body: Best Blender I have ever owned! Now that I own this I make my own salad dressings, coffee drinks, etc.. The Cups that came in addition to the unit are very convenient. I think I will purchase additional cups. I have never owned a blender that blends and crushes Ice the way it should. Has suction cups to grip to the counter and doesn't take up a lot of room.

Author: German Juggernaut
Title: Best kitchen appliance ever
Body: This is a great blender and the smoothie attachment works very well. This thing crushes ice like a champ and blends up anything you can throw at it. The blades are great for chopping and you can make a mean cocktail

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Powerful and easy to clean!
Body: Best blender AND single serve smoothie maker I have ever tried. So easy to clean and high quality parts!

Author: Maddy Harrison
Title: Convenient and a great value! Super sharp blades though....
Body: I'm really loving this new blender. I've been able to make all kinds of things with it. The smoothie cups are so convenient and easy to clean. The blades are super sharp, which is great, but be careful when you wash them (I cut myself)! I feel I got a great value out of what I paid!

Author: LJohnson
Title: How did I live without this?
Body: I'm not sure why I waited so long to buy a ninja. By comparison, my previous blender belongs in the stone age. The Ninja blends everything. EVERYTHING! It's perfect for the variety of shakes I make almost daily. Lots of frozen ingredients: blended. Nuts and seeds: blended. Everything: blended. If you're on the fence about buying a ninja...hop down over here with the rest of the ninja lovers, we're putting everything in the blender. And it's awesome!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Item performs as advertised!
Body: Very powerful, convenient & easy to clean! I'm pleased with my purchase!!!👍

Author: Shawna C.
Title: Arrived Broken
Body: The blender pitcher arrived cracked across the bottom near the base of the pitcher. There was also a piece of loose plastic in the packaging from a piece that had cracked off. The packaging was undamaged, so I do not know what caused the issue, but I was disappointed and returned. Hopefully a different brand will provider higher quality.

Author: Grr
Title: Smoothie cups too small, and lids don't seal
Body: Turns out I wanted/expected smoothie/individual cups to be a lot bigger. These are too small to get a normal smoothie in - and I can find no bigger cups available to purchase that fit this version. Also the lids provided don't seal, making them useless for travel. This was all clear enough on the box/during purchase but I didn't think too much about it. Wish I could return it, too late now.

Author: Jennifer L.
Title: Five Stars
Body: An amazing, versatile and powerful blender. Very pleased!

Author: CF
Title: This blender is amazing
Body: Amazing value, and very powerful. Love the single serve. Super easy to clean.

Author: S.B.
Title: Not sure what happened??
Body: During light uses of this ninja blender, I experienced trembling, vibration and rigorous from the single-use cups to the point where I felt it was unsafe. I had to return it.

Author: mis singh
Title: still broke
Body: broke worst than first one and got stuck paying shipping bill 21.00 dollars that sucks not happy learned my lesson about getting stuck with defected items but blends good

Author: rosemary herbruger
Title: Lost power
Body: My ninja lost power 4 months agoIs only chewing stuffNot working properly

Author: MissE
Title: This is a great blender. I use it for smoothies and shakes ...
Body: This is a great blender. I use it for smoothies and shakes and it works great. I did extensive research and this lives up to the hype.

Author: Lauren
Title: Great
Body: Great

Author: Marah
Title: Sharp Ninja
Body: It is great quality it blends all fruit and vegetables the way I like

Author: egg101
Title: Works great
Body: I workout everyday and eat healthy, so I use this for my protein shakes as I add spinach or kale to them. Kale can be difficult to chop up fine enough to drink in a shake, but the ninja does a great job.

Author: Shinyoung You
Title: PERFECT
Body: Perfect. I should have bought it before. I love it so much.

Author: Hope
Title: after using it a few times the power start blinking
Body: after using my ninja professional blender a few times, only 9 months since i bought it. i just started to use the cups like two months ago and after one month the power button started to blink and doesn't turn on a have to wait until it just wanted to stop blinking and sometimes i have to give up. so i called the ninja number and they said that i have to send my blender so they can start the process and to get a new blender i have to wait till 6 weeks, and i have to pay for shipping, and if they don't have it by that period of time they will call me and see what they can do. 6 weeks!!! is to much time and guess what i look in the bottom and it says is made in china!!!! i think this is so unfair.

Author: Meredith
Title: Excellent blender - love the main blender!
Body: I've been wanting a blender for smoothies/blended beverages. The main blender container has the tall spindle with multiple blades which makes it super easy to blend up thicker ingredients/chop things down efficiently. It's a little difficult to clean (not sure if dishwasher safe, I don't have a dishwasher!) but totally worth it. Especially worth it as the two single serving cups and that blade work well as well! That just doesn't have as much mixing power as the taller blade spindle.

Author: Nathan
Title: Amazing product!!!!
Body: Amazing product!!! Best blender I’ve ever owned

Author: Danny calixto
Title: Perfect kitchen item
Body: Works amazing! A kitchen must have !

Author: Angela
Title: Good Product
Body: It works real well

Author: Miladys
Title: Worth the purchase
Body: I love it, i use it almost everday. I make my own smoothies but hoping to soon try other things with the blender.

Author: Robert Wilson
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love my Ninja

Author: Patrick Stalinski / Vocalist and Actor
Title: Don't buy it
Body: I have had this for a little over a year and it will be broken within a few days I only use it to mix my bulletproof coffee in the mornings and the picture is cracked and leaked onto the motor so the motor is now failing also. Amazon didn't back up the product very sad

Author: Adrian Barry Koltun
Title: TOO GOOD FOR THE PRICE
Body: IT'S LIKE GETTING 2 MACHINES FOR THE PRICE OF ONE. BOY DOES IT WORK. WOW

Author: Brooke H.
Title: Game changer!
Body: This blender puts my old blender to shame! I love the power and flexibility of this machine - I can make big batches or use the single-serve smoothie cups for my morning smoothie. Even with ice and spinach, it only takes seconds for the single-serve to complete blending (just make sure you pay attention to the MAX FILL line and don't overfull it). I've run all the parts through the dishwasher a few times with no damage, and after about a week of almost daily use I haven't seen any leaking. The blades are razor sharp - don't handle them! Hold the blades by the base and use a soft brush if you choose to wash them by hand. I wish it was black instead of grey so it would match my other countertop appliances, but I have no complaints about the machine itself whatsoever. Completely worth the investment and I'm eating healthier already!

Author: Tom
Title: Single Serve cups do NOT work!
Body: The blender works great, the single serve cups with screw-on blades does NOT work. Therefore the cups are non-functional and are now just like any other cold cup beverage holder - not worth the additional $20.00.

Author: Lindsay
Title: Works just as well if not better than $400 blender
Body: I absolutely love this blender! I am a dietitian and have a blog as well so I cook A LOT. I had used a vitamix at work in the past and this is comparable if not better. I love being able to use the big pitcher to make soup (last night I made butternut squash soup). I also love the individual smoothie cups for when I'm making a smoothie for myself only ! Someone commented that the blades are really sharp. This is very true and you should be careful when removing to wash but that's also likely why it works so well to blend and chop ice and puree food!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Quality
Body: Works very well. Turns ice to smooth consistency in seconds.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Highly recommended for smoothie lovers.
Body: I've been using this machine for a few weeks now. Haven't even tried the big pitcher yet, but I've been using the single service (16 oz) cups a LOT. I have yet to find a smoothie recipe this Ninja can't handle. Ice, frozen fruit, peanut butter, too little fluid, ... They all came out perfectly. My I'm so ready for Fall pumpkin smoothie is my new favorite breakfast!The only drawback I've experienced so far is the seal on the drinking lids. The first smoothie I made was almost my last, as I couldn't get the drinking lid off the cup to wash it!! I tried hot water, silicon grips, and some other things. Finally managed to get the lid off by sticking the cup in the freezer for half an hour then immediately running really hot water over the threads for 5 minutes. After that I avoided putting the lids on quite so tightly. :)

Author: Rachelle
Title: Can't go in the dishwasher. It gets moldy.
Body: Blending seems to do great, my biggest issue is how gross it gets. It says it is dishwasher safe which is a must with me with being disabled, but if you put it 8n the dishwasher, mold gets built up I the handle and the little corner pieces and you pretty much can't get it out without breaking it. The handle has screws but is really hard to pry it off and the little corner pieces have no way to get them off without them breaking. All of this tells me it really shouldn't go into the dishwasher since it comes out worse than before. I wish this was disclosed before I bought it.

Author: Cody Nelson
Title: Broke the first use!
Body: BROKE THE FIRST USE! This was bought off of our wedding registry and I am SO upset it broke the very first use. Cannot express how disappointed we are

Author: BJackson
Title: Great overall general blender
Body: Ordered this to replace a standard $40 blender. Very nice product and I the little features like the pouring cap on the lid and the removable blade. Cleans pretty easy and the most important part, it blends very well compared to what we had before.

Author: Sarah M.
Title: I love this blender!
Body: I use this for morning smoothies every day and it's amazing! I get easily annoyed with blenders so I needed one that would just mix everything up the first time and not leave chunks. This one is perfect.The only bad thing is sometimes food gets stuck under the blades, since they're removable, and the dishwasher doesn't always get it. A quick rinse takes care of that, though. Easy to care for.

Author: J. Boland
Title: suction on the bottom is fantastic.
Body: Use my ninja almost everyday for protein shakes. Does the job, durable, suction on the bottom is fantastic.

Author: Tisma Bradford
Title: It was recommended by a family member and I couldn’t be more ...
Body: I’m really enjoying this product. It was recommended by a family member and I couldn’t be more pleased with it!

Author: Patricia F Johnson
Title: Ice Fabulous
Body: fabulous ice quality , easy to use cups are perfectly for.busy morning blending keto shakes . makes low carb desserts.

Author: Káiser_RS.30
Title: Estado Perfecto
Body: Tal como lo describe el producto, todo llegó sin problemas y en perfecto estado.

Author: MK
Title: Ninja Professional Countertop Blender
Body: This product is very good and value for money. I use it very regularly, the small jars are very handy to make milk shakes and fruit juices every day.

Author: L. Adams
Title: Poor materials, cracked.
Body: This blender cracked in three places after only a couple of weeks of light use. It now leaks and is held together with duct tape. Very disappointing.

Author: Taylor
Title: This blender is amazing!!!
Body: I’ve had a crap wal mart blender for as long as I can remember and this is gold. It blends everything up no problem and super quick! It takes seconds to make a smoothie! Before it took me a good 20-30 minutes to get to a good consistency. Super satisfied!

Author: IK
Title: $8 coupler broke, ninja's solution: replace the whole unit ($100)
Body: Coupler drive that has aluminum threads broke after a couple years of use. It is a common issue among blenders that use similar design to my understanding and most other companies offer replacement part. Couldn't find anything online. Called ninja customer service and no luck. They said the whole base needs to be replaced even though motor works just fine. Very disappointed. Epoxied it for now, hopefully it holds up.

Author: s Bias
Title: Review on Ninja Blender
Body: I don’t like having to hold the single serve button down, while mixing smoothie etc.The machine is very loud, otherwise works/blend well.

Author: Sushar
Title: ... am going to put an Indian twist to this amazing product. While you can use this blender for ...
Body: I am going to put an Indian twist to this amazing product. While you can use this blender for juicing and other regular stuff, this blender made great vada and dosa batter! Hands down the vadas have never come out so well!!! Totally recommend it for all your indian grinding and blending needsps: for non Indian folks who are curious to know what vadas are, they are basically savory donuts, try it out next time you are in an Indian restaurant!

Author: Lisa O'Sullivan
Title: Great blender for the price!!!
Body: Love this blender!!

Author: Penny zaunbrecher
Title: The best blender I’ve ever owned
Body: Love this blender!! Use it daily, sometimes twice a day!!

Author: The Lightning Count
Title: Great blender
Body: I was skeptical about a blender being worth this much money, but it really is.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Christmas gift.
Body: I bought this for my Grandson and his wife for Christmas. I liked that I could have it sent to them since they are in the service. They like all that the Ninja does and the extra cups that come with it. Having fun as newlyweds experimenting with the Ninja.

Author: Lynda McDuff
Title: Great blades
Body: Liked the blender and two cups.

Author: katherine aldape
Title: Love it.
Body: This is a great product, works better then most blenders I have used in many years.

Author: AM
Title: Perfectly
Body: I cannot say enough great things. My family and I use this daily for our milkshakes, protein shakes and smoothies... this thing is AMAZING. We absolutely love the single serve option (I bought an extra two of these and they’re perfect as well!). Great quality. Very happy customers!

Author: hibiscusbeauti
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love my blender. It turns everything into a finely ground, smooth consistency. It's very easy to clean and use.

Author: Kimberly
Title: 5 stars
Body: So far so good! This is just exactly what I have wanted. Worked great. If I find anything wrong down the road I will update my review. 5 stars! Cheers!!!

Author: jodi ferris
Title: Ice crushing machine
Body: Amazing! Use it daily for my keto coffee! The attachments make it easy to take and go! Also it crushes ice without leaving little ice chips in your drink

Author: Art
Title: As advertised
Body: Had for couple of months, does as advertised, no problems or issues

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Disappointed: Mold in tops
Body: I purchased this product in February 2018 and loved it for the first couple of months. I used it daily, washed the tops immediately after use, and never put them away wet. Sadly, the original single serve tops developed mold around the inner seal. I called customer support and they sent me a new top at no charge. They also recommended that I could wash the inner ring of the top with a toothpick or qtip. I received the new top and followed the customer service representative's cleaning suggestions. A few months later, the same mold problem developed on the new top. I called customer service again. This time they had no further suggestions for preventing the mold and wanted me to pay for a new single serve top plus shipping and handling. I do not want to purchase another top when based on my experience it will develop a mold issue. I called hoping that the company had come up with a solution for the successful cleaning of their product. Unfortunately, that was not the case. I believe that this product has a poor design and is not worth the cost. I will be investing in a higher quality blender in the near future.

Author: RA
Title: Jams easily; does not work well with frozen fruit
Body: This blender just doesn’t work well. I’ve had it for 7-8 months and it’s already wearing out and smells like something is burning when I use it. I’ve never been able to get it to chop frozen fruit well and it jams easily. This was a big disappointment.

Author: Phillip
Title: Awesome!
Body: Great little blender if you like to make shakes, smoothies or protein drinks.

Author: Trudy
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great!

Author: Alisa
Title: I like this better than my revita-mix!
Body: Wow! This blender is amazing. It is so easy to use and clean and it is SO Powerful! It is amazing.

Author: Jessica Dominguez
Title: Best smoothie/protein shakes maker.
Body: Thank you all blenders work perfectly. Makes AMAZING smoothies. It crushes ice very good too.

Author: Linwe
Title: So far so good
Body: Preliminary results. Shipping was not so great, came from about 60 miles and took nearly a week.As for the product, I have used the single serve cup option about half a dozen times and it seems to work as promised. Easy fill/blend/clean. Super easy to use. I'm glad I chose this one, and I will update when I use the big giant 72oz scary six blade blender.Update: I used the blender to make hummus, it ended up way smoother than I have been able to get in other machines. Again, so it far so good.

Author: Jesse
Title: Lasted shorter than I expected
Body: This was a great blender for about only a little over a year. I use it about 6x a week making smoothies every morning. I clean the blade cap every time after use. Not sure if I'm supposed to clean the base since nothing gets onto it, but this is what it looks like after a short year. The rubber seems to have all worn off and there's always a burning rubber smell after each use. It hasn't completely stopped but I don't want to wait to find out what happens when it completely fails.

Author: Hay
Title: Amazing crushing pwoer
Body: This product exceeded my expectations

Author: Dennis B
Title: Amazing
Body: This blender is amazing no negatives

Author: MATT K
Title: Five Stars

Author: Christy Kuna
Title: Best ever
Body: Love! I had been using a 50 dollar store bought blender from a reputable brand and it was incredibly loud, hard to clean, and a third the time it didn’t sit on the pedestal correctly. Then I get the ninja and my life is changed. I have to drink meal replacement daily for dietary reasons - this blender is amazing. Tight fit, easiest to clean, great speed and chopping/blending. What’s not to love??

Author: debra vallier
Title: Makes great ice cream in minutes!
Body: Second one I've purchased, great product.

Author: Amazon Customer

Body: I really like this blender it works a lot better than the blenders I've had in the past.

Body: Easy to use, easy to clean.

Author: Lucero Boitez
Title: Three Stars
Body: one of my cup lids was broken

Author: Becky
Title: love my ninja
Body: I love it. Easy to use and clean, so glad my nephew talked me into it.

Title: Works great!
Body: As far as I can tell it's a real Ninja, not a knock off and I haven't had any issues with it and have been using the individual cups daily. Have not used the big pitcher yet.

Body: I bought this blender mainly to make smoothies. It works great! Blends my kale, pineapple, banana smoothies perfectly!

Body: I really like this product that I bought! I had the nutribullet which I ran into difficulties with as far as mixing my smoothies. It had a major defect so I trashed it! Bought this as I read the reviews on it & am glad I did buy it! Very easy to clean up too! Very powerful so am very happy with this purchase.

Title: THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST PRODUCTS YOU CAN BUY NINJA ALSO MAKES A BETTER ...

Title: I love it

Author: Gabby
Body: Such an awesome and powerful blender. Highlight: the individual blender-So much less cleaning needed. Blades are super easy to remove and clean

Author: Thomas A McDavitt
Title: Easy to set up
Body: Came well packaged with no damage. Easy to set up. Works awesomely for smoothies. I use frozen fruit to make my smoothies and this blends the frozen fruit to smooth consistancy with very little noise. Has been easy to clean as long as you rinse it out right away after use.

Author: Corgilover
Title: Five Stars
Body: I LOVE this. it can do a smoothie very quickly without having to spend $500,

Author: Ryan J Deaton
Title: My old blender was fine. These end up being too thick
Body: I use it for making smoothies but they are never right. My old blender was fine. These end up being too thick.

Author: Randy
Title: Problem with spout cover on lid. Customer service not very helpful.
Body: The ninja works well at blending from my experience but there are some quality and customer service concerns.There is a small clear plastic cover that goes over the pour spout of the LID. This item is known to break off but there is no replacement available anywhere.I contacted Ninja customer service and they told me that I would have to purchase an entirely new pitcher/lid combo. Customer service did offer me a 10% off coupon but even after applying it the price comes out to over $70 after tax/shipping.So due to a defective piece of plastic that is guaranteed to break, I have to spend $70 each time? Might be cheaper up front for a Ninja than a vitamin mixer or blending technicians but if you have to spend $70 each time a cheap piece of plastic breaks then costs will catch up/surpass pretty quickly.I was able to find just a lid by itself on Amazon/Ebay for about $40, but this is still too expensive just to address a part that will inevitably break.I can't justify the price of the pitcher/lid or just the lid itself so I'm just covering the opening with my hand when I'm using the blender. Not an ideal situation.

Author: Candice
Title: Great product
Body: Great product. Use the single cups often. Very convenient and quick.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Blender..
Body: We use it regularly for multiple purposes.

Author: Jade T
Title: Don't waste your money on these
Body: I did not purchase through Amazon but in my experience, it did not outperform my $20 blenders. We never used it for ice blending, just blending oats with almond milk and fruits. The first base went out on us in 6 months. Ninja sent a replacement base and 4 months after, it too died.All Ninja said was replacement bases only have 90 day warrantys on them.My $20 blenders outperformed the ninja. Don't waste your money on these.

Author: Katherine Ann Payne
Title: Amazing!
Body: Amazing blender! Got as a wedding gift and absolutely perfect. No issues.

Author: KS2017
