Author: L & L in TN
Title: This blender is a beast!
Body: This blender is a beast!We primarily purchased this blender to make smoothies and salsa and it has greatly exceeded our expectations. The power this machine is impressive and I have yet to bog it down. My sister has one of those overpriced Vitamix blenders, and when she tried this one, she was impressed! Not only was it a quarter of the price of hers, it came with two additional single serve blending attachment.The main blending container is large and is made from plastic. It disassembles easily which is great for when it comes time to clean it. Just be careful, those blades are SHARP!The one thing I am not to fond of is the suction cups on the feet of the blender. Don't get me wrong, they do a great job keeping the unit in place. I just don't see the need for them and they are kind of a pita to remove from a countertop. I feel like each time I move the blender, one of the suction cups is going to rip out of the unit and remain on my counter. It hasn't happened yet, but we'll see how long before it does.Don't waste your money on more expensive blenders, this thing is fantastic!

Author: TW
Title: great blender and handles its shake well
Body: great blender, swallow everything at eaze.

Author: Solenne
Title: Very powerful blender
Body: Very powerful blender. I have used it for tough jobs and it has never failed me.

Author: Katie Clark
Title: Great blender. Probably the best one I’ve had yet
Body: Great blender. Probably the best one I’ve had yet, used to use to Magic Bullet, then Nutri bullet and this blends things up way faster and better. It is also nice to have the option to use self serving cups and a big blender for bigger uses. It takes about 5 seconds, if even, to get my smoothies to the right consistency whereas the others it took about 20-30seconds. And for the price, it is definitely worth it over the others, they were actually more expensive then the Ninja.

Author: S.H.
Title: Not a helpful company, dangerous design flaw in cups
Body: When I began searching for a new blender, I deliberately didn't go with this one because i'd read reviews that claimed plastic was found in smoothies. When those affected reached out to Ninja, they claimed Ninja wasn't very helpful. So, I bought something else.This Christmas I received this blender as a gift. At first, it worked incredibly well-- much better than what I had. But within TWO WEEKS of use, I found plastic shards that looked like fingernail clippings in my smoothie. TWO. WEEKS.I called customer support and they offered to send me a new cup for free as a gesture of goodwill, but then turned around and tried to charge me for shipping costs. Knowing that this is a common problem with their blenders, I thought it was outrageous. 1- if all the cups have the same design flaw, why would sending a new one be any type of remedy, and 2- you're going to ask me to pay for your company's mistakes?I understand there's problems in the world, and that finding plastic in my smoothies made with my $100 blender is the least of them, but give me a break...

Title: My son love his new ninja

I would never recommend this Ninja model!

Title: Great blender!
Body: I’ve been debating spending $500+ on one of those fancy blenders for almost a year. I was overwhelmed by the different models and the crazy expense. I read the reviews of this one and decided to give it a try instead. So far, I’m so happy with this purchase. We make smoothies a few times a week and each time it’s blended the ingredients perfectly. So glad I didn’t spend an arm and a leg to get the quality blender I was hoping for! Highly recommend!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: No smooth smoothies
Body: It doesn’t blend greens well. My black and decker did a better job at blending kale and spinach. The solo serve cups are not portable, the mouth opening doesn’t have a cover. So, I still need to transfer the smoothie to another cup that has a full lid if im taking it to work or to the gym. The only good thing is the large size of the pitcher, and that it blends frozen fruits well, as long as you don’t mix greens. But it’s expensive for something marketed to make smoothies.Also: the solo serve cup lid is very hard to unscrew even for a healthy younger person. I don’t tighten it hard and still have trouble trying to unscrew it. I don’t recommend it for someone with arthritis or the elderly.

My two year old loves pushing the buttons to make his smoothies. Love it and use it all the time!

Title: So disappointed! I bought this blender about 2 years ago ...
Body: So disappointed! I bought this blender about 2 years ago and used it occasionally throughout this time. This blender conked out on me already. When I called Ninja, first they said they couldn't find my registration info even though I definitely registered the product. Next, they said the warranty does NOT apply because I bought it from Bed, Bath and Beyond which only has a 1 year warranty. There's no way this $140 blender should have stopped working. Do not waste your money on Nina products!

Author: Amanda Michelle
Title: Awesome gift!
Body: Bought this as a Christmas/ House warming gift for my Bestfriend. She's been wanting the Ninja with the full sized blender pitcher and the Nutri-cups.I don't have much cause to blend but using this on New Years Eve was amazing! Smoothies come out well blended without crazy chunks and it's quick. Keeps the prolonged noise to a minimum. Easy to clean!

Author: Megan S
Title: A Blender" That Doesn't Blend"
Body: Literally the worst blender on the planet. The blades in the middle are a terrible idea, and the blender does absolutely NOT blend. Smoothies come out super chunky, with huge pieces of greens and ice left because, as mentioned, this thing just kind of cuts things up rather than blend them. It's more similar to a terrible food processor than a blender (and I definitely wouldn't recommend this as a food processor either). Tried to return it and they refused to give us our money back. Trust me... do not waste your money- do NOT buy this thing.

Author: DrSPugh
Title: Top notch blender
Body: This blender is top notch. I purchased 2, one for myself & the other for my mother who also loves it. Doesn’t cost a fortune and can be used for more than margaritas or protein shakes. Ninja has a great reputation & their appliances are known to stand the test of time. Easy to clean too, just avoid distractions when your cleaning the inside or near the blades. The blades can also be removed prior to cleaning the inside of your blender so you don’t have to worry about slicing your hand.

Author: UsefulTool
Title: An excellent blender, an even more excellent deal on Amazon.
Body: Ninja continues to make impressive products for the masses. This blender is no different. My first Ninja product, I couldn't help but have high expectations from their many years of making home appliance products and a portfolio of advertising to back it up.The package you receive here from Amazon is second to none. You will not find a Ninja blender in a big-box store that has the same accessories, for near this price. An incredibly powerful blender with enough power for anything you throw at it - it's 6 blades in the main blending cup will have no problem. The only thing I can foresee being an issue with the blender is the membrane style keys on the body. They feel cheap, and likely to give out before anything else in the blender.Pros:Easy to cleanPowerfulVery attractive on your kitchen counterSuction cup feetIncluded single-serve cupsCons:Button feelSingle serve serving lids do not have a close position. They are open all the time.Overall an excellent buy. You cannot go wrong with most Shark/Ninja products, and this one is no different.

Title: Five Stars

Oh, and the mits are shrinking (man tits)Get this.Also makes for a good booze drinks.

Title: Best Blender Ever, just needs TLC
Body: Love/love this product! It’s our second one....we used our first one almost daily, and it wore out with all the dish washer cycles. It still chopped great, but the top seal and handle wore out. Although it’s dishwasher safe, we’ll hand wash this new one. Best blender we ever owned, and capable of so much more!

Author: Rohit
Title: Good blender for juices but Not for -> dry ingredients/peanut butter
Body: Its good for making smoothies. Blends well if you add water or ice. It will turn yellow if you are using turmuric in your smoothies.Not for dry blending -> Without adding water/ice, we cannot grind dry ingredients like coconut / urad daal paste / chutneys.Also, to make peanut butter, you cannot make a thick paste, you will have to add water and will end up a liquidy panut butter.Also, use a non-stick pan cleaning scrub or the container will easily get scratches.Nothing out of ordinary that other blenders do not have.

Author: fg59

Body: Bought this as a Black Friday deal and love it. The ninja cups are useless for smoothies because they’re 16 oz but maybe I’ll make sugar free icee’s in the summer.

Author: Ana
Title: Four Stars
Body: Works awesome love it wish it was a little quieter but works great

Author: katrina hoyte
Title: Five Stars
Body: love it my smoothie come out nice

Author: Linda Vinecour
Title: Nothing I was doing caused the plastic to wear like that, just normal operational use
Body: I bought this machine a few years ago. It pulverizes everything, safety features worked every time, very noisy. But here’s why I threw it away and gave only one star. The blades are wrapped around a plastic rod. I don’t know why, but after a short time you will see that the black plastic is chopped up in places. I used it for mayonnaise and smoothies, no rocks or bones. Mayonnaise. Nothing I was doing caused the plastic to wear like that, just normal operational use. The best part is....all those tiny bits of plastic are going into your food and in to you. And your kids. Friends of mine have seen the same issue. I’m committed to holistic diet and lifestyle, definitely not into consuming bits of plastic. So in the garbage it went. Purchased good old traditional blender with the little blade at the bottom of the canister, no plastic rods.

Author: Mike Pettit

Author: AJ
Title: DO NOT TOUCH BLADES
Body: This goes with out saying, but I'm a little Klutzy and my first time washing the blades they began to fall off my counter and in order to prevent the blades from falling on a dog I instinctively reached out and caught the blades. That was a BAD mistake. Those blades are SHARP. I would definitely recommend this blender for anyone looking to make smoothies, frappes, and shakes. It is a really powerful and fast working blender. Its a little to tall to fit under the cabinet and I would not recommend putting the blades somewhere other than in the pitcher, because they are so incredibly sharp and could do serious damage to a child's hands if they grabbed them incorrectly.

And frequently, that fight is lost. I don’t want to purchase a new jar, were one available, because I don’t feel this should have happened and I don’t want to toss good money after bad.

Author: Natasha Farias
Title: It blends nicely and is worth the price
Body: I used it once so far. It blends nicely and is worth the price.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Pitcher cracked after first use
Body: Unfortunately after the first use the 72 oz. Total Crushing Pitcher cracked on the bottom on all 4 sides. I did not notice if it came like that or not. At first I did not think it was going to be a big deal until the large pitcher started leaking while using the ninja and subsequently pouring the drink from the pitcher. Will try to get it replaced, otherwise will return

Author: Cali Fab
Title: Nice Purchase... bye bye 7.00 smoothies
Body: I am saving money by not buying smoothies in the morning. Its powerful and it works actually its a beast:). I have not used the cups yet but will try it soon. Got a great deal on Black Friday. Just in case something goes wrong I purchased the warranty for a couple of years. It will pay for itself in the time span.

Author: David stoll
Title: It’s like it’s having difficulty
Body: I got refurbished one and the motor in it runs a little hard. It’s like it’s having difficulty. But it works just sounds a little annoying. Not like the others I have had

Author: Joven DeHerrera
Title: Great purchase
Body: Obsessed! Got this on sale and replaced our bullet and blender with it. It works great I just wish it came with more cups, specifically a smaller one. Unfortunately none of our old cups fit either.

Author: tt1106
Title: Enough power to crush ice and icebergs!
Body: Great blender. Works great and grinds things up, like there's no tomorrow. Makes great salsa too. Caveat: These blades are very sharp!!Love the single serving cups also. They probably get used about 3 times as much as the actual Blender container.

Author: Neil Gaetano Lindberg
Title: Great for baby food!
Body: Just like all my family with one of these: Love it other than the lid. That said, we use the cups on the regular for fresh baby food and it beats the heck out of the Oster and the Magic Bullet we killed. I'd recommend - especially if you're going to blend in the cups.

Author: Josh Crabtree
Title: Make your wife happy, buy her one!
Body: My wife freaked out when I gave her this!... She goes through blenders faster than shoes. Hopefully, this one last for a while!

Author: Samantha Valentine
Title: Love it!
Body: Love it!!!!! I just had a cheap blender before and this is quite the upgrade. It blends fast and efficient. I love that i can just blend one smoothie in the single cup and go. So glad I finally spent the money on it.

Author: Scarlett
Title: This blender is awesome. We have only had it for a little ...
Body: This blender is awesome. We have only had it for a little while, but so far it is great. I have 4 kids making stuff in it daily and it is amazing. There are a lot of blades and it grinds ice like a champ. The individual smoothie cups are the best thing about it so far. Even my 10 year old can handle using them. I am very happy with this purchase after a very long time spent researching blenders but not wanting to spend hundreds for the other brands.

Author: j.t.z
Title: also blade plastic holder with not a good finishing, but is a great one
Body: Little noisy, also blade plastic holder with not a good finishing, but is a great one, i am likening it

Author: ulises javier gonzalez
Title: Three Stars
Body: Ok

Author: Natalie
Title: Great blender
Body: Bought this to replace the same product we'd been using for years. Great smoothies

Author: Amelia Flynn
Title: Easy way to get healthier
Body: I have wanted one of these for a very long time but could not justify spending the money on it. With my New Year's resolution of eating more fruits and vegetables quickly approaching I decided to go ahead and make the purchase. Making smoothies could not be easier! I simply add my fruits and vegetables to the singleserve put the lid on it and blend away. Greatest investment I may have ever made.

Author: Karen A Walsh
Title: Five Stars
Body: I'm giving it as a gift. No real feedback yet. It was requested as a gift though!!

Author: CPR
Title: Five Stars
Body: Just as described!

Author: Cathryn
Title: Ummmmmm. Is this a regift??!!
Body: Very disappointed

Author: Laurel Brown
Title: NOT a good buy
Body: at first i was thrilled... then i realized the single cup was too small and exploded all over my kitchen. the big pitcher is too big for a single because the blades go up too high and make a mess. to add insult to injury i almost sliced my finger off on the blades... having them up high is way too dangerous for anyone

Author: Jamie W.
Title: Great, powerful mid-range blender
Body: Wow. We've had several cheap ($30-40) Oster blenders over 10 years, and thought they were okay until we upgraded to this Ninja on Black Friday sale. We love smoothies but only bothered making them once a week or so because the old blender was hard to clean and not great at processing. This blender is powerful and easily blends frozen fruit, spinach, etc. Large capacity and love that it has suction cups so it will stick to the counter and not jitter around.We also LOVE the two included single-serve cups and blending attachment. My husband and I are now using these every day. Easy to clean (dishwasher safe!) and work wonderfully. They even come with travel lids so you can pop them in the car on the morning commute.Overall, a fantastic option for someone who wants an upgraded blender but isn't ready to splurge on a Vitamix.

Author: Diane Serda Smith
Title: Great Value!
Body: We are loving this appliance! Having made the decision to eat healthier, the individual cups are extremely convenient for morning smoothies and juices. We're using the pitcher for family meals...soups, purees, etc.

Author: Moyshe oofnik
Title: Great power but terrible design.
Body: Stupid design. Square canister with circle blades and nothing on the bottom to encourage blending. Material gets stuck in the corners.

Author: MAIK
Title: Four Stars
Body: Good product and really worth of its value. Highly recommend it compared to other product in the competition.

Author: Jan Michael
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love the single blender attachment for smoothies and for the price you can’t go wrong

Author: Da
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love it!!! I use it everything single day!!

Author: idan
Title: One Star
Body: The vault is not written!!!! Doesn't buy it before you checking it

Author: penname1582
Title: I love this blender
Body: I love this blender. I use the individual sizes to make smoothies quite frequently and couldn't ask for anything more convenient. The full size part of this works really well, can use it to make anything from frozen cocktails to blended soups. I think you will find this is well worth the money to upgrade from a traditional blender.

Author: PETRESCU FP
Title: super. Thank
Body: Got it as a gift, super. Thank you

Author: Min
Title: It's good for the price
Body: try it today. It's good for the price. I made soymilk. Looks good. But it made lot's noise. Will buy vitamix after that.

Author: eunice maize
Title: I purchased based on the great reviews to make my morning smoothie
Body: I purchased based on the great reviews to make my morning smoothie. Unfortunately, the single serving jar won't lock into place making it impossible to use. The single serving jars are useless. I need to return this but its already been opened and used. (The larger container works fine, just not the single size) Has anyone else had this issue? Has any returned a used blender?

Author: William Richardson
Title: Motor is strange
Body: After a few weeks of usage feels like the blade is giving out and sounds like it too. Takes a while to stop turning. Not happy n paid so much. Would like some help checking on what is going on with motor.

Author: Keeley J.
Title: So great
Body: I LOVE this blender! I had weight loss surgery and this thing was a life saver- it blended things perfectly and quickly!

Author: esp
Title: Love this blender
Body: Love this blender. It's very easy to clean and very powerful. It blends your ingredients very quickly and very well.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Am unable to check the Anoka BLENDER now I travelled if I discover fault I will return it

Author: Cindy Tomasso
Title: I'm so pleased with this blender
Body: Finally ablender that blends ice! I'm so pleased with this blender.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I made applesauce in it and it came out better than my usual method of an immersion blender
Body: This was bought for making baby food for a tube fed baby. This works well for this base on what I see so far. Planning on putting the blender food through a strainer to help out. Haven't done this yet but so far no concerns. Ymmv. I made applesauce in it and it came out better than my usual method of an immersion blender.As other people say it is loud. But that should be expected with as much power as it has. I'm good with compromising noise for function.Also as others say, watch out the blades are sharp. Which is a good thing considering its function. They will cut you if you are not careful. They will also fall out of the blender if you are not careful. Easy enough to pull it out ahead of any pouring.

Author: Brian Hartz
Title: Blender cracks easily
Body: Bought this blender in July. It blends well. However in the last week, it has started to crack, from the inside! Have no idea what to do. Please contact me.

Author: juliska
Title: Love this blender
Body: I’ve had this blender for almost 4 months. So far it works great. I’ve really only used it to make smoothies, and I only use it once in a while. It’s big, so u can make a lot at once. I make like 3 smoothies at a time and I love it. I could prob make like 4 or 5 if I wanted. The blades are very sharp so be careful. My friend cut them selves on it when they were putting it together 😑 I like how it comes with the two little cups and little blade to make personal drinks, although I never use that part, it’s a nice added feature. It’s a little loud blending frozen fruit, but that’s expected and it’s not as loud as other cheap blenders I’ve had in the past. The only thing I don’t like about it are the suction cups on the bottom base. I have an extremely tiny kitchen and the only spot I can fit it in is under my cabinets. My cabinets are so low tho that it almost touches the lid of the blender, so when I need to move it out to take the lid off the suction cups won’t let it move and it’s just annoying for me lol. No one else will prob have a problem like this and it doesn’t effect how it works, just me complaining. I love this blender!

Author: Corey L.
Title: Perfect for smoothies
Body: Cant beat the price! It wont beat out the $300+ blenders out there, but if you're like me and just intend to make smoothies and daiquiris then you'll be happy with this purchase.

Author: JJ
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very happy with this product.

Author: Mister E.
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it.

Author: CMG
Title: Don’t ever buy a ninja product.
Body: Don’t ever buy a ninja product. Broke after the first week. Can’t lock it in. Absolute garbage. And then they will charge you 20$ just to ship you a replacement peice

Author: linda ngatcha
Title: Five Stars
Body: excellent blender. job well done. thank you.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender for smoothies. Love it!!!

Author: nr
Title: Five Stars
Body: good quality

Author: Jason A. Withers
Title: Believe it or not stands up better and is quiet compared to industrial models that we ...
Body: Bought for a 36 seat bar in a restaurant. Believe it or not stands up better and is quiet compared to industrial models that we had.

Author: enrique
Title: Great blender for decent price!!!
Body: Used a regular blender to make shakes that were chunky with pieces of fruit and kale. Now there are smooth like butter!!

Author: Elizabeth C
Title: Horrible piece of plastic no customer service lid broke in under 60 days
Body: I purchased this from a retailer (not Amazon) after less than 60 days the lid seal was not working and the plastic spout cover broke. I have called the warranty department transferred and then auto message told me to call back, sent an instant message on Facebook and no response. For an $80 Blender you would expect some customer service.

Author: George Lutz
Title: Great for shakes
Body: Only used so far for milk shakes and worked great. Ground up the ice with no problems.

Author: rasha tannous
Title: Hello we try to use the blender its didnt work ...
Body: Hello we try to use the blender its didnt work and its start fireSo pleas what we can do??????????

Author: Dee
Title: Love this blender
Body: Love this blender! I have yet to find something I don't like about it, maybe how stinking sharp the blades are but they suppose to be. I love the fact the blades in the main blender actually goes all way up the shaft, making more evenly blended, crushed. This is also extremely powerful and I am grateful there are suction cups to hold the unit in place.

Author: Steve L
Title: Jink. Don't buy this blender.
Body: Total junk. It is failing after just a few months of basic use for whey shakes. Will buy another brand next time.

Author: Aris Hernandez
Title: I enjoy using the Nutri Nija cups for my shakes
Body: I enjoy using the Nutri Nija cups for my shakes. They're convenient and easy to use and clean. I am rating this 2 stars because the Blender pitcher itself stopped working after 1 year. In my perspective, The Nutri Cups are actually sturdier and made with thicker plastic than the pitcher. There is a limited 1 year warranty, not worth it. I am saving my money now to buy a better blender and I am steering away from Ninja blenders forever.

Author: George
Title: Super Powerful, Very Sturdy Construction
Body: Super Powerful, Very Sturdy Construction, Super Convenient, Multi-Use. A steal at the Black Friday Sale Price!

Author: Kara
Title: Best money I’ve ever spent on a blender
Body: Best money I’ve ever spent on a blender. I tend to use the single serve cups more, so it’s nice that there are 2 of them.

Author: sunluvinbug
Title: Five Stars
Body: This thing gets it done and is very easy to clean!

Author: K
Title: The whole family loves it
Body: I bought a refurbished Vitamix about 8 years ago and I've had nothing but problems with it. I tried returning it three times and I kept getting back the same unit claiming it was fixed. Finally, I gave up, swore off Vitamix, and bought a Ninja. I must say, I am impressed. It has taken everything I have thrown at it so far. With the individual cups that can be used ion the blender, my daughter has taken a liking to it. She wants to make smoothies all the time now. So not only did I get a better blender, My daughter is getting more fruits and vegetables in her diet. Score!

Author: MITRANI GILA
Title: Wrong item was sent to me. The product is ...
Body: Wrong item was sent to me.The product is 110volt, in iarael there is only 220 volt, it doesn't work.It wasn't mention it fit only 110 volt,It's use less

Author: Kristie K
Title: Quality blender
Body: Product was packaged well. The Ninja blender has a real quality feel to it, and looks well engineered. It blends ice good in the main container as well as the single serve ones. I replaced a Waring pro model I had for 20+ years with this one because the plastic bottom finally gave out. The one thing I noticed right away with the Ninja is its squareness limits where you can store it. My Waring was round and fit in the wine rack. Also the suction cups on the base of the unit can be annoying when moving it or while in storage. I leave it sideways to avoid it sticking in the cupboard. Overall I like the Ninja blender, only time will tell if the hardened plastic will hold up as well as thick glass.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Works better than I imagined
Body: Amazing!

Author: Dr. Who
Title: Perfect for smoothies
Body: Perfect for smoothies

Author: Felix Shrayber
Title: Five Stars
Body: very satisfied!

Author: Sue
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender!

Author: It's-Just-Me
Title: Ninja rocks ice like candy
Body: I bought this to crush ice for Fraps.....used it once with the ninja cup, crushes solid ice like candy! Extremely satisfied so far but I will update if anything negative comes up. Have not used this actual blender yet....

Author: craig johnson
Title: More throw away junk.
Body: It blends great but after less than a year it is no longer working. I am the only one who uses this in my household and use it for an occasional smoothie 3-4 times a week.If I break it down, it costs $1.00 for each use.Yeah it blends but for the price and number of uses you will get from this blender it’s not worth it at all. Look for a better quality name.

Author: Khloe Mason
Title: Fantastic!
Body: This blender is very powerful. It makes great smoothies and crushes small ice cubes. My only caveat is to run it intermittently so it protects the motor from burning out. This means pressing the pause button and waiting several seconds in between blending cycles. So glad I bought this. Great price too.

Author: tina
Title: Loving the individual Ninja cups!
Body: So far I love it! Really love the feature of the Ninja cups, I mainly got it to make smoothies, and it is so nice to not have to deal with a big pitcher after you make them. I can make individualized smoothie for my girlfriend and myself, since she is not a fan of bananas. The blender engine seems powerful, although louder than I expected. Sorry neighbors! One other surprise is the suction feet on the bottom of the unit, they are very powerful! I have to really yank the unit to get it off the counter. Which I guess is a good thing cause it does not move around when you blend. I'm a little weary of the blade that goes in the pitcher. Since it doesn't lock, the lid does. Just mean you'll have to be careful about using it. Use your common sense and double check to make sure the lid is locked before you blend/pour.

Author: KingOfTheAsylum
Title: Five Stars
Body: love that you can blend right in the cups themselves instead of having to get everything dirty.

Author: Theresa S. Barger
Title: Five Stars
Body: This blender lives up to its reputation. It's fast and powerful.

Author: AJ
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great gift, thank you for delivery.

Author: Gustavo Gonzalez
Title: Great quality
Body: I love this blender. I bought it for my Bariatric surgery smoothies and purée diets. It works great!

Author: Victor Khazanov
Title: This item is not compatible with Israel Voltage standard. ...
Body: This item is not compatible with Israel Voltage standard. It was not described . To return the item costs 216$ . The price with shipment was 131$.

Author: EBB
Title: Great size. Durable
Body: Great size. Durable. Lots of add on items for make it even more fun to work with. Good purchase.

Author: Gabriela torres
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love my blender tanks

Author: Theloniusphere
Title: Get one!
Body: This is the most awesome kitchen appliance I have ever owned! The three stacked blades in the pitcher really do the trick and they do it fast. I would buy it again and highly recommend it to those who do any blending or food processing.

Author: Andy Kenkel
Title: I love this blender
Body: I love this blender. I use the blender cups every day. Only reason I did not give a 5Star is because I think they could have designed the kids better. The blade screws on the outside of the cup but the lids on the inside which makes it hard to unscrew.

Author: Chris
Title: Great Blender
Body: I just bought this blender and have only used it one time, but it is by far the best blender that i have ever used. I highly recommend!

Author: Shawn McAdams
Title: My smoothies FINALLY taste professionally made!
Body: I just got this today and I am so happy with it! I previously had the Ninja IQ, single serve blender and decided to upgrade because the price was so good. I’ve been through multiple brands of single serve blenders and they have all worked nicely, but not a professional quality like this one. The assembly was easy, and so was clean up! I am always making smoothies with ice and mostly frozen produce & the smoothie I just made is comparable to Smoothie king or Planet Smoothie in terms of quality (which is what I’ve been hoping for). The ice blends up so quickly and smoothly! No more paying $6-$8 a Smoothie for me, this is absolutely amazing for the price.

Author: Famila klier
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love this product but I've only had it two weeks and the price has gone down $20. Dissappointing

Author: Moshe
Title: Broke after first use
Body: I used it once then it broke. It won’t blend. Power light keeps blinking. I read online that it has to be aligned correctly but I checked all areas and it looks fine. I tried to return or exchange it but it needs to be in original packaging which I threw away. Very disappointed.

Author: M.N.
Title: Does the Job Well
Body: Bought this as a gift for our married daughter for her birthday and she loves it! They do smoothies in it often and it blends the frozen fruit smoothly with hardly any chunks. The only drawback is the loud noise it makes when operating so you don't want to do it if your kitchen is close enough to sleeping people in bedrooms.

Author: Midwest Builders
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love this blender! I use the single serving cup on a nearly daily basis. Blends quickly and smoothly.

Author: Stephany Garcia
Title: it is very excellent. well worth the 60-ish bucks
Body: I have tried the Magic Bullet, Nutribullet, and Ninja Professional Blender. All I can say is that the Ninja Professional Blender had no problem with making my smoothies, blending my frozen fruit, and chunky peanut butter with ease.The only thing I wish is that my 2 16oz smoothie cups came with closable lids. the lids have an open lip to drink from but if you are a total klutz you may end up with smoothie all over your floor.Besides that, it is very excellent. well worth the 60-ish bucks.

Author: Kristina
Title: This is the best blender I've ever had
Body: This is the best blender I've ever had. I needed something for morning smoothies that would easily cut through frozen fruit, this did the job!

Author: Cory
Title: I was happy with the price and heard good reviews
Body: I was happy with the price and heard good reviews. I was upset that it was shipped in a box that had Ninja blender all over it. So if your ordering it for a gift watch out

Author: Tatiana Rivera
Title: Great purchase
Body: Does a great job blending. It is used A LOT in my home and no complaints so far.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Four Stars
Body: its a decent blender i paid over 80 for it literally 2 days ago...... laaaaaaaaaaaame

Author: LucLiLove
Title: Stopped Working!!! Doesn’t Hold up!
Body: Very disappointed. Only 3 years later and the base stopped working for the single serve cup. I contacted support and was told I needed to buy a new motor base for $99.95. Yet it costs $50 here on Amazon? I also purchased a replacement cup and blade for $30 thinking that was the issue...so basically it would be cheaper to just purchase a whole new unit!? Hate having to replace things I just recently purchased. 😡

Author: Jennifer Liffick
Title: This is an overall great product.
Body: This professional blender is great for making smoothies, milkshakes, purée, and so much more. The individual cups make it great for when your on the go and don’t want the extra hassle. The blades are very powerful and grind the ice and other frozen food until it’s smooth. This bundle is great because it comes with the two cups instead of having to buy them separately. The blender is easy to store and very easy to use. This is an overall great product and makes a great gift for the cook of thefamily.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: defected
Body: i never write reviews. this is my very first time. we bought this item a few months ago and only after only 1 use it stopped working and we can't even return it bc we missed the time window of returning it. we feel we were ripped off.

Author: MomotheHoHo
Title: A Work Horse in the Kitchen
Body: I love the Ninja blender! It has replaces my food processor. Easy to use, clean, store and it does an great job blending frozen fruit. I love that it's light.

Author: Ann S.
Title: The best purchase! I use the small blenders all the ...
Body: The best purchase! I use the small blenders all the time for smoothies.

Author: Matthew
Title: One Star
Body: It don't work period had to return and this product is crap don't buy it.

Author: Alexa Muhlbach
Title: I've just purchased this and I absolutely love it. Using the single serve cup it takes ...
Body: I've just purchased this and I absolutely love it. Using the single serve cup it takes less then 10 seconds to perfectly blend frozen fruit, kale, and ice for the perfect smoothie. No chunks like my previous blender which took over 30-60 seconds to not even blend this well.

Author: Ma
Title: Extremely Disappointed in Ninja!
Body: Extremely disappointed in the Ninja Professional Blender! It didn’t even last a year! Went to make a protein Shake and it didn’t fit anymore. Can not comprehend how this could happen!

Author: Kevin
Title: The 9 cup blender top part broke I have never ...
Body: The 9 cup blender top part broke I have never used this part. We had used single cups with no problem. The release button just broke off. Do not buy this product.

Author: Diana Gomez
Title: Five Stars
Body: I love this product

Author: BitsandChits
Title: Brittle jars
Body: I purchased this at Best Buy. I have had no problems whatsoever with the blender itself, but the jars keep cracking, no matter how carefully I handle it, it cracks after a few months, and it's reached the point in the 1-year warranty where Ninja will no longer replace them. If they'd continued replacing the jar, I'd have provided a much better rating. It's upsetting, because I love the blender itself.

Author: Jinx
Title: Great blender
Body: I haven't used the blender itself that much but I used the individual portion attachment all the time. It's quick and efficient. It's so much more stable than others I've used in the past.

Author: Bonnie H
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it! My coworker recommended it.

Author: Drawmonster
Title: Amazing blender
Body: Really great blender that makes other blenders pale in comparison

Author: David
Title: Great value for a fantastic blender
Body: We love our Ninja! It consistently blends a variety of ingredients with ease. We have used a family member's high priced Blendtec blender and this one consistently outperforms it. The Blendtec seems to have trouble even with a basic smoothie or crushing ice. With the Ninja, it's done in a quarter of the time. I really like the three sets of blades; I feel like it is more thorough and faster than just one blade at the bottom. I love to make coconut milk in mine on a regular basis. I was hesitant to get the Nutri Ninja cups but my husband insisted and he was right; I love the ease of making a single smoothie or grinding a small amount of an ingredient for cooking (I used mine to make garlic ginger paste in a snap for an Indian dish the other day). I like that I can put most of it in the dishwasher; I personally choose not to put any blades in the dishwasher to keep them sharp. This blender rocks and I would most definitely buy it again.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: great product

Author: Sara
Title: I recommend this product.
Body: It is so easy to use and clean. I love this product.

Author: happy day
Title: Works great! Love the multi-tiered blades
Body: Works great! Love the multi-tiered blades. It really gets the job done!

Author: Crystal
Title: We love it. We were looking for something similar to ...
Body: We've had this blender for a couple months now. We love it. We were looking for something similar to other high end, very expensive brands but without the price tag. We only use it for smoothies though. With that said, the single cup blenders are wearing out a little faster than I would of hoped. I would probably just buy the blender to save the money on a feature that might not last that long. We recommend!

Author: Judy
Title: Works great. Be careful very sharp
Body: Works great. Be careful very sharp. Six stiches in ring finger. Still like it.

Author: Brad
Title: Life Saver
Body: Life saver. We give my son a bed time smoothie to help him sleep. After we stopped breast feeding it was the only way we could get him to drink his milk. Put in a banana and some almond milk... Boom his favorite.

Author: Ana
Title: Disappointed - warps, leaks, and burns me when I make bulletproof coffee
Body: I decided to splurge when I moved into a new place and by a new blender as my old bullet blender had stopped working. With that one I had mostly made smoothies, occasionally tomato sauces, and had recently gotten into making bulletproof coffee, and had never had any issues until it stopped working, after many years of use. At first I was pretty happy with this blender set, although one thing I didn't understand or care for at all were the suction cups on the base of the blender - I like to move things around in my kitchen, and it's annoying having this one appliance that is constantly stuck to the kitchen counter, especially considering the issues I've had with it. SO the issues: Lately when I've been making my bullet proof coffee, I started noticing that more and more frequently, the smaller size container would start leaking, either before I put it on the base or afterwards. So obviously this was annoying, spilling coffee all over the counter and the base, and I started trying to be more careful, checking the connection to make sure the lid was securely fastened. But I STILL kept having issues, and this reached a BOILING point the other day when I went to take the thing off the base after blending, and it unscrewed itself on the base and hot coffee came squirting up into the air, burning both of my hands and arms, and needless to say, getting all over the counter, fridge, fridge, floor, and blender base. I was pissed. Then I noticed that the blender components seem to have become warped, I assume from the heat, and that's why I have been having issues. Now I looked through the reviews and I see people saying things about how this isn't meant for heat, but I don't remember that being made clear when I bought the dang thing. I just assumed if I was paying like $75 for a blender it would be able to blend hot or cold food like every other blender I have used in my life.

Author: James S. Lenze
Title: I use this every day and many days I use ...
Body: I use this every day and many days I use it more than once a day. It does everything! I use it to make smoothies, lemonade, and grind almonds for almond flour. I left the almond flour in too long one day and found myself with smooth and tasty almond butter. I would buy another in a heart beat! We've had it almost a year and it shows no signs of problems. So, I shouldn't have to buy another soon but when the time comes, it will be a repeat!

Author: bandbplus2
Title: Unlimited power!
Body: I feel like the “Unlimited Power” dude in Star Wars every time I fire this up. First professional grade blender we have owned, and are not dissappointed. The locking base and lid mean you won’t get smoothies everywhere. The single serve cups are nice in that the threads are in the inside of the cup, making it pleasant to drink from. No issues with frozen fruit, too much ice, or anything else. Easy to use. Fill it. Lock it. Push a button. Wait. Pour out the yummy. The removable blade stack up makes cleanup easy, just be careful, blades are very sharp. Would definitely recommend.

Author: emmanuel
Title: One Star
Body: THIs ithem come with not lid

Author: Aaren
Title: Square blender means it won’t thoroughly blend everything - bits ...
Body: Square blender means it won’t thoroughly blend everything - bits a pieces get stuck on the outsides of the blender.Motor is powerful but it doesn’t matter if it can’t reach everything it needs to blend.

Author: Liz
Title: Sold it on Craigslist
Body: I bought this on Prime day and was initially very excited. I just can't get past the blade design...this makes stirring in between blending (or taste testing) a huge pain. This design also means that a mess is made every time; the bulky blade piece drips EVERYWHERE, and it has to be taken out/put back in to stir and taste. Cleaning the blades is also cumbersome. I was also not impressed with how this blade design handles chia seeds. I thought my mom's Oster from the 70's that she donated to me did a better job of this (RIP old school blender). This unit is HUGE. Also, the plastic container seems a bit flimsy (I prefer glass, but didn't think to check before buying this). These barriers made me reconsider every smoothie/blender recipe, so I decided to sell it on Craigslist and use that money to buy a new Oster blender with a glass bowl and more powerful motor. Luckily I was able to make my money back...and then some :)

Author: Gerda Presson
Title: It's good for the price
Body: For the price I thought it was quite good, but then I got an amazing promotional opportunity on a Blendtec. The Ninja just didn't compare and so I returned it.

Author: Crystal
Title: Five Stars
Body: This is good.

Author: Disney Nut
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender for making smoothies! Very powerful.

Author: Valleri Nichols
Title: I love this blender but my lid broke and it does ...
Body: I love this blender but my lid broke and it does not work without the lid opening and closing properly.

Author: Mario
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great 4 our smoothies

Author: Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: This blender works really good. Would recommend Y'all.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Intimidating at first, luckily this one comes with the small blender too!
Body: So when my husband bought this I got upset because it's expensive plus it was absolutely huge but then I realised that it came with like a bullet sized version of the blender part with a small blade and everything and it's pefect! Easy to clean and use if it's just 1 smoothie you're makin, not so heavy and intimidating. Plus if I wanted to make enough for both of us the big version is there too. It's honestly the quality of the blenders we used when I worked at a smoothie place. Although I will say if you have minimal bench real estate then this is not for you.

Author: Anne
Title: Single serve base leaks!
Body: We purchased this blender almost two years ago. It worked really well for about a year. Then the base with the single serve blade started to leak. After it started to overheat and our smoothies tasted burnt! We contacted customer service and they did replace the blade, but it continues to overheat. If you are mainly planning to use the larger blender, this should work fine. But if you plan to use the single serve blade often, I would look elsewhere! We have been disappointed.

Author: PM, Ottawa
Title: does exactly what we were hoping so happy with the purchase
Body: Works quite well but have had it for a short time so cannot comment on durability. The blender is quite sizable. Tried blending spinach but had to occasionally open the jar and push the leaves down to allow them to get caught and blended. The blades are very sharp so watch out when cleaning them. The base senses what is on top (big jar or the single serve jar) and illuminates the appropriate buttons. In short, does exactly what we were hoping so happy with the purchase.

Author: Beth A. Mistretta
Title: Wonderful Blender.
Body: Love this blender. I use it for smoothies for me and frozen dog treats for my dogs. Works great!

Author: Lauren
Title: Great!
Body: Very impressed. I have used it to make smoothies and baby food so far.

Author: JRPM
Title: LOVE Ninja brand!
Body: Bought it during Prime Day, BEST deal ever! Came with so much accessories for less than $100!

Author: Phoenix
Title: Defective, non functional single serve jar
Body: The large jar works pretty well. i have made pesto, grinded onions n tomatoes in it. Used it to make milk shakes, smoothies. However the small jar does not work at all. I hate to use the bigger jar even when I m making a single serve smoothie or milk shake. Its quite disappointing to get a defective part. I realized it pretty late after receiving it, lesson learnt test everything immediately upon receiving it.

Author: LK
Title: Five Stars
Body: Much better than the last (cheaper) Ninja we owned.

Author: Johnny Rivera
Title: Three Stars
Body: Love it! Use it everyday!

Author: L.H
Title: Great deal.
Body: Works exactly how I want it to. Great deal.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Amazing blender, can blend practically anything you want. Makes for super easy smoothies and protein shakes.

Author: Bridget S.
Title: We love our Ninja
Body: We love our Ninja. I was afraid to purchase this, thinking it would be hard to use or clean. It's so easy. My kids can even use it. We make smoothies every day. Buy with confidence!

Author: Ash Miller
Title: Awesome blender!
Body: This blender is awesome! From shakes and malts to salsa verde it works great. We really like the individual cups. Only complaint is all the nooks and crannys in the lid. It makes it a little tricky to clean.

Author: Gerd04
Title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this blender
Body: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this blender. It works great on ice and even when using the single serve containers it works amazingly. I use it daily for my iced coffees and it completely blends every time.

Author: William C Kirk
Title: Two Stars
Body: it not good

Author: Stuart Williams
Title: Cracks on the base with very little use
Body: This is my second Ninja Blender. I went with the bigger model hoping for some more durability. The base of both of my blenders develops cracks and when used leaks out on to the counter. I have only hand washed this and used it sparingly, thinking that the lack of overuse would make the second one last. This is not the case. This blender is not durable. And if this is the way that all Ninja blenders are then I would recommend you find another blender or save your money for one that doesn't break.

Author: Jess
Title: Love it, just one flaw.
Body: I love this blender. They biggest issue is the threading. It is so hard to get the tops off after blending because the threads are on the inside. So liquids and seeds can get lodged, barricading the top like Fort Knox making the removal of the lid a pain in the behind.

Author: AS
Title: Broken after 3 months
Body: Great while it worked. Purchased on July 17, almost exactly 3 months ago. Today I went to use it and the power didn't turn on I plugged it into various outlets thinking it was the fuse. Not sure if it can be replaced by the seller or if I have to just eat the cost. Either way it's too soon for this thing to break.

Author: LAC
Title: I make a lot of fruit smoothie. My old ...
Body: I make a lot of fruit smoothie. My old blender had a problem with frozen fruit. The Ninja works perfectly and has no issues.

Author: Mike
Title: Great Kitchen Blender
Body: I use this every morning for breakfast smoothies! It's perfect & the additional cups are a great team with this blender. It def crushes ice & seeds. This was a great purchase for our kitchen. Would recommend to anyone

Author: Sydney B.
Title: Fantastic
Body: I love it! I had no idea how much I would like the single serving option but it's amazing.

Author: Limlim
Title: Great Purchase
Body: Was worth it, loved the additional cups and its very strong, I use it for both dry powder and smoothies too and it works just fine.

Author: Mariah Hardy
Title: Great blender! I don't have to keep stopping it ...
Body: Great blender! I don't have to keep stopping it and pushing the fruits and veggies down. The long blending blade gets it all moving! It is really loud!

Author: Fernanda Medina
Title: Five Stars
Body: Best all around blender out there

Author: Dawn F.
Title: I have had a terrible experience with this Ninja blender and this company
Body: I have had a terrible experience with this Ninja blender and this company. We bought this blender and immediately noticed that it had four spiral cracks starting from the bottom of the pitcher where manufacturer made hole is that the blade attaches to (*see photos attached to this review). After many long waits on hold with the company, I was finally able to get a replacement that took about a month to arrive. Their customer service representatives were very rude and were accusing me of having done something to crack the blender pitcher; however, a quick google search will reveal that there are many people experiencing these same uniform spiral cracks on the bottoms of their Ninja blender pitchers. Then, my replacement pitcher had the same exact cracks that began to spread from the bottom of the pitcher. Again, I called them for a replacement and was treated poorly. They said my one-year warranty was up. I argued that I did not have the replacement pitcher for a year, and that they replaced my cracked pitcher with another cracked pitcher and should therefore provide me with a pitcher that is not broken. It is obviously a factory defective, faulty item. This blender is of low quality and not built to last. Do not buy it.

Author: Jay
Title: It's discouraging knowing that my other blender that I paid less for was a much better product than this one that was $40 more
Body: My previous ninja I owned lasted about 8 years and the reason I bought this one was that we had lost the other when we moved.. As far as the product I rate it as a 2 star due to the fact that 3 months of using it the base started to split. As you can see in this photo we have a crack all the way up the side of the blender with the smoothie coming out the sides and the bottom. It's discouraging knowing that my other blender that I paid less for was a much better product than this one that was $40 more. I do love the brand so I will be purchasing another but not sure on this blender.

Author: Stephen
Title: Works amazingly
Body: Not good at small batches but thats what you can you the single use for. Otherwise, no complaints, I love it

Author: Mike D (Oregon)
Title: Decent, arrived broken but fixable, and odd cups?
Body: Its a pretty good blender, i've not had any issues with it.There's one confusing piece though, it came with a couple of cups and these cups attach to the blender, but the blades are far too big to fit inside the little cups. I can only assume there's another blade i have to buy. Why would this come with the extra cups that attach and not a blade?Aside from the awkward cups that cant really be used, everything works well, its strong, and it even has suction cups on the bottom to help it stick to the table. I did have an issue with the lid, i heard something rattling inside and opened it up to find a small L shaped metal piece lose from some spot it had to go in. I was able to put it back and so far it hasnt come back out.

Author: 54dinner
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great

Author: Jennifer W

Blends everything fabulessly fantastic has a fantastic feature to be able to make just one or multiple servings. That is extremely convenient for myself. Sometimes I only want to make myself just one for the night. An absolute fantastic purchase!

Author: Donna Holmes
Title: Nice blender
Body: Turns ice into snow. Great for drinks and pureed soup.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: works fast, crush ice seamlessly. it has blades ...
Body: works fast, crush ice seamlessly. it has blades on the bottom and middle which help it pulverize everything through the blender, not just the bottom.

Author: Abraham the vampire apprentice
Title: New no I got used. Fruit spillage on Outside. WTF
Body: I would give it 5 stars if the thing didn't arrive and show fruit spillage and someone didn't clean it up due too Laziness. I was supposed too receive a new one.. Disappointing. Especially. since the fruit is stuck on the outside because. someone let it go whoever. had it before. me.

My old ninja, fortunately was given to me as a christmas gift. I drink shakeology and use this to blend it up everyday in the single serving cups. It blends it up nice & smooth!

Author: 1pete315

Author: purplepanther

Author: Amazon Customer

Body: Love love love it! I am so glad that I brought this. Family is making multiple smoothies and need a high power large blender and this is perfect.

Author: Angel Moore

Author: buching

Body: Very good product and highly recommended.

Author: alicia

Body: Closing the lid is Mathmatical.

Author: miyako
Title: Five Stars
Body: Excellent blender!

Author: Frank
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great for making protien shakes.

Author: illegalmonkie
Title: PROS --Blends incredibly quickly. This thing was made to ...
Body: PROS--Blends incredibly quickly. This thing was made to crush frozen fruit--Easy to use...simple buttons and clear blend options--Sturdy--Suction cups on bottom of blender for no-slip usageCONS--Awkward to fill up sometimes due to their blade design--Lid is a bit bulky, but can be seen as a safety 'feature' I guess--Single-serve cups could be a bit wider...a bit smaller/narrower than some of the other competitor 'single' serve blender cups

Author: anonymous
Title: ... work as well as the Vitamix 3700 would not recommend.
Body: does not work as well as the Vitamix 3700 would not recommend.

Author: Nia
Title: impossible to get a replacement pitcher
Body: It is a nice blender however the pitcher is very weak and cracked within a year. Finding a replacement pitcher is impossible so at the moment i can use it only with the two little containers. I would rate it much higher if it were possible to obtain a replacement pitcher.

Author: Jen
Title: So far great for individual smoothies
Body: I've had this for a month and use it at least 5 times a week for smootbies. I like how I can make individual smoothies and can use the cup so I don't need to wash the entire blender. I only need to clean the cups I use (which need to washed anyway) and the small blender piece. I do think for smoothies the individual blender is better because the larger blender doesn't seem to blend it small enough. For example, I used kale in the larger blender and found a few larger pieces but none when I use the individual blender. I really hope the individual blender doesn't break like other reviewers said!! I use frozen bananas instead of ice hoping to put less pressure on it

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Thumbs up!
Body: Best blender I've ever purchased! Great for frozen drinks and smoothies.

Author: Dee
Title: Not powerful enough to blend veggies for smoothies.
Body: I make protein shakes almost every morning. I add vegetables and fruit to the mix. This blender will purée the fruit with no problem but the veggies are only partially blended. I wouldn't buy it again. It should be able to handle broccoli slaw or similar.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great product
Body: Strong, easy to use, easy to wash. Very satisfied with it. Love the options of large bowl + 2x single portion cups.

Author: VIRTUOUSWON
Title: Great while it last.....
Body: Works great....and then it doesn't. For the price of these blenders you would think they'd last a while, but they don't. I'm really disappointed and from my reading, this is a common thing. They stop working.

Title: Worth it's price
Body: Great product. I use it for smoothies, and blending... Worked great for my butternut squash soup too.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Worth the $$$$
Body: Oh my gosh! This thing is the Queen of smoothie makers! Smoothie just the way I want it in a snap! Big chunks of ice cubes? Pffft! in a snap, the cubes are ice dust! Wonderful product. It is worth the $$$.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: single serve smoothie cups
Body: Powerful blender, good for ice and smoothies but has trouble getting rid of small particles. I was hoping to use it for mill flax seeds, but 10 min in the blender produces little effect. My last blender had a bullet attachment which I did not expect.And when using single serve smoothie cups, the contents flowed out. I eventually returned.

Author: Shannon
Title: Love the Ninja
Body: Love my Ninja. We make a lot of smoothies. Our old blender took forever and had to be opened several times to get the ice chopped up. The Ninja chops everything right up no problem. The individual cups are easy and convenient.

Author: Enosh Svoray
Title: Cracked after a few weeks, got another one- same thing,
Body: The bottom cracked on about the 20th use, then I received an exchange blender from Amazon and the same thing happened again- don't buy this blender.Before this I used a kitchen aid blender I purchased about 8 years ago and have used it well over 2000 times.

Author: Caroline C.

Author: Alice

Author: Cindy Hunt
Title: good

Author: Krystal Pierre

Author: J. Slowik

Body: Bought this blender a month ago, and already the plastic base of the pitcher has started to have spider cracks and leak. Amazon is helping me out to send a replacement. Hopefully I'll have better luck with #2!If it lasts longer than a month this time w/o cracking, I'll update this review as appropriate!Update 9/23/17 : My replacement blender pitcher has again cracked and is leaking. This is getting very frustrating. Going go contact Ninja directly and see if they have anything to say. Otherwise I sending back for a full refund and going with a different brand, possibly w/ a glass pitcher rather than what appears to be cheap plastic.

The suction cups on the bottom will make sure the blender stays in place. Will be buying more of these as gifts next time prime days comes around.

Then he had to pay a fortune to for them to ship a new motor to him where he is in school in Canada. A company should stand by their product, especially if it is a lemon. Awful. DO NOT PURCHASE>

Author: ev
Title: delighted !
Body: I waited too long to buy an expensive blender and I'm happy with my choice - It was not even that expensive because I got it during xmas in July offers - Basically I wanted one to crush ice to make frozen daiquiris and smoothies. It grinds oranges and limes even with the peel. The personal cup is very very handy. I recommend this product.

Author: Ashley
Title: Five Stars
Body: This is the best blender I've had!

Author: Xajiixa
Title: Four Stars
Body: Good for smoothies. Not so great for salsas.

Author: Christina
Title: Wonderful blender!
Body: I finally killed the motor on my old KitchenAid blender, and so went searching for a new one. I'm not one to normally spend this much money on a kitchen appliance, but I use my blender several times a week, and I killed the motor of the old blender pureeing some butternut squash, so I figured, what the heck - let's for something with power. Oh my goodness - so much power! With my old machine, I'd have to partially defrost frozen fruit for smoothies. Now - nope. Ice for a frappuccino? Not a problem. It make salsa in less than a minute. I haven't tried pureeing a winter squash, yet, but I don't anticipate any issues.To be honest, the power behind this thing will take an adjustment - I've accidentally over-blended my foods several times, now. What once took me 5 minutes now takes 30 seconds. It's not a problem, by any means, just an adjustment period.

Author: Facu

Body: After just over 1 month, the blender stopped working. Every time we tried to turn it on, the power button blinked red. We used the blender (at most) 10 times to make individual smoothies for my children. I tried to exchange it but didn't realize that I couldn't do so after 30 days. I am so very disappointed.

Author: Amazon Customer

Body: This is my favorite household appliance by far. Very versatile in which there's individual smoothie cups as well as the blender itself. It's so powerful and easy to use. If you're searching for the best blender, you won't be sorry with this one.

Author: Maria
Title: I love this blender although it was expensive
Body: I love this blender although it was expensive. We use it for everything but mostly for smoothies. The inner blade mechanism is very wobbly so I have to be careful when cleaning and I think they just came out with a warning about it for Ninja. The blades are very sharp and the blender is very loud too when it's on. We also have the single serve cups so you can just make one smoothie and those work very well. It also has suction cups on the bottom of the blender which I love so it doesn't go tumbling off the counter, everything is plastic so a fall from the counter would definitely break the blender or the carafe.

Author: Karen
Title: Five Stars

Title: Five Stars

Title: This Ninja Blender is One of the best out there.
Body: I've owned many blenders in my lifetime, this is by far the Best one I have ever owned. It makes the most delicious Smoothies and in seconds. So powerful, chops up everything and so easy to clean. I just love it.

Author: Chicago customer
Title: Not At Good As Older Ninja
Body: I have two Ninja blenders. I purchased this one because I was worried my old one might be ready to quit working, and I wanted the single serve cups. This blender does not work nearly as well as my old Ninja. In my old Ninja I can make smoothies that are light and well blended and similar to a frosty. This Ninja doesn't get the ice in small enough particles, and it's more like a slushie. The single serve cups work worse than a regular blender. I feel like I wasted money on this.

Body: Broken. Again. The second product was obviously something another person returned - the torn box was re-taped and the contents were not in original packaging.

Body: This is my 2nd Ninja product. I like this style because I can make single serve in a to go container. Very powerful. Blends up in no time. I got a great deal on this item during the Prime Member sale. I'm very happy with it.

Author: VaGrammie2

Body: I love my Ninja blender. It performs very well making smoothies, milkshakes, and sherbert freezes. It is fast and quick and it is also nice to have a smaller container for making one serving to take with you or use at home. Highly recommend!

Author: BlackSnow
Title: Five Stars

Author: Suba-Prasanna

Author: Oye!
Title: Annoying safety features
Body: The blender is great, but the safety locks on the lid/pitcher are annoying. You have to get all the components to align perfectly/lock to be able to blend anything, but a lot of times it refuses to work even if you've set everything right. Then you have to empty the pitcher, remove the blades, and reinstall / fill everything back up to see if this time you have satisfied all the safety mechanisms. It gets super frustrating after the 2-3rd time the blender randomly believes it's not correctly aligned.

Author: Shelton_50
Title: An honest review on the Ninja Pro from a die hard Foodie.
Body: I didn't want to review this as soon as I got it because I wanted to give my best opinion on the product. That is this thing is amazing! I have basically lived off gazpacho since I bought it. I've made amazing pie crusts in it, and I now make smoothies almost daily. I really like this blender. I have made pie crusts in a food processor before to save time but never a blender. I thought the only way it would be possible to make a pie crust in a blender would be with a Vitamix and that's just not true. This Ninja pro blender works just as well on a budget. So if you want that Vitamix but don't see that large price in your budget, go with the Ninja.I will say that although I don't mind, I am not impressed with the plastic containers. It's not something to complain about. I'm just not impressed. I would imagine that having plastic containers means they don't last as long as other glass blenders. I don't wash this in the dishwasher because it said not too in the package. So my plastic pieces still all look new, even after daily use over months.One warning, I'd like to put out there about this blender is, the main blade(not the nutri blade) is so sharp you should be very careful washing it by hand. I believe one of the reasons this blender works so well is that it has extremely sharp blades. But you need to be careful cleaning them. I have cut my fingers and so has my husband. Its so sharp that those cuts look like paper cuts. But in my opinion that's a good thing for blenders because it helps them work well.In short, the Ninja Pro is plastic, not dishwasher safe, and the blades are CRAZY sharp! BUT! It works very well and the savings over similar products makes it well worth the price. Enjoy!

Author: Bunny Rodriguez
Title: Five Stars
Body: Bought as a gift for my husband and he loves! Works amazing

Body: I have had plenty of blenders for my smoothies and post workout shakes. None have been better than this ninja. There overall brand is great and the blades that go to the top of the blender make quick work of any thing inside. You can make smoothie shop quality smoothies every night with this. Strongly recommend!

The new one would probably be what I need for smoothies. The big hopper is great for making soups and salsas. Makes things smooth as needed or just barely chopped.

Title: Carafes don't last. Been through 3... all cracked at the bottom.

Returned and got a replacement thru Amazon.Within two weeks, the carafe from the new one cracked at the bottom and started leaking. Dealt directly with Ninja and after much back-and-forth, received a new carafe.Within three weeks, the new carafe cracked at the bottom and started leaking.I have no desire to see if another new one will last four weeks or not. Author: carriemay
Title: Best kitchen investment I've made in years
Body: To be honest, I'm not sure what I ever did without this thing! It's so easy to use and blend SO QUICKLY. I make a big batch of smoothies every two weeks and freeze in mason jars for morning breakfasts. I was using a small single serving blender before and the process would take at least 30 min, now it takes 10 min with prep and cleanup included! The blades are attached to a stem so you're not just blending from the bottom but be careful as the blades are sharp and the stem is not fully attached to the blender if you turn it upside down to dry. The complaints about it being loud are definitely true but hey, you're getting a blender, what did you expect?! Definitely glad I bought this and happy it will last for years to come.

Author: LastDays
Title: Great sort of bulky blender
Body: I got this blender to make smoothies. I was using a cheap 30 or so dollar blender for years and it was always a strugle to get that thing blending since it always made air pockets and you'd have to stir the contents and try again. After using my mother's vitamix I decided I needed a new blender. But I didn't want to pay an arm and a leg for it.I saw the ninja on sale and swooped on it, my days watching the 3 ninjas and karate kid as a child had finally paid off as I was able to subdue this guy with no problem.THE BLENDER: I was a little dissapointed at first with how bulky it is, the three blades and the clunky lid are kind of awkward at first. But I am satisfied with the performance. Can't expect the performance of a machine 4 times it's price, right? I mostly use the pitcher to make my smoothies because I like to make bigger 28oz smoothies for my breakfast. But the single serve works fine.One thing I've noticed when looking through reviews is complaints of the pitcher cracking and lid warping. All I have to say is stop being lazy and wash your ninja by hand. It seems to me that you won't have any of these problems with hand washing.Cheers

Things don't spew out, but the crack is growing and little droplets appear on the side. Why so specific on the date? I had until July 28th to return it and I noticed the crack today, July 30th - i.e. it lasted less than a month!! A replacement is $70 so I'm currently 'risking it' until I decide what to do. Disappointed and waste of money now, although I appreciate I have probably just been unfortunate as so many people seem to love it.

Body: I bought this on a whim on Pride Day, and I haven't had buyer's remorse yet. It works better than any blender I've ever had. The only time it's not been able to blend ingredients is when I didn't add enough liquid to the mix. It's a breeze compared to past blenders where I've had to unclog the blades after nearly every pulse.I primarily use this to make smoothies for myself, which makes the two small. single-serving cups it comes with perfect. I get just the right amount of smoothie, there isn't much to clean up, and it's quick.

Super-sharp blades (be careful when cleaning your Ninja!), and a powerful motor crush ice, and pulverize whole fruits and greens in seconds. Fantastic, affordable alternative to a Vitamix, I just hope that it holds up over the years...Time will tell. Highly recommended product!
