Author: John
Title: Yes, yes, YES!
Body: What in the world have I been waiting for!! Works lime a charm. I feel classy now!

Author: Peggy C.
Title: What a great upgrade!!
Body: What a great upgrade!! I've had the Ninja 900 Watt blender for a few years and have loved it, but this one is a nice step up. It's quicker, quieter and I can blend, chop, grind more of anything at one time.

Author: Paul N Morris
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very nice. Does everything I want it too.

Author: Cleigh
Title: Love it! Got it at a great price on ...
Body: Love it! Got it at a great price on prime day. Love using the smaller cups for personal smoothies and shakes.

Author: Crystyle
Title: Best blender!
Body: Best blender I've ever owned. Blends things in seconds! Wish I bought one sooner!

Author: Cat fanatic in US
Title: This is a monster
Body: This thing is a monster. I got it to crush ice. It makes it sno-cone size. Love it. Just may save my teeth.

Author: Anna F
Title: Great blender. Replaced our 15 year old cheap blender
Body: Great blender. Replaced our 15 year old cheap blender. Can not believe we didn't do it sooner. Makes smooth smoothies with the full pitcher or the personal sized ones.

Author: SassC
Title: Game changer
Body: Day one of this blender was a game-changer for me. I love the suction cup base and easy to use power panel. The smoothie cups are GENIUS and now my whole family is making smoothies more often. I also used the blender to pulverize Oreos for a pie crust. Worked like a charm! I have used cheap blenders for most of my adult life, but now I understand the difference that high quality can make. If you're wondering whether or not it's worth the price, IT IS.

Author: Abby Welch
Title: Perfect blender for the price
Body: We previously had a blender (Cuisinart) that when purchased we thought was good quality, but not does not even compare to this! We've had this for about two weeks now and have used it for smoothies and margaritas. It crushes ice and frozen fruit to the perfect consistency. The best part of the whole thing though are the blender cups. So genius for on the go! (Hoenstly, the actual blender part is huge, so the cup size is a lifesaver!)

Author: Gina Sipple
Title: Best blender
Body: I have gone through many blenders, ones on the cheaper side and moderate side, not ready to buy an expensive one. So glad I finally invested. I use it daily. Love the cup attachment! Powerful and blends very quickly. So worth the purchase.

Author: EC Craig
Title: High performer
Body: Been very happy with this item and really appreciate the Ninja cups. It has no problem blending frozen fruits and ice into delicious smoothies. Frozen, whole strawberries are too large even for the large pitcher so I soften them up in the microwave before throwing them in. I haven't tried any vegetables yet.

Author: Mrs
Title: Decent blender, but dangerous blade assembly caused us a visit to the ER for a laceration to a child's foot....
Body: The blender works well. I have only used it a couple of times since receiving it three days ago, but it appears well made, feels strong and sturdy and makes short work of ice cubes!However, there is a dangerous flaw to the design of how the blade assembly sits in the jug. The blades are razor sharp, which is to be expected on something that will be used to chop and cut, but the blade assembly does not lock in to the blender jug, it is only secured by applying the lid. There is a small warning stuck on top of the lid that states the blades are sharp and loose, and liquid should only be poured through the spout with the lid on. We made smoothies yesterday and removed the lid to check the consistency and add milk. When we were happy, we poured several cups. My son poured the last cup, and as he tilted the blender, the blade assembly slid out and fell to the floor.My daughter, who was standing next to him, suffered a deep laceration to her foot after the blade assembly hit her on it's way down.She has an one inch laceration that required 5 stitches at the ER. The cut was very deep, the blade almost went through the foot.I feel we were very lucky that she did not suffer a more serious laceration. Given her standing position, the weight, sharpness and fall trajectory of the blade assembly, the injury could have been much worse. It's not an exaggeration to say she could easily have suffered a laceration to her arm or leg resulting in damage to the radial or femoral artery.It's hard to believe there isn't some form of friction or locking mechanism to stop the blade assembly slipping out as easily as it does.

Author: ellen
Title: aweful
Body: I would do on stars if that was possible -- could not even make a simple smoothie without it over heating. Europe can have it. Keeping my bullet.

Author: T. Presswood
Body: Love it! This is much better than my vitamix!

Author: happymom
Title: Five Stars
Body: This makes great smoothies and shaves ice quickly. Great product for the price!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Works amazing!!!
Body: Love this blender!!! I had to replace mine and I've heard nothing but amazing things about Ninja, I was not disappointed!

Author: Elisa
Title: Quality of the product?
Body: I just received my blender and I am totally in love with it. However, I don't know If they all come like this or if its it a defect? are they all scratched?

Author: Laura White
Title: Perfect!
Body: Got it over a week ago, I've used it everyday (sometimes twice a day, shhh), I've used the larger pitcher and the single serve ones. It has worked perfect each time. Blends ice in a matter of seconds, blends large frozen strawberries in seconds. I even made some baby food with it! So far so good, we absolutely love it. I read reviews something about the lid not going on write, if you line up the arrows and put it on, it goes on fine... I've had no issues. Made a large batch of mudslides last night too, worked perfectly!

Author: Ann W. Turner
Title: Appliance is the Bomb
Body: This appliance is the bomb! I can't believe how handy it is. I make shakes daily (for health and weight loss) for lunch, using frozen berries, yogurt, o.j. etc. And you can mix this all up in a smaller container with its very own blade attachment, then pour into another container, same size, with a drink top. So cool. Love this.

Author: Martha Moore
Title: Great for blended drinks
Body: We wanted a blender powerful enough to crush ice so we can make mint juleps and other blended drinks. This blender is designed to do that and also to make smoothies. It has a large glass container with multi-level blades, 2 small containers with smaller blender blades, and a recipe book for drinks.We also wanted a blender that could chop vegetables, such as onions, without making mush. This blender is NOT designed for that. I plan to also buy a Ninja food chopper.

Author: Laura Kircher
Title: Disappointed because the blades looked great
Body: This blender has a major design defect. You can not remove the rubber gasket in the blade compartment to clean it. We called the company to inquire and they agreed it can not be removed. I have a magic bullet that has the same rubber gasket and I remove it and clean it. You would be surprised at the amount of gunk that gets under there that you can't see without removing it. I can only imagine what would be growing in there if it were not cleaned. Disappointed because the blades looked great.

Author: David Spontak
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product. Use several times a week with no problems.

Author: tea-pop
Title: Ninja rocks
Body: Great deal of the prime day. Just pop frozen berries and OJ into the cup for an instant smoothie! Packaged with some starter ideas, but easy to get creative with smoothie concoctions. A bit loud, from the ice crunching power! Nice compact form factor, high quality plastic smoothie cups.

Author: anita k
Title: WOW!!
Body: What was I waiting for!! I absolutely love this blender! It is leaps and bounds better for making smoothies than my Oster was. So quick, powerful and has great safety features. Don't put it off like I did. Ditch the less powerful blenders and take the plunge. You will not regret it!!

Author: Harmanpreet
Title: As advertised!
Body: Its exactly what you pay for! Fantastic product especially on a lightening deal!

Author: E.
Title: Five Stars
Body: Awesome!

Author: Mr. Positive
Title: and I'm super pleased with it
Body: Bought this on Prime Day, and I'm super pleased with it. It makes much better smoothies than I was making with my KitchenAid blender.

Author: S. Friedland
Title: Just as good as the big guys.
Body: Works just as good as those far more expensive machines. I had both the Vitamix and the Blendtec and, while they were very good, this one is terrific at one-quarter the price. So far it works very well.

Author: Jeffery or Lindsay
Title: love it
Body: I bought this to replace an old Ninja. I am very pleased. The little blender cup is the best.

Author: J
Title: Best blender!
Body: The most powerful blender I have even owned.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: I cant find anything wrong with it

Author: JANWHITEHEADHOLLISTER
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love

Author: Pat
Title: Love
Body: Works according to description. Love it

Author: Laura Finiol
Title: Doesnt work at all, zero power!
Body: Doesn't work! I can't even find a way to contact seller. I just wasted over a hundred bucks.

Author: JerHenning
Title: Five Stars
Body: Wife loves it, all that matters.

Author: Eas
Title: The blender itself is great; easy to clean
Body: The blender itself is great; easy to clean, easier to use. The Ninja cups' lids have a slit on them that is not re-sealable (you can't close them and toss them in a bag or expect them to stay cool). Buy other cups but otherwise a great blender.

Author: Roadrunner
Title: Love it.
Body: Have wanted one forever. Finally bought it on Amazon prime day for great deal. Love it.

Author: FAS
Title: Disappointing. Kitchen Aid so much better
Body: I bought the ninja after so many friends raved about it. I was replacing a kitchen aid 5 speed diamond blender. There's really no comparison, the kitchen aid is superior. It took three times as long to crush and blend ice in a smoothie. In a second smoothie veggies stayed chunky, which is never an issue with the KA, plus I had to scrape the sides repeatedly. I expected great things with all those blades. Super disappointing. Plus six blades on a loose stick? Seriously?Pro: quieter than KA and suction cups on counter were nice. But since the KA takes a fraction of the time to do better work, I'll stick with KA.

Author: desertislandgirl
Title: Easy smoothies
Body: Just used this for the first time and I love it. Nice design, extremely sharp blades. Crushed frozen fruit in an instant to make a hassle-free smoothie.

Author: Daniel W
Title: This is a fantastic blender! We've only had a it a few ...
Body: This is a fantastic blender! We've only had a it a few days and we've done smoothies and frozen drinks with it so far! It's great!

Author: Nikki
Title: ... this blender on Amazon Prime day so got a great deal. This blender is a beast
Body: I purchased this blender on Amazon Prime day so got a great deal. This blender is a beast, cuts through ice for smoothies like its butter. Makes great milk shakes. Although, my husband does complain it's a little loud.

Author: William F Heckler
Title: Four Stars
Body: Awesome blender .... crushes ice well for smoothies...a bit noisy

Author: X. rays
Title: it looks like you can put large fruits in but the result ...
Body: I am not sure why but when I use it to make smoothy it takes longer time than my other smaller blenders. From the picture, it looks like you can put large fruits in but the result is not so good when I tried, a lot of big chucks left in the smoothy. I also tried to blend green vegetables such as kale leaves and left it on for about a minute. It did not break the leaves small enough.It takes very short time and blended well when I blend instant oak meal. It feels better when blend dry ingredients.With so many good reviews, I did not keep the box. I would return it to try other brand if I could.

Author: Sarah F.
Title: ... got this blender on Amazon Prime day and I love it so much
Body: I got this blender on Amazon Prime day and I love it so much! Love even more than I got it for a bargain! I've used both the big blender and the single serve, no complaints :)

Author: Dantes
Title: So sharp you'll cut yourself
Body: This thing could probably blend metal. Use it every morning for frozen fruit. Replaced my d $25 sunbeam which had trouble with ice. Word of caution. When retrieving the blades from the dishwasher make sure you are focusing on your task and grab carefully. I've cut myself twice on the blades (100% my fault).

Author: Mr. Bill
Title: It blends
Body: It blends

Author: Tragically Hip Fan
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it! I have been wanting to get one for a while. So glad I finally did.

Author: Sangfroidgnome
Title: Not a professional" blender"
Body: Seems to blend well, and that is the most important thing.I picked the two-star rating for other reasons, such as, the terrible safety features built into the lid and pitcher, which makes use difficult.The lids which screw on the single serve cups have no closure mechanism to seal them, which is the primary function of a lid. The single serve cups also have locking tabs, but they make the cup pointy and uncomfortable to hold.I am also offended that they use the adjective professional when in fact this is only for home use, isn't anyone holding marketing accountable? Words have and meaning, and I think Ninja should not be able to advertise falsely.

Author: Laura Amini
Title: I used it probably a couple of dozen times and it was fine at first
Body: This worked well until now. I used it probably a couple of dozen times and it was fine at first. Now it leaves chunks of carrot and parts of spinach in my smoothies. A lot of money to pay for something that worked well for such a short time. VERY disappointed!

Author: Jescolben
Title: Perfect
Body: Got this for a great price on Amazon Prime day! Best blender I have ever purchased. My son LOVES making snow cones with it. And I love making smoothies with it. It easily blends anything. My friend has a vitamin, and I think this Ninja works better.

Author: GrizzlyAdams
Title: I have to say I am very impressed with the Ninja Pro blender and highly recommend. I bought this as a gift for my ...
Body: I only post reviews for products that I feel very strongly about whether positive or negative. I have to say I am very impressed with the Ninja Pro blender and highly recommend. I bought this as a gift for my wife, however, I use occasionally and love this product. Some of the features that I like the most are the flip top to easily pour, the removable multi level blades to thoroughly blend (and I would imagine easily replaceable, if needed), the powerful motor and the option to just use the individual size container. The only minor complaint that I can think of is the combination of the large container on top of the base is too tall to fit under our cabinets on the kitchen counter and requires to lift the suction cupped base for each use. Although the suction cups provide stability and is a safety feature, it's kind of annoying lifting each time. Highly recommend this blender set.

Author: JKneazle
Title: Five Stars
Body: Absolutely love it!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Perfect!
Body: great thanks!

Author: Frank
Title: The suction cups on the bottom are really sturdy, and allow you to step away while it ...
Body: This Ninja blender was a HUGE upgrade from the first edition. The suction cups on the bottom are really sturdy, and allow you to step away while it is running without fear of the blender committing suicide over the counter. The flip top is not only great for pouring, but it also allows for creating emulsions or adding stick to your sauce while it is running.

Author: Gigi
Title: Great item to purchase
Body: This is worth every penny spent. And I got this at the right time, Prime day. Can't wait to see what else comes out of this...

Author: Camille Patchoski
Title: Great Purchase!
Body: When my blender broke I knew I wanted to replace it with a Ninja. I didn't know how much I was going to love it! The single cups are awesome. I have a protein shake every morning so it so handy to blend, put the lid on and go. I only used the big blender once and it was great for margaritas with friends. Best kitchen investment I made in a long time.

Author: Zina S.
Title: Great for On the Go Drinks!
Body: This blender is amazing. It works quickly & efficiently, while the to go cups are just the right size for me to prep a breakfast smoothie and go. It's the easiest way for me to get my daily dose of fruits and veggies, while never failing to disappoint with the smoothness and timeliness of the drinks produced.Best kitchen electric purchase I've made all year!

Author: Avery Gordon
Title: This product is absolute garbage! It feels extremely cheap
Body: This product is absolute garbage! It feels extremely cheap, the blades are dull, It doesn't blend properly and it is way too loud! I don't think it will last more than 1 month.

Author: Mariaant
Title: A little bit disappointed
Body: I was so excited about this purchase and everything looks right but my blender looks like someone used it already :-(, it looks cracked from the bottom and also the blades look like they are used and broke from one side (attaching picture)

Author: Andrew C
Title: Five Stars
Body: easy to put together and start right up great value looks great works great

Author: Doug138
Title: Ninja Blender
Body: Received this product yesterday and tested out the 72 oz blender and it performed excellent. This morning we tried using the to-go containers to make smoothies and they do not work that well. I had to remove them from the blender a couple times and stir the contents by hand and then continue blending. Other then the to-go blending this is a great blender. I will just blend our smoothies in the big pitcher and then pour them into out Yeti cups.

Author: John Henry Davis Jr.
Title: Five Stars
Body: SWEET

Author: rob silla rosie rex loki
Title: Five Stars
Body: Perfect blender. Makes awesome smoothies and crushed ice as well

Author: Deanne Miracle
Title: Absolutely love this blender
Body: Absolutely love this blender... I wanted it to make healthy smoothies. As soon as I got it of course I had to try it. It blends everything I put in it....fresh strawberries...blieberries...spinach...etc. I also love that I got it a great price.

Author: Mike
Title: Ninja chop
Body: It blends great. The girlfriend loves waking me up in the morning with the lovely sound that is this thing munching ice cubes for her smoothie.Suction cups on base is a great feature.Overall happy. I do wish it came with more smoothie / single serve bottles.

Author: Michael McM
Title: Love this blender I use it every morning for my ...
Body: Love this blender I use it every morning for my smoothies as I get ready to go to work and the travel cups make it a breeze gives me just the right amount and no mess.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: If you like chunks of ice and other food particles not blended ...
Body: Don't believe the hype. Really know what you want in a smoothie BEFORE making this purchase. If you like chunks of ice and other food particles not blended well in your smoothie - buy this right away! If you desire a smoothie, chunk-free smoothie - look elsewhere.

Author: Yvonne DeSuza
Title: Five Stars
Body: The best Blender I ever bought.Good product to buy.Y. Desuza

Author: R. Wright
Title: I didn't know what I was missing!
Body: I'm a person who doesn't replace things that still work, but I got tired of fighting my blender every morning. On the recommendations of friends, I bought this Ninja blender, and WOW, am I impressed! This thing chews through frozen fruit, kale, and ice in no time. The stacked blades in the blender jar mean that I don't have to constantly stop to push the ingredients down to the bottom, and the fact that they are removable makes it SO easy to get the blended items out of the jar, and so easy to clean! When I'm just making smoothies for myself, I LOVE the individual cups! The design of the cup pulls all of the ingredients down to the blades, and the whole thing is just so fast and easy - just rinse the blades, replace them with the travel lid, and you're ready to go. Perfect for busy mornings.

Author: Jon Keith
Title: Amazing What a ninja
Body: AmazingWhat a ninja

Author: Carol C
Title: Don't Recommend
Body: I purchased this a month ago to make smoothies with. The individual cups worked great but the lid to the main blender absolutely wouldn't snap on. After several days of talking with Ninja Kitchen on Facebook, they sent me a replacement. This one works okay but the lid is still not a strong fit. So I will probably avoid using that and continue to do the individual smoothies instead. I have had some trouble getting the blade piece to easily screw onto the cup. The threads don't seem to match well. One time I screwed the blade into the cup and turned it on; it leaked all over the place. I also find the suction cups on the bottom very annoying. They cling to my quartz countertop like barnacles to a ship, making it difficult to quickly and easily move the blender around. Overall, the blender does a decent job but due to the problems mentioned I wouldn't buy the blender again.

Author: Nubia
Title: UN-Smoothie
Body: Horrible; spilled ingredients everywhere. Veggies still in cup unblended, messy cleanup. I just wanted an easy convenient way to make daily smoothies, this product was not it. Item being returned asap.

Author: tncdel
Title: I mostly use the blender simply to blend fruit together ...
Body: I mostly use the blender simply to blend fruit together with whey protein powder. And I have found that, owing to its square shape, it is inferior for that purpose to a conically shaped blender, such as Oster, Waring, and Black & Decker manufacture and sell at a fraction of the Ninja blender price, and just as durable. For any type of powder will be trapped in the corners of a square blender because it is powered centrifugally in a circular vortex.

Author: Mary Beth Haines
Title: it's easy to clean
Body: Just started really using it. It has the power and ability to do whatever I need, which I cannot say for all blenders I've had or used. Plus, it's easy to clean. Seeing the unhappy review about the sharp blades, have been careful about cleaning them, and so far, all is great!

Author: olivia
Title: It's a good blender for the price
Body: This has been a good blender, works brilliantly. The Nutri Ninja cups are very useful as we only make enough for two people. They do have the quirk of spilling over sometimes, but that's only if you get the quantity wrong - put more or less of the ingredients than the MAX size limit listed on the cups, and you get smoothie all over the place. If you follow that max line, though, you'll have no problems with it.

Author: MissyM
Title: Nice big capacity, great blade, we use daily!
Body: We love this blender, it's better than our nutribullet as it holds more and has blades all the way up the middle core piece instead of nutribullet that only has blade at bottom. Nutribullet was nice for smaller single serving smoothies, this has much more capacity.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender! Much quieter than the my last Ninja
Body: Great blender! Much quieter than the my last Ninja

Author: Deakbs
Title: Powerful and loud
Body: I have yet to even try the actual big blender part of it, I've just been using it for the cup part to make smoothies. I was a little disappointed when I found out that even this couldn't handle this special mixture I make of honey, and some various types of seeds. That mixture broke my last blender and I bought this one because it was the most powerful but even the ninja still sort of gets slowed down with this mixture and doesn't blend it all too well. I also was disappointed to find out that when your using the small cups to blend smoothies and such that you can only use one setting or one speed. Then other speeds you can only use when using the big blender cup. This blender is pretty loud and I live in a studio attached to my landlords house. Luckily my landlords are really chill and also going a little deaf.

Author: Lenora Zatarain
Title: Three Stars
Body: wish i waited and purchased at Costco where i would have gotten more for same price

Author: Matthew L. Evans
Title: Awesome. Crushes ice
Body: Awesome. Crushes ice, blends smoothies, makes margaritas, feels powerful when it turns on. A big improvement over my old blender. My only complaint is for some reason, on mixed drinks with ice, it seems to not crush the ice small enough - I'm constantly getting relatively small ice crystals caught in the straw. Its a minor complaint though and it may be I can find a way to fix that problem through better blending. THe stand alone device is a cool idea and is good for making single shot smoothies.

Author: Stma
Title: really great blender. use it every day and works for ...
Body: really great blender. use it every day and works for small portions for one/two persons,and for a larger group. Definitely recommend it!

Author: Kelsey Mullen
Title: Doesn't even work! I spent all of this money ...
Body: Doesn't even work! I spent all of this money on a defective blender. The lid doesn't fit on properly and won't depress the pin far enough so the blender doesn't work at all! So frustrated!!!

Author: Rhiannon Berglund
Title: Great blender at a great price
Body: Love this blender. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because some water gets inside the lid when washing. Just have to give it a good shake to get most of it out.

Author: Stephanie K.
Title: The blender itself is great, smoothies are a dream
Body: We use the single-serve glasses daily for smoothies. I hadn't thought about them for breakfast before, but they are so quick it's become part of our morning routine!The blender itself is great, smoothies are a dream, and some sauce bending works pretty well. Says not for use with hot liquids, but room-temperature or a bit warmer seem to do just fine.Only issue I've had is that I got a little bit of smoothie from the singles into the lock mechanism for the singles. Tough to get it to seat sometimes. So wipe everything before you install, even if it's just a little bit!

Author: Derby
Title: Product is perfect but cap was defective first time
Body: Product is perfect but cap was defective first time. Ninja sent me two new ones. Both work great. But had to wait a week.

Author: Lou
Title: Five Stars
Body: This has to be the best blender I have ever owned

Author: Elizabeth Corcoran
Title: Five Stars
Body: Excellent product.

Author: Timothy Scharf
Title: Four Stars
Body: Good quality! too​ bad it's plastic!

Author: ganache
Title: Blender changed my life forever!
Body: I bought a Shark Rocket vacuum, and decided that since this was the same company, Id give this blender a try. Absolutely perfect in every way. A real powerhouse at your disposal!

Author: Ricardo C.
Title: Take care of the little cups
Body: If you are not careful you can scratch the little cups everything else works perfect.

Author: Zhanyou xu
Title: Five Stars
Body: love it

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: perfect for family
Body: Love this bundle i make smothies for my kids everyday

Author: Jamie Grapes
Title: Must have!!!
Body: Absolutely amazing product!! Definitely recommend it! Made a smoothie this a.m. in under 30 seconds!!!

Author: lisa
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love love love it!!!

Author: brendavargas
Title: TOO SHARP TO HANDLE!!!
Body: If you are purchasing this product, be extremely careful! The product was poorly packaged. My husband sustained a deep laceration that required treatment in the ER after this product's blades fell on his foot. There were no warning labels indicating that the blades were not secured or attached to the container. I cut my hand when I attempted to secure the blades! This is definitely NOT a product to have in a household with children.

Author: Jose M Hernandez
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender its no joke

Author: Tracy in FL
Title: Five Stars
Body: It's Soooo fast!

Author: Lisa F.
Title: Ahhhh-mazing blender.
Body: It REALLY pulverizes ice. I made Chocolate Almond Milk ice cubes to toss in with a little banana and peanut butter and it's so smooth and creamy. Love this blender.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Need a full refund I believe I got a bad batch and I refuse to pay shipping for the third time
Body: Bought it in March and in May the base stopped working..they nicely sent another one after I made contact..then that new one was received but also stopped working in early june...

Author: Thomas
Title: It rocks
Body: My wife is the main user of it and she loves it. She says it is much better than our last GNC blender.

Author: Ryan
Title: rendering it completely useless. Looked it up and apparently many others have ...
Body: Got the blender set up and it wouldn't start. Realized that the locking mechanism for the handle/lid wouldn't click into place and that the lid was defective, rendering it completely useless. Looked it up and apparently many others have had the same problem. Went out and bought an Oster, much cheaper and works just fine. Don't waste your money or your time.

Author: Nida Syeda
Title: It started working fine for couple of days and then the small cups ...
Body: It started working fine for couple of days and then the small cups were not working. Every time I try to put the individual cup on the machine, it's more like kept blinking like it's not ready . We are in the middle of making an exchange for the individual cups part but the big grinder is working just fine .

Author: Nicole Jeppesen
Title: Best buy ever
Body: Great product, in our home we use it every day, before this one we bought a kitchen aid blender, that kitchen aid blender was piece of s...This Ninja blender best product ever.

Author: Mateo B.
Title: Not Bulletproof
Body: It broke the second I put warm water in it, 2nd time ever using it. The main container is NOT heatproof. And I'm talking about literally one cup of coffee being put in. NOT SUITABLE for Bulletproof Coffee.

Author: Nehtor
Title: This thing does a better job with the single cups than that one did ...
Body: So far I am loving this blender. I had a Cuisenart before this that would get stuck every time I tried to blend. This thing does a better job with the single cups than that one did with anything. The full blender does even better. I have created shaved ice multiple times without issue. The only complaint/wish that I have is that you could get glass instead of plastic for the pitcher part. Before I even used it, I scratched the plastic pitcher with the blades. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great blender that does not cost $500 dollars!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great Blender!
Body: Love this blender. Definitely worth the money. Have only used the small container, it does everything.

Author: Shirley Groves
Title: Loving the great smoothies and frappes the Ninja blender and smoothie feature ...
Body: Loving the great smoothies and frappes the Ninja blender and smoothie feature makes! Now I couldn't live without it. Really crushes ice!

Author: M.B.
Title: I use this blender DAILY and it is awesome!
Body: Ignore all the negative reviews. I use this blender DAILY and it is awesome!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great product!!
Body: Love it!!

Author: Joan
Title: Five Stars
Body: I've made some delicious smoothies in the Ninja!

Author: Melanie E. Outen
Title: Best blender ever!!
Body: I love having the individual cups for my protein shakes and it chops up ice like a dream!

Author: Caco Fonix
Title: Base Unit Coupler Gear Striped and no way to replace it
Body: Purchased 3 years ago, we never liked it since it is EXTREMELY noisy. The threads to screw on the smoothie jar are too fine and takes a few tries to engage. Have never used the blender jar. Only used it for milkshakes. And now the coupler gear in the base is stripped. Called support. Am surprised they have Sunday hours and the support person was American. She said Ninja did not offer spare parts but she could offer a discounted unit. Since we were never happy with this purchase in the first place, I politely declined.Am surprised this scores 4.5 stars on Amazon. Have purchased a Vitamix but still need a smaller blender. Will go for a Cuisinart or Breville this time.

Author: Bob C
Title: Makes single-serving smoothies in just a few seconds
Body: Excellent; very powerful motor and compound blade turns ice into snow in just a few seconds. We use the single-serving features to make a smoothie for my mom almost every day.

Author: Amanda
Title: love it
Body: best blender for the money! does the job!

Author: Joe Belcher
Title: Five Stars
Body: Awesome blender.

Author: Leathe
Title: A bit loud and can't handle spinach/kale
Body: Large capacity blender, does the job. Quite loud which is standard. Didn't puree spinach/baby kale within a smoothie recipe unfortunately, I am left with visible leaf bits even after 5 minutes of blending. I will probably get a vitamix next with the plan to make smoothies with veggie ingredients.

Author: Petorius
Title: Worked Perfectly 4/13-6/17
Body: Bought 4/13 died 6/8/17. Just ordered a new one. Love this blender--worked perfectly for just over 4 yrs, making ice into perfectly smooth coolness. I smelled and felt the bearings burn out when I was making a smoothie tonight, so I logged-in to see exactly when I bought it and order another. FYI there is a 1000w one and I bought the 1100, which is what I would recommend for a few bucks more. I also bought the 3-yr warranty this time too, since I make more smoothies than before...

Author: Anon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works perfectly.

Author: Jim Murphy
Title: Five Stars
Body: The Best blender Ever!!!

Author: Lauren Shirk
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love this blender!!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: The ninja professional is a great blender and I would recommend it to anybody who ...
Body: The ninja professional is a great blender and I would recommend it to anybody who is in the market for a new blender.

Author: Andrew and Lynda Ferante
Title: Love!
Body: Best blender I've used, I even use it to purée food for my 10 month old baby girl ❤️❤️

Author: Kim O.
Title: Highly Recommendable
Body: Excellent refurbished product. Came in original packing and looks and works like new. The travel blender cups are fantastic for single servings. Will continue to seek out certified refurbished products - have yet to be disappointed. Highly recommendable!!!

Author: Christen L Murray
Title: Best thing I ever bought for my kitchen!
Body: I love this blender. I am so glad that I did the research and picked the Ninja over other blender/food processors. This one can really take a beating and does an EXCELLENT job of making purees, juices, soups and the like. I use it all the time. It is very easy to clean, has done great in the dishwasher and doesn't show any signs that it could burn out or get over heated.

Author: Bub
Title: Powerful machine!
Body: Use it almost everyday! No problems. Super powerful. I'd buy it again! My favorite part of the entire machine package is the individual cups for smaller jobs. Get it!

Author: Kelly
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love, love, love this machine! Chops, blends, creams.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: I like it!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works great!

Author: The Brit
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great power to this blender. Creates my green smoothies without a problem! Loving it so far

Author: AngieH
Title: I LOVE our new blender
Body: I LOVE our new blender! I use it every day for smoothies. Most of our smoothies have frozen fruit in them so, after reading the instructions, I always pulse a few times first to break up the frozen fruit and then blend. Love it!

Author: Raymond Proulx
Title: Three Stars
Body: Works very well but difficult to assemble.

Author: jason stoudmire
Title: Five Stars
Body: loved it

Author: Marcos Guo Yan
Title: One Star
Body: It broke and I have no assistance overseas

Author: Robert hanger
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender!!

Author: Griff
Title: Professional grade!!
Body: Best blender I've ever used....love the safety features

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Piece of junk
Body: This blender is junk. Im being honest. We are a Vegan family and use the blender almost daily. Every single morning my smoothie is left with chunks of fruit or greens and it's is quite unpleasant! We purchased this bc it is quite inexpensive compared to the Holy Grail- The Vitamix. Needless to say I am actively saving to replace this piece of junk. Save your money!

Author: lou hunt
Title: Best Ever
Body: So much better than Magic Bullet!

Author: Lynn
Title: A great blender!
Body: The best blender made! Period.

Author: Jeanne Ann Cassotta
Title: It works great and fast
Body: I use my blender every day, especially for puree of tomatoes for ravioli and macaroni sauce. I also use it to blend fruit drinks. It works great and fast, takes only a little time to whip up something fast and delicious.

Author: Dr. Bee
Title: Two blender units have cracked after about 4 weeks, do not buy
Body: I loved this blender when it worked. I bought it in Jan 2017. The blender unit cracked after about 6 weeks. I called Ninja and got a replacement blender under warranty. I was impressed that they sent it to me so easily (maybe I should have been suspicious?). The new unit lasted about 4 weeks and cracked. Both units cracked on the bottom of the blender. I'm not going to call for a warranty replacement because I'm not expecting another unit to perform any better, and it's wasteful to keep getting a plastic blender that will ultimately be in landfill.What are we blending in here? Just protein shakes, with ice, frozen fruit, and protein powder.A silver lining is that the smaller portion individual size containers are working fine, so we can make small smoothies. I was doing this previously with a small oster unit that I got for about $20, so it's hard to justify this huge blender sitting on my counter.Summary: DO NOT BUY.

Author: victor zamudio
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very satified with our first Ninja Blender.

Author: Jermaine Johnson
Title: Five Stars
Body: Thee Perfect Blender

Author: Fernanda
Title: Perfect!
Body: Excellent product! I use evey day for my morning smoothies and it's awesome! Super powerful and easy to use/clean. Love it!!!!

Author: Aj
Title: Love it!
Body: Seriously in love with this blender. It's a monster and super easy to take apart and wash.

Author: professor1950
Title: DOes the job!
Body: Does the job! I dropped one of the small cups in the sink and it cracked. Very fragile quality (of course I know that I was the one who dropped it)

Author: anna k.
Title: Five Stars
Body: great for every day use

Author: The Shark
Title: Works great.
Body: Very loud, but what blender isn't? Works great.

Author: VeggieMunch
Title: The Best Decision I made
Body: The best decision I made for a kitchen gadget. The cleaning is convenient. The food retains all the fibre and the two additional containers make it easy for both my husband and I to have our choice of fruit mixes.

Author: mnmzg
Title: Blends nicely
Body: Very nice blender so far. It blends up fruit and ice nice and quick.The only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is because it is quite loud, and it's unfortunate they don't sell extra cups at a reasonable rate, because it'd be nice to have more than 2.

Author: Desiré F.
Title: I really like the fact it sticks to the counter because it ...
Body: It's an absolute treat to have this. I bought it on my journey to eating healthier. It's been an incredible help. I really like the fact it sticks to the counter because it has grips at the bottom of the base if that makes sense? It's not easily moved or knocked down. While I don't have kids or animals. I'm a clumsy person and love the added security.

Author: maria
Title: Five Stars
Body: Excelent!

Author: GatorMan
Title: Buy it - you will love it!
Body: This review is really going to be simple. It works great and we love it!. We like the individual cups much more than we thought we would. We make smoothies in them all the time and the clean up is really simple. When we want to make something up in the bigger pitcher, it's a breeze as well. Both the cups and the pitcher clean up easily. The power behind both of these is better than any other blender we have ever had. This was a really good purchase and we recommend it to everyone looking at them.

Author: Private Customer
Title: Good powerful blender
Body: Wow, these blades are super scary! They will slice your finger fast. We just barely grazed one and got a cut. So be careful. Other than that, it's a great blender. The small cups and large container are all plastic. I wish it was glass, but I couldn't find this style of blender in glass. It's pretty powerful (and loud). It will blend ice and frozen fruit with no issues. I think it's a good design. Overall, we are happy with it. It's more powerful than our last one.

Author: HDG
Title: Love it
Body: Love it

Author: Tweeda
Title: Five Stars
Body: Absolutely LOVE!!!!Best bkrnder Ive ever owned!

Author: Angela C. Duggan
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love this blender! Exactly what it says, works great.

Author: Sarah Brown
Title: Not for Smoothies!
Body: I purchased this blender for smoothies and it did not blend well at all in the big container or the smoothie cup so I had to return it. They gave me a full refund so thank you for that!

Author: Sam
Title: It stopped working after a few months
Body: This was a great product that we loved, for a few months. Then suddenly, it completely stopped working.

Author: AnHoKa
Title: Does it All!
Body: Does it All! Everything they claim is accurate, and I couldn't be happier with my Ninja!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Beautiful blender, very easy to use, and very sturdy. Amazing for its price in all honesty.

Author: Benne
Title: Awesome
Body: AWESOME. Would recommend this product highly!! So easy to use and it runs great!!

Author: Brittney Lacy
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love that I can make individual size smoothies without having to clean the entire blender

Author: SofoniMichel
Title: Single Serve Cup Not so Great
Body: Awesome blender! The single serve cup, on the other hand, not so much. The blade for the single serve cup got stuck the second time I used it. I spent hours trying to remove it and even injured my hand. Apparently, this is a manufacturing issue and is pretty common but Ninja has yet to address it. The seller responded quickly when I informed them about the problem. They couldn't help but they did provide me with a partial refund.

Author: MaryAnn m.
Title: Great Blender
Body: Using this machine always daily. Have to purée most of my food as I have swallowing difficulties. Excellent machine which does exactly what I bought it for!

Author: Meghan Lee
Title: Great blender for the price!!!!
Body: Great blender for the price!! Changed my green smoothies completely!

Author: Someone in Ashburn
Title: Love it
Body: Love this blender. I got this blender in the beginning of February and have used it just about every day since. I primarily use the smaller cups for my morning smoothies, but the big blender works really well to break up ice and frozen fruit as well.

Author: Ahmet Kuzey
Title: I like it. Works great
Body: I like it.Works great!

Author: Ron
Title: Why buy something more expensive when this one does the job well!
Body: We replaced an expensive blender ($400) that died after 5 or 6 years (old blender died with metal shot flying out everywhere) with this blender. We researched many more expensive ones and then decided to try this one verses buying another $400 or $500 blender. It is very powerful and straight forward to use. It is powerful and easy to clean too. We really like the cups that come with it for a quick personal smoothie! The design for pouring is very nice also! We have had no issues chopping up ice, ice cream, sherbet, yogurt and fruit (apples that were sliced, bananas, avocados, pears that were sliced, strawberries, raspberries, blue berries, celery, peanut butter, peanuts and a lot more. It has been two months using it and we really are glad we purchased this blender as it does everything we need - smoothies, shakes, deserts, puddings and energy drinks!

Author: Mary S.
Title: Single Serve Cup is LIMITING !!!! Why can't we get additional sizes to work ?
Body: I like it - but I think I should have more choices than a 16 oz. Why can't I get a 20 oz or a 24 oz ?

Author: Rick E
Title: The bar for blenders gas been raised.
Body: I had owned traditional blenders in the past. This Ninja Professional blender blows away the old style appliances. I use it to puree squash to make butternut squash soup. This application separates the men from the boys. It performs fantastically!

Author: Sam
Title: Awesome!
Body: I would recommend this... it is a little difficult to clean, and it takes more counter space than I thought it would! It does a fantastic job with smoothies!

Author: Onlineshopperforlife
Title: Pretty good product
Body: Good for smooth but not making juice, but it is not a juicer so that's okay! The blades are super sharp. The top has a very good seal and it is easy to clean. We use it almost daily to make smoothies. I just use frozen fruit without ice and it works well

Author: Lori
Title: You need this blender
Body: I use it every morning to make a smoothie for breakfast and every weekend for milkshakes! Crushes ice like a champ!!

Author: Precious
Title: I love it
Body: One of the best things I ever bought. I use it every day.

Author: Christina C.
Title: Four Stars
Body: Works great!

Author: Froggy
Title: WORKS GREAT THIS FAR, BUT HAVEN'T GIVEN IT ANY TASK TOO CHALLENGING!
Body: So far I am in LOVE and wish I had purchased this sooner. The multiple blades on the Ninja pro do a great job blending all my soups. I use the smaller container to grind flour (don't ask) and smash up garlic and herbs. The best test for this would have been blending up raspberries to see if the ninja was able to bust up the seeds any. I am not currently including berries in my diet, so I may never find out the answer to the question. I haven't put anything too hard inside, but it's easy to clean and I was able to get rid of my mini bullet blender as this has the bullet attachment that works with the same base. That's great when you are dealing with a small kitchen, the fewer things to store the better.

Author: BK
Title: awesome blender
Body: So glad I upgraded my blender! This has worked perfectly for making soups, smoothies, and any overall blending. My only wish is that the individual cups had a fully closed lid in case you want to make a smoothie ahead of time.This blends ice and frozen fruit really well and have used it for cashew based creams/dips and it has blended everything perfectly!I previously used the magic bullet and this blows that away, everything blends much quicker with this.

Author: Sierra
Title: Vitmix has some competition
Body: I'll be honest... I was in the market for a Vitamix but sadly I missed a great sale & promotion for one. So I decided to buy a Ninja till the next time a great deal comes along...Needless to say... this blender is awesome! So easy to clean. Great safety features. Over all just a great blender. Be careful with washing the blades... sharp! But that's the good thing. Recommend this!

Author: Scott M
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works great

Author: Jodi Kitson
Title: This is my third blender and the best so far
Body: So far we are loving it. We drink smoothies every day. It doesn't blend as smooth as a vitamix (a friend of mine has one), but it works well for the price! This is my third blender and the best so far.

Author: Cristi
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works perfectly! We make smoothies at the office every morning. 👍

Author: Kayla Johnson
Title: Best Blender!
Body: Great blender! Glad I purchased this over the Vitamix

Author: Alex V
Title: Five Stars
Body: I've been using this daily for smoothing.. it rocks..

Author: Lisa
Title: love it
Body: Works great love it no more to say

Author: CB
Title: Meets Expectations & Value
Body: Its a bit loud but an outstanding value 1100hp for under $100. Hand washing the blender itself is okay and attachment and all dishwasher safe pieces and parts which are designated to the top shelf

Author: Michael
Title: Five Stars
Body: Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it.

Author: Fabgabulous7
Title: Horrible design - leads to leaks and aggravation
Body: I have to say I'm disappointed. Using the full size attachment doesn't work as well as I expected. The food tends to stick to the side and the blades don't reach. It never does a great job of truly blending chia or flax seed or fresh greens in smoothies which is what I was hoping for. Smoothies never turn out truly smooth. The biggest issue though is with the smaller single serving attachment. I use this literally every day for my bulletproof coffee in the morning. The way the cup/blade is designed it is very easy to twist the blade attachment on slightly crooked which results in either 1) the green button to blend won't go on, or 2) it leaks and creates a huge mess as soon as you turn it upside down because there isn't a good seal. It's a horrible design. Again, I use this every morning and 80% of the time I have to rescrew the blade on at least 3 or 4 times before I can get it to work with a good seal. It's a pain in the neck but I spent so much money on this blender and can't invest in a new one right now so I'm stuck with it.

Author: blas
Title: Five Stars
Body: Very good item

Author: Jaimie.b
Title: Love love love
Body: Love love love! Be careful with the double blade as they can be somewhat painful if handled incorrectly. It has stood up to everything I've put in there, including an entire pitcher of ice which my old blender would fly apart into pieces if I were to try something like that.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it!!!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it. Great size, easy to clean.

Author: Derek Hill
Title: Two Stars
Body: Probably a good product, but it broke a week after using it

Author: Ariel
Title: Ninja blender is awesome! Love how easy it is to use and ...
Body: Ninja blender is awesome! Love how easy it is to use and it's very durable with frozen items. :) I highly recommend!

Author: CJ Miller
Title: This was perfect for our needs
Body: This was perfect for our needs. We especially like the easy cleaning that is allowed by just removing the inner blade. It took some getting used to on removing it from the stand; but overally a great blender. Love the added 1 person cup too. That is great for one perons use.

Author: J. Lee
Title: Four Stars
Body: The blender is awesome, its right up there to my Blendtec but like 1/4 the cost.

Author: Albert J.
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great power!

Author: Vegas Steve
Title: Love the company (their coffee maker is great)
Body: Love the company (their coffee maker is great), dislike the blender. The blender worked ok for a couple years of really light use. Then it started dropping tiny black bits into whatever I blended (like plastic bits). That, plus the darn blades are WAY too sharp when cleaning, and I won't be replacing it with another Ninja. Gonna bite the bullet and buy a Blendtec.

Author: Ann Priest
Title: I am very disappointed in the quality of this blender
Body:
I am very disappointed in the quality of this blender. I bought it two and a half years ago. I've used it only for one smoothie a day during the spring and summer months. I'm nearly sixty years old and have bought many different blenders over the years. This is the first one that had the motor go out. In the past, I've given away blenders when I wanted to buy a new one because they never stop working. This is the most expensive blender I've ever bought. It's also the poorest quality to break down so quickly. I was told that I could buy anew motor base for $100. I see no reason to do so. I always try to buy quality with the expectation that the product will last. Unfortunately, this product didn't last. 
  
 Ninja Professional Blender & Nutri Ninja Cups (BL660)

Author: Tony
Title: Four Stars
Body: I like it alot.

Author: TrueVirgo
Title: A ninja it is not!
Body: Great blender but the name is pure irony because it is SO loud. We don't make smoothies in the morning because we don't want to wake everyone in the house up.

Author: mhaia
Title: Five Stars
Body: wow

Author: orlie Perez
Title: Five Stars
Body: LOVW IT

Author: arriazac
Title: The single serve containers are too small!
Body: I bought this item at Best Buy using the price match with Amazon. I was shocked of how small the single serve containers are. I thought it was the same size as the one that came with the first ninja bullet (have the comparison on the photos). I don't plan on using the blender one as much as the single serve options due to only having my husband who drinks kale smoothies every other day but I thought having the mistaken thought of the old single serve containers and a big blender for $100 and higher watts for the same price as when he bought the first version of the ninja 4 years ago, I was like let me get this instead when we have visitors and need to make a lot of smoothies. To my disappointment of how small the single serve containers are, i was just shocked. They should have at least made the single serve containers 20oz instead of 16oz or better yet kept the same size as the first ninja bullet containers. Those were perfect for single serve kale smoothies(small) or 2 servings of smoothies (taller) haven't tried the 72oz, like I said it'll be used when I have visitors or when I make my Jamba Juice imitation smoothie. I'm glad the 72oz is also a food processor, I can make basil pesto now. I haven't used it but hopefully the blades will be ok and will not rust or anything. The older version of the single serve ninja we had bought 4 years ago started melting metal in which we realized was going inside our smoothies(it's when black junk and copper looking shavings are showing under the attachable blade. Therefore we decided to get another one. The problem I have with this for single serving, it's great that you do not need to push down anymore but you have to press the single serve on your own. Wish you can just touch it once and it does its thing on its own for 30-40 seconds, not continuously pressing on the button.

Author: Plinio M.
Title: Really good but the personal cup blender does not a so ...
Body: Really good but the personal cup blender does not a so good job as the blender pitch does! Could improve. Otherwise absolutely good specially comparing its price with the others over double price professionals brands! I'm pleased with this product anyway and would and did recommend it for a friend.

Author: Dcg
Title: Awesome. Wasn't going to drop $300 bucks on a ...
Body: Awesome. Wasn't going to drop $300 bucks on a blender and I'm glad I chose this one. Does exactly what I need it to do and I don't find it to leave smoothies gritty. Perfect

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Good
Body: So far so good, I only need 10 seconds for everything to be blended perfectly. I usually blend protein powder with fresh fruits like strawberries, blueberries, mangoes, avocados, and collagen pills (those giant ones you get at Costco, 6 pills a day). Just make sure not to fill over the Max line or blend for too long, the machine will howl.The machine is loud but your neighbor should be able to stand it since it's only 10 secs of noise. It's worth noting for those who expect absolutely no fragments, my smoothies still show tiny tiny specks of fruit skin and vitamin pills, but far from the point where you'd choke on fruit bits.The blades are super sharp, be careful because I got a small cut by just accidentally touching the blades while washing.

Author: Ralph
Title: Very good quality
Body: Has very good power, well designed cups, relatively easy to clean.Very functional overall.

Author: artcentric
Title: Good smoothie maker
Body: Love this blender to make veggie fruit smoothies with hemp protein and supergreens for my skinny teen. The individual serving cups blends better than the large container because I often have to stop and mix the top portion where the powder sits or an occasional fruit chunk. Overall pleased with it as an affordable option to the other popular name brand.

Author: Ampogm
Title: We love our ninja!!!
Body: Got this as a replacement after our son did not secure a lid on our old one and spilled milk and lord knows what else inside of it. We can't live without our ninja! We use it everyday. The blades never seem to ware down, the quality never lessens so Long as you don't dump a gallon of milk over it. We used to be bullet fans (and it was a great cheap little blender) but we wore it down after a year or so. Our ninja lasted for years before our mishap :) ninja is the way to go!!

Author: Tacoma247
Title: Five Stars
Body: good.

Author: Doris
Title: Breaks easily.
Body: Gear shaft is plastic. Breaks easily.

Author: Indiana Mike
Title: To-Go Cup Lids Don't Seal... WTF!
Body: I give it a 3 out of 5 stars... the pitcher is a lightweight clear acrylic of some sort ant at the base, where the blade rotates, it looks like there are tiny stress cracks on a brand new unit. Oh, and their To-Go lids don't have a way to close it like you would expect from a to-go drink holder. Come on man! I make a smoothie and want to take it on my drive to work but your Ninja lid doesn't fully enclose. Lame engineering.I haven't tried their single smoothie maker yet. Kind of sucks that the to-go cup lids don't fully seal. I'm stressing this... remember 3 out of 5 stars...Other than that, it makes great smoothies so far. The motor seems adequate enough and the blades are super sharp as they should be for a brand new blender. Hope it lasts 25 years like our old blender.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product!

Author: Marc
Title: Pretty good. Not very good for dishwasher. Ice won’t spin as video shows
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Not very Good for ice! I would like to have liquified vegetables like spinach, but it left it a little bit choppy. Another problem they should fix is that when in the dish washer, food get stuck at the upper area as the picture shows. I drilled a few holes to let it out as part of my invention

Author: raymond.benning
Title: Best blender buy.
Body: We had many blenders in our life-time but this is by far the best. Plenty of power and refines the food you put in it better than any other we had. I use the smaller container mostly though. Happy with this product.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I am very happy with it
Body: Monster power. I have not had the Ninja Blender to long. But I have used the full size blender as well as the individual mixer cups. I have also used it to make an oreo crust for a dessert. I am very happy with it. Smoothies as easy as pie. Blends almonds so perfectly in the smoothie no big chunks. Ice cubes no problem. I clean after each use. I make sure it is completely dry before storing it for the next use. Just common sense. I have read about some complaints about the individual mixer cups leaking..... I say again COMMON sense. Don't over fill past the mark on the cup and make sure lid is on correctly you will not have a problem. Packaging was great, no way to move around in the box to get damaged. LOL... unless it is a UPS delivery...... They may lose it..... but cant damage it........ I Would Recommend !!

Author: NinjaMom
Title: This is AWESOME!!
Body: This is AWESOME!!!! There are three blades and three setting with a pulse setting as well. I use this to make smoothies and it does a fantastic job. My husband said they use these in a commercial kitchen and restaurant setting (he is a Chef) and they are the best. Just buy it, you will be glad you did.

Author: LB
Title: The blades work excellent where my other blenders have struggled with frozen fruit
Body: I wish I bought this years ago. I can make 5 days worth of shakes at once. The blades work excellent where my other blenders have struggled with frozen fruit. The only drawback is it's tall so I need to move it out from under the counters to use it, but the suction cups make it a pain to move.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: A blender for everyone!
Body: I'm not a big blender user, so it was with much trepidation that I bought this one. I didn't like the idea of lots of attachments; i have a small kitchen and don't need a lot more clutter in the house. But this was well rated, so ..It came in an immense box. Upon opening it, I discovered the manufacturers were ingenious. All the packing was cardboard, completely recyclable, in origami like folds, could be folded out flat! This was probably more exciting to me than the blender itself.The blender is huge. It doesn't fit under any of my cupboards. It also has suction cups on the bottom, which, in operation, are a good thing, but during the time you are not using the thing, is a real pain in the butt because it sticks to the surface and is hard to move and impossible to slide.Ok, I've finally used it. One, to grind sprouted grains, and then also to make smoothies. It works great! and surprise, I have found myself using one of the little extra cups, to make small shakes or grind small quantities of things. It is easy to clean, and easy to use. I really like it! I tried grinding ice first thing because that's something a lot of people were discussing, it does that well too. I think this blender is a keeper and I recommend it.

Author: AlliG
Title: This is the most amazing blender!
Body: This is the most amazing blender!!! I highly recommend it, i wish now i had purchased the one with the food processor because i am so in love with this product!Update. Unfortunately after about 5 months of use the blades are dull. Using for smoothies only and the blades have dulled and barely blend things anymore. Eaves my smoothies chunky. Dissapiunted

Author: Amazon Customer Fernandez
Title: Five Stars
Body: Amazing

Author: Pen Name
Title: Please make sure all of the accessories are actually in the package.
Body: Ninja works great... I can only use the cups because a lid never came in the package for the big blender......

Author: Alexis R.
Title: Great Blender for the Price
Body: The price of this blender is hard to beat. Makes great fruit and vegetable smoothies! Not bad at making margaritas either!

Author: Tom
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works good

Author: Nicholas A. Young
Title: Great blender, love individual cup option.
Body: LOVE this blender. The individual cups are so handy and this thing blends ice like it's nothing. I will say, when they tell you be careful washing the blade, take it very seriously! I sliced my finger really bad on the main blade because I was using a rag and didn't realize it would cut through the rag. Guess that's why it chops ice so well...

Title: Five Stars
Body: a bit too loud but good

Body: Absolutely loving this blender. Best on the market!!!

Author: JandR

Author: Juan Hernadez
Title: I was like wtf
Body: Works great! I seriously recommend this for anybody blending fruits or vegetables or even ice. I was amazing like wtf amazed at the shredding power of this thing! Within 1 - 2 - 3 seconds everything was liquefied. Now lets just hope it lasts for years and not 1-2 years like every god damn blender I got on sale at walmart.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Best Value !
Body: We got into juicing. Well, juicers only use half the fruit or vegetables and leave allot of waste. We use this to juice, and it works FANTASTIC ! No matter what you put in it, carrots,ginger,apples,etc. It cuts them so, so, fine, that it comes out as juice! A small amount of pulp, and I do mean small pulp is left in the drink. We got the two cups that come with it, and we really love the cups. Because you can make just a single serving if you want. For 100.00 it is a great value. My mother spent 350 on the bullet. The ninja works just a well at 1/3 of the price !!

Author: Kay
Title: Five Stars
Body: Works great and even better than the Vitamix. We would definitely buy again.

Author: Simon
Title: Such great value!! Buy it now!
Body: I am obsessed with this blender! I can't believe it was only $100 compared to the cost of similar ones like VitaMix. My first impression was how amazing the packaging was when I opened it! Packaging in general is usually annoying and not very intuitive. This packaging was so clever, with finger holes which made the smaller boxes easy to pull out of the large box and easy open tabs. I assembled it all in just a few minutes. Then when I used it I really loved it! The triple blade action blends very well. Although it is large it looks nice on the counter. I can blend five smoothies at once so I make them on Monday morning and refrigerate them in to-go cups for the whole week! Cleaning is easy too. The couple of issues I have had is that big chunks of frozen fruit don't fit below the top blade so they are hard to get started. Also the blade itself is not attached to the bottom so if you pour too far (flip the blender completely upside down) the blade falls out so I have had to learn this lesson with smoothie splatter all over the sink and counter.

Author: dkdenergy
Title: More Fragile than Expected
Body: I am so excited about this purchase! It is perfect for the price. Was hoping to get a Vitamix but the prize is way too steap compared to the Ninja, I'm very happy that I went with the Ninja Instead! The quality is great, sharp blades, and two blender cups. It's a perfect blender for the price and will last us for many years. One thing I don't love about it though is the button latch lid. I prefer a more basic rubber top like the Vitamix because it's quicker and easier to clean. The lid and parts take special care to get clean and I'm worried about the button or handle breaking. The plastic parts seem less durable than other brands. We got the warranty though so I'm still happy. Overall, I love this blender!

Author: David
Title: Great
Body: I have used this blender just about every day since I received it. Having the 2 blender cups is really great and convenient and this thing is powerful.

Author: GreenAdam
Title: Very nice, but very LOUD!
Body: Nice package, excellent blender, lots of good information provided... but this sucker is about as loud as a Top Fuel Dragster with your ear pressed against the exhaust pipe.

Author: L. Allen
Title: Five Stars
Body: WOW! I am so impressed with the performance of this!

Author: Mike McGirr
Title: Piece of crap. Don't buy.
Body: Horrible product. The lid was supposed to snap into place, but somehow in the assembly line creation, the alignment was off, so the lid wouldn't snap closed on top. This triggered some weird thing where even if you turned the power on, nothing would happen. It looked like there was some metal rod from one corner of the lid was supposed to insert into the top, letting it know it was sealed and ready to activate. So essentially, I purchased a product I couldn't use because the pieces didn't fit together. And because of the complex packaging which I threw out, too much of a pain in the ass to even return to amazon, which I would do in a heartbeat if I could.

Author: tennisbob
Title: Highly Recommended
Body: I bought this to replace my Nutribullet which was leaking badly, had a small capacity and smelled like smoke if I ran it for more than 45 seconds. I chose the Ninja because it was highly rated by consumer reports and the Nutribullet was lowly rated. I am very glad I bought this. It never leaks, it makes smoothies much smoother than the Nutribullet, has a much larger capacity and costs about the same. If I want to make an individual serving I can but most of the time I like to have a couple of large glasses of a smoothie and the Nutribullet or single serving size of the Ninja is not enough. This is worth every penny of the $90 and the Nutribullet in comparison should cost about $30 because it is 1/3 as good but it is way overpriced at $90 at most stores. The only negative is the pitcher doesn’t wash well in my crummy dishwasher but that might just be my dishwasher. Either way it is easy to wash by hand and probably prolongs the life.

My only wish was that one of the Nutri cups that comes with the blender have a sealable top; I love bringing some to work for a snack and ended up having to carry it vs throw it in my bag as the top doesn't have a closure setting.

Author: Katrina
Title: Does NOT do good with kale!!
Body: I dislike that you have to release the lid lock every time you want to open the blender up. Little bits of whatever you're making all get stuck in the pour spout and are difficult to get out. The first time I used the blender, there were multiple big chunks of ice in there - and I even blended a second time after I saw them the first time. I make a smoothie with protein powder, liquid, kale, and ice. The kale never completely broke down. It was like having to drink grinded up pieces of kale with every sip (and I let the blender go for several minutes!).I returned the product after giving it 3 good tries. For all the wonderful reviews, it didn't live up to its expected quality for me.

Title: Great power!
Body: Great power!! The large blender really allows you to make a large batch. I love that it comes with he smaller personal blender cup too.

Author: Potts
Title: I love the single serve option
Body: My biggest complaint about this blender is not the blender itself at all. It works very well. I love the single serve option. I actually bought this blender for the sole reason that it had the single serve option. I have next to no time in the morning when getting ready for work so to quickly make a shake and not have to clean anything is amazing for me. However, here's the big problem. I cannot get the lid off the to go mug. I drive an hour to work and enjoy my shake. Immediately upon arriving at work I always go the rinse out my cup. Well, it's super glued on. I mean to the point that it won't budge to come off. I asked 2 strong men to try to get the lid off and they cannot. I appreciate that the to go cup is durable and won't leak on me when in transit however, it poses an even larger problem that I can't get the lid off to clean the cup. Like I said the blender works well. I do not have any complaints after using it for one week. I'm just warning you that if you are sold on the single serve option, this is a pain in the butt.

Title: Changed my review
Body: I changed my review because only a few months after using, the top button for the small bullet blender broke. Unfortunately their website is not very user friendly and cannot use warranty through the website or via email.

Title: Excellent blender. Both blenders blend really well and can ...

I tried making healthy banana ice cream by freezing bananas and blending them in the blender - it turned into a perfectly smooth, thick consistency I was looking for.

Body: Good Stuff first: It really blends well. Everything is thoroughly pulverized including frozen fruits, ice and think yogurt blends.Bad Stuff: The blender only runs on single serve if you physically hold down the button which if fairly inconvenient. The single serve cups are also too small and are not enough for me (a lean 23 year old girl.) For that reason, I pretty much have to use the large container making purchasing the combo useless.

The blades are for more of a rough cut. If i have the time, i have to re blend them in the smaller cup portion which has a more traditional blender blade. This model would probably be good for margaritas, but not so much for smoothies. If you like them chunky though, this blender is for you.

Title: 1100 watts Ninja Professional Blender!
Body: So far this is a great purchase. I think the price was pretty good and I love that it comes with two (2) 16 oz. single serve Nutri Ninja cups with to-go lids that are dishwasher safe and BPA free. I have seen different Ninja products with lower wattage at discount stores but I didn't want a ton of attachments and they did not have the the XL 9 cup capacity. I didn't want to buy a smoothie maker and a blender... I wanted both in one and here it is! This has a 9 cup x-large capacity with a (caution -very sharp!) multi-blender blade. It does a great job and is terrific if you want to use it instead of pulling out the food processor for some things. Has a nice lock in place safety feature and t's very easy to use. I read other reviews about how big it is, but it sits on my counter under the cabinets with a little room to spare. Happy I waited for this particular model and feature combination.

Title: The blender worked great until I put whole frozen strawberries in the small ...
Body: The blender worked great until I put whole frozen strawberries in the small cup, at which time the rotation coupler was destroyed. No biggie its a $4 part. But wait they do not sell the coupler for this machine they want me to buy a new one. The coupler will ware out on any blender eventually. For them to not offer a replacement option is bs as far as I'm concerned. I will throw this thing in the trash and buy a different brand.

Author: The 2000 Man
Title: Pitcher broke after two years.
Body: I purchased the Ninja Professional BL660 blender from Amazon in March, 2015. At the time I would have given it a 5-star review. It is easily the best blender I have ever owned. I use this blender about twice a week, mostly to make smoothies. It powers through ice and frozen fruit with ease. However, after a little less than two years (as of Feb., 2017) of use it has developed some problems: 1) The rubber gasket on the lid has become warped and misshapen. I suspect this is the result of being run through the dishwasher. So despite claims that it is dishwasher safe, it looks like it is not. 2) Shortly after this was purchased a piece of plastic broke off the bottom of the pitcher. It didn't seem to affect it though so I kept using it. A few days ago one of the plastic tabs that holds the closed while the blender is running broke off. Upon closer inspection it looks like cracks are developing around the other tab. A replacement pitcher and lid is available on the Ninja website and from an Amazon seller. Despite this I will buy the replacement parts and keep using this blender, but I'm not happy about it. As I mentioned it is a great blender and probably as good most blenders costing much more. I am attaching photos detailing the problems I have encountered. My advice is to always hand wash, but be really careful with the crazy sharp blades.

Also, when I add kale I need to run it for quite some time to break it all down. All in all, it's a great value. I use it everyday and I can't imagine using a regular blender.

Title: Longer Term Usage
Body: I've had this blender for several years but have only had two periods where I actually used it. First, the bottom assembly smokes now and has always smelled like burned rubber. The cover on the larger assembly is a problem; there's no way around stating that. It sticks; it breaks; it's finicky. The single serve is a great option but if you want a decent size shake, you have to chop everything super small (waste of time) or keep taking the cover on and off to add more ingredients. My single serve often becomes warm before the shake is smooth. It rattles and vibrates to the point of suspicion that it shouldn't be used anymore. I'm trying the Nutribullet Max.

Author: Mammatus Books
Title: Solid and powerful; with a funky blade
Body: I use this blender daily for green smoothies. It has sufficient power and durability to take the abuse that I've put on it for about 2 months now. The only reason I knock off one star is that the blade is an interesting configuration that makes loading the blender somewhat difficult. Rather than just one section of metal blades at the bottom of the pitcher, as is customary in blenders, this model of Ninja has a long 'tower' that runs through the center of the pitcher with a series of blades along the column. The column then rests in a small divot in the underside of the lid. One one hand, this blade does a superb job pulling all of the material in and chopping it all up beautifully without the necessity of a spoon or plunger to move material toward the blade. The down side is that loading a large quantity of spinach -- the first item I put into the pitcher for a smoothie - requires some finesse ... and some forcing to get it past the blade all along that center column. So overall, I'm pleased and I would indeed buy it again. I can't fault the design of the blade since it is superb for keeping material moving, but for the narrow purpose of leafy greens, it is somewhat of a pain.

Author: Brittni Page
Title: The blades are SUPER sharp, so instead of hand washing them or ...
Body: This blender definitely lives up to the hype. We bought one for my father to replace an older blender that broke in our dishwasher. After seeing the package we decided to finally bite the bullet and get one for ourselves. This thing is a beast! It crushes anything you throw at it with ease! I worried from some reviews about the sides being plastic but that doesn't seem to be slowing this blender down. The blades are SUPER sharp, so instead of hand washing them or risking the damage in the dishwasher, we put hot, soapy water in it and let it run. It gets all those nooks and crannies we might normally miss and we don't lose fingers!I've had a magic bullet before, so I was a little weary of the single serve cups. Turns out, those blades are just as sharp, if not sharper! The downward pull helps everything blend quickly. I have not had to blend anything more than 20 seconds with the single serve cups.My only complaint about this blender is that I can't figure out how much stuff to put into the big container to make just a couple smoothies. I always end up putting too much, and now we have a bunch of containers of ice cream in the freezer. I'm sure I'll figure it out some time, but I'm glad to know that I could make 5 or 6 smoothies with no problem!

The motor is very powerful, but started making funny low key sharp sounds when in use after using for a year. Also, the steel that the blades are made of, is of very poor quality in my opinion as it dulls very quickly, and no longer blends to a smooth consistency.
